original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>You are blessed to walk the foundations of Pharloom.<br>Humble yourself before the shells of those who gave their lives to hold our kingdom’s weight.
original_zh_text: 关于飞行员。&lt;br&gt;我很幸运拥有一台Mac。&lt;br&gt;面对那些为承受国家负担而牺牲生命的人们的遗体，我们感到谦卑。

original_en_text: <hpage>You are wrong, Lady...<hpage>I knew the wish, and the price to achieve it. And now, across these many ages, I have only come to know it better...<hpage>Strength... in mind, in care, in claw. Strength enough that I may live to see a world better than our own, or to craft a world as I desire. <hpage>That was the wish, of my mother, of my mentor, and of you...<page>...Indeed, spider... So much pain you must have passed to speak our hope so simply...<page>For her you become... who knows clear our desire, and has seen full the darkness beneath our house, I would show you the gift...
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;“小姐，我错了。"&lt;hpage&gt;我知道这个愿望以及实现它的代价，现在，多年后，我对它有了更深入的了解。&lt;hpage&gt;权力是.生存的能力就是比我们自己更好地看待世界，创造我们想要的世界。&lt;hpage&gt;我的意志，你的意志，我的意志。&lt;page&gt;...事实上，我们必须忍受很多痛苦才能表达我们的希望。&lt;page&gt;上帝知道我们的愿望，可以看到我们家里的黑暗。

original_en_text: Coral sways,<br>Clear water flows,<br>Upon our river free of time.
original_zh_text: 珊瑚在颤抖。&lt;br&gt;随着水的流动，&lt;br&gt;没有时间去河边。

original_en_text: Witness, the first light. The only means we possess to resist that void with which our family is forever linked.<page>Reach forth, child grown strong. Wrest it from this remembrance. Burn yourself free from our sad fate...
original_zh_text: 用自己的眼睛看到第一缕光芒是面对与家人永远相连的空虚的唯一方法。&lt;page&gt;随着孩子们长大，他们变得更强大，从记忆中抹去，并从悲惨的命运中解放出来。

original_en_text: ...Ignore them, daughter... their whispers...<page>...Greater, grander... Weaver, guardian, queen... Those are their desires... not your own. Certainly not mine...<page>...Only if you resist them, you might see it, another hope... beyond...<page>...But to recall these words, in time so far... Will you even remember me, child? Could you?...<page>...A mother... before the mask... before I lay forever in duty...
original_zh_text: ...不要注意那个女孩和她的低语。&lt;page&gt;...韦伯、迪恩、雷吉娜，这是你们的愿望，我……...不是我是&lt;page&gt;...只有反抗，我们才能看到更多，看到另一种希望。&lt;page&gt;...但当你回头看这句话时，你还记得我吗？“如果你--”&lt;page&gt;...在我母亲戴上口罩之前，在我永远承担责任之前。

original_en_text: ...Show us your craft, child...<page>...Show it splendid, as only we can teach...<page>...Prove yourself more Weaver than Wyrm...
original_zh_text: ...这证明了他们的能力。&lt;page&gt;...因为我们是唯一可以教他们的人。&lt;page&gt;...他看起来更像个恶魔。

original_en_text: At water’s source,<br>And coral’s heart,<br>Our lord born last to rule.
original_zh_text: 泉水，&lt;br&gt;珊瑚之心。&lt;br&gt;上帝生来就是国王。

original_en_text: ...She called us daughters... Called us divine... She lied...
original_zh_text: ...她称我们为女儿，称我们为圣人，而我撒了谎。

original_en_text: ...Alas... spider’s child...<page>...For our ways you will think us harsh... You will think us uncaring, unrepentant...<page>...And so we must seem, for such is the cost of our wish...
original_zh_text: ...¡哦，是的！蜘蛛的儿子。&lt;page&gt;...他们认为我们漠不关心，没有遗憾。&lt;page&gt;...这是我们为愿望付出的代价。

original_en_text: ...She called us daughters... She called us divine...
original_zh_text: ...她称我们为女儿，称我们为圣人。

original_en_text: ...We are life... We are growth... What world without us?...
original_zh_text: ...我们是生命，但我们是在一个没有我们的世界中长大的吗？

original_en_text: ...Good... Better...<page>...Yet still you will need to be faster...<page>...In time, they will come for you... Those who fear your nature, and those seeking to claim it...<page>...To survive our world, you must learn to sting... swift and sudden...
original_zh_text: ...好吧好吧&lt;page&gt;...但我们必须做得更快。&lt;page&gt;...他们害怕自己的本性，想要确认自己的本性，他们最终会来找你。&lt;page&gt;...为了在这个世界上生存，我们必须学会如何洗澡。

original_en_text: ...Our claws to crush... Our claws to rule... Our claws to save them all...
original_zh_text: ...我们的武器摧毁了现有的武器，挽救了我们的武器。

original_en_text: ...To dance... And love... And end... Together...
Pilgrim<br>May these fields of flame sear away all impurity.<br> That you be granted ascendance to the verdant lands above.
original_zh_text: 关于飞行员。&lt;br&gt;让火烧掉不洁净的东西。&lt;br&gt;您有权降落在上面的绿地上。

original_en_text: ...Better a child spun mad... than none...
...Better a child spun frail... than none...
...Better a child spun pure... than them...
...For her light... eternal... our song sustains...
original_zh_text: ...永远，你的光芒和音乐将继续存在。

original_en_text: We speak the wish of the Master Herald,<br>he who signs an Age’s end.<br><page>Under chapel fallen to the monarch’s might,<br>Over camp collapsed to the black thread plight,<page>Scorched field on edge, shells black and burned,<br>Up towers spinning, near the surgeon spurned,<page>Cage of one who raged against the silken lie,<br>Fell heart of frost, who soars on high,<page>Past cradle’s peak, last test of fitness,<br>That the age may pass, this shroom its witness.
original_zh_text: 古人的愿望。&lt;br&gt;谁将在本世纪末签署该协议？&lt;br&gt;&lt;page&gt;当王国掌握在教会手中时，&lt;br&gt;地球被一条黑线覆盖。&lt;page&gt;大地将燃烧成红色，树皮将燃烧成黑色。&lt;br&gt;塔倒塌了，附近的外科医生被拒绝了。&lt;page&gt;笼子里的人对丝绸非常生气。&lt;br&gt;它从冰中心坠落并爬得很高。&lt;page&gt;经过最后的测试和准备，&lt;br&gt;时间不多了，这就是证据。

original_en_text: ...How we hunted... How we sang... My children, I saw you glorious...
original_zh_text: ...你怎么唱歌？怎么唱歌？伙计们，很很高兴认识你。

original_en_text: ...From our Silk... A child born loyal...
original_zh_text: ...丝绸一个忠诚的儿子诞生了。

original_en_text: <hpage>So, the Herald visits this land too...<hpage>If he is here, now, then great change or a savage end is inevitable. He would care to see nothing else...
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;该报访问了该地区。&lt;hpage&gt;如果他现在在这里，巨大的变化和残酷的结局将不可避免。
维坎波酒店附近的景点

original_en_text: Ah... I understand, stranger. I presume too much of one who is not a flea.<page>I’ve heard the settlement below us is setting up a wishwall. Perhaps I’ll send Grishkin down to hang up our wish...<page>
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。我觉得你看起来很奇怪。对于那些不是跳蚤的人来说，有很多意见。&lt;page&gt;据说下面的村庄建了一堵愿望墙，所以也许他应该派格里什金去实现他的愿望。"&lt;page&gt;

original_en_text: Bug not flea, my learnings, all have been scratched to your maps. Can give no more.<page>Leave now! Seek and save lost fleas, for a caravan full and whole!
original_zh_text: 昆虫不是跳蚤，我的教训就在你的地图上。&lt;page&gt;走吧，走吧！寻找并拯救丢失的跳蚤并建造一个完整的商队！

original_en_text: Have you met her yet? Our burly new companion, Vog! Fresh returned from a long time spent tracking.<hpage>We have met, Fleamaster. It gladdens me that so strong a flea exists as her.<hpage>Yours was a caravan sorely lacking for protection, and I am too bound by my own tasks to provide it for you.<page>Why, we would never impose so! And now, no matter! Her scent may be strong, and her taste for brew bottomless, but her skill is sharp.<page>If predators draw close, her talents will provide much confidence to our caravan.
original_zh_text: 你以前见过他吗？她的伴侣从《Vogue》的长途旅行回来了。&lt;hpage&gt;我看到了，斯特拉总理，您很幸运拥有如此强大的芯片。&lt;hpage&gt;“我无法保护你，因为我的任务受到了攻击。&lt;page&gt;好吧，我们永远不会强迫你这样做！现在我很好！啤酒香气浓郁，味道难以形容，但技术精湛。&lt;page&gt;随着捕食者队越来越近，他的天赋将给球队带来信心。

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? Would you seek service of me, ehh? Mine is knowledge much, the places of the lost little ones, heard and smelt across the caves.<page>You could help find! And bring! For all to come together now that times turn dark...<page>But no map you hold! If learnings are wanted, a map must be owned. Until then, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: 如果你停下来，昆虫就不是跳蚤，不是吗？我们需要服务，对吧？你在干什么？我听到并闻到了这些小东西，了解了很多关于失落洞穴的位置的信息。&lt;page&gt;时代变了，我们团结一致。&lt;page&gt;如果你想了解一封信，你需要一张地图，现在你什么也做不了。

original_en_text: Our travels have end, and now soon the world will also have end! At such bitter of times, brew with friends is most sweet.
original_zh_text: 我们的旅程结束了，世界也结束了。和朋友一起喝啤酒是在这些艰难的日子里你能做的最甜蜜的事情。

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, sir flea. I see you were able to unite safely with this caravan.<page>Oh yes! All thanks to you! Dear, sweet you! Heh heh!<page>The Fleamaster, that old bore, tells me to call you Miss Hornet. But such a prickly name ill befits such a delicate beauty! Shall I call you something prettier, like ‘Nectarsweet’, my dear?<hpage>You shall not. Address me by my name or not at all.<page>Gradak! Of course. Of course! Heh heh. And now, I shall let you in on my little secret. My carriage doubles as a soothing spa, you see. It’s most ingenious.<page>The water inside is piping hot, and purer than a psalm! Heh heh! I’d gladly let you soak inside, for a modest fee!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;您可以安全地参与这次护送。&lt;page&gt;哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦，是的！谢谢你的评论，亲爱的。&lt;page&gt;自由之王，可恨的老头叫我班布尔小姐，但这样迷人的名字并不适合美丽的女人。&lt;hpage&gt;用你永远不会叫的名字来称呼我们。&lt;page&gt;我来告诉你我的小秘密。我的车就像周围最聪明的水疗中心之一。&lt;page&gt;我们心中的水比诗歌更纯粹！我很高兴使用它，它不贵！

original_en_text: Dear one, how shameful for the world to end while poor Kratt still has so much living left in him!<page>But how sweet of you to join me here! Will you play the Flea Bounce game, that I may appreciate the beauty of your agile form while I await my doom?<page>To play is simple. Leap up and keep bouncing on the fleas who fly past for as long as you are able!
original_zh_text: 在可怜的克里特岛上有这么多人的生命，世界末日是多么可耻啊！&lt;page&gt;很高兴你加入我们！你需要一个新跳蚤吗？你能欣赏他们的才华并等待他们的命运吗？&lt;page&gt;这个游戏很简单。下载并跳转到尽可能多的芯片！

original_en_text: Strange beasts prowl these grey lands. I hear them roar and shriek outside camp. Is best to stay inside and make quiet.
original_zh_text: 一头奇怪的野兽在灰色的地面上行走，我听到田野后面传来尖叫声。

original_en_text: At longest last, have our flea roamings ended! Every sandy grain and stinky squelchy maggot was worth to endure, to claim such a home!<page>Is time for rest and celebrate, and none have earned such more than you, Miss Hornet! Raise your flask and drink most heartily with us!
original_zh_text: 跳蚤的旅程结束了！每一块石头、每一种恶臭都值得忍受，就像这所房子一样！&lt;page&gt;现在是休息和庆祝的时候了。没有人比你赚的钱多，女士。我给你带来了一瓶酒。

original_en_text: We will camp here in these grey lands until more fleas find their way to the caravan. Please lend your aid to any of our fellows you find lost out on the roads!
original_zh_text: 当其他跳蚤没有遇到商队时，我们就会随身携带灰色的地面。帮助那些在旅途中迷路的人！

original_en_text: <hpage>I am travelling these lands for my own reasons, Fleamaster. However, if I happen upon any fleas on my travels, I will aid them as best I can.<page>Oh, oh, I could ask for nothing more! They must all be hiding or stuck in dangerous places, but if you rouse them they are sure to find their way here to us.<page>May the kingdom bless your travels and keep you safe, stranger! You are welcome to rest here with us whenever the roads bring you back!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;“我来到这个国家是有原因的。不过，如果您在旅行中遇到跳蚤，请尽力而为。&lt;page&gt;“哦，我不能要求更好了！每个人都必须躲藏起来或被困在危险的地方，但如果我们叫醒他们，他们一定会找到我们的路。"&lt;page&gt;愿上帝保佑您的旅程并保证您的安全。每次你回来，我建议你和我们一起放松一下。

original_en_text: The journey here was long, but we didn’t lose a single flea! I’m told it’s good luck to bring a guest along when travelling, so we must have you to thank!<page>I trust the trip was agreeable for you. A pleasure perhaps? Nestled in with our dear little ones...<hpage>They certainly make for energetic travel companions. I’ve not often had opportunity to socialise with such spirited sorts.<page>Splendid! And now, you must go and see Grishkin, sitting there by the bubbling cauldron. After long travel, we drink to revive our spirits!
original_zh_text: 我们已经走过了漫长的道路，但我们没有失去任何东西。我听说欢迎旅游的客人会带来好运。&lt;page&gt;这次旅行会让你快乐。和我们心爱的孩子在一起可能是一件很有趣的事情。&lt;hpage&gt;这是能源旅行者的理想选择。你很少有机会与如此活跃的人交流。&lt;page&gt;这太不可思议了！我不得不去看看坐在锅炉旁边的格里斯金。经过漫长的旅程，格里芬！

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, your bottle is full of Flea Brew. You know what such means! You must have drink! Har har!<page>When you have finish drinking, return and we will fill flask again! I’m is always brewing!
original_zh_text: “切尔西，你的瓶子里装满了啤酒。“哈。&lt;page&gt;喝一杯，喝一杯，我一直在想。

original_en_text: My fellows give much worry for the other fleas, but I’m not give at all. They will find their way to us, and if not, who keep count of them anyway? Har har!
original_zh_text: 我的伴侣担心其他跳蚤，但我一点也不在乎。他们还记得我们吗？哈！

original_en_text: Ahh, and before the road steals you away from us again, allow me to offer you a humble gift!<page>One of the little ones found a pale artefact while digging about in the sands. A spiny, cold sort of thing.<page>I see no use in it for we fleas, so of course we are all too pleased, eager even, to bestow it upon our dear friend!
original_zh_text: 哦，在这条路带你离开我们之前，我送给你一份谦逊的礼物。&lt;page&gt;其中一个小男孩发现了一块苍白的遗物，正在沙子里挖掘。&lt;page&gt;我认为它对我们没有任何帮助，所以我们当然会把它送给一位快乐而有爱心的朋友！

original_en_text: For your hard efforts and eternal friendship, please accept these meagre rosaries as reward.<page>Think of we fleas when you find chance to trade them!
original_zh_text: 我们请求您接受这颗卑微的念珠，作为对您辛勤工作和持久友谊的奖励。&lt;page&gt;如果您有机会交易跳蚤，请记住我们的跳蚤！

original_en_text: Dear one, my lone light amongst the darkness! Will you bathe in Kratt’s spa-carriage and let the warm waters wash away your worries?
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，黑暗中唯一的光明，为什么不去垃圾浴室洗澡并用热水冲洗呢？

original_en_text: Please, my dear, step inside! I will stand guard here while you bathe... Right on this very spot!
original_zh_text: “进来吧，小姐，我要去看你，我要游泳。"

original_en_text: Dodeshna. Want for shelter from the thick, grey air? Is heavy, and wet. I’m worry for the little flea’s health in this land.<page>And they make play in the filthy water. I say them stop, but they just laugh and splash on me. They are lack respect!<hpage>Most bugs instinctively obey those with strength and will. Speak with authority, or your commands may go unheeded.<page>Ugh... really, is Fleamaster’s job to teach the fleas such. I will just have rest here until is time to move on.
original_zh_text: 多迪斯纳先生，你想避开灰色的空气吗？我担心这个地区小跳蚤的健康，因为它们又重又湿。&lt;page&gt;在脏水里玩耍。我叫他们停下来，但他们摔倒了，扔了水。&lt;hpage&gt;大多数昆虫本能地追随那些有力量和意志的昆虫。如果您不咨询当局，您的命令将被忽视。&lt;page&gt;是的，是的，是的……...事实上，火师的使命就是训练跳蚤。我们会休息直到出发为止。

original_en_text: Away then, bug. Await challenger, shall I.
original_zh_text: 来吧宝贝他们正在寻找竞争对手。

original_en_text: Vikna! Our little game has ended. But I trust, after a short rest, you will play with us again?
original_zh_text: 我们的小游戏已经结束了，但短暂休息后，我想我们会再次玩它们。

original_en_text: Ahh! Do I understand you rightly, stranger? You will help gather the lonely fleas to our caravan? Truly?
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。哦，是的！这是一个奇怪的故事，你知道吗？你能帮我在我们的大篷车里养一只孤独的跳蚤吗？实际上？

霍恩夫人！“救世主！“请到我这里来。&lt;page&gt;“超越邻近地球的黑暗和死亡，这是您给我们的美丽而安全的地方。&lt;page&gt;这个农场没有殖民地，所以旅程到此结束。&lt;hpage&gt;我很高兴这是一个好地方，奶奶。我很高兴跳蚤活了下来。大多数甲虫似乎都有更悲惨的命运。&lt;page&gt;是的，只有通过你们的努力，才能等待光明的未来。为了庆祝我们的到来，我很高兴为您提供一项小型服务。&lt;page&gt;她学会了缝纫和跳蚤收集材料。您可以在行李中添加额外的口袋，让您的旅行更轻松。&lt;page&gt;这比你应得的要少得多，但我希望你无论如何都能满意。

original_en_text: <hpage>I know not what you plan, Fleamaster, and at this time I cannot participate.<page>Ahhhh. Ahhhhhhh! Wretches, wretches, all of us! How can we begin without you, dear friend?
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我不知道你在做什么，但我现在不能参与。&lt;page&gt;是的，正确的。哦，是的！可怜的东西，可怜的东西，我们所有人！从哪里开始，亲爱的朋友？

original_en_text: Gathered here we are, to honour the grand champion of this very final of all festivals!<page>Now, Miss Hornet! Strike the great effigy with all your might!
original_zh_text: 感谢所有最新的获奖者！&lt;page&gt;“大黄蜂小姐。拿出最好的雕像！“"

original_en_text: The little fleas like this place most of all. They are as much happy as I ever hear them!
original_zh_text: 这么小的跳蚤是最好的。我从来没有听说过你这么高兴。

original_en_text: Oh, dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at our marvellous troupe! Their numbers full. Their spirits bright. All thanks to your heroic efforts!
original_zh_text: 哦，我亲爱的朋友，大黄蜂小姐，看看我们的好朋友！房间里挤满了人，他们的灵魂是光明的。

original_en_text: Another journey complete! And a new, high spot for our rest, upon the doorstep of that mighty Citadel, no less!<hpage>It is fortunate that all of your companions survived the trek, Fleamaster. The howling rise beside, and the tangled wood before it, have both claimed the lives of countless bugs.<page>Indeed! A perilous ascent! Maybe it was your company that brought us luck, Miss Hornet? It surely put us fleas at ease to have you and your weapon riding close.
original_zh_text: 旅行回来了！“这是我们所依赖的新平台，进入你的伟大城堡吧！&lt;hpage&gt;幸运的是，我所有的朋友都经历了这段漫长的旅程。在他旁边，一棵树抓住了他的面前，杀死了无数昆虫。&lt;page&gt;“你是对的，风险越来越大。也许你的伴侣会带来好运，女孩。这是我和我朋友的房子。"

original_en_text: Oh, and look, Miss Hornet, look at how many lost fleas have come! It seems even the last few stragglers are now with us.
original_zh_text: “嘿，泡泡小姐，看看跳蚤的数量！“最后一个似乎就在我们身边。

original_en_text: Ah! Aha! A native of these fiery lowlands approaches! Have no fear, my friend, we fleas are but humble travellers!<hpage>Well met, sir, though like you I am not of these lands. I am merely journeying through.<page>Oh. Oho! A kindred spirit! It’s good luck for wanderers to meet on an unfamiliar path.
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。哦，是的！哦，哦，哦！来自这片温暖草原的人们来了！“别担心，我的朋友，跳蚤是一个谦虚的旅行者。&lt;hpage&gt;“我和你一样来自这个国家，但我很高兴。&lt;page&gt;哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！对于无家可归的人来说，这是一个在陌生的街道上见到他的好机会。

original_en_text: Dodeshna, dear one, dodeshna! Heh heh! Have you returned to use Kratt’s luxurious spa-carriage? I’ve kept it roastily warm for you...
original_zh_text: 亲爱的多德施纳！这是什么？为你燃烧，为你燃烧。

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is now ended, and the Flea Juggle champion has set an even higher score! Tremble in awe, dear fleas, at the might of our dear Miss Hornet!
original_zh_text: 比赛结束，自由板冠军提高了比分！我亲爱的跳蚤，害怕得发抖，我们亲爱的跳蚤小姐！

original_en_text: There are many lost and lonely fleas still scattered across this kingdom. If only some more of them joined us, the caravan could continue its journey.<page>You’ll find the little dears in all sorts of strange places, for they love to peek and pry and play, but if you rouse them they are sure to find their way here!
original_zh_text: 帝国被孤独的跳蚤打断了。随着越来越多的人加入，团队不断发展。&lt;page&gt;他们喜欢观看、观看和玩耍，所以你可以在所有陌生的地方找到他们，但当他们醒来时，他们就会找到自己的路！

original_en_text: Those great rumbles from beneath, they have sound similar to giant beast. Such beast is much sorrowful though, I am think.<page>Fleas and monsters alike have their troubles...
original_zh_text: 下面传来巨大的爆炸声，就像一头巨兽。&lt;page&gt;怪物和怪物有麻烦了。

original_en_text: <hpage>The Fleamaster and his caravan sought for caves offering space and safety. This calm lake and shore may prove suitable.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;Flex Master和他的商队正在寻找一个可以提供空间和安全的洞穴，这个宁静的湖泊和海岸将是完美的。

original_en_text: Oh, Miss Hornet! Wonder at how large our caravan has grown! So bold and boisterous! This gilded chamber can barely contain us all!<page>The many fleas are itching to journey once more, to find a space to stretch their wings. But from here, as their leader, I am hesitant to order us so swiftly away.<page>These heights hold too much danger to set forth without a safe goal held clear in mind.<page>What of you, Miss Hornet? Your tasks carry you throughout this kingdom. Have you ever encountered a place appropriate?
original_zh_text: 太抱歉了女士.我很想知道这个充满激情的团队是如何成长的。勇气和积极！这个金色的房间容不下我们所有人！&lt;page&gt;许多跳蚤向后移动，寻找空间展开翅膀。但在那里，他犹豫了一下，作为老板，命令他立即离开。&lt;page&gt;如果没有明确的安全目标，这样的高度可能非常危险。&lt;page&gt;你是大黄蜂小姐，你的任务是穿越王国。

original_en_text: We will camp here a time before moving onward. These moments of safety and calm must be treasured, rare as they are.
original_zh_text: 我们在这里呆了一段时间，然后我们继续前进。虽然像这样的安全与和平的时刻是罕见的，我们会很感激。

original_en_text: Oh, my dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at how many of the lost fleas have come! It seems even the last few stragglers are now with us.
original_zh_text: 哦，我亲爱的朋友，大黄蜂小姐，看看消失的跳蚤数量！最后一个似乎就在我们身边。

original_en_text: And now that we have met, know that I am Fleamaster Mooshka, leader of this caravan!<page>Our own journey has barely begun, but you are most welcome to tarry here a while, stranger. Where ways are dark and winding, good bugs must stay close together!
original_zh_text: 现在我们是这支球队的飞行大师和队长了！&lt;page&gt;我们刚刚开始我们的旅程，但我们会在这里呆一段时间。在黑暗曲折的地方，好虫子一定要被亲吻！

original_en_text: The bellowing sandy land was full of much danger. We was almost lost poor Varga to hungry worms as we travel up!<page>Sadly, he is finding way here after all. Har! Is only jest. Grishkin and Varga is great friends, just like all fleas is being.
original_zh_text: 这个游戏充满了危险。当我们爬上去时，可怜的巴尔加被一只饥饿的昆虫困住了。&lt;page&gt;他终于找到了出路。哦，哦！格里芬和巴尔加是朋友，就像其他跳蚤一样。
我可以再喝一杯啤酒吗？

original_en_text: You have brought them all, bug not flea. My work is done! No more searching needed. Ours is a caravan full!<page>Now my duty must change. To watch. To protect. This new task I am looking much to liking.
original_zh_text: 我把它们都拿走了。这些虫子不是跳蚤。完成工作！不需要进一步的研究。车已经满了！&lt;page&gt;请注意，我的职责正在发生变化。

original_en_text: Is warm here, you agree? Is very... what is say, cosy?<page>The Fleamaster though, is always want to move on. We will be drag away somewhere much worse soon, I think.
original_zh_text: 你感觉温暖吗？实际上？有很多. ...我的意思是，先生。你觉得怎么样，康纳？&lt;page&gt;然而，Flackmaster一直想继续前进，我认为我们很快就会陷入更糟的境地。

original_en_text: Oh... what a shame. Heh heh! I think you’d find the waters inside delectably soothing, if you’d only reconsider!
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。多么可耻啊！这是什么？当你想一想，你会发现水是如此舒适！

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I bring a delivery, supplies from the couriers of Bellhart to aid your settlement.<page>Such dedication you continue to show us, Miss Hornet!<page>While we may seem safe out here at range from danger, we cannot go far to forage, and the many fleas need much nurture!<page>Food and provisions, such as you bring, are crucial in these desperate times.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;船长，我们有伯哈特大使送来的一包物资。&lt;page&gt;“你是我的未婚夫，海蒂小姐。"&lt;page&gt;我们似乎已经脱离危险，但我们不能走得太远。&lt;page&gt;在这个绝望的时刻，您需要食物和用品（例如，要带走的东西）。

original_en_text: This trial is Flea Dodge. Stay upon platforms, avoid attacks. Longer stay gives bigger score.
original_zh_text: 该测试旨在预防跳蚤。留在球场上以避免攻击。停留的时间越长，分数就越高。

original_en_text: Dodeshna, dodeshna! I am saying, welcome to our caravan, stranger!<page>You are a very funny, very strange flea, isn’t it? No fur at all, and your wings fall off!<page>Har, har har har! Is just jest, of course. Us fleas famous for giving jokes!
original_zh_text: 欢迎来到预告片，陌生人！&lt;page&gt;你是一只有趣又奇怪的跳蚤，不是吗？实际上？没有皮肤，翅膀就会脱落。&lt;page&gt;哈！这是一个笑话，我们以笑话而闻名。

original_en_text: Some beasts here, I see them eat through the bony ground. Is very smart! Bone is everywhere much abundant! If only I had such stomach, har har!
original_zh_text: 这是一头会变成骨头的野兽。它很聪明！到处都是骨头！我希望我有一艘这样的船。

original_en_text: Drink to full, Miss Hornet! Why waste? Be merry with us fleas before it all ends!
original_zh_text: “喝一杯吧，霍尼夫人。为什么使用它？让我们的跳蚤满意，直到一切结束！

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended, and you have bested your old score. Rishkiz, champion!
original_zh_text: 考试结束了，你违反了原来的成绩。“好吧，冠军！"

original_en_text: Normally I would never burden a visitor with the caravan’s worries. But! Isn’t it the custom of this kingdom to share your deepest wishes with strangers?<page>Well, my wish is for the poor lost fleas of these lands to find their way to our caravan! Stranger, could you not help us?
original_zh_text: 通常，他们不担心大篷车或游客。还有更多！在这个国家，向陌生人表达自己最深切的祝愿不是一种习俗吗？&lt;page&gt;希望在这片土地上游荡的可怜跳蚤能找到我们的商队！非常有趣。你能帮助我吗？

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, if your troupe is still prepared to travel, I have discovered a cave beyond the Citadel, at the edge of some ancient aqueducts. That place may well suit your needs for safety.<hpage>The trek would be long, but once reached, you will find a sandy shore, free of predators, beside a wide clear lake. It is as peaceful a place as I’ve seen throughout these fraught lands.<page>That’s it! It must be! Our destination has at last been set. Our journey can continue!<page>True friend of fleas you are, Miss Hornet. That place shall welcome us, no doubt. Will you be joining for this new journey?
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;福雷斯特，如果你的公司还在计划旅行，我在老运河尽头的城堡外发现了一个洞穴。&lt;hpage&gt;旅程可能需要很长时间，但当你到达时，你会发现旁边有一个干净的大湖，还有没有捕食者的沙滩。&lt;page&gt;就是这样！“对，对。命运终于决定了，旅程仍在继续。&lt;page&gt;“泡泡小姐，你是跳蚤最好的朋友。我们来这里是为了让您感到受欢迎。你想参加这次旅行吗？

original_en_text: My treasured guest... what need have I of rosaries, now that all is ending? Please, use my spa-carriage, free of charge! Dear Kratt is only too happy to provide!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的客人们，现在结束了，我能做些什么呢？免费使用汽车SPA。Shellkrat很乐意帮助您！

original_en_text: So many lost fleas have made it here... Truly, I’d never dared to hope we could gather such a grand company!<page>But still there may be more out there in this wide world... What a wonder it would be if they too found their way to our fresh paradise!
original_zh_text: 这么多迷失的跳蚤来了，没想到会有这么大的团队！&lt;page&gt;如果他们能找到通往新天堂的路，他们该多高兴啊！

original_en_text: Auugghhh... the pain! Such fury, over a mistake! Poor little Kratt did not mean to steal a look!<page>This old carriage needs constant care. I was only doing repairs! I had no intent to intrude! And I barely saw a thing!<hpage>Lie no more to me, flea, and be grateful you still live. Know that if you peer again, you will die.<page>Of course! Kratt would never! Let’s consider the matter forgotten, and you shall forever be my treasured guest!
original_zh_text: 如果她反对邪恶，可怜的猫就不会倒下！&lt;page&gt;汽车需要不断维护。他们会解决它的！“我从来不想打扰你。我几乎什么也没看到！&lt;hpage&gt;别对我撒谎，开玩笑吧，谢谢你让我活下来。如果我再见到你，我就会死。&lt;page&gt;是的，不！你可能会被扭曲，但你永远是我的客人！

original_en_text: Dodeshna! Miss Hornet, is it? Welcome to our new camp! The travelling is done, and so we drink! <page>Is no better way to revive spirit than to drink the famous Flea Brew! I’m have just finished a batch, bubbling and warm!<page>You are friend, finder of lost, little fleas, hmm? Here, take bottle of Flea Brew with you! Will keep you warm while you travel.<page>I am always brewing here, so have no fear to drink plenty, and return whenever you are wanting more!
original_zh_text: 杜兹纳！你是黄蜂小姐。欢迎来到新营地！旅程结束了，我们去喝一杯吧！&lt;page&gt;如果你不喝著名的纳米啤酒，你就永远不会重生！我们刚刚结束派对，闻起来很辣。&lt;page&gt;您是一个朋友，您正在寻找丢失的跳蚤。一杯啤酒让我在旅途中保持温暖。&lt;page&gt;我总是在这里喝酒，所以如果你想看更多，就多喝吧！

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? If service is you here seeking, none is left for me to provide. All fleas are here, collected close.<page>Much better it is now for fleas to be together, ready to face whatever end will come.
original_zh_text: 如果你停下来，昆虫就不是跳蚤，不是吗？“如果你来这里服务，我就不能。所有的跳蚤都在这里，并且收集得很好。&lt;page&gt;一切都好多了，因为跳蚤已经聚集在一起并准备好提供结果。

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Of your many companions, I had little worry you would survive to find this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Mine is to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together and grow them strong.<hpage>If you have sensed the locations of other lost fleas, would you share them with me? I may be able to send them safe to the caravan.<page>The locations! For price they could be shared, but you hold no map to mark! If learnings are wanted, a map must be owned. Until then, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;为巴黎干杯。在他众多的同伴中，我并不担心他会活下来并找到商队。&lt;hpage&gt;你需要做什么工作才能以这种可怕的方式离开你的朋友？&lt;page&gt;跟随我的脚步、气味和强烈的情绪。找到我们的跳蚤朋友，最年轻的跳蚤，让我们抓住他们并让他们变得更强大。&lt;hpage&gt;如果你知道芯片在哪里，你会分享它吗？“我们可以用大篷车带走它。&lt;page&gt;大师！关于价格，我们可以分享。没有纸！如果你想知道，你需要一张地图，而你现在无能为力。

original_en_text: Bug. World is ending. Nothing left but to test ourselves.<page>This trial is Flea Dodge. Stay upon the platforms. Avoid attacks. Longer stay gives bigger score.<page>To score most is to become champion. This is only thing left to strive for.
original_zh_text: 世界已经破碎，你别无选择，只能证明这一点。&lt;page&gt;该测试旨在预防跳蚤。如果您留在平台上，就可以避免攻击。停留的时间越长，分数就越高。&lt;page&gt;“最重要的是成为冠军，这是我们唯一需要为之奋斗的事情。"

original_en_text: Bug, you are champion of Flea Dodge, but trial is still open to you. Can you defeat your own score?
original_zh_text: 巴格，你是道奇队的冠军，努米，但这个过程仍在进行中。

original_en_text: So bug not flea, you return. World is ruined. Final end comes soon, says Fleamaster.<hpage>This land is gravely wounded, but death need not follow. It is now my task to free this kingdom from its dark fall.<page>Grrr... such words are just fancy. Nothing left now, except to protect what little we have.
original_zh_text: 弗莱明表示，蠕虫会回来，世界会被摧毁，而不是跳蚤，最终结果很快就会公布。&lt;hpage&gt;地球受到严重破坏，但死亡仍将继续。现在我的任务是将这个王国从黑暗的崩溃中解放出来。&lt;page&gt;是的，是的，是的……...它很薄。“我们唯一能做的就是保护我们拥有的小事。

original_en_text: Come, you revellers! Try the Flea Juggle game! Keep striking fleas upwards. Keep them airborne for as long as possible!
original_zh_text: 加油，粉丝们！你一定要尝试跳蚤游戏！与跳蚤的斗争正在进行中，因此请尽可能长时间地留在空中。

original_en_text: <hpage>I have seen a place, Fleamaster, a cave beyond the Citadel, at the edge of some ancient ducts. That place may well suit your needs for safety.<hpage>The trek would be long, but once reached, you will find a sandy shore, free of predators, beside a wide clear lake. It is as peaceful a place as I’ve seen throughout these fraught lands.<page>That’s it! It must be! Our destination has been set. Our journey can continue!<page>True friend of fleas you are, Miss Hornet. That place shall welcome us, no doubt. Will you be joining the caravan on this journey?
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;在城堡后面，你可以看到一个名为Flamemaster的洞穴。在旧管道的尽头。&lt;hpage&gt;旅程可能需要很长时间，但当你到达时，你会发现旁边有一个干净的大湖，还有没有捕食者的沙滩。&lt;page&gt;就是这样！“对，对。命运已定，旅程仍在继续。&lt;page&gt;“泡泡小姐，你是跳蚤最好的朋友。我们来这里是为了让您感到受欢迎。你想参加这一天吗？

original_en_text: All are here now, bug not flea. For your seeking, ours is a caravan full.<page>Much better it is now for fleas to be together, ready to face whatever end will come.
original_zh_text: 但并非所有昆虫--这里它们是跳蚤。我们的舰队已经满足了您的搜索。&lt;page&gt;一切都好多了，因为跳蚤已经聚集在一起并准备好提供结果。

original_en_text: Ooh, heh heh heh! What a turn, for dear Kratt to be strung up in such a dank little cave!<hpage>Cursed threads stretch throughout this land, set to ensnare the unwary. You seem no worse for it now, at least.<hpage>That metal carriage... It is yours, I assume?<page>Ooh, yes, yes! I’m setting out to join the nearest flea caravan, aren’t I? Safety in numbers, yes? I’ve had more than enough of venturing alone.<page>And you... I trust I will see you there? My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly share with you when next we meet! Heh heh!
original_zh_text: 对，对！亲爱的克里特先生，我很高兴在这样潮湿的洞穴里玩耍！&lt;hpage&gt;这些被诅咒的线条旨在防止人们无意中在地板上奔跑。至少在一段时间内，情况看起来并没有那么糟糕。&lt;hpage&gt;我想这台金属机器是你的。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的，是的！“我加入了舰队，对吧？“事实上？很安全，对吧？我厌倦了独自冒险。&lt;page&gt;你...你认为我们会在那里见面吗？这台机器隐藏着一个秘密，所以下次我看到它时，我想与你分享。

original_en_text: And now, with our caravan bursting, we’ve rested here long enough. We fleas must head higher!<page>Oh, but stranger, how remiss of me! First, please, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing it is! All of us together.<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan prepares to depart toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 舰队已经满了。我们可以在这里休息。筹码必须上涨。&lt;page&gt;我多么懒啊。首先，你会怎么称呼他？&lt;hpage&gt;“你可以叫我巴布比，弗雷大师。“很高兴看到你的坏朋友在你的舰队中很安全。独自旅行是一个非常危险的国家。&lt;page&gt;他们走了！换句话说，我简直不敢相信！真漂亮！我们都在一起。“&lt;page&gt;亲爱的朋友们，汉布尔比小姐，我们的火车正在驶向沼泽和高地。

original_en_text: I have marked your map, bug. See the learnings of fleas lost across the lands.<page>If you are as brave as told by fellow fleas, seek them. Save them. For a caravan whole.
original_zh_text: 鲍勃，我看过你的地图。我知道跳蚤去任何地方。&lt;page&gt;正如你的跳蚤同事所说，如果你勇敢，就去寻找它们。“整个团队。

original_en_text: You are welcome here always, Miss Hornet, true friend of fleas!<page>Stay as long as you care. Rest and restore. We many fleas do so enjoy your company.
original_zh_text: 你总是很快乐，泡泡小姐，我的跳蚤朋友！&lt;page&gt;只要你能照顾好自己，你就会留在那里。休息和恢复。很多跳蚤爱好者都喜欢这家公司。

original_en_text: Dear friend of fleas, please! If ever you come upon a cave both wide and free, return with haste and tell us.<page>The fleas are oh so eager to journey, and I’m eager to see them to a destination safe!
original_zh_text: 如果您看到空白，请告诉我。&lt;page&gt;蠕虫是一名旅行爱好者，希望看到他安全到达目的地！

original_en_text: <hpage>That is well, Fleamaster. My travels through this land have been far and deep, and yet at almost every reach I met the friendly, inquisitive presence of your kind.<hpage>You fleas have an uncommon desire for adventure which I find admirable, even if it is seldom matched by capability.<hpage>Though I am long accustomed to travelling alone, following your journey, and sharing some part in its progress has been a warm thing.<page>And so happy have you made we fleas! Even as the darkness comes to claim us, we would be honoured to bestow one final gift, a treasure from fleakind’s glorious past.<page>May it mark you in Pharloom’s final moment as a friend to us all.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我深深地走进了这片土地。无论你走到哪里，你都会遇到像你一样的好奇心。&lt;hpage&gt;跳蚤对冒险有着不同寻常的胃口，它们的技能几乎无与伦比，但令人惊讶。&lt;hpage&gt;我已经习惯了很长一段时间独自旅行，但我很高兴跟随您的旅程并分享我的进步。&lt;page&gt;我很高兴你让我飞起来！即使夜幕降临，我也很荣幸地从跳蚤辉煌过去的宝藏中送给你我最后的礼物。&lt;page&gt;我们像朋友一样度过了过去的几天。"

original_en_text: You are have luck, Miss Hornet, to lack the fur of we fleas. All the blowy sand of that place is getting very stuck inside!
original_zh_text: “泡泡小姐，我很高兴你没有跳蚤毛。

original_en_text: The beasts here are... much frightful, hm? Scary?<page>But if give them space, they leave alone. You respect beast, beast respect you.
original_zh_text: 有一头野兽，不是吗？是的，对吧？还有其他恐怖分子吗？&lt;page&gt;如果你给他们空间，他们就会自己出来。你是一只动物，而动物就是你。

original_en_text: Grand Champion... bug called Hornet. Will you once again challenge the Flea Dodge trial?
original_zh_text: 比赛中，有一种名叫“Shersh”的昆虫。你想再次体验神秘的火灾过程吗？

original_en_text: Fierce one, my dear Grand Champion! Will you dance and fly with us above the water?
original_zh_text: 亲爱的冠军，亲爱的冠军。你想和我跳舞吗？你想在水上飞行吗？

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I bring a delivery, supplies from the couriers of Bellhart to aid your settlement.<page>Ahh, such a kindly gesture adds much warmth to our celebration!<page>These poor little fleas will never grow to roam the world as we have, so let us give them what happiness we can before the end.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;船长，我们有伯哈特大使送来的一包物资。&lt;page&gt;哦，这样善意的举动为我们的庆祝活动增添了温暖！&lt;page&gt;在一切结束之前，我们会尽一切努力让他们快乐。因为这些可怜的跳蚤不会像我们一样长大并环游世界。

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, sir flea. I see you were able to unite safely with this caravan.<page>Oh yes! Heh heh. All thanks to you! Dear, sweet you! Pray tell, what does one call such a delicate beauty? Surely yours is a name most sweet and soothing. Are you Fairgrace? Or Nectarsweet?<hpage>I am Hornet, sir. Address me by that name or not at all.<page>Gradak! Of course. Of course. My dear, Hornet! I shall let you in on my little secret. My carriage doubles as a soothing spa, you see. It’s most ingenious.<page>The water inside is piping hot, and purer than a psalm! Heh heh! I’d gladly let you soak inside, for a modest fee!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;您可以安全地参与这次护送。&lt;page&gt;哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦，是的！哦，谢谢，谢谢！“这个美丽的女人叫什么名字？他的名字是最甜蜜、最安慰的名字。这是宝贵的祝福吗？尼塔隆？&lt;hpage&gt;你到底叫不叫他的名字？&lt;page&gt;“是的，当然，亲爱的巴布比，我会告诉你我的小秘密。“我的车已经成为一辆治愈水疗中心和最智能的汽车。&lt;page&gt;我们心中的水比诗歌更纯粹！我很高兴使用它，它不贵！

original_en_text: Mamashka. The trial begins. Flea Dodge!
original_zh_text: “妈妈，审判已经开始了。那太糟糕了，道奇。

original_en_text: <hpage>I saw your plea posted at Bellhart, sir flea, and accept your request.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我读了你发给伯哈特的地址并接受了。

original_en_text: The dirge I sing is for the end of our old lives...<page>Here at the end of times, our paradise crumbles beneath us. Flea and friend alike, all will soon be consumed...
original_zh_text: 我唱的赞美诗是我们旧生活的结束。&lt;page&gt;世界末日的时候，天会降临到我们身上。土豆就像朋友，一切很快就会耗尽。

original_en_text: Ahh, look! The poor fleas are starting to make their way to us! What a precious thing!<page>We have much to thank you for already! And I hope we will have even more to be thankful for very soon! Please, keep seeking out our lost fellows!
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。看着我！可怜的跳蚤来了！多么珍贵啊！&lt;page&gt;我们已经有很多值得感激的事情了！谢谢你找到我失踪的朋友。

original_en_text: Grrr.. bug, not flea. Why you must bother me? This spot is mine, fair fought and earned.<hpage>I won’t stay long, madam. Nor would I contest your right to this cave. I only ask what task causes you to perch alone atop these dank ducts?<page>Task? Mine is a work most important, but not for talking of here, where danger waits close. Soon, I depart to seek fleas, my fellows, and join them.<page>Now... Grrr. You leave me! I go soon to seek other fleas. A flea alone is good, but fleas together is best! Till then, rest I need! Off, bug!
original_zh_text: 咕噜，这是昆虫，不是跳蚤。获胜是我的公平游戏。&lt;hpage&gt;“很快，小姐，我怀疑你就没有权利进入这个洞穴了。“我想一个人呆着。&lt;page&gt;我的工作是我最重要的工作之一，但我不是在这里谈论它，危险就在这里。很快，我开始寻找我的同伴并加入了他们。&lt;page&gt;目前，这.我的天啊！让世界来吧！“土豆很棒，但它们是最好的！与此同时，休息吧！该错误已关闭。

original_en_text: Dear friend... Miss Hornet! Forgive us, but we beg one more favour from you. Will you accompany us in our final act...?
original_zh_text: 亲爱的朋友们，黄蜂小姐，很抱歉，但我还有一个给你。

original_en_text: It is time for the Festival of the Flea! One last, grand celebration before the black quakes pull us all down into the darkness!<page>Rouse yourself fleas, one last time! Let the games begin!
original_zh_text: 今天是弗莱彻的日子。地震前的最后一场盛大派对把我们推入了黑暗！&lt;page&gt;最后，您必须自带液体。让我们从游戏的教训开始。

original_en_text: Ahhh! Alas. Then we shall pray your own path remains safe.<page>And now, our new home is calling. We venture again!<hpage>Good travels, Fleamaster. May your journey ahead be safe and smooth.
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。哦，是的！是的，正确的。我们希望您的旅程安全。&lt;page&gt;它叫你的新家，你正处于危险之中！&lt;hpage&gt;我们希望未来的旅行安全且成功。

original_en_text: But stranger! While you’re with us, you must hear of the miracle that has occurred!<page>See all these fleas gathered to our troupe? It seems so many! An impossible number, yet here they are, safely joined together. Our most cherished wishes answered!<hpage>If you were seeking fleas to join your caravan, I have found and freed many throughout my travels.<page>Oh! Can it be? Then you here are our saviour, our dear fleafriend! For all have made their way right, straight to us!<page>And now, with our caravan full to bursting, we’ve rested long enough. We fleas must head higher!<page>Oh, but saviour, how remiss of me! First, please tell, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing it is! All of us together.<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan prepares to depart toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 但是外国人！当你和我们在一起时，你会听到已经发生的奇迹！&lt;page&gt;您见过我们剧院收集的跳蚤吗？我觉得这太过分了！这是一个不可能的数字，但与安全性相结合。我最大的愿望终于实现了！&lt;hpage&gt;如果你正在寻找跳蚤加入你的舰队，我已经发现并释放了许多跳蚤在我的旅行。&lt;page&gt;我的天啊！你还好吗？您是我们的救世主，也是我们跳蚤中亲爱的朋友。因为每个人都来找我。&lt;page&gt;团队已经满了，她休息了很多。'&lt;page&gt;“我很懒，我的救世主。首先，告诉我你会怎么称呼他？"&lt;hpage&gt;“你可以叫我巴布比，弗雷大师。“很高兴看到你的坏朋友在你的舰队中很安全。独自旅行是一个非常危险的国家。&lt;page&gt;他们走了！换句话说，我简直不敢相信！真漂亮！我们都在一起。“&lt;page&gt;亲爱的朋友们，汉布尔比小姐，我们的火车正在驶向沼泽和高地。

original_en_text: Welcome back, my fierce one. Dodeshna! Heh heh! I’m sure your travels have wearied you.<page>Oh no, I wouldn’t dare take rosaries from such a treasured guest! Please, use my spa-carriage, free of charge! Dear Kratt is only too happy to provide!
original_zh_text: 欢迎回来，我亲爱的朋友，多什纳！这是什么？您的旅行可能会很无聊。&lt;page&gt;哦，我从来没有勇气把玫瑰经带给如此尊贵的客人！免费使用汽车SPA。Shellkrat很乐意帮助您！

original_en_text: Miss Hornet! You have proven yourself the champion at each of our flea games!<page>I am confident now that the grand champion of our festival has emerged. It is none other than yourself, of course!<page>And thusly, must our final ceremony begin. Fleas, prepare yourselves!
original_zh_text: 霍恩夫人！您是我们赢得的每场跳蚤锦标赛的冠军！&lt;page&gt;这场盛会的获胜者已经出来了。当然还有你！&lt;page&gt;闭幕式已经开始。布洛克，我准备好了。

original_en_text: Good friend of fleas is you, Miss Hornet. Now must join and drink much. Be merry before all ends. Brew is made, enough for all!<page>No charge for you if needing more. Why waste when future is final?
original_zh_text: 巴布比小姐，跳蚤最好的朋友就是你。现在你需要多喝点。&lt;page&gt;如果您需要更多，您不必付费。如果未来是确定的，为什么还要浪费时间思考呢？

original_en_text: A strange flea has joined our troupe. All are welcome, but something about this one sets my fur to raise.<page>His carriage offers a steaming service, but the charge in rosaries is stiff, especially for us fleas who carry few.<page>For the companionship we provide, and the safety of our numbers, surely some discount is deserved?
original_zh_text: 他们一起消费。那很好，但是我的夹克更糟糕。&lt;page&gt;她的汽车提供蒸汽服务，但玫瑰花很贵，尤其是对于我们这些穿着小跳蚤的人来说。&lt;page&gt;由于我们提供的房间的友善性和安全性，我们不得不打折。"

original_en_text: Vikna! Dear one, you outdo yourself! To beat your previous high score is a marvel indeed!
original_zh_text: 维卡兰托，你比自己高。赢得最后一场比赛倒计时真是个奇迹！

original_en_text: You still here, bug not flea? Is rest I need before I leave for caravan. Not chat. You feel trouble-type. Make my shell tense.<hpage>I shall take my leave, madam. Stay strong on your own journey. May we meet again at the caravan, amongst your fellows.
original_zh_text: 你还在这里吗？昆虫不是跳蚤吗？我们在去大篷车之前需要休息，没有猫，他们认为有问题，所以他把壳切了。&lt;hpage&gt;“好吧，夫人，我得走了。旅途中保持静止。我想在车里见你。

original_en_text: Ah, of course. Perhaps you will be trying one of the other games?
original_zh_text: 为什么不尝试另一款游戏呢？

original_en_text: Grrr... bug not flea. Still wishing for knowings of my work? But you hold no map to mark! Until a map is owned, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: 是的，是的，是的……...昆虫不是跳蚤，你知道它们是什么吗？我没有论文可写！在地图创建之前，几乎什么都没有。

original_en_text: Thank you. Thank you! I’ll treasure these sweet-smelling rosaries dearly! Now, don’t be shy. Step inside!
original_zh_text: 再次感谢！“我对这款香水很感兴趣。请不要害羞。

original_en_text: Vikna! My dear one, my dancer, the game has ended and you have proven yourself the champion!<page>None can best your score. You have shamed us all with your fearsome grace! But you will keep playing for me, yes?<page>The end of the world need not be a lonely thing... eheh heh...
original_zh_text: 亲爱的丹卡诺，比赛结束了，你证明了自己是冠军！&lt;page&gt;你那可怕的优雅冒犯了我们所有人！“你愿意为我工作吗？“真的吗？&lt;page&gt;世界末日并不是一个单一事件。是的，正确的。

original_en_text: Excellent, excellent! Let us make preparations and be off without delay! Rouse yourself fleas, for the caravan roams once more!
original_zh_text: 非常勇敢！勇敢的人们！干得好！干得好！干得好！干得好！干得好！准备好了，我们现在出发吧！把你的车放进卡车上休息一下！

original_en_text: My dear, will you play Flea Bounce for me once more? Leap up and bounce on the fleas who fly past for as long as you are able!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，你能把它从跳蚤身上拿下来吗？尽可能多地下载，然后跳转到Flea！

original_en_text: Say you dodeshna to the new flea sitting there? Is quiet one, but is very good at games!<page>Have no worry for him, Grishkin will look after. Will fill him with brew and meet him to all the other fleas.
original_zh_text: 假设您对新Dodeshna芯片的看法是正确的。一个安静的游戏，但非常好！&lt;page&gt;“别担心，我会照顾你的。他倒满啤酒，看着其他跳蚤。

original_en_text: Here we shall remain, for a time, Miss Hornet, and pray that more lost fleas find their way to us.<hpage>What others I encounter, I shall send your way, Fleamaster.
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂夫人，我们可以在这里住一段时间，我祈祷其他流浪跳蚤也能找到路。&lt;hpage&gt;当我遇到其他人时，我会带他们去见我的主人努米。"

original_en_text: <hpage>That is well, Fleamaster. My travels through this land have been far and deep, and yet at almost every reach I met the friendly, inquisitive presence of your kind.<hpage>You fleas have an uncommon desire for adventure, which I find admirable, even if it is seldom matched by capability.<hpage>Though I am long accustomed to travelling alone, following your journey, and sharing some part in its progress has been a warm thing.<page>Ahh, and so happy too have you made we fleas!<page>I would be honoured to bestow one final gift unto you, Miss Hornet, a treasure from fleakind’s glorious past. May it mark you forever as a friend to us all.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;好了伙计们我深入了这片土地。无论我走到哪里，我总是会遇到像你这样好奇的人。&lt;hpage&gt;Free对冒险有着不同寻常的渴望，即使这种渴望不匹配，也很有趣。&lt;hpage&gt;我已经习惯了很长一段时间独自旅行，但我很高兴跟随您的旅程并分享我的进步。&lt;page&gt;我很高兴你送花给我。&lt;page&gt;“大黄蜂先生，我很荣幸成为光荣过去跳蚤宝藏的最后一份礼物。"

original_en_text: The spa is yours, dear guest! And always open for one so considerate and kindly as yourself... eheh heh...
original_zh_text: 亲爱的客人们，水疗中心是你们的！始终向像您这样富有同情心和善良的人敞开心扉。是的，正确的。

original_en_text: With luck, my dear, we will meet again when I have joined the flea caravan.<page>My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly to share with you when next we meet!
original_zh_text: 如果你幸运的话，如果你加入自由大篷车，你就会再次见到他们。&lt;page&gt;这辆车隐藏着秘密。下次我看到它时，我会和你分享。

original_en_text: The pact is made then. Fellows! Steel yourself! It is time, it is time!
original_zh_text: 交易结束了，孩子们。我强烈要求！现在是我独处的时候了。

original_en_text: This long lake... Space is much more big here. Finally I have some quiet from the little fleas.
original_zh_text: 这是一个很长的湖，所以有更多的空间，所以我终于可以放松了。

original_en_text: Ahh, that is a shame, but I understand. I’m sure our roads will cross each other soon enough.<page>And now, we must be off! Rouse yourself, fleas. The caravan roams once more!
original_zh_text: “抱歉，我们的路快到了。"&lt;page&gt;我们必须回去恢复，弗洛伊德的车队又开始了！

original_en_text: The grand ceremony has ended, but still we play! Will you honour us with a display of Flea Juggle, Miss Grand Champion Hornet?
original_zh_text: 游戏结束了，但我们还在玩。“大黄蜂小姐，我可以看看获胜者的跳蚤浴室吗？”"

original_en_text: Wonderful! Wonderful! The fleas will be overjoyed to share this next journey with our favoured companion! Let us away!
original_zh_text: 他们很棒。这太不可思议了！我们期待着与我们亲爱的朋友分享我们的下一次旅行！来吧来吧他在那里！“

original_en_text: Mamashka! Let our beautiful game begin! Flea Bounce!
original_zh_text: 恭喜你，妈妈！好游戏开始了！自由弹跳

original_en_text: <hpage>Unfortunately not, Fleamaster. I have visited many of this kingdom’s caves, and none would offer the safety and space you require.<hpage>If ever I come upon such a place, I will let you know.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;他是飞行员！我参观过王国中的许多洞穴，但没有一个可以为您提供所需的安全和空间。&lt;hpage&gt;如果我来到这样的地方，我会告诉你的。

original_en_text: How do you like our festival, Miss Hornet? While the world crumbles around us, we will laugh and dance and frolick!<page>Make merry with us, and play some of the games of old!<hpage>My time is slim, Fleamaster. If I am to join your games, know it will be only to hone my skills for the greater trial I must soon face below.<page>Of course! Of course! Joy or learnings! Any reason is fine by us, Miss Hornet!<page>And look here, we have Flea Juggle, where the challenge is to strike fleas upwards and keep them airborne for as long as possible.<page>To have our treasured guest challenge this humble game would be an honour for us, truly!
original_zh_text: “霍尼特小姐，这是怎么回事？“你觉得我们的假期怎么样？当我们周围的世界崩溃时，我们会笑、跳舞、玩耍！&lt;page&gt;快来玩点老游戏吧！&lt;hpage&gt;如果我是你游戏的一部分，我会磨练我的技能来应对你面临的最大挑战。&lt;page&gt;当然可以！当然可以！幸福就是学习！“不管怎样，大黄蜂夫人。"&lt;page&gt;这就是跳蚤的作用，而任务是让跳蚤尽可能长时间地飞行。&lt;page&gt;我们很荣幸地欢迎我们尊贵的客人来到这个卑微的会议。

original_en_text: A mistake, treasured guest! Never again! Ohhh. Never again!

<hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Amongst all of your troupe, I had little doubt you would survive to reach this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Bug not flea! Mine is to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together and grow them strong.<hpage>If you have sensed the locations of other lost fleas, share them with me. I may be able to send them safe to the caravan.<page>My learnings? Not free for you, bug not flea. Rosaries! Give those and I shall say of what I have sensed. Work like mine... much long, and hard. For that, I deserve some riches held.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;为巴黎干杯。有了你的团队，我毫不怀疑你会加入这个团队。&lt;hpage&gt;你需要做什么工作才能以这种可怕的方式离开你的朋友？&lt;page&gt;昆虫不是跳蚤，它们是跳蚤。矿井后面，有一辆卡车，一股气味，一种强烈的感觉。找到我们的跳蚤朋友，最年轻的跳蚤，让我们抓住他们并让他们变得更强大。&lt;hpage&gt;如果您找到跳蚤的其他地方，请与我分享，它们可以用大篷车安全地运输。&lt;page&gt;在我的研究中？这对你来说不是免费的，错误也不是耻辱。考虑到这一点，我想分享我的感受。就像我一样，很多。这就是他们需要财富的原因。

original_en_text: So many lost fleas have made it here... Truly, I’d never dared to hope we could gather such a grand company.<page>But, oh! The world has grown so dangerous, and there may be more lost fleas out there. I do so hope they can find their way to us!
original_zh_text: 这么多迷失的跳蚤来了，没想到会有这么大的公司。&lt;page&gt;妈妈，哦，世界很危险，更多的跳蚤正在消失。

original_en_text: We fleas are all gathered, but now the world has loudly marked its ending! As great as our numbers grew, it seems our caravan will be the last.<page>There is only one thing left to do... but the preparations require time. If your travels wind their way back to us, dear friend, you yourself are welcome to participate...
original_zh_text: 蠕虫聚集在一起，但现在世界即将结束。球队越来越多，但我认为我们的球队是最后一支。&lt;page&gt;我们只有一件事要做，但我们需要时间准备。亲爱的朋友们，我们邀请您旅行归来时亲自加入我们。

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, I must tell, we’ve seen evidence nearby of a hunter of our tribe, a flea that seeks fleas!<page>As pungent and gruff as their sort often are, they’re still useful to have around a caravan.<page>A flea of their rare skill, settled among us, could offer defence and more.<page>If you’re still to be helping grow our town, search them out, up atop the muck choked ducts.
original_zh_text: “大黄蜂小姐，我看到证据表明我们部落的猎人正在寻找跳蚤。普拉加斯！&lt;page&gt;它们通常又辣又稠，但在大篷车周围仍然非常有用。&lt;page&gt;我们之间安装了具有罕见功能的芯片，提供防御等等。&lt;page&gt;但如果你想帮助城市发展，看看被泥浆堵塞的管道。

original_en_text: A cauldron full of Flea Brew.

<hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Of your many companions, I had little worry you would survive safe to find this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Mine was to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together so strong they could grow.<page>A task once important, mine! But not now. All fleas are here, safe. A rare many! Time for toasts, and brew to fill our bellies!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;为巴黎干杯。在我们很多同志中，我们一点也不担心火车是否安全。&lt;hpage&gt;你需要做什么工作才能以这种可怕的方式离开你的朋友？&lt;page&gt;我们的目标是通过指纹、气味和敏感度来跟踪它。找到最年轻的跳蚤，让我们一起变得更强大。&lt;page&gt;这是我的伟大工作！不是现在，我知道。巴黎在这里很安全。是时候喝酒并用葡萄酒填饱肚子了！

original_en_text: Look here! All these lively fleas flocked to our caravan. Thanks to you and your hunting, our numbers grow grand. Mayhap, in time, we could grow to match even those caravans of our fabled past?<hpage>To see so many safe is a welcome sight, Fleamaster. Their playful cheer suggests you are a fine steward for the swelling troupe.<page>Such kind words, Miss Hornet! How lucky we are to have found a friend so fair!<page>But now, we must away! These moors have been our host long enough. It is time to climb and hoist towards drier caves!<page>Good friend to fleas, would you join us on this next journey?
original_zh_text: 你一定要看看这个！“这些活跃的跳蚤已经入侵了舰队。多亏了你们和狩猎，我们的数量正在增长。随着时间的推移，您可以将其与过去的传奇大篷车进行比较。&lt;hpage&gt;这是一件好事，让很多人看起来很安全，Flex Master。你有趣的掌声表明你是一家成长型公司的优秀经理。&lt;page&gt;“女孩，你很漂亮。在角落里！我很幸运有好朋友！&lt;page&gt;现在我必须走了！这片土地已经是我们的主人很久了，是时候去干燥的洞穴了！&lt;page&gt;“你是巴黎最好的朋友，不是吗？”“你愿意陪我下次旅行吗？

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended.<page>Bug not flea... impressive was your performance. Your score exceeds even my own.<page>To see skill so much, moments before everything ends, gives me unexpected joy.<page>Rishkiz... I congratulate you, champion.
original_zh_text: 威克：审判结束了。&lt;page&gt;昆虫不是跳蚤，它们是跳蚤。他的表现令人印象深刻。“你的分数比我高。"&lt;page&gt;在过去的几分钟里，我看到了很多技术，感受到了意外的喜悦。&lt;page&gt;恭喜你，冠军！

original_en_text: Ahh, Miss Hornet! Greetings, and well met, once again!<page>The journey here was long, but we didn’t lose a single flea! And now fate has brought us back together again... what a marvel!<hpage>It is good to see you safe, Fleamaster. The journey to this moor from the caverns below is long and dangerous.<page>Dangerous, certainly, but we fleas are born to roam!<page>And now, you must go and see Grishkin, sitting there by the bubbling cauldron. After long travel, we drink to revive our spirits!
original_zh_text: “对不起，霍恩先生。早上好，再见！&lt;page&gt;我们已经走过了漫长的道路，但我们没有失去任何东西。这是将我们团结在一起的神奇命运。&lt;hpage&gt;从洞穴到沼泽的旅程漫长而危险。&lt;page&gt;当然，这很危险，但跳蚤生来就是为了行走。&lt;page&gt;我不得不去看看坐在锅炉旁边的格里斯金。经过漫长的旅程，格里芬！

original_en_text: Grrr.. bug not flea. Why you must bother me? This spot is mine, fair fought and earned.<hpage>I won’t stay long, madam. Nor would I contest your right to this cave.<hpage>I have encountered several of your fellow fleas, united in a caravan. Perhaps you would consider joining with them?<hpage>Yours seems a hardy hide, and I fear alone they lack the strength to survive long in this land.<page>Caravan? Grrr. Felt it in my fur... Time for change. If caravan is close, then my task, these lands, may near be complete.<page>Now... Grrr. Much talk I gave. You leave me! Meet again at caravan, amongst good fellows. There I share my learnings of fleas and Pharloom. Till then, rest I need! Off, bug!
original_zh_text: 咕噜虫不是跳蚤。获胜是我的公平游戏。&lt;hpage&gt;“不会太久，小姐，但我怀疑你是对的，在这个山洞里。"&lt;hpage&gt;我在大篷车的隔离区遇到了他的同伴。&lt;hpage&gt;她的皮肤看起来很强壮，但她自己却没有能力在这个地球上活得很久。&lt;page&gt;大篷车？我的天啊！“我在皮肤上感觉到了，现在是时候做出改变了。如果商队接近，我在地球上的任务可能就接近完成了。&lt;page&gt;现在是. ...咕噜，我们讲了很多故事。因为我在朋友的大篷车里，所以我分享了我对跳蚤和法老的了解。现在我需要休息了！该错误已关闭。

original_en_text: Ohhhh! What other choice do we poor wretches have?! Cruel fate leaves us with only one last task...<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet! Forgive us, but we beg one more favour from you. Will you accompany us in our final act...?
original_zh_text: 我的天啊！穷人会做出什么选择？艰难的生活终于结束了。&lt;page&gt;亲爱的朋友们，黄蜂小姐，很抱歉，但我还有一个给你。

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is ended, and we have a new Flea Juggle champion! Incredible!<page>Miss Hornet, with your skill, I’m certain you could best all three of our games and become the grandest champion of them all!
original_zh_text: 游戏结束，一艘新船出现。这太不可思议了！&lt;page&gt;“大黄蜂小姐，以你的才华，我相信你将成为我们三场比赛中的最佳赢家，也是所有比赛中的最佳赢家。

original_en_text: My, what a sweet face now emerges from the darkness! Poor Kratt has been hiding here from those blackened beasts for too long, all alone!<hpage>The beasts and bugs ensnared by the black thread are dangerous indeed. You have done right to hide yourself from them, sir.<hpage>That metal carriage... It is yours, I assume?<page>Ooh, yes, yes! I’m setting out to join the nearest flea caravan, aren’t I? Safety in numbers, yes? I’ve had more than enough of venturing alone.<page>And you... I trust I will see you there? My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly share with you when next we meet! Heh heh!
original_zh_text: 可怜的老鼠躲在这里很久，远离黑兽！&lt;hpage&gt;被困在黑线上的动物和昆虫非常危险。&lt;hpage&gt;我想这台金属机器是你的。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的，是的！“我加入了舰队，对吧？“事实上？很安全，对吧？我厌倦了独自冒险。&lt;page&gt;你...你认为我们会在那里见面吗？这台机器隐藏着一个秘密，所以下次我看到它时，我想与你分享。

original_en_text: There are still many fleas for us to be united with though, and we’ve rested long enough. The caravan must head higher!<page>Oh, but stranger, how remiss of me! I introduced myself earlier without ever asking for your own name. Forgive me! Please, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<hpage>I still have a long journey ahead of me. If I come across any more fleas, I will assist where I am able.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing for me to hear!<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan must be away now, toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 不过，我们还是组装了很多芯片，休息得很好。&lt;page&gt;我多么懒啊。我已经介绍了自己，但我没有问他的名字。我该怎么称呼他？&lt;hpage&gt;“你可以叫我巴布比，弗雷大师。“很高兴看到你的坏朋友在你的舰队中很安全。独自旅行是一个非常危险的国家。&lt;hpage&gt;我还有很长的路要走，但如果我发现更多跳蚤，我会尽力而为。&lt;page&gt;他们走了！换句话说，我简直不敢相信！听到这个消息我很高兴！"&lt;page&gt;“我亲爱的朋友们，汉布尔比小姐，我们的车队必须出发前往广阔的高原平原。

original_en_text: So many awful places have us fleas travelled. Many times I almost die. But here is seems safe enough.<page>You will have rest too? Is space enough for us all now... friend.
original_zh_text: 跳蚤去了可怕的地方，有几次它们差点死掉，但这个地方相当安全。&lt;page&gt;你也想休息一下吗？有足够的空间容纳我们所有人吗？我是你的。

original_en_text: Welcome again, Miss Hornet! See how high our caravan has climbed, resting right on the doorstep of that mighty Citadel!<hpage>It is fortunate that all of your companions survived the trek, Fleamaster. The howling rise beside, and the tangled wood before it, have both claimed the lives of countless bugs.<page>Indeed! A perilous ascent! We have seen the many husks in passing. A mighty luck must shine on us, to journey with such success.
original_zh_text: 你好，黄蜂小姐，看看我们的商队爬得多高，停在一座强大城堡的门口！&lt;hpage&gt;幸运的是，我所有的朋友都经历了这段漫长的旅程。在他旁边，一棵树抓住了他的面前，杀死了无数昆虫。&lt;page&gt;“你是对的，风险越来越大。我们看到很多软体动物，所以我们很幸运能够取得这样的成功。

original_en_text: Look, look! So many fleas have joined the caravan! What a miracle! We can not thank you enough for honouring our humble wish!
original_zh_text: 看着我！看着我！我们团队里人很多！这是一个奇迹！谢谢你实现了我的小愿望！

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? Would you seek service of me, ehh? Mine is knowledge much, the places of the lost little ones, heard and smelt across the caves.<page>You help find! And bring! Best we come together, we fleas all... now that times turn dark...
original_zh_text: 如果你停下来，昆虫就不是跳蚤，不是吗？我们需要服务，对吧？你在干什么？我听到并闻到了这些小东西，了解了很多关于失落洞穴的位置的信息。&lt;page&gt;请帮我找到他！你最好把他们都杀了，时间会创造一个新的洞。

original_en_text: As you wish, sweet one. Shall we just rest here together on the shore of eternity instead?
original_zh_text: 我们会在永恒的尽头再次见面吗？

original_en_text: Mamashka! I am saying, let the game begin! Flea Juggle!
original_zh_text: 恭喜你，妈妈！让游戏开始！巴黎的陷阱！

original_en_text: What a beautiful spot you’ve gifted us, Miss Hornet! Safe apart from the dark and death of the lands beside. A place for fleas to grow smart and strong.<page>Here we shall see our travels end, for in Pharloom there could be no finer place to settle.<hpage>I am glad the location suits, Fleamaster. It is a calming thing to know these many fleas may survive. Most bugs of Pharloom seem destined for far bleaker fates.<page>Indeed! A hopeful future awaits! And only because of yourself and your efforts. To commemorate our arrival, it would be my pleasure to perform a small service for you.<page>I have been learning to sew, and the little fleas have been gathering materials for me. I thought I could add an extra pocket to your tool pouch, to make your travels just a little easier.<page>A trifling favour, much less than you deserve, but still I hope it meets to your satisfaction!
original_zh_text: 高奈特太太给了我们一个好地方这是一个跳蚤聪明而强壮的地方，远离黑暗和死亡。&lt;page&gt;这个农场没有殖民地，所以旅程到此结束。&lt;hpage&gt;我很高兴这是一个好地方，奶奶。我很高兴跳蚤活了下来。大多数甲虫似乎都有更悲惨的命运。&lt;page&gt;是的，只有通过你们的努力，才能等待光明的未来。为了庆祝我们的到来，我很高兴为您提供一项小型服务。&lt;page&gt;她学会了缝纫和跳蚤收集材料。您可以在行李中添加额外的口袋，让您的旅行更轻松。&lt;page&gt;这比你应得的要少得多，但我希望你无论如何都能满意。

original_en_text: My dear Flea Bounce champion, will you play with us again? Let us dance and fly above the waters until the world itself falls away!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的篮板冠军，你想继续和我们一起打球吗？让我们在水上跳舞、飞翔，直到世界消失。

original_en_text: Sweet one! What a delight to see you emerge from the horrible darkness now enveloping the world!<page>Poor Kratt feared he would have only his mangy fellow fleas for company at the end of everything. How kind of you to spend your last moments here with me!
original_zh_text: 天哪，我的爱！我很高兴我们逃脱了笼罩整个世界的可怕黑暗！&lt;page&gt;可怜的老鼠担心自己最终会成为肮脏跳蚤的伴侣。我们很高兴我们在一起度过了最后一分钟。

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I took your request from the wishwall in the pilgrim camp. You are seeking fleas to join your caravan? I have found and freed many throughout my travels.<page>Oh yes, indeed! And look here, they all have made their way to us! So many gathered, it seems a miracle. Our wishes granted before even your promise was known!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;火之王，我收到了为朝圣地建造一堵愿望墙的请求。在我的旅程中，我遇到了很多人并释放了他们。&lt;page&gt;对，对，对！每个人都想来这里！这么多人聚集在一起真是个奇迹。在承诺兑现之前，我们的希望就实现了！

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is now ended, but you can play again, as much you wish... until the end of the world comes for us all!
original_zh_text: 游戏已经结束，但直到世界末日，如果你愿意的话，你可以再玩一次！

original_en_text: Stranger, will you hear my worry? The time has come for us fleas to find each other and travel together, as has happened through generations before.<page>The many fleas of this kingdom should be flocking to our caravan, but times have become dangerous. You feel it too, yes? Our poor cousins, out there, in hiding!<page>Would you, could you, help us find these poor, lost fleas? We daren’t continue our journey until some of the poor dears have found their way here to us!
original_zh_text: 奇怪的是，你听到我的担忧了吗？跳蚤和前几代人一样，是时候互相寻找并一起旅行了。&lt;page&gt;王国的跳蚤包围着我们的商队，但时代变得越来越危险。你也能听到，不是吗？实际上？我姐姐躲起来了。"&lt;page&gt;你能帮我找到丢失的芯片吗？他们不敢继续旅行，直到被穷人的亲戚发现。

original_en_text: Alas, Miss Hornet! Until our paths cross again, our dearest wishes go with you.<hpage>Safe travels to you and your troupe, Fleamaster.
original_zh_text: 在我们的道路再次相遇之前，我们与你同在，而不是与你同在。&lt;hpage&gt;祝您和您的船员旅途愉快。

original_en_text: And so the great ceremony has reached its climax and its grand champion has emerged!<page>Thank you for spending your last moments with us here, Miss Hornet.<page>Though the world will soon end, and our paradise will crumble, the memories of friendship we all shared shall surely echo through the oncoming void for all eternity!<hpage>Fleamaster, your sentiment is kind, but this world will not end.<page>Oh? How good of you to speak words of hope for our benefit, but we have accepted our fate. Come, let us forget the past and revel together!<hpage>It is not merely hope that I offer you, sir, but a promise. This kingdom’s suffering has a singular cause, and by my own claw will it be cleansed.<hpage>Perhaps not every flea will survive what is coming... but the world will not die, and your settlement may still see chance to prosper.<page>Ahh? You speak... with such conviction. But I cannot bring myself to hope such, I am sorry.<page>Come what may, we fleas will be here until the end. And the games will continue, of course! Celebrate with us for as long as you wish, dear friend.
original_zh_text: 派对来了，伟大的冠军来了！&lt;page&gt;最后一次谢谢你，霍妮特小姐。&lt;page&gt;即使世界崩溃，天堂崩溃，友谊的记忆也会永远在等待我们的空虚中回响。&lt;hpage&gt;“火之王，你关系很好，但世界不会终结。&lt;page&gt;你在干什么？真的吗？我们倾听希望的话语，但我们接受命运。忘记过去，玩得开心！&lt;hpage&gt;他们不仅给了我们希望，也给了我们承诺。这个国家遭受苦难的原因只有一个，我会用指甲把它清除。&lt;hpage&gt;然而，世界不会消亡，殖民地仍然有机会繁荣。&lt;page&gt;这是什么？你在干什么？请带着这个信念说话。我真的很抱歉，我没有希望了。&lt;page&gt;无论发生什么，我们都会坚持到最后。当然，游戏还在继续。亲爱的朋友们，如果您愿意，请加入我们的庆祝活动。

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is ended, and we have a new Flea Juggle champion! Incredible!<page>You have proven yourself the champion at each of our flea games!<page>I am confident now that the grand champion of our festival has emerged. It is none other than yourself, of course!<page>And thusly, must our final ceremony begin. Fleas, prepare yourselves!
original_zh_text: 游戏结束，一艘新船出现。这太不可思议了！&lt;page&gt;您是我们赢得的每场跳蚤锦标赛的冠军！&lt;page&gt;这场盛会的获胜者已经出来了。当然还有你！&lt;page&gt;闭幕式已经开始。布洛克，我准备好了。

original_en_text: You not want my learnings, bug not flea? Rare it is we share such things with ones outside our own.
original_zh_text: 你知道昆虫不是跳蚤吗？我很少与别人分享。

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, you are the greatest of us all in the Flea Juggle! But will you challenge yourself to ever higher achievements?
original_zh_text: 黄蜂小姐，你是最好的跳蚤！您正在寻找更好的结果吗？

original_en_text: Dodeshna, stranger. You are looking a little... tired, is it? Unhealthy?<page>You can rest with us here, if wish. Is nice and dark, and warmth from below brings good health.<page>Still, you should make care not to stay much long. You are not flea, after all.
original_zh_text: 陌生人：你累了吗？你在干什么？&lt;page&gt;阳光、黑暗和炎热的天气会让你更健康。&lt;page&gt;但要注意不要呆太久。毕竟，你不是跳蚤。

original_en_text: You still here, bug? Is rest I need before I travel. Not chat. You is trouble-type. Make my shell tense.<hpage>I shall take my leave, madam. Stay strong on your own journey. May we meet again in more hospitable surrounds.
original_zh_text: “爸，你在吗？“旅行前需要休息。猫很难把它从壳里拉出来。&lt;hpage&gt;“好吧，夫人，我得走了。旅途中要坚强。

original_en_text: Look, Miss Hornet! See the many lively fleas that form our caravan. Thanks to you and your hunting, so many are here! And all are eager again to travel!<page>We had once wished to match the numbers of our fabled past, yet now, we may even have exceeded them!<hpage>It is a welcome sight, Fleamaster, and the playful cheer about the caravan suggests you are a fine steward to the troupe.<page>Such kind words, Miss Hornet! How lucky we are to have found a friend so fair!<page>But now, we must away! These moors have been our host long enough. It is time to climb and hoist towards drier caves!<page>Good friend to fleas, would you join us on this next journey?
original_zh_text: “看看这个，霍尼夫人。看看组成我们舰队的许多活跃跳蚤。谢谢孩子们！人太多了！每个人都想再次旅行。&lt;page&gt;我想赶上过去的传奇英雄，但现在我可以击败他们了。&lt;hpage&gt;《舰队长》是一部受欢迎的节目，商队的欢呼声证明他已经到了处理尸体的地步。&lt;page&gt;“女孩，你很漂亮。在角落里！我很幸运有好朋友！&lt;page&gt;现在我必须走了！这片土地已经是我们的主人很久了，是时候去干燥的洞穴了！&lt;page&gt;“你是巴黎最好的朋友，不是吗？”“你愿意陪我下次旅行吗？

original_en_text: Marvellous! We fleas shall be overjoyed to have your company on the road.<page>Now! Our new home is calling. We must travel!
original_zh_text: 这太不可思议了！我们俱乐部很高兴与您在一起。&lt;page&gt;快点，现在！它被称为你的新家，你必须旅行！

original_en_text: I’m wonder at this land... Something heavy hangs above, like shadow. I’m hope the little fleas have not much danger here...
original_zh_text: 我对这片土地非常感兴趣。有什么沉重的东西像影子一样悬在那里。希望你的小猫没有危险。

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I took your request from the wishwall in the pilgrim camp. You are seeking fleas to join your caravan?<page>Oh, yes! The time has come for us fleas to find each other and travel together, as has happened through generations before.<page>The many fleas of this kingdom should be flocking to our caravan, but times have become dangerous. You feel it too, yes? Our poor cousins, out there, in hiding!<page>But... do I understand you rightly, stranger? You will help find the poor, lost fleas? Truly?
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;火之王，我收到了为朝圣地建造一堵愿望墙的请求。&lt;page&gt;哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦，是的！跳蚤和前几代人一样，是时候互相寻找并一起旅行了。&lt;page&gt;王国的跳蚤包围着我们的商队，但时代变得越来越危险。你也能听到，不是吗？实际上？我姐姐躲起来了。"&lt;page&gt;更多... ...这是一个奇怪的故事，你知道吗？你能帮我找回丢失的芯片吗？实际上？

original_en_text: That great vein of bells there... some of the fleas wanted to shelter inside, but I was not so sure. The whole creaking mass seems unstable! It makes me tremble!<hpage>You were wise not to head inside, Fleamaster. A silken curse has taken hold of the settlement within. Advise your fellows to avoid that place.<page>A curse, you say?! W-well then! Our thanks are owed again. I shall let all fleas know they must not venture closer.
original_zh_text: 一块发光的手表。一些跳蚤试图躲在里面，但没有效果。声音非常不稳定。你在颤抖！&lt;hpage&gt;“普里莫尔斯先生，请不要进来。丝绸的诅咒统治着这座城市。&lt;page&gt;你认为这是诅咒吗？好吧，好吧！好吧，好吧！好的！再次感谢您的帮助。“我警告你不要接近所有跳蚤。

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended. Your score can be seen on the board beside me.
original_zh_text: 过程已经完成，您的帐户就在我旁边的桌子上。
别给我任何东西，你知道的。
远程工作场所（远程现场）
别给我任何东西，你知道的。
远程工作场所（远程现场）
耶稣基督，哥谭市的无家可归者

original_en_text: Ah, miss! Course you’d be one to survive through all this! Capable as you seem and all. <page>It’s a sad thing, but I can’t say most folk down here’ve fared so fortunate. And our once fine camp below ain’t no longer safe for any bug, all crushed and consumed by this black calamity.<hpage>Nowhere is safe, sir, but I am glad you few remain. Know I shall work to fix this, as best I’m able.<page>Calming our raging world? That’s a lofty goal, miss. I’m not thinkin’ any one bug’d be able to stop these happenings, but it’s heartenin’ knowing you’ve still got fire enough to feel different.<page>Rest here with us, long as you like. A little company’s about the best thing we few’re wishin’ for now.
original_zh_text: 我的天啊！你是唯一一个可以克服它的人！你很有能力。&lt;page&gt;我们下面的田野不再适合昆虫，所有的昆虫都被黑死病压垮和吞噬。&lt;hpage&gt;“没有安全的地方，但我很高兴你没事。我们将尽最大努力解决这个问题。" "&lt;page&gt;一个平静而愤怒的世界-我相信错误是不可避免的，但我很高兴知道你仍然足够兴奋来改变事情。&lt;page&gt;如果您想在这里放松一下，小企业是最好的，我们可以期待这一次。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I bring supplies from the town of bells up above, to aid your camp and its residents.<page>Ah! Mighty thankful these folks’ll be. Most arrive here with nothin’ but their shell. Your delivery there’ll make things a little easier on ‘em.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我从奥伯贝尔带来了一些物资来帮助你们的营地和居民。&lt;page&gt;是的，正确的。哦，是的！谢谢，感谢大多数只带着贝壳来到这里的人。当你携带它时，事情会变得更容易。

original_en_text: Mm. Mmm! Who is it? An intruder! Terrible! To interrupt a humble druid as they work!<hpage>I meant no intrusion, druid. The sound of your laughter drew me to investigate.<page>What? Laughter? No idea what you mean. Nonsense!
original_zh_text: 我的天啊！对，对！“你是谁？入侵！可怕的是，不起眼的机器人的工作已经停止了！&lt;hpage&gt;机器人不想干扰他的笑声，并要求我调查一下。&lt;page&gt;这是什么？干净的？我不知道那是什么意思，混蛋。

original_en_text: May your travels bring you fortune, hunter. And may the Citadel come to fear your freedom in our land.
original_zh_text: 亨特，愿你的旅程给你带来财富。

original_en_text: Hrm? Oh, it’s you again. Please, no more talk of bells or travel. I’m trying to stay hidden.<hpage>I mean no intrusion, ma’am. Are you composing yourself here before you leave on your own journey?<page>Like all the others, my brothers and sisters who trudged off to die? No, I think I’ll linger here a little longer with my thoughts...
original_zh_text: 这是什么？你在干什么？我们不再谈论旅行和旅行，她试图隐藏。&lt;hpage&gt;“别担心，小姐，你准备好了吗？”»&lt;page&gt;和其他人一样，我的兄弟姐妹惨死。

original_en_text: Must be terrifying out there, beyond the settlement. Nothing but monsters and madness lurking in the darkness.<page>I’ve heard tales of a safe place, though. Just up above here, where the moss paints the stones green, there’s an old village. Bit of a holy place, apparently, well protected.<hpage>I’ve visited the settlement you speak of. It was built around a burial spire, corpse-home to an ancient Weaver.<hpage>It is hardly safe though. The terrain is treacherous, and predators prowl its commons. I advise you avoid that place.<page>Oh... I see. Of course. Nowhere is really free of danger, is it? That’s just the way for us pilgrims...
original_zh_text: 在黑暗中，你可能会遇到可怕的怪物或疯子。&lt;page&gt;再往前走一点，有一个古老的村庄，绿色的石头上长满了苔藓。"&lt;hpage&gt;我们参观了一座建筑，那里的尸体是用旧织物建造的，周围环绕着墓地的尖塔。&lt;hpage&gt;但这并不意味着它是安全的。地形继续扩大，掠食者进入公共场所。我们建议您避开这个地方。&lt;page&gt;是的，正确的。到处都有危险，对吧？实际上？为朝圣者祈祷。

original_en_text: For though, as pilgrims, we aim our sights high and never waver from our path, the loss of a brother or sister still stops our trembling limbs in place.
original_zh_text: 作为朝圣者，我们的目标很高，我们的旅程坚不可摧，但我们兄弟姐妹的去世令人震惊。

original_en_text: Few are as foreign as you, hunter dear. Visit me when you care.<page>I’ll look forward to hearing how your steps might shake our world. Oho. Yes!
original_zh_text: 像你这样的外国人很少。&lt;page&gt;我迫不及待地想看到你的脚步震撼世界。

original_en_text: Ohh, the world trembles! But we can hear it... beating steady... beating free...
original_zh_text: 这个世界太可怕了！我认为天气稳定，所以我可以自由地跳舞。

original_en_text: Granter refuses! I understand. Granter is petty, evil. Misguided! When your mind clears, return here. Return here and grant my wish!
original_zh_text: 格兰特拒绝了。我认为格兰特错了。我弄错了如果你有良心，请回来。我来这里是为了实现你的愿望！“

original_en_text: Oh... you’ve come to hide down here too, then? ‘Tis a fearful world out there. If you can keep quiet, I don’t mind you joining me.<hpage>You’ve chosen a curious place to rest, ma’am. This pit of bells and the structure around it... they suggest a station for travel, though one long abandoned.<page>Aye. Rumours in the camp say these bells run throughout the lands, great veins of them, forged by our ancient kin.<page>And some even say bugs used to travel through them, in gilded carriages no less!<page>Surely such fanciful travel would be a sin for us pilgrims. We must walk and climb and crawl using only our own meagre claws... Only thus can we prove our devotion.
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。你躲起来了吗？外面的世界是一个可怕的地方。如果你停下来，你会和我在一起。&lt;hpage&gt;我选择了一个奇怪的地方。钟楼旁边的一座建筑物已被提议建造一座现已废弃的客运大楼。&lt;page&gt;是的，在农村地区，这些手表散落在大地上，这些巨大的线条据说是古代亲戚建造的。&lt;page&gt;昆虫走过或走在金色的马车上。&lt;page&gt;对我们朝圣者来说，这段反复无常的旅程无疑是罪恶的。我们只需要带着脚趾甲走路，爬上去，爬上去。

original_en_text: Did you take a look at the wishwall? You might’ve noticed I added a cheeky little wish of my own.<page>Fair’s fair, I did build the thing. Seems like the kingdom should be granting my wish before anyone else’s.
original_zh_text: 你见过欲望之墙吗？正如你所看到的，我添加了一个小愿望。&lt;page&gt;说实话，我想我做到了。我的王国似乎实现了我的愿望。

original_en_text: You keep the berries to yourself? All for you? Mmm. Promise breaker! Promise breaker!
original_zh_text: 你有浆果吗？为了你的？我的天啊！叛徒！叛徒！

original_en_text: Never shared my name with you, did I? Awfully remiss of me.<page>It’s Pilby. Been nice spending time with you, miss.<hpage>Likewise, sir. It’s been some time since I had such ample opportunity for friendly conversation.<hpage>My name is Hornet. It is good to be properly acquainted at last.<page>Hornet, eh? Strong name, that. It certainly suits you, miss. Heh heh...
original_zh_text: ”你从来没有一个名字，是吗？我太鲁莽了。&lt;page&gt;我很高兴和你在一起。&lt;hpage&gt;此外，我已经很久没有进行过友好的交谈了。&lt;hpage&gt;他们称之为炸弹。“我很高兴终于正式见面。&lt;page&gt;黄蜂是真的吗？这是一个美丽的名字，你会没事的，女孩。是的，正确的。

original_en_text: The Mossberries. Do you still hunt them, little you? My wish was granted, but clear now that more are needed! More!<page>Bring more Mossberries here. Mmm. Yes, we will trade. Precious rosaries for fresh berries!
original_zh_text: “小子，你还在追我吗？“我的愿望实现了，但现在我想要更多！“这是可能的。&lt;page&gt;请给我一块慕斯。好吧，我们做个交易。美丽的玫瑰和新鲜的浆果！

original_en_text: <hpage>As promised, druid, I have your berries. What is your need for such common fruits?<page>Common!? No. No... Special. Cherished. Only a druid knows it! The berries bright! For my wish. My wish so dear!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;确保机器人，我已经采集了你的指纹，你想从这些水果中得到什么？"&lt;page&gt;什么是正常的？不，我特别担心。这是只有机器人知道的事情。浆果很大。我的愿望很珍贵。

original_en_text: I’ll soon be making my way up to the great Citadel. As holy as I am with rosaries, I’m sure my path will not be an arduous one...
original_zh_text: 虽然我是念珠圣人，但我相信我的旅程不会很困难。

original_en_text: Oh! And you can’t be leavin’ without some reward for your work. Take these beads for labour.<page>Rosaries ain’t provin’ much use to us lot anymore, but hopefully you in all your journeyin’ can still put ‘em to use.
original_zh_text: 我的天啊！如果你的工作不赚钱，你就不能离开。&lt;page&gt;我不再使用玫瑰，但我希望我能在旅行时使用它们。

original_en_text: You’re here, in here, so why did you send you? Hm? Did you hear my wish? Granter of wishes? You?<hpage>Granter of wishes?<page>Wishes, yes! My wish! I need fruits of the world, three little darlings. I need them, so I wish! Does the kingdom not send you, little you, to grant my desire?
original_zh_text: 我们走吧，我们走吧，好吗？你为什么派他去？你在干什么？你在干什么？你能感觉到我的愿望吗？你的愿望会实现吗？你是谁？你是谁？&lt;hpage&gt;你的愿望会实现吗？&lt;page&gt;我的希望，是的，我的愿望。你需要三个孩子才能结出世界的果实。“我想要他们，所以我想要他们。

original_en_text: Your travels have taken you far, haven’t they? While I’m yet to even start my journey. Shameful behaviour for a pilgrim, really, to tarry here so long.<hpage>I see no shame in it, sir. Your life is your own, and need not be squandered at the ghostly call of the Citadel. Journey out for your own sake, or not at all.<page>Heh... you truly aren’t a pilgrim, that’s for certain. That’s blasphemy, spoken with friendly intentions or not.<page>And yet... I don’t recoil from what you say. Perhaps I’m not much of a pilgrim either.
original_zh_text: 这是一条漫长的路，不是吗？你在干什么？我知道我的旅程还没有开始。可惜朝圣者能停留这么久。&lt;hpage&gt;你的命是你的，不要召唤城堡的鬼魂来送它。不要独自旅行或旅行&lt;page&gt;嘿，哟！你不是朝圣者，但你是朝圣者。如果这是真的，那就是亵渎。&lt;page&gt;同时，或者. ...我不害怕你说的话。我不是朝圣者。

original_en_text: This stone’s a beauty, isn’t it? They say it’ll help you gather up rosaries on the road ahead. You’ll come back and share some with me, won’t you?
original_zh_text: 这石头不是很漂亮吗？你在干什么？据说它可以帮助您在通往未来的路上收集念珠。实际上？

original_en_text: Ah, thank you for sharing, sister. For the honourable and steadfast Pilby, we will sing.
original_zh_text: 谢谢分享，我们为我们的姐妹和坚强的比利的荣耀而歌唱。

original_en_text: Mmm. You can hear it, yes? Listen close. Weak, but precious. A pulse, a beat! Faint... Our very own...
original_zh_text: 我的天啊！“你听到了，不是吗？“真的吗？这可能看起来脆弱，但这是值得的。我甚至失去了良心。

original_en_text: Loose rosaries filling your pockets? I can string ‘em up safe, so you won’t go losing them. Might seem a simple art, but it takes some talent to keep ‘em properly secure.
original_zh_text: 你口袋里有玫瑰吗？这可能看起来像是一门简单的艺术，但它需要人才来保证它们的安全。

original_en_text: Hm? I recognise you. You’ve returned to the camp, then? Are you a pilgrim, or just a wanderer?<hpage>I am no pilgrim, sir, though I have travelled their paths.<page>Not a pilgrim? Well, it makes no difference, I suppose. We all must walk the roads, up and up, though most of us will fall long before we see the grand gates.<page>If you’re wise, you’ll stop here and rest a while before heading back out into that dangerous world...
original_zh_text: 这是什么？你在干什么？我知道你是谁，我知道。“回营地？“你是朝圣者吗？“你是外国人吗？”»&lt;hpage&gt;我不是朝圣者，但我正在他的路上。&lt;page&gt;你不是朝圣者吗？“我们都必须沿着这条路走，但大多数人在看到美丽的大门之前就摔倒了。&lt;page&gt;如果你聪明，就停在这里，你会休息，然后你就会回到这个危险的世界。

original_en_text: Mmm, the precious fruit! Yes, fragrant and round. So round! For you, you who finds berries, a nice reward of rosaries!
original_zh_text: 这是一种美丽的圆形水果，气味芬芳。这一轮！对于那些寻找水果的人来说，玫瑰经是一个巨大的奖励！

original_en_text: O-oh! Traveller! Destined for the Citadel, yes? Well, before you embark, won’t you stop and make trade with an old pilgrim?<hpage>I’d see your wares, madam, though I fear I may have nothing worthy to offer in return.<page>Oh, worry not! If you lack fine goods to trade, we can barter still. In this devout land, we deal in the currency of faith!<page>Rosaries! Those finely carved beads of prayer! If you will only share some with me, I will trade you something fair.
original_zh_text: 我的天啊！旅行者！这是一个名字，不是吗？这是什么？现在，为什么他们在离开前没有与古代朝圣者达成协议呢？&lt;hpage&gt;我想看看你们的产品，但我可能没有任何东西可以退货。&lt;page&gt;别担心，伙计！总有一个你不拥有的高质量产品市场。在这个宗教王国里，我们交换信仰的硬币！&lt;page&gt;罗莎莉！美丽的玫瑰雕塑如果你想和我分享，我会给你合适的。"

original_en_text: Seems like just a key, but who knows what it’ll unlock? I reckon it’s come from the Citadel, so it must open the way to something holy!
original_zh_text: 它看起来像一把简单的钥匙，但你永远不知道什么能打开它。我相信我来自城堡，所以我必须去圣地！

original_en_text: A rare find, this. Shinier than faith and harder than a Craggler’s hide. A skilled craftsbug could fashion something nice out of it, if they’ve got the knowledge.
original_zh_text: 这是一个不寻常的发现，比信仰更轻，比追逐者的皮肤更难。有了这些知识，经验丰富的宇航员就可以做到这一点。

original_en_text: For comin’ all this way, take a few beads. You’ve well earned ‘em.

<hpage>Druid, I require a pitcher of your Mossberry Stew to satiate a gourmand of the Citadel. Will you pass some to me?<page>Mmmm! A bug who’ll consume my berry brew? Strong they’d be to bear a taste so sharp!<page>Here is a flavour so ripe! Searing! Flavour of pleasure and pain! They too may see the visions if they taste it strong. The visions, could they see?<page>Grant the stew! For your bug, mmmm... to share the visions. Yes! We shall pass it!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;城堡里需要一罐鸽子干。我能为您做些什么？&lt;page&gt;哦！哦！昆虫能吃水果吗？你必须很强壮才能忍受这么强烈的气味。&lt;page&gt;他很富有，却被烧死了。快乐和悲伤的味道。如果您喜欢它的味道，请看看这些地方。你看到愿景了吗？&lt;page&gt;为死者干杯。是的，我们有共同的愿景。哦，是的！他们在路上！

original_en_text: Ahhh! Ahhh-ohhhh! The smell again! Stronger, stronger now! But still young yet! Listen to your sisters, little one, and grow! Oh, grow!
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。哦，是的！哦，是的！哦，是的！我又感觉到了！坚强，坚强！他们还很年轻！听着，亲爱的，醒醒！“成长！

original_en_text: Oh... mmm. Do they hurt you also, the visions? The stink? Nasty, horrible fruits. The pain!<page>Enough berries. We need no more. For you though, my one and only friend. My beloved. A reward!<page>Your amulet. Let me... transfuse. Yes. Your amulet’s tears will flow stronger still!
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。我的天啊！“你伤害了他的意见吗？“？令人恶心又可怕的水果，但很疼！&lt;page&gt;贝瑞很好。“我不需要你，我的朋友。轻奖励！&lt;page&gt;他们将成为你的保护者。输血：是的，你的捍卫者会流下更多的眼泪！

original_en_text: Mmm, the precious fruit! So precious! And perhaps now, we have enough. Enough, enough! For our work often begins, but never ends!
original_zh_text: 水果非常珍贵。也许这就足够了。够了，够了！我们的工作经常开始，但永远不会结束。

original_en_text: Ah, hello again! What a blessing to see a familiar face on this treacherous climb.<hpage>Greetings, sir. I see you have begun your pilgrimage, or else set out for your own sake. Either way, I am glad to see you here unharmed.<page>Not quite unharmed... I’ve suffered my share of scrapes and burns. That’s just the nature of the journey, I suppose.<page>But I’ve seen so much! Great metal structures and vast scorched fields! The grandeur of it all is humbling indeed, even for one like me who was so humble to begin with.<page>I’ll rest here just a little longer before resuming my climb.
original_zh_text: 哦，我们见面了！“我很幸运在这次危险的攀登上看到了熟悉的面孔。&lt;hpage&gt;你好，医生，我见过他朝圣或独自一人。&lt;page&gt;但这并不意味着她完全无辜。他也被烧了又烧。&lt;page&gt;你看得太多了！巨大的金属结构和巨大的粘土。即使对于像我这样从一开始就谦虚的人来说，这种伟大也是非常谦虚的。&lt;page&gt;我们将在这里安息并继续崛起。

original_en_text: Mmm! Mmm! This is them, the precious, promised fruits!<page>Drop them in, there they go, and now at last we can begin!
original_zh_text: 哦！哦！哦，哦！他们的承诺已经兑现。&lt;page&gt;把它放在他们的位置上，现在我们终于可以开始了！

original_en_text: Just a piece of something greater, but finely crafted. You should take it with you, traveller, for luck.
original_zh_text: 它很好，但做得很好，幸运的是旅行者会携带它。
