original_en_text: <hpage>Good luck on your quest Garmond. If you hope to claim justice for your fellows passed, I suspect you’ve some challenge yet ahead.<page>Aye! Zaza and I’ll fight to cavern’s end if it need be, for the bugs held in our hearts, and our honour as knights!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;如果你想为死去的同胞伸张正义，我想你仍然会遇到一些麻烦。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的！哦，是的！如果有必要，我和紫将为了心虫和骑士的荣誉而战斗到洞穴的尽头。

original_en_text: Ahh, can you feel it too? The thralls of the Citadel are gathered close, in overwhelming numbers!<page>Together though, the three of us would be more overwhelming still! Would you allow us to fight by your side, brave sister?
original_zh_text: 你也听到了吗？城堡里的奴隶聚集在人群中！&lt;page&gt;如果我们有三个人，那就更好了。“亲爱的，你能让我打电话吗？". " "

original_en_text: Well, well! See what happens to nasty bully-bugs when they come after poor old Grindle? That’s a well-deserved end, we reckon.<page>We heard this old Sitty-dell was nice and quiet and burstin’ with goodies. So what’s happened, eh? Why’s it crawlin’ with bullies and busybodies?<hpage>The creature that haunts this place is stirring, little thief. The Citadel’s caste now roam the halls. You would do well to leave soon, if you mean to survive.<page>What what? You bein’ mirthful? We’re stayin’ here ‘til we’re done pilfering! You should be the one leavin’ if you’re so afeared!
original_zh_text: 当这个邪恶的幻象到达可怜的格林德尔时，会发生什么？我认为这是正确的结局。&lt;page&gt;听说这座古老的市政厅美丽、安静、充满了美丽的东西，但为什么到处都有这么多强盗和吵闹的人呢？&lt;hpage&gt;入侵这里的生物将成为复活的小偷。城堡现在悬挂在走廊中。如果你想活下去，最好尽快开始。&lt;page&gt;这是什么？你在笑吗？我会留下来直到飞机结束。如果你害怕，快点。

original_en_text: High up, above the caverns all of crust, Nuu has been told of a hole, filled with writhing things, all zipping and zapping.<page>But so sad! Nuu cannot herself see it. The lands quake and rattle. The savage threads stretch. The dangers are too much.<page>It must be you, miss grown-up, older, stiffer, a shell less precious. Seek the cave, and the things within. How else will the journal be complete?
original_zh_text: 在那里，诺亚感觉每个洞穴的树皮上都有一个洞，里面装满了扭曲的物体。&lt;page&gt;但她很难过！没有人能看到诺亚，也没有人能看到他。地动山摇，野蛮的痕迹仍在继续。现在的危险太大了。&lt;page&gt;都是报纸。你老了，工作又努力，你的掩护也没用。打开洞穴和里面的东西。你是如何结束的？

original_en_text: Ahh miss grown-up, Nuu hoped you would return here. For clever Nuu can track well where you have been, she sees your cut-marks and sniffs out your fragrant trail!<page>And look where the trail has led sweet Nuu! A thick wriggler lived in this nest, rumbling and crackling in the darkness.<page>Its sour juices still line these rocky insides, and patient Nuu will gather it all up!<hpage>There is much to learn in these crusted highlands Nuu, but much danger as well. Indulge your curiosity if you must, but keep your senses trained on the darkness.
original_zh_text: “先生，请回到这里。SmartNuu可以跟踪您的位置。我看着你的刀，闻到了它的味道。&lt;page&gt;巢穴里住着一只巨大的鳄鱼，在黑暗中挖鼻子。&lt;page&gt;石头仍然充满苦涩，病人的姐妹们正在收集！&lt;hpage&gt;在硬核环境中有很多东西需要学习，但也有很多风险，所以如果你需要的话，可以满足你的好奇心，在黑暗中训练你的感官。

original_en_text: Don’t let defeat weigh on you, nimble bug! If strength remains, simply step again to the challenge. Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 不要陷入失败，不要陷入灵活的错误，如果我们想留下来，就必须再次战斗。来吧来吧

original_en_text: Oh! Those horrible beasty-beasts are gone! Much and many thanks for you, mighty warrior!<hpage>It was a simple thing, small bug. I assume you are Tipp, the courier?<hpage>Frey, the Bellhart trader, seemed concerned for your safety... and for the cargo you carry.<page>She sent you?! Bah! She needs to learny-learn a little patience! I’m is barely been away! But still... is lucky-lucky for me you came.
original_zh_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！野兽消失了！谢谢你，伟大的士兵。&lt;hpage&gt;你是经纪人吧？实际上？&lt;hpage&gt;伯哈特商人弗雷似乎担心伯哈特的安全和货物。&lt;page&gt;你派他来的？哦，哦，哦！你必须学会有耐心！我几乎没有错过它！然而，尽管如此. ...我很幸运来到这里。

original_en_text: Well, I’m is be off now. That old grubly-grub in the bell will come after me herself if she not get her goods!
original_zh_text: 如果那张顽固的纸什么也不做，我就会找到它。

original_en_text: Now I must train, and strive, further and faster by your example. Your skill upon these tracks has roused my spirit, nimble bug. You shall forever have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 现在我必须训练，效仿他的榜样，走得更快。你在这条赛道上的技巧唤醒了我的头脑，敏捷的虫子。感谢您的持续支持。

original_en_text: A town built within the thick vein of bells that runs through Pharloom’s core. One wonders who would craft so many, and for what purpose?
original_zh_text: 它被贯穿法鲁心脏的深静脉包围。我想知道谁做了什么。

original_en_text: Hornet Wielding Needle! With my master’s passing, I have resolved to improve my skills that, in time, I may match her prime.<page>Much work I must do to achieve that goal. I have found this wide bare stone fine ground on which to train.<page>Would you spar with me now? Raise that blade and test my rings! You may prove my greatest challenge yet.
original_zh_text: 我的师傅去世后，我决定提高自己的技能，最终达到师傅的巅峰。&lt;page&gt;为了实现这个目标，我们付出了巨大的努力。“我找到了这个宽敞的地方，我可以像光秃秃的石头一样爬行。"&lt;page&gt;你想和我比吗？拿起床单并检查戒指可能是我面临的最大挑战。

original_en_text: <hpage>Your charts and tools show fine skill, Shakra. I’ve met few who’d match your talent.<page>Cartography! Peh. Bakallo! It is a craft-skill common amongst my tribe. Most important to keep one’s mind sharp when on a journey.<page>The charting of caverns, the memory of travel, the knowing of one’s place within the kingdom, an engaging task for a warrior’s mind.<page>An unfortunate thing that my great mentor never learnt the skill. Her talent at getting lost... I should almost be impressed...
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;沙克拉说，他的牌和工具表现出令人难以置信的技巧，很少有人能与他的才华相媲美。"&lt;page&gt;画一张地图！佩珀卡洛！这是我们部落的一项常见技能，旅行时保持头发清洁很重要。&lt;page&gt;绘制洞穴地图、穿越记忆以及发现它们在王国中的位置对于士兵来说都是令人着迷的职业。&lt;page&gt;不幸的是，我的前任从未学习过这种技术。我失去了一个我几乎印象深刻的角色。

original_en_text: Lots of good stuff tucked away in this old prison... lovely place to bring a lucky little snitchbug like Grindle! What a favour those lugs did us! O-hoho!
original_zh_text: 这座旧监狱有很多优势，是容纳像格林德尔这样快乐举报人的完美地方！耳朵很有用！哦，哦，哦！

original_en_text: Oooh, ma. Miss grown-up, you deny poor Nuu? So sour!<hpage>I am sorry, Nuu. Though I recognise the value in your wish, my own task is too pressing.
original_zh_text: 妈妈！你会拒绝穷人吗？太酸了。&lt;hpage&gt;“我知道你的愿望很重要，但我的工作非常紧迫。

original_en_text: Come to rest here, miss grown-up? Then let Nuu see our journal, for she is eager to see your cuts!
original_zh_text: “这不是休息的地方吗？“我想看这个视频，姐姐。读报纸！

original_en_text: This great structure... It would have taken the lifetimes of so many bugs to build it. Now its wounds run deep, and I can hear the groaning of its final breaths.<page>Everything that grows must pass, I suppose. Still, to witness even its current state is a privilege I’ll not squander.<page>And what of you, friend Hornet? Where are your travels taking you?<hpage>They have taken me deep, and will take me yet deeper still. I have a responsibility to cut this land free of its dark fate.<hpage>That is no concern of yours though, sir. You should continue your own journey, albeit with a claw on your weapon at all times.
original_zh_text: 我一生中犯了无数错误，伤口已经脱落，我开始感觉到最后一口气了。&lt;page&gt;以这种方式看到它的机会是一种荣幸，不容错过。&lt;page&gt;“你好吗，蜜蜂？“你的旅程将带你去哪里？&lt;hpage&gt;他们深深地爱我，深深地爱我。&lt;hpage&gt;即使你的武器有点‘你也必须继续你的旅程。

original_en_text: To our safe haven? Our home... This is what’s left of it after the great breaking began.<page>There was that terrible noise from above. Everything shook and fell apart, and the black threads sprung up from beneath. Many a poor pilgrim has already been lost to the destruction.<page>You might have been too, if not for some fleeing pilgrims who found you fallen and carried you back to us.<hpage>The black threads... I may understand their source.<hpage>I must speak with the old Caretaker. Do you know what has become of him? I see he has left you his garb.<page>Oh, yes. He charged me with looking after those remaining here, said he had to confer with his family down below.<hpage>Down below... Then they have slunk away to hide in their ruined chapel.<hpage>I must pay them a visit. Thank you, Sherma. Stay safe, and take care of your fellow pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 安全港口。骄傲节陷落后，房子被遗弃了。&lt;page&gt;上面传来可怕的声音。一切都颤抖了，倒塌了，地板上冒出了一道黑线，许多可怜的朝圣者死于破坏。&lt;page&gt;如果你不是带领我们找到他的逃犯，也许你就是同一个人。&lt;hpage&gt;黑线显示了它的起源。&lt;hpage&gt;我想和一位老兵谈谈，你知道发生了什么吗？这些是她的衣服。"&lt;page&gt;哦，是的，我说我必须照顾住在这里的人，并与那里的家人交谈。&lt;hpage&gt;他走进一座废弃的教堂。&lt;hpage&gt;他们必须参观。谢谢你，谢尔曼。请注意安全并照顾好朝圣者。

original_en_text: Bakkana! A battle well won! The haunted bugs have been defeated and the way forward is yours. Let us meet again soon, away from this dreadful Citadel.
original_zh_text: 你们在巴尔干地区赢得的战斗已经失败，通往未来的道路属于你们。选择这座可怕的城堡，你很快就会看到它。

original_en_text: Huge caves ascending to Pharloom’s Citadel. The roads are slowly being devoured by sand and howling wind.
original_zh_text: 一个巨大的洞穴一直延伸到帕勒姆城堡。街道被沙子和噪音吞没。

original_en_text: <hpage>Farewell, tall bug, until we cross again.<page>Or until death calmly claims us both...
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;再见，直到你回来。&lt;page&gt;直到死亡悄然过去，

original_en_text: Again and again you prove your mastery, nimble bug, yet still I never tire of the challenge!<page>As reward for such an impressive feat of endurance, I have only this small trophy, a memento given by my own speed teacher, now fairly passed to you.
original_zh_text: 你一次又一次地展示了你的技能和敏捷性，但我喜欢这个挑战！&lt;page&gt;我拥有这个小奖杯作为对这一令人印象深刻的患者结果的奖励。我记得我的超级主宰者，现在我把它交给了他。

original_en_text: <page=S>Bring us the hearts, Old One. Make’em beat, fierce and final. See for yourself the forgotten strength of this land of bugs before we burn those memories in its saving.
original_zh_text: &lt;page=S&gt;亲爱的朋友们，请把你们的心交给我。最后，我失败了。在保留这些记忆之前，让我们来看看这些被遗忘的昆虫的大地力量。

original_en_text: Tch... Hahahaa. Marvelous! So the spider knows something of fathomless beings, and still it hopes to stand against one, a god... <page>Where do you hide this boundless strength you claim, spider? I’ve watched your struggle towards us. Yours was a painful, broken trek. One needs grace to stand before the divine.<hpage>Then best you keep watching, child. I’ve found those who claim themselves a god can rarely match the title.<hpage>And experience tells me, even gods can fall.
original_zh_text: 他的名字叫海尔，他很棒。蜘蛛对无意识有所了解，但它们仍然想与上帝战斗。&lt;page&gt;无限的力量是我看到你们在这段旅程中挣扎的地方，这是一段痛苦而破碎的旅程，一个人需要恩典才能站在上帝面前。&lt;hpage&gt;我很高兴看到孩子们，但一个自称是上帝的人不配得到这个称号。&lt;hpage&gt;经验告诉我，上帝会堕落。

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you look well at home in these wilds.<page>Poshanka! These scorched fields offer many paths and much combat. To leap from vantage upon the red-shells or to meet them face-front with rings ready? These are decisions to live for!<page>I am much surprised those soft pilgrims ever safely climbed this scorched and savage place.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;夏克拉，你在沙漠中感到平静。&lt;page&gt;博尚卡！博尚卡！这片燃烧的沙漠提供了许多道路和许多战斗。我应该跳进红色贝壳吗？我应该在额头上戴一枚戒指并说“早安”吗？这是我们生活中的选择！&lt;page&gt;我很惊讶语言朝圣者在这个被烧毁而残酷的地方获救。

original_en_text: Here, the proof of our majesty... mark of our divine right...
original_zh_text: 它是我们伟大的一部分，也是上帝法律的象征。

original_en_text: Hoi hoi! A nimble opponent appears. At last! At last!<hpage>If you are seeking challengers, sir, you should choose a location less far afield. It is rare chance I, or any bug, would come upon this distant cavern.<page>True! Though once discovered, could there be a more perfect spot? This giant, boney body, so distant from Pharloom’s ails.<page>Here, freely, we can test our speed and our sleek shells. Here we may race!<page>You must be eager to step to the task, challenger? Fulfil my wish! Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 这是什么？终于灵活了！无限（无限）&lt;hpage&gt;如果您正在寻找竞争对手，请选择一个不太远的地方。昆虫进入这个偏远洞穴的可能性非常小。&lt;page&gt;制片人！！但一旦你找到了，什么才是完美的呢？巨大的骨尸距离国家农场很远。&lt;page&gt;您可以自由测试您的速度和敏捷性。你可以在这里竞争。&lt;page&gt;挑战者？你想做这样的事情吗？希望我的愿望能够实现！让我们一起探索界限！

original_en_text: Our capital, built grand... The seat of our sovereignty... slipped from my mind...<page>Why does it fade? Why can I not recall that sacred place?
original_zh_text: 资本是美好的。主权在哪里？她从我的脑海中消失了。&lt;page&gt;他为什么消失了？为什么我们不记住圣地？

original_en_text: Zaza and I will tarry here a little longer... These pilgrims need watching over, and we are committed to the task.
original_zh_text: 谁和我将在这里待一段时间，这些朝圣者需要得到照顾，我们致力于这项使命。

original_en_text: Delicious! I like you already!<page>But what a bore it would be to cut you down now, when you’re so achingly close to our grand Citadel...<page>Climb higher, little spider. I want to savour your struggle just a little longer!
original_zh_text: 这太好吃了！我知道我爱上他了！&lt;page&gt;然而，它距离我们美丽的城堡非常近，所以分割它很无聊。"&lt;page&gt;“醒醒，孩子。我想再打一次。

original_en_text: But Nuu is sensible, she understands. Miss grown-up has purpose, she must be away.<page>The cleaning can wait for another time. Nuu is patient... always patient.
original_zh_text: 丹尼聪明又有同情心，这个女人有目的，她必须离开。&lt;page&gt;下一次，我等着打扫。我总是很有耐心。你必须始终保持耐心。

original_en_text: <hpage>You seem to have some familiarity with this prison and its guards. Do you know a path to escape?<page>Escape! A little jailbug like you ain’t ever escapin’ anything! Get out of here, will you? Stop bothering us! You got nothing to steal, so we got nothing to talk about!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;他了解监狱和警卫。&lt;page&gt;快跑快跑像你这样的囚犯永远不会逃脱！“离开这里，不要打扰我，不要偷窃，不要争论。"

original_en_text: Though the dust has not yet settled over our battle here, Zaza and I must soon be away. The memory of our village calls us ever onward. Farewell, brave sister!
original_zh_text: 我们在这里的斗争还没有结束，但我和子必须尽快离开。人们的记忆引领我们前进。祝你好运

original_en_text: <page>You would challenge again, nimble bug? You have proven yourself time and again.<hpage>Your course can still provide understanding, sir. Upon it, I see my own limits clearer and learn to push them further. <page>Of course! Of course! And I can learn much following behind your fair form.<page>I’d need only a moment, and the track would again be ready.
original_zh_text: &lt;page&gt;挑战是再次失去她。我已经尝试过很多次了。&lt;hpage&gt;大师，您的道路给了我们直觉。从那时起，我学会了更清楚地看到自己的局限性并进一步推动它们。&lt;page&gt;当然可以！是的，不！我们可以从这种美丽中学到很多东西。&lt;page&gt;这需要一段时间，课程将再次准备好。

original_en_text: <hpage>Your threats are worthless, child. If you are my foe, stay your voice and raise your blade.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;如果你是我的敌人，请提高你的声音，举起你的剑。"

original_en_text: I can save you, little spider. All the trouble you’d face above. All the suffering. It’s so simple.<page>I’ll just skewer you here and now, pluck that flickering life right out of you.
original_zh_text: “我可以帮助你，蜘蛛。他们面临的每一个问题和每一个痛苦都很简单。&lt;page&gt;我现在加入你们，为你们带来光明的生活。

original_en_text: How sad. A little spider has fallen from its cage. So lost. So weak. Poor little morsel.
original_zh_text: 不幸的是，一只小蜘蛛从笼子里掉了出来，我把它弄丢了。我是一个非常脆弱又可怜的孩子。

original_en_text: Ooooh ma, is well-begun. Many creatures have been recorded, but many many more still to be learned of!<page>Miss grown-up, you should rest quick and venture out to hunt again soon, thinks Nuu!
original_zh_text: 我们已经记录了许多生物体，但我们需要了解更多。&lt;page&gt;我起得很早去打猎。

original_en_text: Well fought sister, well fought! Though terrible and tenacious, the beast was no match for us.<page>Be proud! The bugs of this land will sing of our victory to their offspring, and their offspring’s offspring, forever more!
original_zh_text: 这只野兽很可怕，很可怕，但它不是我们的敌人。&lt;page&gt;我为你感到骄傲！昆虫永远会歌颂我们的胜利。

original_en_text: Hah... aha ha ha ha ha!<page>Congratulations, spider. Finally, I felt your sting, and you’ve bared the truth of my pathetic empty shell.<hpage>You always had the scent, child. You are no bug. Yours is a life born entirely from thread.<page>Life? You’re too generous! This weak, wasting existence. This was not life, just a husk shaped to act as a child.<hpage>Yours was life, pale one. Do not confuse your unique creation with its absence. I have seen others make the same mistake.<page>Platitudes, spider? From you? Don’t be gross.<page>Head on. Climb up, up and away. You’ve earned your audience with the divine.<page>Face the holy mother who would fashion so cruel and crude a daughter as me.
original_zh_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！&lt;page&gt;恭喜你，蜘蛛。最后，我感受到了你的痛苦，你也找到了我的痛苦。&lt;hpage&gt;你永远是，我的女儿，你不是昆虫，你的生活是线下诞生的。&lt;page&gt;你的生活怎么样？你太慷慨了！“这不是生命，而是一个像孩子一样运作的身体。&lt;hpage&gt;不要将他的白人生活、他的白人生活、你唯一的创造与你的缺席混为一谈。&lt;page&gt;老蜘蛛？迪伊？别伤害我。&lt;page&gt;站起来，站起来，走吧，你值得一个神圣的倾听者！&lt;page&gt;如果你面对圣母玛利亚，她会把你变成一个残酷暴力的孩子，就像我一样。

original_en_text: Conversing is a pleasure, but I must return to my observance. Try not to leave too much of a trail when you leave, please.
original_zh_text: 我喜欢讲这个故事，但我们必须重新找回良心。当你离开时，不要留下任何痕迹。

original_en_text: <page=M>Enough chatting, Old One. Best you get heading below. Whatever action you’re planning, time is against you.
original_zh_text: &lt;page=M&gt;别说了，老头子，这么做吧，不管你做什么，时间都会对你不利的。

original_en_text: For sharing this moment I shall have you accept a gift, one I had believed I would never pass. <page>You would take these rings, and the learnings to make more.<page>They are built of a clever method devised by my master and will crush hard this kingdom’s toughest shell. Use them, and she is remembered!<hpage>My thanks, Shakra. To gain a tool so defined by its owner, I am much grateful. They shall prove a great aid on my own journey.
original_zh_text: 为了分享这一刻，你可以接受你以前从未送过的礼物。&lt;page&gt;我拿着戒指去查清楚所有的细节。&lt;page&gt;它建造得很好，我的主人设计它来突破王国最坚硬的外壳。&lt;hpage&gt;谢谢谢谢这就是我们描述的工具。我们感谢业主给我们这个机会，并感谢他们。这对我的旅行有很大的帮助。

original_en_text: The warmth of these caverns keeps many smells alive! Is good for Nuu, who is always searching carefully for learnings!
original_zh_text: 这个洞穴的热量散发着一种宜人的气味！这对于那些一直在寻找知识的人来说是个好消息！"

original_en_text: <hpage>Little pilgrim, these baths provide some respite from the dangers without, but even so you should not let down your guard.<hpage>You must have seen now that the bugs of this Citadel are long fallen to the Haunting.<page>Ahh... some of my brothers and sisters have seemed... lost somehow, yes. But to be lost is to be sometime found, is it not sung?<page>Yes... The Citadel will provide for them. It is a holy place indeed, that holds wonders such as this lovely warm bath!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;像这个浴缸这样的小管子可以暂时缓解外部危险，但甚至无法解除警惕。&lt;hpage&gt;如您所见，城堡里的昆虫都落入了鬼魂手中。&lt;page&gt;是的，正确的。为什么他们不能像我的兄弟们一样成功？你会找到你失去的东西吗？&lt;page&gt;这是一个真正神圣的地方，就像这美丽的温泉一样神奇！

original_en_text: Hoi! Let our mighty contest of shells commence again!
original_zh_text: 我们开始了一场精彩的鱼比赛！

original_en_text: Hoy! We thought one of them buzzing bullies was sneakin’ up on us, but it’s just a mangy jailbug!<page>Why you in here, then? Caught thievin’ were you? Greedy, greedy!<hpage>I’ve stolen nothing. Rather, I suspect the wardens are servants of the Citadel. The cage used in my capture bore similar runes to the one that first brought me to this land.<hpage>Bound in that cage, I’d have proved a fine gift were they to deliver me to their masters.<page>Pah, there ain’t nothin’ fine about you, jailbug. We recognised a fellow thief soon as we saw you!<page>Now, don’t be lingerin’ around here. Those guards’ll be wanting to pop you back in your cage quick quick!<hpage>They’ll not get the chance. I will reclaim my belongings and leave this grim place with haste.
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿。我知道人群会来，但这只是肮脏的逃跑！&lt;page&gt;你为什么来这里？你抓到小偷了吗？有贪婪，有贪婪。&lt;hpage&gt;我从来没有偷过任何东西。让我们假设警卫是城堡的仆人。我被关在一个笼子里，上面刻着符文字母，就像把我带到这个地球上的笼子一样。&lt;hpage&gt;如果我被交给我的主人并锁在笼子里，这将是一份很棒的礼物。&lt;page&gt;当我看到它时，我认出了小偷。&lt;page&gt;关回笼子里跑吧！&lt;hpage&gt;我想拿回我的行李，尽快离开这个黑暗的地方。

original_en_text: You recover quickly. Already, my ring-marks have faded from your shell. If you are prepared, let us duel again.
original_zh_text: 她的康复速度加快，我戒指上的指纹从她的壳上消失了。当我准备好后，我会再次战斗。

original_en_text: ...Yes, communication is the heart of it. The grandest boasts and the tiniest murmurings all have their meanings...<page>...Your point is well made. Even the flowers have their stories to tell. Light can be cast anywhere...<hpage>I’ve no desire to interrupt your meditations, Herald, but I am eager to speak with you, if you would listen...<page>...Take note of it all, render it in line, you’ll be glad that you did. You can take the journey home with you...
original_zh_text: ...沟通是心脏。大哨和小哨是有原因的。&lt;page&gt;...花有故事。光可以投射到任何地方。&lt;hpage&gt;我不想打断你的想法，先锋先生，但如果你愿意听我说，我想和你谈谈。&lt;page&gt;...如果您将所有内容写下来并按顺序发送，您会很乐意这样做。

original_en_text: Oooh, but the scroll is so heavy with beautiful beasts! Could it be that the works is almost complete? Miss grown-up, you must keep your preyings up. No time for rest!
original_zh_text: 电影中有很多伟大的动物。您的项目即将完成吗？孩子们，我们继续打猎吧。现在不是休息的时候！

original_en_text: The myth we made... by grace... by blade...<page>All bowed before we princes green...
original_zh_text: 我很感激你的好意。你应该使用刀。&lt;page&gt;每个人都喜欢绿色王子。

original_en_text: So many moments spent simple... joyful... free...
original_zh_text: 它们往往很简单：自由和幸福。

original_en_text: Do you see? How crass and frail that Citadel’s machines! This one groans in pain at its very existence.<hpage>Its mechanism is likely jammed. If the gears were unstuck its clamorous complaints would soon cease, and it could become a useful place to rest.<page>A place to rest or no, I desire only for the noise to stop!
original_zh_text: 你看到这个了吗？多么简单而脆弱的堡垒啊！一个男人在他面前痛苦地呻吟着。&lt;hpage&gt;一旦设备被拆除，噪音就会停止，成为一个舒适的休息场所。&lt;page&gt;无论休息与否，我只是想停止制造噪音。

original_en_text: These root-woven roads show evidence of my master’s passage. A thrice-crushed bug, gouged wood, score-prints of sharp claws passing. Small signs that only I can read.<page>Though the trail is cold, it eases me to know she is still within this land.
original_zh_text: 这条迷失了根源的道路，就是大师所走的道路。昆虫被折断了三次，树也折断了，指甲上有锋利的痕迹。&lt;page&gt;路很冷，但知道自己还在地上，他松了一口气。

original_en_text: <hpage>These are dangerous fields, young one, not for casual wandering. What task sees you brave them?<page>A treacherous quest! But a crucial one! Upon the last wish of my father, I’ve taken up the study of these wild caves.<page>These fields still display life and growth, even as the lands around erode to dust.<page>There is a hot harmony here that eludes the grey wastes above and the dry Marrow beside. With time and study, I shall uncover why.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;“伙计们，这是一个危险的地方。别坐在这里。&lt;page&gt;这是一项非常危险的任务！但这是强制性的！应父亲的要求，我开始探索野生洞穴。&lt;page&gt;尽管周围的土地被摧毁并化为灰尘，但这些田地仍然活跃并生长。&lt;page&gt;它具有温暖的和谐感，避免了顶部的灰色碎片和旁边的干燥骨髓。随着时间的推移和研究，我们会明白为什么。

original_en_text: Track your location throughout these winding lands with a bone compass. Each member of our tribe can craft them. I would pass you mine, for a small price.
original_zh_text: 使用骨罗盘来监测变形地球的位置。我们部落中的任何人都可以做到这一点。

original_en_text: Ooooh, ma ma! Even young Nuu never guessed that Pharloom held so many fascinating creatures! Soft ones, hard ones, small ones, big ones! Nuu is greedy to see what remains!
original_zh_text: 我的母亲，甚至她的妹妹，都不知道法罗群岛有这么多令人着迷的生物。硬、软、小、大！我想看看剩下的。

original_en_text: You see this idol before us, red maiden? I have passed its like before. They mark our pilgrimage well.<page>If we sing to it, a miraculous shrine will rise from the ground, and we will have a place to rest! Such a wonder!<hpage>It is not song that rouses this shrine, but payment in rosaries.<hpage>Without rosaries, the shrine remains hidden. I have encountered similar constructs on Pharloom’s paths. This kingdom does not grant rest lightly.
original_zh_text: 你看到你面前的红色女人了吗？我清楚地记得这次朝圣之旅。&lt;page&gt;当你唱歌时，神奇的寺庙升起，成为休息的地方。&lt;hpage&gt;唤醒寺庙的不是一首歌，而是一串念珠。&lt;hpage&gt;玫瑰经不存在，庇护所被隐藏。我们在前往帕尔马的路上发现了一座类似的建筑。王国没有休息。

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>These I have fashioned from the husks of old bells. A hard task to make, so the cost reflects the extra effort.
original_zh_text: 您可以用它来显示地图上的重要地点和记忆。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;这是一项艰巨的工作，因此成本反映了额外的努力。

original_en_text: Poshanka! Here we meet, high atop this twisted steel structure. I can sense fierce enemies ahead.<page>It seems you too draw closer to your trail’s end. With my own task now resolved, my rings call for combat.<page>Hornet Wielding Needle, shall we fight forward together?
original_zh_text: 博尚卡！博尚卡！就在这个扭曲的钢结构上方，您可以感觉到前方有一个凶猛的敌人。&lt;page&gt;现在，我的任务结束了，我的戒指必须战斗。&lt;page&gt;蜜蜂会转动针来战斗吗？

original_en_text: All of these marvellous healing supplies... Surely they, at least, are some proof of the Citadel’s holy nature?
original_zh_text: 它们至少是教会神圣品格的一个证据吗？

original_en_text: H-hoy red m-maiden! Have no f-fear, ‘tis only I, Sherma!<page>I found healing supplies, b-but then the way back collapsed... and I heard moaning from the dark... oh, how thankful I am to see you!
original_zh_text: 我的小红女孩。“别担心，是我，谢尔曼。&lt;page&gt;我非常感激我看到了它，找到了治愈的材料，并在回家的路上听到了黑暗的低语！

original_en_text: The great Citadel is so close, I can hear the voices of our brother and sister pilgrims calling out to us!
original_zh_text: 附近有一座大城堡，我可以听到朝圣者的尖叫声。

original_en_text: What a battle, brave warrior! You’re the first I’ve seen who could match the red-shells and emerge victorious.<hpage>They are deadly foes indeed, and seemingly keen hunters. You did well to keep yourself hidden from them, young bug.<page>I did, didn’t I? Disguise and subterfuge are skills I’ve honed keenly, all in aid of my most important work!
original_zh_text: 多么英勇的士兵啊，多么英勇的战斗啊！您是第一个参加比赛并赢得红包的人。&lt;hpage&gt;他看起来像一个致命的敌人和贪婪的猎人。&lt;page&gt;你做到了，不是吗？实际上？服装和特技是您需要提高的技能来完成最重要的事情！

original_en_text: Mind yourself while you travel this grim land. A great winged beast has been stalking the heights, swooping without warning and tearing the life out of unwary travellers!<hpage>I believe I have seen the creature you speak of. It may have marked me as prey, and followed me down onto the lower roads of the moor.<page>What what! Gurrrooo! The beast has been spotted! Once Zaza has fully rested, we’ll set to tracking it down!
original_zh_text: 在这个充满挑战的国家旅行时要小心，因为巨大的掠食者在天空中徘徊，在没有警告的情况下躲藏起来，并夺走鲁莽旅行者的生命！&lt;hpage&gt;“我知道你是什么样的生物，”他带我出去吃点东西，然后我们去了沙漠。&lt;page&gt;这是什么？你在干什么？咕噜！野兽被发现了。当孩子完全休息后，他开始狩猎。

original_en_text: Welcome back red maiden, and thank you again for coming to my aid.<page>I’m no healer, but with the supplies we found in the ward below even my unlearned claws can ease the suffering of our brothers and sisters.<page>That such darkness could creep into this most holy of places, even though we pilgrims kept our promise to ascend...<page>I confess, I wonder at the meaning of it all. But enlightenment does not come easily, or all at once... I should just continue my task in the meantime.
original_zh_text: 欢迎回家，红女孩，谢谢你的帮助。&lt;page&gt;我不是治疗师，但我在下面房间找到的材料可以减轻我兄弟姐妹的痛苦，即使我还没有学会如何做指甲。&lt;page&gt;我们朝圣者信守了爬山的承诺，但黑暗正在蔓延到这个最神圣的地方。&lt;page&gt;然而，启蒙并不容易，也不会突然到来，我们必须继续我们的使命。

original_en_text: Hrm...? Oh, hoy there! I was hoping we would meet here, red maiden.<page>Rising at last to the heights of the Citadel and being amongst so many of my brothers and sisters... it is a blessing indeed. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice belies some hesitation in that belief, little pilgrim. You have seen now the reality of this broken place. What do you make of it, truly?
original_zh_text: 这是什么？你在干什么？天哪，它在这里。再见，红。&lt;page&gt;最终，我成为了这座城市的大祭司和许多兄弟姐妹的中保。这确实是一种祝福。是的，这是一种祝福。&lt;hpage&gt;小小的朝圣者，把这种恐惧隐藏在你的信仰中。现在你看到了这片荒野的现实，你有什么想法？

original_en_text: Safely-saved is Pill! But who is this rare carer for the shell of another? Name yourself, good bug!<hpage>I am Hornet, Pill. Your brother wished for your return to Bellhart, where he waits now. I’m sure he will be eager to see you alive.<page>Young Tipp! How he worries always. Blessed I am for the care, him and you Miss Hornet! A lucky bug is me!
original_zh_text: 药物是安全的。但谁是处理别人贝壳的特别人呢？请告诉我你的名字。&lt;hpage&gt;- 你哥哥说你活着回到了巴巴特，你想见他。&lt;page&gt;我一直很担心她，我很幸运能够照顾他和你，舒伊特小姐。

original_en_text: I pray my dice bring you luck on your final climb, sister. And I pray that by parting with them, my own ascent shall be made lighter.
original_zh_text: 姐姐，我祈祷我的数据能给我最后一次升天带来好运。我祈祷当我分心时，我的升天会更容易。

original_en_text: See here, this old statue. I’ve been thinking long on it, what clues it might hold.<page>The claw-work seems beyond the other structures throughout these caves. Who was she I wonder, to deserve such refined remembrance?<hpage>Hers is the form of a dancer, and the craft is indeed exquisite. There must once have been more to these ants, before the Haunting snared their shells and minds.
original_zh_text: 看着这座古老的雕像，我很长时间以来一直在想它意味着什么。&lt;page&gt;这门大炮似乎优于洞穴中的其他结构。&lt;hpage&gt;她的风格是一种舞蹈形式，而且技巧真的很棒。蚂蚁必须在鬼魂合上壳和心脏之前做更多的事情。
是的，正确的。禁忌的味道。

original_en_text: Holy water, nice and hot,<br>Makes a perfect swimming spot,<br>Heals your worries in a flash,<br>So jump on in... splash splash splash! Ha ha ha!
original_zh_text: 圣水是温暖的。&lt;br&gt;最好的游泳地点。&lt;br&gt;他立即表达了自己的担忧。&lt;br&gt;跳，跳！

original_en_text: Very, very lucky little trinket we got ‘ere! Pulls ‘em little clickie-clackies right into yer waitin’ claws!
original_zh_text: 这些都是快乐的小事！把它们放在脚上！

original_en_text: Gurrroo! A fellow warrior braves this blighted place! Know you stand before the honoured knight Garmond, and brave companion Zaza.<page>Together, Zaza and I are wish bound to scale this Citadel, and vanquish the horrors at its heart!<hpage>Then good luck to you, sir bug. It is heartening to meet another of sound mind and fortitude enough to fight back against the many haunted husks.<page>Aye! Never-ending, these unnatural opponents! This Citadel seems its twisted source, and honour decrees we must fight on, until we rend the heart of its decay!
original_zh_text: 来吧来吧来吧来吧同志们勇敢地站在这片荒无人烟的土地上！我知道我面对的是受人尊敬的骑士加莫内和他勇敢的同伴齐扎。&lt;page&gt;我和吉要去城堡消除恐惧！&lt;hpage&gt;祝你好运，虫子们。看到其他人是多么聪明、坚定和幽灵般扔这么多炮弹，真是令人着迷。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的！哦，是的！永远，这些非自然的敌人。这座城堡似乎是这场混乱的根源，我们必须尊重心脏勋章，直到我们能够挖出里面腐烂的心脏！

original_en_text: <hpage>I found the well in the hidden chambers beyond. The power that remained at its base I have taken for myself.<page=S>Bound yourself a new nature, aye? And from the shells of our ancestors, no less, all those many who’ve called these lands their own.<page=S>You make it seem so simple-like. All o’that learning, all o’that strength... sucked up in a whirl of Silk.<page=M>We’d call you a thief, Old One, and cruel for the taking, but its all coming down soon if you can’t stop it.<page=M>If there’s advantage in your act that might see these caves safe, then it’s better you make your claim.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我们在一个偏远的隐蔽房间里找到了一口井，并以此为基础接管剩余的电力。&lt;page=S&gt;同样，在我们祖先的壳中，每个声称拥有这片土地的国家都出生在我们祖先的壳中。&lt;page=S&gt;所有的知识和一切的力量都被丝绸的漩涡吸收。&lt;page=M&gt;“我叫你小偷。“偷窃是残酷的，但如果你不阻止，事情很快就会发生。"&lt;page=M&gt;如果你的行为有利于保护这些洞穴，那么你最好提出你的问题。

original_en_text: Best keep your visits brief, Hornet Wielding Needle. Without swift action taken, our world’s ruin seems certain.<page>If you cannot calm Pharloom’s tortured throes, then certainly no other bug could face the task. <hpage>As you say, Shakra. I shall do what I must.
original_zh_text: 谈话很简短，汉布尔比用针操纵了谈话。如果没有迅速的反应，世界肯定会被摧毁。&lt;page&gt;如果我们不能减轻法老的痛苦，那么其他昆虫肯定无法完成这项工作。&lt;hpage&gt;正如我之前所说，我正在做我必须做的事情。

original_en_text: Near the edge of those lands swept by wind and sand, Nuu has seen it, a single bug, watching, waiting.<page> Too scared was Nuu to crawl close, for fear it would wake, and its big blade might mark this perfect shell.<page>For the journal’s sake, you should seek the bug, up on edge, through a tall tunnel hidden by crust.<page>A hard find, that one, but Nuu is not worried! She knows your adult cunning will see you there quick!
original_zh_text: 昆虫在被风和沙子覆盖的土壤边缘爬行，等待着看到它。&lt;page&gt;井太害怕了，他不敢靠近，害怕醒来，大叶子露出了完美的外壳。&lt;page&gt;为了记日记，你必须穿过隐藏在贝壳中的高大隧道，最终找到一只昆虫。&lt;page&gt;很难发现，但我并不担心。相信你的成熟很快就会到来！

original_en_text: For my mapping stock, we have traded all the charts and tools I can provide. While this new threat remains, I shall not make more.<page>My cartography may be a simple sort, but I hope that my craft shared has made your travels easier.
original_zh_text: 在我的地图库存中，我交换了我能提供的所有地图和工具。只要这个新威胁存在，我就不再相信它。&lt;page&gt;我的画可能很简单，但我希望我分享的工匠能让你的旅程更轻松。

original_en_text: Lead on, sister! Zaza and I will be close behind!
original_zh_text: 姐妹们，请带我来这里。我缴了税，看着他。

original_en_text: Hoy! Did you see it, red maiden? The great gate heard my song and, in its infinite and ancient kindness, has opened the way forward for us!
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿。你看到这个了吗？红老妇人，门，听我的歌，以无限的怜悯为我们开辟道路！

original_en_text: <hpage>Must you not press on, sirs?<page>Oh, yes! We will be off at once. Very soon. I fear though, that Zaza must rest a little longer...
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;朋友们，我们可以继续吗？&lt;page&gt;哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦，是的！很快，我想吉尔就会休息一下。

original_en_text: Poshanka! Edges sharp and senses keen!
original_zh_text: 博斯纳博斯纳！清晰清晰！

original_en_text: <page=M>Even knowing her motivation, it is a shock the monarch can resist so long. We’d thought none could survive that void.<hpage>She will have retreated within her protective form, that cocoon of thread. Even as the dark eats its outer, she will spin its Silk anew.<hpage>The effort would be immense and it will strain her soul thin, but what other choice remains?<hpage>This is the desperate act of a dying god. A defiance that, left unchallenged, will bring your kingdom’s ruin.
original_zh_text: &lt;page=M&gt;令人震惊的是，尽管国王知道自己的动机，但他却能忍受这么长时间。&lt;hpage&gt;他回到了他的保护管形式。她的外表被黑暗所掩盖，但她又恢复了丝滑的形象。&lt;hpage&gt;努力是巨大的，它会吸收你的灵魂，但它是什么？还有哪些其他选择？&lt;hpage&gt;这就是上帝之死的绝望。如果我们不拒绝这种抵抗，上帝的王国就会被摧毁。

original_en_text: <page=M>The quakes... This collapse will take Pharloom all.<hpage>If the void doesn’t claim it first. Surely you’ve seen them, the black threads that wrack your lands? The dark leeches up, possessed upon the fallen monarch’s Silk.<hpage>Pharloom’s roads were not safe before. Now they’ll prove impassable. Those pilgrims still alive in your lands best huddle and hope. <hpage>If there can be another end to this, it is up to us to discover it.
original_zh_text: &lt;page=M&gt;地震和山体滑坡是罪魁祸首&lt;hpage&gt;您见过一条黑线穿过您的国家吗？黑暗吸血鬼和堕落君主的丝绸。&lt;hpage&gt;我知道帕劳的街道并不安全。他们还没有被超越。朝圣者仍然生活在自己的土地上。&lt;hpage&gt;如果还有另一个结局，你一定要找到它。

original_en_text: <hpage>Why do you sing, little one? This bony gate seems like a poor audience.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;孩子，你为什么唱歌？狭窄的门似乎是一群可怜的旁观者。

original_en_text: <hpage>Can you safely make your way back to the settlement, little one? I could escort you if need be.<page>Oh no, I’ll lay no more of my troubles upon you, red maiden. With the way cleared I can return under my own guidance.<page>After all, what’s another pilgrimage, eh? Ha ha!<page>Oh! And I have something for you as well. I found it buried amongst the broken relics down here in the darkness, glowing with a pale light.<page>’Tis an odd-looking thing... not exactly holy-seeming... but I would be honoured if you accepted it all the same!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;他能安全返回村庄吗？如果你愿意，我可以带你去。&lt;page&gt;我的红女孩，我再也不会责怪你了。如果你扫清道路，就可以在我的带领下返回。"&lt;page&gt;最后，他？朝圣是什么意思？&lt;page&gt;哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！他被埋在黑暗中，废墟中，他看到了苍白的光芒。&lt;page&gt;我不敢相信他不是圣人，但我希望他能找回它。

original_en_text: The challenge! The course! It shall be improved. Yes! Yes! The truest test is still to come. We shall fly fast together once more!
original_zh_text: 挑战者！是的，不！那会更好，是的。哦，是的！哦，是的！但真正的证据尚未到来。希望他们能再次在一起！

original_en_text: I’ve learnt too that travelling is not without its dangers... but I find myself wielding my weapon quite adeptly.<page>It’s curious, the way our instincts can guide us with such precision.
original_zh_text: 此外，尽管他们知道这次旅行会是安全的，但他们能够非常熟练地使用武器。&lt;page&gt;令人惊讶的是，我们的直觉如何正确地引导我们。

original_en_text: Un-Daak... well struck. To face the fury of your weapon in a true battle would be an experience indeed. I would gladly duel again, if you have the time for it.
original_zh_text: “韦恩·博士”做得非常好。当然，愤怒是在战斗中面对武器的体验。如果我有时间，我会战斗。

original_en_text: Hoho sister, my whiskers are still quivering! That’s how you know you had a rousing battle!<page>You go on ahead. Zaza and I will keep guard here and catch any stragglers.
original_zh_text: 胡子们可以继续吸烟，因为他们知道他们正在打一场激动人心的战斗！&lt;page&gt;紫色和我来这里是为了保护和阻止幕后黑手。

original_en_text: Hoy, red maiden. ‘Tis a prayer answered to see you safely wake.<hpage>Little Sherma? What has happened here?
original_zh_text: 早上好，雷德小姐，我祈祷你能平静地醒来。&lt;hpage&gt;“小谢尔曼，怎么了？”

original_en_text: Poshanka! So you found my calling ring, Child Wielding Needle. I recognised the sound of your weapon’s foreign metal against it.<page>On the hunt for my master, I am often away, but I still use this place as camp. Use the ring to call me whenever you wish to make trade.
original_zh_text: 博尚卡！博尚卡！发现我戒指的人戴着针，知道异物和金属如何影响武器。&lt;page&gt;通常我们正在寻找主人，但它仍然是一个露营地。如果您想谈判，请用手机拨打电话。

original_en_text: <hpage>Gladly I will accept your aid Shakra. Let us cut closer to this Citadel’s haunted heart.<page>Garrok! Hornet Wielding Needle. Beside you, I will gladly raise my rings!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;感谢您帮助沙库拉更接近这座城堡的幽灵中心。&lt;page&gt;“不，泡沫随着针移动。我把戒指放在旁边。

original_en_text: I’d hoped to never step these hateful halls, yet here I stand, as all those hapless bugs before.<hpage>You’ve journeyed far from that damp cell, tall bug. If you would oppose the minions of this Citadel, you have my respect.<page>Hmph. Then we share a rare stance, warrior. Few others seem possessed of will enough to resist.<page>So many weak minds, drawn up and strung, in love with the great golden leech atop their lands.
original_zh_text: 我从来不想进入这个充满仇恨的房间，但它就像一只不幸的昆虫在我面前。&lt;hpage&gt;我走出一个潮湿的房间，房间大小只有昆虫。如果你不同意这座城堡，我尊重你。"&lt;page&gt;我们有一个不寻常的地方：士兵，很少有人抵抗。&lt;page&gt;许多软弱而紧张的人爱上了他们土地上的印加巨人。

original_en_text: Ho there, brave sister! What poetry has fate writ, that we should meet here at the peak of this ghastly Citadel!<page>Beasts and fiends, all here are lost to that horrid Haunting! And out from this golden corpse it seeps to plague the good bugs of the land below. Well, no more we say!<hpage>You should beware brave sirs, the creature that commands this curse is a foe far beyond bug. I would not see your lives given in vain.<page>Pah! We beware nothing! We would give our lives a hundred times over to finally cut away the evil that clutches our kingdom!
original_zh_text: 什么是关于命运的诗歌？我们将在城堡顶部见面。&lt;page&gt;动物和恶魔消失了，就像鬼魂一样，一切都是恐惧！他逃离了金尸，金尸在肥沃的土壤中受到害虫的侵扰。&lt;hpage&gt;勇敢的先生们，这个被诅咒的生物比敌方昆虫要好得多。&lt;page&gt;哦，哦，哦！我从来没有真正关心过任何事情！我们将付出一百倍的生命来根除我们王国周围的邪恶。

original_en_text: Goodness! This is just too embarrassing! Detected even through my perfect cover! What tell? What error? Surely something gave me away!<hpage>It was no one thing, young bug. Your disguise is near faultless. I’ve merely spent a long life being watchful.<page>Gah! Then I’ll just have to hope the beasts about don’t share such keen sight. It’ll be so much harder to accomplish my work if I’m detected, or eaten!
original_zh_text: 我的天啊！太热了！封面是完美的。我说了什么？发生了什么？有东西正在展示！&lt;hpage&gt;衣服几乎完美。我们为此准备了很长时间。&lt;page&gt;是的，正确的。哦，是的！我希望周围的动物没有这么敏锐的眼睛。吞下去，吞下去，这会使工作变得困难！

original_en_text: <hpage>The battle ahead may indeed be arduous. I accept your offer of aid, sirs.<page>Gurrrro! Yes! No force in the kingdom can withstand our might! Lead on, sister! Zaza and I will be close behind!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;从现在开始，战斗将是艰难的。女士们先生们，我来帮你们。&lt;page&gt;来吧来吧来吧来吧哦，是的！哦，是的！王国无法抗拒权威！姐妹们，请带我来这里。我缴了税，看着他。

original_en_text: Sister, sister, tired and glum,<br>We will sing, and you can hum,<br>Together we shall overcome!
original_zh_text: 我的妹妹，我的妹妹，又累又沮丧。&lt;br&gt;我可以抽烟和唱歌。&lt;br&gt;我们一起失败了。“

original_en_text: <page=M>Oh ho! Back from the depths with nary a scratch! Is it as you feared?<hpage>It is, and worse. Your snare has sunk the monarch deep, deeper than I can safely descend.<hpage>To cut Pharloom free, I must plunge below the surface of that lake of liquid nothing.<page=B> No shell survives submersion in that void, Old One, not even yours.<hpage>Not without aid, certainly. Though aid may exist. The flower that resists the dark. Do you know of it?<page=M>The Everbloom?... We’ve heard the tale, but had thought it a myth. If ever it sprouted in our lands we would surely have known?<hpage>I would not seek it in these lands. I need its power full, and it is too fragile to sustain here long. I would seek it in my memory.<page=S> Oh ho ho! So you’d have us wrench open your soul, to retrieve the fabled bloom? Can such a thing be done?<hpage>For another bug, no, but I am Weaver enough to attempt it.<hpage>In the distant past, I knew the flower. My thread still holds its faint memory. If the Everbloom was grasped strongly enough within my Silk, it could be made to manifest.<page=M>Ah! So you’re asking another spell of us? To reveal the flower clear?... But to illuminate one of your kind’s old memories, so acutely... This is no easy thing, even for us...<page=M>Old One, you must give us a moment to confer...
original_zh_text: &lt;page=M&gt;是的，大喊！“对不起，我想你真的很担心。&lt;hpage&gt;你的陷阱已经落入国王手中，比我的安全还深。&lt;hpage&gt;我没有做任何事情来释放法罗。我冲进湖里。&lt;page=B&gt;蝎子无法在这个古老的真空中生存。你自己也这样做。&lt;hpage&gt;这并没有真正帮助。你知道如何抵抗深色吗？这对你有帮助吗？&lt;page=M&gt;永恒的色彩？我听过这个故事，但我认为这是一个神话。如果他们在我们国家长大，那么&lt;hpage&gt;我在地球上找不到它，我需要它，但我太虚弱了，无法在这里呆太久，我在记忆中找到了它。&lt;page=S&gt;哦，哦，哦！你想打开你的灵魂并宣布传奇之花吗？你能做到吗？"&lt;hpage&gt;至于其他的错误，没有，但我已经穿了足够多的尝试了。&lt;hpage&gt;我认识这朵花很久了，我的记忆总是脆弱的。如果我的丝绸足够坚固，可以挂在那朵永恒的花朵上，它就会出现。&lt;page=M&gt;是的，正确的。哦，是的！“你想用魔法？花应该点燃吗？然而，他显然能够透露他的种族的旧记忆，这对我们来说并不是一件容易的事情。&lt;page=M&gt;“爸爸，我们需要时间谈谈。

original_en_text: My wish is granted... and now everything I love is lost...
original_zh_text: 我的愿望实现了，我所爱的一切都消失了。

original_en_text: Gara Takana! What has happened to you, Child Wielding Needle, to cause you such brutal weakening?<hpage>You are seeing the effects of a parasite, Shakra, a writhing entity implanted by force. It will not kill me, not quickly at least, but its presence wears greatly on my shell.<page>It is a horrid state you suffer. Fight yourself free, or find help with haste. I would not wish to see you defeated by such deceitful strength.
original_zh_text: 在法国，它很高！是什么让你这么软弱？&lt;hpage&gt;你所看到的是寄生脉轮的影响，它被存在的力量改变和加强。它可能不会杀死我，至少不会很快，但它的存在会对我的外壳造成很大的磨损。&lt;page&gt;这就是他们所遭受的痛苦。尽快寻求帮助！我不想被这种欺骗性的力量打败。

original_en_text: Hoi! Let our mighty contest of shells commence again!
original_zh_text: 我们开始了一场精彩的鱼比赛！

original_en_text: You’re in the habit of craftin’ all kinds’a nasty tools’n traps, aint’cha? This kit’ll let you build ‘em even nastier, heh heh...
original_zh_text: 你习惯用各种无聊的工具和陷阱，对吧？实际上？他们会让事情变得更糟吗？

original_en_text: Poshanka, Child Wielding Needle. This heart-home is cut free of its curse.<page>Tell me, was it your blade that brought its saving? My shock would be great if another here managed the feat.<hpage>I slew a tall creature above the town, a Weaver I suspect, though one twisted in purpose.<hpage>By voice and claw it aided, perhaps guided, the thread that strung the town. <page>Weaver? Those vicious old things! To our young we tell the tales, but had thought them long dead, only corpses bound in spires. <hpage>This one still lived, though if it was a Weaver, it was broken in a savage way.<hpage>Its own Silk was bound, pinned deep within its shell. A cruel punishment I’ve not before witnessed. <page>Even broken, my envy remains. A Weaver’s fabled skills... To meet one in combat means great challenge, and great pride in victory.
original_zh_text: 波斯尼亚的孩子们挥舞着针头。淋浴释放了诅咒。&lt;page&gt;剑能带来救赎吗？如果有人这样做，我会感到惊讶。&lt;hpage&gt;我在城市上空杀死了一个巨大的生物。它是故意扭曲的，但我怀疑那是眼泪。&lt;hpage&gt;它有助于声音和钉子，并有助于控制连接城市的电线。&lt;page&gt;剧院在哪里？很久以前，我们向一个年轻人讲述了这些故事，他以为自己已经死了很久，而在箭头中，他只是一具尸体。&lt;hpage&gt;他还活着，但如果是眼泪，他会受重伤。&lt;hpage&gt;她的丝绸深深地绑在壳上，这是她从未见过的残酷惩罚。&lt;page&gt;当嫉妒被打破时，嫉妒就会继续存在。研发传奇的技术之战意味着为获胜而自豪。

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings, Shakra. You are a welcome sight amidst the sodden gloom of these caverns. <page>Child Wielding Needle, your aspect is still sharp. My respect remains. Heed a warning, many fierce bugs roost nearby.<page>On the lake beyond this cave nest a ragged horde atop an old watermound. Their mastery of flight makes them dangerous. My shell will forever carry the score of their pins.<page>If you’re seeking a safer path, head back, towards this land’s core.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;早上好，欢迎来到夏奇拉湿洞。&lt;page&gt;她外表看起来总是很坚强。保持我们的尊重。如果您留意警告，您会注意到附近有许多凶猛的昆虫。&lt;page&gt;洞穴后面是一个古老的部落，位于古老的湖山上。它们的飞行能力使它们处于危险之中。我的贝壳总是有我象征性的结局。&lt;page&gt;如果您正在寻找更安全的路线，请返回地球中心。

original_en_text: Nuu is a long way from her safe lodging... perhaps she will stay in this nice, dark little squeezy place a little longer.
original_zh_text: 您可以在这个美丽、黑暗、拥挤的地方停留一会儿。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sherma, I bring supplies from the town of bells below. Since you are now caretaker here, I entrust them to you.<page>Oh, what a blessing! This will surely raise the hopes of our poor brothers and sisters.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;泽曼，我从贝尔顿带了一些货物。你是这个地方的守护者。“我为你准备了一切。&lt;page&gt;哦，多么好的机会啊！这给我们可怜的兄弟姐妹带来了希望。

original_en_text: Red maiden, you have some great task ahead of you, do you not? If so, then I fear the time of our final parting draws near.<hpage>You sense it true, Sherma. I shall soon descend to the darkness below the kingdom and quell the source of Pharloom’s rending.<hpage>If that task is achieved, my future may take me far from Pharloom, but know I have faith that you will hold these bugs together, and see them prosper.<page>Ah! In truth, I’m still only a fool, but I’ll hold dearly to your faith in me. That warmth will help me to endure whatever challenges lie ahead!<page>Now let me pray for you, dear friend, and may my hopes follow you into the deepest darkness and beyond!
original_zh_text: “我们还有很多工作要做，不是吗？如果是这样，他担心撤退的最后时刻即将到来。&lt;hpage&gt;“你是对的，萨姆。很快我就会进入王国的黑暗，扼杀祖国的毁灭。&lt;hpage&gt;当这项任务完成后，我的未来可能会远离法勒姆，但我确信我会把这些错误放在一起，看看我如何茁壮成长。"&lt;page&gt;是的，正确的。哦，是的！我仍然很疯狂，但我相信你的信任。这种温暖将帮助您克服所有困扰您的困难！&lt;page&gt;亲爱的朋友们，请为我祈祷，让我的希望能够在黑暗深处和更远的地方生存。

original_en_text: The way forward is yours. Let us meet again soon.

<hpage>Shakra, you pit yourself against the black-threaded bugs? They are dangerous foes, even for a hardened warrior.<page>I relish such danger, and have little choice besides. These creatures besiege the town within. They are relentless, and empowered. <hpage>...It is the void, stretched up into this world and its husks. I know it well, this force, its nature. If it senses soul within, it will drive voracious towards it.<page>As you say! Many bugs now huddle within the bells. Nowhere else is safe with this black threat rising.<page>Some luck, at least, that I chose to remain, and can offer my rings’ defence.<hpage>Shakra, I seek to end this new disaster, for in it I share much blame, but know, I shall need time to complete my task.<hpage>I ask you hold fast till then. This town and its bugs need a guardian, and I can think of none better.<page>Very well, Hornet Wielding Needle. A pact made strong. If you are working towards the venom’s end, I shall fight with faith renewed.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;脉轮，你能对抗黑线上的错误吗？他们是危险的敌人，甚至是强大的士兵。&lt;page&gt;“我喜欢冒险，我别无选择，只能这样做。生物包围着城市。他们冷酷而强大。&lt;hpage&gt;...这是一个穿过世界及其外壳的真空。我了解他的力量，他的本性。如果你能感觉到那里的灵魂，你就会渴望它。&lt;page&gt;正如你所说！这只手表充满了错误。随着这种黑人威胁的增长，其他一切都是真实的。&lt;page&gt;幸运的是，我决定留下来，并且能够在擂台上提供防守。&lt;hpage&gt;脉轮，由于我肩上肩负着巨大的责任，我正在努力结束这场新的灾难，但我知道完成我的使命需要时间。&lt;hpage&gt;这次请尽力而为。这座城市和它的昆虫需要有人来照顾它们。我想不出更好的了。&lt;page&gt;奥尼托移动了他的针。这是一个强有力的协议。如果我想摆脱这种毒药，我就会用我的新信仰来战斗。"

original_en_text: Let us charge on. My rings shall sing loud on the shells of our enemies.
original_zh_text: 我的戒指在敌人的子弹中歌唱。

original_en_text: And now, miss grown-up, the task is done! Nuu must be away.<page>But do not be sour! Just think! Pharloom is only one land. So many more must hide out there, filled full with beasts and scents and tastes, all waiting to be discovered.<page>For Nuu, her journey is only at its start. And for you, miss grown-up, Nuu wishes too your happy hunting, much and more!
original_zh_text: “女士，您已经完成了您的任务。&lt;page&gt;停下来思考一下！法罗群岛是一个必须隐瞒一些事情的国家。野兽、气味，一切都在等待被发现。&lt;page&gt;我们的旅程才刚刚开始。

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, what has happened here? For these masses to huddle so amongst such destruction?<page>The dark-spun bugs, they besiege the town, relentless. I have defended against each wave anew, but they are empowered in foul ways, and I am much fatigued.<hpage>...It is the void, stretched up into this world and its husks. I know it well, that force, its nature. If it senses soul, it will drive voracious towards it.<page>As you say! All these bugs, gathered close within the bells... but nowhere else is safe with this black threat rising.<hpage>Shakra, I seek to end this new disaster, for in it I share much blame, but know, I shall need time to complete my task. I would ask you hold fast till then.<hpage>This town and its bugs needs a guardian, and I can think of none better.<page>Very well, Hornet Wielding Needle. A pact made strong. If you are working towards the venom’s end, I shall fight with faith renewed.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;沙库尔怎么了？我们是否参与了这场灾难？&lt;page&gt;我保护了所有的波浪，但我很累，因为我没有吃足够的食物。&lt;hpage&gt;...它是一种空，它蔓延到世界和它的外壳。我了解他的力量，他的本性。“当你感觉到一个灵魂时，你不安全地接近它。"&lt;page&gt;正如你所说！当钟声响起时，昆虫就会聚集，但随着这种黑色威胁的增加，其他地方就会变得不安全。&lt;hpage&gt;脉轮，由于我肩上肩负着巨大的责任，我正在努力结束这场新的灾难，但我知道完成我的使命需要时间。&lt;hpage&gt;这座城市和它的昆虫需要有人来照顾它们。我想不出更好的人了。&lt;page&gt;奥尼托移动了他的针。这是一个强有力的协议。如果我想摆脱这种毒药，我就会用我的新信仰来战斗。"

original_en_text: Eugh. Is it gettin’ hotter down here? Mustier? Grindle’s been down here too long. Reckon it’s time to climb back up soon, to where all the serious treasures is!
original_zh_text: 这里热吗？没有枪？“格林德尔已经在这里这么久了，我想是时候尽快回来，找到所有重要的宝藏了！"

original_en_text: So this is... defeat? Can it be? Huu... A shell so fast! Wonder of Pharloom! A bug whose pace could match my own.<page>Though I set a simple course, you have proven its match and more. Take this small reward, nimble bug, and remember well our grand contest!
original_zh_text: 就这样吗，失败？你还好吗？法老的奇迹：他是一只和我一样快的昆虫。&lt;page&gt;我们安装了一个简单的路径，但我们发现它是兼容的。注意这些小奖金、错误，记住伟大的游戏！

original_en_text: Oh, hoy there! Why, I must have dropped off to sleep as soon as I arrived!<page>Certainly, the pilgrim’s way is exhausting, but a good rest is a reward unto itself!
original_zh_text: 他来了！为什么？我穿好衣服就上床睡觉了。&lt;page&gt;当然，朝圣之旅可能会让人筋疲力尽，但好好休息本身就是一种奖励！

original_en_text: That was a battle well-fought, Child Wielding Needle. Your master would be proud of you.<hpage>The one who trained me long ago... I never called her master. Whether she would be proud of what has become of me, I cannot say.<page>Nu-Hakkata! Whether she is dead or alive, have faith! Nothing a pupil does escapes their master’s sight!
original_zh_text: 这是一场精彩的战斗，孩子们挥舞着针头。您的客人会为您感到自豪！&lt;hpage&gt;他们训练了我很长时间。“我不叫他大师。我不知道你是否为发生在我身上的事情感到自豪。&lt;page&gt;空的一面！生与死需要信仰。学生所做的一切都逃不过老师的注意。

original_en_text: Wide, dim hollows, choked by rag and dust. The bugs who once tended these lands have clearly lost their way.
original_zh_text: 当然，巨大而黑暗的虚空被灰尘和尘埃覆盖，曾经保护这片土地的昆虫也消失了。

original_en_text: Red maiden! Dear sister! At last, our great pilgrimage is at its end!<page>Our faith never wavered, and now here awaits our glorious reward, the shining Citadel! Where all sing as one!<hpage>I will not tell you to turn back, for I know you will not, but I urge you at least to be cautious. Terrible things lurk within this Citadel, little pilgrim.<page>Oh, sister! There is no need for caution, and no need for fear. Let us step forward under guidance of our faith!
original_zh_text: 红女孩！亲爱的姐姐！伟大的朝圣终于结束了！&lt;page&gt;我们的信仰没有胜利，荣耀的回报此刻等待着我们。&lt;hpage&gt;我以为你不会回来了，所以我没有告诉你回来，但至少你要小心。小朝圣者，这座城堡里有可怕的事情。&lt;page&gt;早上好，姐姐！信仰之路就是信仰之路。你不必害怕，你不必害怕。

original_en_text: This vein of gilded bells creates an effectively defended settlement. I can see it once gave a long time of peace to its bugs.<page>And yet, look at their numbers now. Stricken by cursed thread. Only a few have survived.<page>We must learn from them, Child Wielding Needle. Peace is a slow poison that would wither even the hardiest bug.
original_zh_text: 这个金钟是一种有效的防御解决方案，我长期以来一直看到它给我内心的平静。&lt;page&gt;看看这些数字，你是不是被困在队列里了？只有少数人幸存下来。&lt;page&gt;我们必须教导我们的孩子，世界是一种缓慢的毒药，即使是最顽固的昆虫也会传播。

original_en_text: <hpage>Your camp here looks comfortably set, Shakra. Are you planning to stay a time?<page>Perhaps, yes. This heart-home makes a fine base for now and later if needed.<page>Still! I must take care not to rest overlong. My shell would soften and my senses dull.<page>
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;脉轮，露营似乎很舒服。您打算住一段时间吗？&lt;page&gt;如果有必要，这个心宫将永远是一个良好的基础。&lt;page&gt;休息！注意让皮肤柔软，情绪消失。&lt;page&gt;

original_en_text: Oh, hullo again! This time, I most certainly do recognise you! ‘Tis a pleasure to bump into you here, deep in this serene wood.<page>Do you have a name, like I do? Would you share it with me?<hpage>Certainly, sir. I am Hornet.<hpage>I notice you gazing at the buds above us... are they familiar to you, perhaps?<page>Hm? No, not at all. Very beautiful though! Perhaps I should gather some up before venturing on...
original_zh_text: 天哪，我回来了！这一次，我完全承认这一点。“很高兴在这片宁静的森林里见到你。"&lt;page&gt;你的名字和我的名字一样吗？你能和我分享一下吗？&lt;hpage&gt;“我是一只蜜蜂。&lt;hpage&gt;他意识到自己正在看着自己头上的子弹。&lt;page&gt;这是什么？你在干什么？不是每个人，但它很漂亮。在开始冒险之前，您可能想带上一些东西。

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>These markers I have modelled after the sheen of my own shell. Perhaps you will think of me when you use them.
original_zh_text: 您可以用它来显示地图上的重要地点和记忆。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;我做了一个模仿我的贝壳灯的标志，当你使用它时记住我。

original_en_text: There are signs that pilgrims once travelled even these crumbling paths, long ago. Now only the voracious worms nest here.
original_zh_text: 过去，有迹象表明朝圣者遵循了一条不可持续的路线，但现在他们只能利用昆虫筑巢。

original_en_text: Hoi! Nimble bug! Surely you have reconsidered? Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿，那是一个明智的错误！您确定检查过了吗？让我们一起探索界限！

original_en_text: You have purchased the last of my mapping stock, for now. Stay alive on your journey, and when our paths next cross we may trade again.
original_zh_text: 您可以在旅行时保持好心情，下次看到时再次出售。

original_en_text: Don’t be lingerin’ here too long! We got snitchin’ to do and we ain’t keen on company!
original_zh_text: 我很想这么说，但我的同事不这么说。

original_en_text: If you venture further and higher into these caverns, beware. The sickly air only grows thicker.
original_zh_text: 进入洞穴时要小心，因为这只会让痛苦的空气变得更糟。

original_en_text: I’ll be off soon, once I’m good and rested. Beyond the wood lies the final climb, and then at last we shall reach the Citadel!<page>Which of us will reach the Grand Gate first? If it’s me, I shall wait for you so we can enter together!
original_zh_text: 当他感觉好点时，他爬上了一棵树，终于在最后一次攀登中到达了城堡。&lt;page&gt;谁将成为第一个进入星门的人？如果我在那里，我会等着和你一起去。

original_en_text: If you would fight alone, I will say nothing more.
original_zh_text: 如果你单独战斗，我不会告诉你。

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair meeting again, sir knight. I see this bell has drawn you too towards its safety.<page>Who would have guessed, sister! A safe corner, hidden so high atop Pharloom’s cursed crown!<page>Our fair village may have fallen, but for these fellows... these scared few, our honour charges us to keep them safe. Our hornlance shall raise for them! After some rest, of course.<hpage>Hold fast to your new charge, Garmond. See these bugs survive, and know I aim, in time near, to cut down this curse at its core.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;很好的引用，我的朋友。手表非常注重安全。&lt;page&gt;谁能猜到？躲在一个安全的角落里，躲在被诅咒灯塔的王冠上！&lt;page&gt;我们伟大的人民可能会倒下，但那是为了他们。我们的荣誉要求我们保护这个可怕的少数派。我们的号角将为他们吹响。当然是短暂的休息。&lt;hpage&gt;保护你的新攻击，盖蒙！只要这些错误持续存在，我的目标就是在不久的将来根除这个诅咒。

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>Beneath here and further on, the burly bellheads have a big, hot, gleaming hive! Full of all sorts of tasty snitchables!<page>But there’s this big gate they got down in its belly... shut tight, locked up. If you could wriggle through, you’d get your claws on all kindsa goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦，哦，哦！卡门·格林德尔为那些记住我们秘密的人祈祷。&lt;page&gt;在这个动荡的时代，这里和其他地方都有巨大而温暖的闪闪发光的峡谷！有很多伟大的记者&lt;page&gt;但他们把门放在他的肚子里，关上了，关上了。如果你能克服它，你的指甲就会把一切都举起！

original_en_text: You see this idol before us, red maiden? I have passed its like before, they mark our pilgrimage well.<page>If we sing to it, a miraculous shrine will rise from the ground, and we will have a place to rest! Such a wonder!<hpage>I suspect it is not song that rouses this shrine, but payment in rosaries.<hpage>I have encountered similar constructs on Pharloom’s paths. It seems this kingdom does not grant rest lightly.
original_zh_text: 你看到你面前的红色女人了吗？我经历了和以前一样的经历，这给了我一个朝圣的好兆头。&lt;page&gt;当你唱歌时，神奇的寺庙升起，成为休息的地方。&lt;hpage&gt;我相信圣殿不是被一首歌唤醒的，而是被玫瑰经的吟诵唤醒的。&lt;hpage&gt;在去法老宫殿的路上，我们发现了一座类似的建筑。王国不会安息。

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>There’s lots of pickings round here, right? Well, it’s all nothing compared to what they got hidden up, up above us. The great big Sitty-del they calls it!<page>A golden place, groaning with goodies! Could never steal it all in a thousand snitch-bug lifetimes they reckon!<page>Oh yes, that’s where ol’ Grindle is headin’. Don’t you dare follow us, though! We want it all for us-selves!
original_zh_text: 哦，哦，哦！卡门·格林德尔为那些记住我们秘密的人祈祷。&lt;page&gt;你有很多皮卡车，不是吗？与隐藏在我们脑海中的东西相比，这算不了什么。它被称为“伟大的城堡”。&lt;page&gt;风景优美的黄金之地！一个人无法偷走一千条生命。&lt;page&gt;这就是证人的命运。“跟我们来！我们都在做我们的工作！

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>You know where all them dreary raggedies are camping? Back near the ol’ chapel? Well, beyond that chapel is a dirty great grave!<page>Not much in there but husks, right? But but! My sniffer tells me there’s something worth the trouble buried down at the bottom!
original_zh_text: 哦，哦，哦！它就在格林德尔的口袋里，留给那些记住我们秘密的人。&lt;page&gt;你知道垃圾在哪里吗？你会回到老教堂吗？教堂后面有一个肮脏的坟墓。&lt;page&gt;这只是一个掩护，不是吗？实际上？妈妈，妈妈，妈妈！当我闻到它的味道时，我很害怕。

original_en_text: <hpage>The groaning docks, beyond the caverns of bone. There I have seen a vessel able to pass below, a heavy bell built for descent.<hpage>I need only gain access, and an operator to assist. I will investigate the docks, and uncover the means.<page=M>You’d be the first in an age to dive so deep, Old One. That space below remains long unseen, even to our family. <hpage>For those depths, I am more prepared than most. I will reach the base of this land, and know the truth of the new disaster we, together have wrought.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;有一艘船可以从它下面经过，还有一只沉重的手表让它掉了下来。&lt;hpage&gt;您所需要的只是访问和操作员：找到门，找到路径。&lt;page=M&gt;在此期间，学生们将首先深化研究。下面的空间并不总是为家庭所知。&lt;hpage&gt;我们将照耀地球，发现我们共同制造的新灾难的真相。

original_en_text: Why does it fade? Why can I not recall that sacred place?
original_zh_text: 他为什么消失了？为什么我们不记住圣地？

original_en_text: <hpage>Here you lie, monarch. Sunk so deep, yet still you cling to life. <hpage>Would you let your lands be choked black... to protect just her?
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;天哪，你是个骗子。如果你陷得很深，你还活着。&lt;hpage&gt;你愿意保护你的土地吗？

original_en_text: <hpage>Take care, Garmond. Whatever dangers these lands present, I’m sure what waits in that Citadel will be worse.<page>Aye, sister! Until that Citadel is reached and justice is served, Zaza and I shall not fall.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;无论这座地球上的城堡里有什么危险等待着我们，我相信情况会更糟。&lt;page&gt;在到达堡垒并恢复正义之前，紫色和我不会倒下。

original_en_text: Letting you live was my rebellion, spider. I’ve denied my mother your silken strength. I’ve won.<page>She can thrash, and waste, and know her pathetic, broken child caused the mortal wound.<page>Rejoice! And let it all come down.<hpage>I will not. I have already stood the sentinel for one dying land. That role... I will never play again.<hpage>While I live, and possess the strength to resist, this kingdom, and the bugs within it, shall not fall.
original_zh_text: 我没有把力量交给蜘蛛妈妈，我赢了。&lt;page&gt;他知道鞭子没用，疼痛会破裂，孩子们会受伤。&lt;page&gt;让我们快乐！放下一切。&lt;hpage&gt;我不是死亡之地，我是这份文件的保管人，我再也不会碰它了。&lt;hpage&gt;只要它还活着，有抵抗的力量，它所在的王国和昆虫就不会灭亡。

original_en_text: Hahahhaa! Spider. Spider. What a marvellous specimen you are! You fight and fight, heedless as the world crumbles around you.<page>Pharloom and her bugs will be crushed to dust, and still you’ll be vainly swinging your blade.<hpage>...There may still be a way to prevent that fate. I will claim the hidden power, the bloom that repels the dark.<hpage>Those snails share some fault in the snare, and their callous use of the void. They shall help me now to seek its counter.<hpage>I will return, child, when I bear the strength to dive below, and cut this land finally free of your mother’s grasp.
original_zh_text: 哈！哈！当我们周围的世界崩溃时，我们无意识地挣扎和挣扎。&lt;page&gt;释放你自己，你的虫子就会被撕成碎片，你的剑却徒劳地挥舞。&lt;hpage&gt;...我有一种隐藏的力量，我拒绝黑暗之花。&lt;hpage&gt;这些蜗牛陷阱也有其缺点，总是钻漏洞。他们会帮助我找到反击。&lt;hpage&gt;我的儿子，当我沉入大海时，我就会回来，我终于有力量将这片土地从你母亲手中解放出来。

original_en_text: After some tasty goodies? We never say no to a fair trade, heh heh! Take a look at what we’s got...
original_zh_text: 吃完美餐后？我并不反对公平贸易。

original_en_text: We could add a little pocket to yer tool pouch for you. You could pack even more goodies in there! All your shards’n sharp things!
original_zh_text: 您可以在工具箱里放一个小口袋。你可以穿得更好！你的每一部分都很坚强。

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, if I may, I’d ask a small task of your carving talents.<hpage>Within the halls of the Citadel, I encountered a means of travel new to me, a network of pipes traversed in vessels propelled by steam and air.<hpage>That Citadel is a labyrinth, and pins to mark each station would prove useful to me.<page>What you describe sounds as hideous and unnatural as anything in that place. Still, if it will aid you, I shall craft the pins.<page>Seek me at a moment not long from now. The pins will be carved, and we may trade.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;“夏克拉，我希望你能利用你在这方面的天赋来做一些工作。&lt;hpage&gt;在城堡的客厅里，我发现了一种奇怪的旅行方式：船只和飞机通过的管道网络。&lt;hpage&gt;城堡就像一个迷宫，每个季节展示的松树都很有用。&lt;page&gt;你画的东西听起来和这个地方的其他部分一样可怕和不自然，但如果它有效，我会做一个菠萝。&lt;page&gt;我们会尽快找到他们。旋转可以雕刻和互换。

original_en_text: These overgrown caves offer little challenge to a skilled warrior. A place for reflection, perhaps.
original_zh_text: 这些人口稠密的洞穴对熟练的士兵来说几乎没有什么问题。也许这是一个反思的地方。

original_en_text: Fear not, red maiden! This shrine will surely rise for us, we only need to patiently wish for it!
original_zh_text: 你没有什么可害怕的。红色处女与我们同在。我们所要做的就是耐心祈祷。

original_en_text: <page=M>In the heights of the great wood, nestled deep in its roots, vines and branches, find the one who sowed the first seed.<page=S>They’re the very essence of the place, the nub of it all. Ain’t really a bug, to be told, but a powerful presence nonetheless.<page=M>We’d heard the Citadel once made grudging accord with that creature, sent their servants in reverence, even built a shrine up there somewhere. Maybe it’s worth you searching for it?
original_zh_text: &lt;page=M&gt;在树根和树枝的深处，他找到了播下第一粒种子的人。&lt;page=S&gt;我是这个地方的本质，我是一切的中心。换句话说，这不是一个错误，但它仍然是一个强大的实体。&lt;page=M&gt;我听说城堡违背他的意愿与这个生物签订了条约，让他的仆人哭泣，并在某处建造了一座寺庙。

original_en_text: Old roads and passages overrun by roaches and their keepers. The ways are covered thick with filth.
original_zh_text: 街道和走廊上到处都是蟑螂和警卫，街道也很脏。

original_en_text: In this moment, I have no more items to trade. Perhaps, if we meet again on the roads ahead, I shall have crafted new goods to sell.
original_zh_text: 目前没有可更换产品。如果您旅行，您可以创建和销售新产品。

original_en_text: You like this gleaming spinner I snitched from the big Sitty-dell? There’s a way to make it sing to you, or so they says!
original_zh_text: 你喜欢我带到大教堂的闪亮旋转器吗？我们有唱歌的方式，或者至少有说话的方式。

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>This dark-shell material is cold to the touch, and more resilient than it looks.
original_zh_text: 您可以用它来显示地图上的重要地点和记忆。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;这种深层材料给人一种比看起来更凉爽、更有弹性的感觉。

original_en_text: Crumbling roads built upon the shells of ancient bugs. All of Pharloom rests upon these fragile foundations.
original_zh_text: 这条不稳定的道路建在古老的昆虫壳上，整个灯塔都建在这个脆弱的基础上。

original_en_text: Crusted heights above those howling steps. Signs suggest great warriors once ruled this winding place, though the sand has eroded much of their mark.
original_zh_text: 有迹象表明，一位伟大的战士曾经统治过这个曲折的地方，但沙子摧毁了大部分废墟。

original_en_text: <hpage>To search these lands so thoroughly, Shakra... I wonder, who is it you hope to find?<page>Okklu-Din... a perceptive question. I travel in search of my mentor, the greatest of my tribe. I have followed her trail throughout this kingdom, but have so far failed to catch her.<page>She will have travelled much farther by now, but if I keep moving and stay vigilant, we shall reunite.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;仔细看看这片土地。沙库尔，你知道我想见谁吗？&lt;page&gt;我把他赶出了王国，因为他去见我的主人，部落的最高领主，但我还没有抓住他。&lt;page&gt;现在事情正在发生，但如果我继续保持警惕，我们可能会再次在一起。"

original_en_text: The stone structures of this place suggest clear waters once ran throughout.<page>What fantasy that now seems! Even this swamp’s inhabitants seem spawned of its noxious nature.
original_zh_text: 石头表明水已经干涸。&lt;page&gt;现在有多大了？由于其毒性，就连沼泽中的居民似乎也在增加。

original_en_text: But look here! As soon as our sacred journey begins, we are tested. This huge gate stands between us and the way forward.<page>Only holy prayer and song will open the way! In this kingdom, even mighty bone is moved by music!
original_zh_text: 但你一定要看看！当圣日开始时，我们就会经历它。一扇门挡住了我们，挡住了我们的路。&lt;page&gt;只有祈祷和上帝的歌唱才能开辟道路。即使是世界上最坚强的骨头也能演奏音乐。

original_en_text: You win again! Never have I met a luckier pilgrim...<hpage>You mistake, sir. It was skill that won me this game. One must be careful not to rely merely on luck.<page>Hmph. Fairly said, sister.<page>I must confess something though. Truth is, I already lost the last of my rosaries. I can’t pay our last wager.<page>I do have something small for you, at least. These dice. They certainly seem to have taken a liking to you. Take them, in memory of our meeting.
original_zh_text: 我们会赢的！我从未见过如此快乐的朝圣者。&lt;hpage&gt;技术将我带入了这个行业。&lt;page&gt;我姐姐说话很好。&lt;page&gt;我不得不承认我错过了最后一个位置。&lt;page&gt;至少我有东西给你。“我喜欢这份报纸。" "

original_en_text: <page>Who are you hoping you’ll find down there, spider? An ailing child and a Silk starved beast? <page>If so, I’m afraid we may sorely disappoint. What waits below is me no longer.
original_zh_text: &lt;page&gt;蜘蛛侠，你在找谁？生病的孩子和饥饿的动物。&lt;page&gt;如果是这样，我们会非常失望。

original_en_text: Hoy, you’re still hanging around then? Quiet in here. Good for hidin’ out.<page>You gots the li’l clicky-clackies on you then, eh? The rolly-roundies? What the shops like to swap for?
original_zh_text: 它还在动吗？这里很安静，所以你可以躲起来。&lt;page&gt;这就是森林存在的原因吗？实际上？您想换商店吗？

original_en_text: You... So, it is done... My wish granted before ever I arrived...<hpage>The bronze pair that danced this chamber, it is clear, tall bug, how closely they mimicked your shell. Was it you who provided their inspiration?<page>Not I, warrior. For this place, my heart holds only loathing...<page>The dancers... they were the last free act of my partner... Always hopeful. Always naive.<page>His whole he gave, in desperate trade to see our own caves left safe. His shell and soul became the mould.<page>So long, I dared not visit... Even as our lands fell to thread and ruin... Instead I wasted, a coward caged, too weak to witness his grace bound in parody so cruel.<hpage>Take some solace, tall bug. His soul is now free from that shell of iron, and the fate that befell your lands, this Citadel too has been claimed full by it.<page>Aye... Slim consolation, warrior, now that everything I loved is lost...
original_zh_text: 你是谁？在她到达之前，她的愿望就已经实现了。&lt;hpage&gt;房间里跳舞的青铜同伴太清晰，太大，无法模仿水槽的距离。你有什么灵感吗？&lt;page&gt;“不是我，士兵，我讨厌这里。&lt;page&gt;跳舞的人。这是我们合作伙伴的最后一次免费表演。他们总是充满希望。我总是很天真。&lt;page&gt;他竭尽全力确保洞穴的安全，他的身体和灵魂是一体的。&lt;page&gt;尽管我们的土地变得荒凉，化为废墟，但笼子的网格却因为这种残酷的模仿而太薄弱，无法直接看到它的优雅。&lt;hpage&gt;放松点，高大的昆虫，你的灵魂已经从铁壳中解放出来，你的命运就在你的土地上，城堡也被它占领了。&lt;page&gt;是的，一点安慰，士兵，我所爱的一切都消失了。

original_en_text: <page=M>What’s this? That’s an unexpected heart you’re holding, Old One...<page=M>We can guess to its source, though we’d believed it long gone from these lands. <hpage>The heart of a graceful lord. In its taking I was able to witness his caves and kingdom as once they flourished.<hpage>A stunning sight. Unique. All gone... Lost to the pale monarch... and the system to keep her caged.
original_zh_text: &lt;page=M&gt;这是什么？她有一颗意想不到的心。&lt;page=M&gt;关于它的起源的猜测是可能的，但人们可以认为地球自古以来就存在了。&lt;hpage&gt;这是上帝的恩典。在拍摄过程中，我看到了他的洞穴和他王国的繁荣。&lt;hpage&gt;他们都决心击败苍白的君主和将他关在笼子里的制度。

original_en_text: A beat of rosaries is our wager. Once you find enough, I’d be happy to play.
original_zh_text: 我们的赌注是一串念珠，如果我们找到足够的赌注，我们就会很高兴地玩。

original_en_text: Nimble bug, you return refreshed! And so perfectly timed, for I have a new challenge prepared.<page>The course shall remain the same as last, but length, the laps, will greatly extend.<hpage>You propose a test of endurance? I have undertaken many in my time.<page>Excellent! Excellent! Though know, for this race, I can only provide slight reward for victory.<page>What say you, nimble bug? Let us stride fast forth!
original_zh_text: 聪明的昆虫，你又健康了！现在是最好的时机，因为我们正在为新的挑战做准备。&lt;page&gt;这场比赛与上一场比赛相同，但所需时间（圈数）增加了。&lt;hpage&gt;我需要控制抵抗力吗？我一生中做了很多。&lt;page&gt;这太不可思议了！这太不可思议了！在这个游戏中，您只能获得少量奖金。&lt;page&gt;速度误差是什么意思？“走，走，走。"

original_en_text: <hpage>Another time, Shakra. I am always eager to learn, but for now my tasks call me away. <page>Bakelo! Answer to your tasks, then. My rings shall await your return.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;“下一个是樱桃。我一直想学习，但现在我不需要了。"&lt;page&gt;好吧，你做你的工作！我希望我的戒指能回来。

original_en_text: Gurrroo! Fellow warrior, if you are wishing to lock blades, know you stand before the honoured knight Garmond, and brave companion Zaza. Together we will face bold to any challenge!<hpage>I have no wish to fight you, sir bug. It is heartening to meet another on these roads of sound mind, and with fortitude enough to fight back against the haunted husks.<page>Aye! Too many, these unnatural opponents! We did hope Pharloom’s vast expanse would still possess some place free of that tainted thread. <page>Alas, so far we’ve encountered only violence and decay. We greatly fear the Haunting afflicts this kingdom all.
original_zh_text: 来吧来吧来吧来吧同志，如果你想拔出你的剑，你知道你面对的是珍贵的骑士加蒙和他勇敢的同伴吉吉。&lt;hpage&gt;“我不想和你争论，贝克先生，在这条明智的道路上遇到另一个有足够耐心来抵消幽灵壳的人是很有趣的。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的！哦，是的！这些非自然的敌人就足够了。我仍然希望其中有一个广阔的蓝色景观，没有污染线。&lt;page&gt;到目前为止，我们只看到腐败和暴力，我们担心这种痴迷可能会影响王国中的每个人。"

original_en_text: Poshanka! Edges sharp and senses keen!<page>In my land, that is the way warriors greet each other. For though you are a child barely hatched, you are also a warrior. Your stance, your weapon, your movements all proclaim it so.<page>I am a navigator amongst my tribe, and have been making maps of these lands. I can trade them with you, and supplies, if you wish.
original_zh_text: 博斯纳博斯纳！清晰清晰！&lt;page&gt;我们国家的士兵向我们致敬。你是一个新生儿，但你也是一名士兵。&lt;page&gt;我是一个部落的飞行员，如果我们可以交换货物和货物，他们绘制了这片土地的地图。

original_en_text: Rest below while you can. In the lands beyond these bells, it is rare to see such safety.
original_zh_text: 我尽可能多地休息，这种安全感在这些物种背后的国家是罕见的。

original_en_text: <hpage>Child, if your wish is to gain learning of this land’s creatures, why not hunt them yourself?<page>Ma? Nuu, herself to hunt? No, no! Is not Nuu’s nature to hunt, is hers to come later and learn. Such is the way of things!<page>But you... a predator! Know it from your smells can clever Nuu! So Nuu asks you to cut and record, so we both may learn!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我的女儿，如果你想了解这片土地上的生物，为什么不自己去打猎呢？&lt;page&gt;妈妈，你想追自己吗？不，不！不，不！大自然不是为了狩猎，而是为了学习。&lt;page&gt;你是掠食者！可以说它们是聪明的气味。修改并保存以了解它。

original_en_text: <hpage>Little pilgrim, these baths provide some respite from the dangers without, but there is a still safer place high on the other side of the Citadel.<hpage>A settlement has formed around the old shrine there. The bell housed within seems to provide some sanctuary from the dangers of the Haunting.<hpage>Your brother and sister pilgrims who now huddle around it would be glad of your company, I am sure.<page>Oh, how wonderful! Yes, I will make my way over there with haste... after I have bathed a little longer. I want to arrive fresh and clean to such a holy place!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;作为一名年轻的朝圣者，浴缸提供了减少外部危险的机会，但城堡的另一边有一个更安全的地方。&lt;hpage&gt;古代庇护所周围形成了殖民地，内部时钟似乎可以避免入侵的危险。&lt;hpage&gt;聚集在这里的朝圣兄弟姐妹将很高兴与您在一起。&lt;page&gt;哦，那太好了！我会的当我有灵魂的时候，我想去这样一个神圣的地方。

original_en_text: You hold many charts, Child Wielding Needle. You should consider trading for a quill.<page>With a quill in claw, your maps can be further extended from your own travels. Record enough and you may, in time, come to know this kingdom all.
original_zh_text: 有许多图表让孩子们思考如何玩针和使用铅笔。&lt;page&gt;通过将手柄安装在脚上，您可以将地图扩展到您的旅程之外。如果你有足够的资源，你可以了解王国。

original_en_text: Poshanka! Child Wielding Needle. You too have discovered this haven of bells.<page>For a long time, I avoided this place for sense of something strange. Now arrived, I find it free, and its few remaining residents offering trade and welcome.<hpage>I slew a tall creature above the town, a Weaver I suspect, though one twisted in purpose.<hpage>It was her you may have sensed. A formidable force, even aged. By voice and claw she aided, perhaps guided, the haunted thread that grasps these lands. <page>Weaver? Those vicious things. To our young we tell the tales, but had thought them long dead, only corpses bound in spires. <hpage>This one still lived, though if it was a Weaver, it was broken in a savage way.<hpage>Its own Silk was bound, pinned deep within its shell. A cruel punishment I’ve not before witnessed. <page>Even broken, my envy remains. A Weaver’s fabled skills... To meet one in combat means great challenge, and great pride in victory.
original_zh_text: 博尚卡！博尚卡！孩子们挥舞着针头，甚至这种动物也有一个避风港。&lt;page&gt;现在，当我到达时，我意识到这个地方是免费的，剩下的少数居民也提供商业和接待服务。&lt;hpage&gt;我在城市上空杀死了一个巨大的生物。它是故意扭曲的，但我怀疑那是眼泪。&lt;hpage&gt;你能感觉到，但你听不到。老年人也表现出了巨大的力量。她的声音和双腿帮助他们，并可能引导他们收集有关土地上鬼魂的线索。&lt;page&gt;剧院在哪里？很久以前，我向一个死去的年轻人讲述了这个故事，但他认为箭中只有一具尸体。&lt;hpage&gt;他还活着，但如果是眼泪，他会受重伤。&lt;hpage&gt;她的丝绸深深地绑在壳上，这是她从未见过的残酷惩罚。&lt;page&gt;当嫉妒被打破时，嫉妒就会继续存在。研发传奇的技术之战意味着为获胜而自豪。

original_en_text: This outpost that the shambling pilgrim-bugs have built for themselves... Dondakku!<page>Where are the armaments? The watch-poles? Never have I seen such a poorly defended encampment!<hpage>The pilgrims here seem to have no mind for war, Shakra. I suspect most depart for the Citadel soon after their arrival.<page>Hmph. If they persist in their carelessness, they will find only death in these harsh lands.
original_zh_text: 这个不稳定的基地是由朝圣者建造的。&lt;page&gt;你的枪在哪里？保罗怎么样了？我从来没有见过这么弱的东西！&lt;hpage&gt;这里的朝圣者似乎没有战争的概念，大多数一到达城堡就到达。&lt;page&gt;如果他们不小心，就会死在这片荒凉的土地上。

original_en_text: What’s this? The little spider climbs so high, here to stand aquiver at our startling Citadel.<hpage>Pale child, you return only to mock? Neither you nor your land have proven my match. This sleeping Citadel shall be no different.<page>Spider, dear. Why must you remain so distressingly... optimistic? The power that waits above, you cannot conceive, her who would snuff that hope with barely a glance.<hpage>Fool child. You still think me blind to the form of your liege? Having come this far?<hpage>This land’s grandeur, the devotion of its bugs, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is in the thrall of a creature beyond bug, one of that higher caste.<hpage>Whatever its desire for my Silk and my shell, it shall find I’m quite attached to both.
original_zh_text: 这是什么？小蜘蛛坐在一座美丽的城堡里，爬得很高。&lt;hpage&gt;他是一个蓝色的男孩，不是吗？你又减少了吗？这并不意味着你和你的国家将我视为敌人。&lt;page&gt;“亲爱的，亲爱的，你为什么这么乐观？“我不认为我有那种力量;它很快就扼杀了希望。&lt;hpage&gt;傻孩子，你以为我永远见不到你的国王吗？是的，对吧？&lt;hpage&gt;地球的美丽，昆虫的忠诚，以及围绕着它们的诅咒。&lt;hpage&gt;他的王国由一个超凡的存在统一，那就是蠕虫，最高种姓之一。&lt;hpage&gt;无论你多么渴望丝绸和贝壳，你都会发现你对两者都有着强烈的依恋。

original_en_text: Aren’t those solemn judge-bugs nice? They do not speak or sing, but I sense great wisdom behind their gleaming gazes!<hpage>Beware them, little one. Wise or not, their judgements are often followed by violence. Many of your fellow pilgrims have fallen to them on these great steps.<page>Oh...? But even the fallen will sometimes stand again, and all pilgrimages will be completed, yes? That’s how I’ve heard it!
original_zh_text: 法官的错误错了吗？他们不会说话，也不会唱歌，但他们能感受到明亮的眼睛背后隐藏的巨大智慧。&lt;hpage&gt;无论知情与否，他们的审判都伴随着暴力，这群人中许多朝圣者被捕。&lt;page&gt;是的，对吧？但有时，即使是堕落的人也会站起来，朝圣之旅也会结束。是的，对吧？实际上？我听说过。

original_en_text: These twisting tunnels hide many worthy opponents, but many traps as well. Watch your footing closely.
original_zh_text: 这条蜿蜒的隧道不仅隐藏着许多珍贵的敌人，还隐藏着许多陷阱。

original_en_text: As you requested, these pins will mark the travel stations within that hideous structure of steel and steam.
original_zh_text: 根据需要，销指定采用坚固的钢结构和蒸汽支架。

original_en_text: <hpage>Head fast for Bellhart, Pill. These lands are not for travelling without a sharp blade in claw.<page>Aye! Yes! To Bellhart, and my brother, I shall fly quickly-quick. If you pass that way again, stop and give greeting!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;贝尔哈德和皮尔这些土地不适合没有钉子的旅行。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的！哦，是的！哦，是的！哦，是的！伯哈特和他的兄弟们，我飞得很快。

original_en_text: <hpage>Who are you calling for, Shakra? Your voice echoes through the caverns.<page>I came deeper into Pharloom in search of my mentor, the greatest of my tribe. I could not keep pace though, and her trail grew cold.<page>She will have travelled much farther by now, but if I keep moving and stay vigilant I will reunite with her.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;这意味着... ...谁打来的？她的声音在山洞里回响。&lt;page&gt;我去灯塔寻找部落中最好的主人，我的主人，但他不能再走路了，他的脚很冷。&lt;page&gt;她现在已经过去了，但如果我醒来，我会再次见到她。

original_en_text: We must never let our shells soften, or Pharloom’s sharp teeth will sink in quick.<page>Would you duel with me, Hornet Wielding Needle? Together we shall sharpen one another’s skill.
original_zh_text: 不要让你的皮肤变软。如果你不这样做，鹰的锋利牙齿很快就会出现。&lt;page&gt;Marcel Niddle《Do You Want Me》你想要我吗？我们将共同努力提高我们的技能。

original_en_text: I’ll wish you success in your grand task, miss, but forgive me my sadness for knowing the cruel cost...
original_zh_text: 我希望你对你出色的工作感到满意。“我知道价格。"

original_en_text: Hurry it up, let us out quickly then! We got places to go, bugs to see, trinkets to pilfer!
original_zh_text: 走吧，走吧！有地方可以参观，昆虫可以看到，飞翔的场景！

original_en_text: Warrior... I heard your approach. Why do you come? Surely you’ve no desire to see these long collapsed caves?<hpage>The way was open, sir. I merely followed the path through. Am I correct to guess you were once a resident of these borderlands?<page>Aye... and glorious they were, in their time. Pharloom’s end approaches, but my caves, these caves, fell to fate long before. <page>Of that fair land, I am the last... Now to remain till the end, and remember the splendour that was...
original_zh_text: 我听到他走近了。你好吗？你不想看到那个长洞，是吗？实际上？&lt;hpage&gt;道路是开放的。我刚刚开始这条路。您是边境地区居民吗？&lt;page&gt;秋天即将结束，我的洞穴，这些洞穴，已经落入命运之手。&lt;page&gt;在这个美丽的世界里，我是最后一个。你必须努力到底，忘记荣耀。

original_en_text: Miss grown-up, you have hunted long with little rest, thinks Nuu.<page>Perhaps you are covered in too many juices, weighed down by beastly filth? Let sweet Nuu clean you, make you fresh!
original_zh_text: 陛下狩猎已久，休息的时间却很少。&lt;page&gt;你是一只被过多果汁或粘液包裹的动物吗？Sweet Noo会让您感觉清新爽口！
这太好吃了！我知道我爱上他了！

original_en_text: <page=M>We could do it. The spell can be cast, with enough power, enormous power, equal maybe to that monarch...<hpage>I cannot grant you mine, if it even were enough. My strength is still needed to face her below. Where else do you propose we seek a source?<page=M>From Pharloom! Ho ho ho! Remember, ours is a kingdom of wishes granted.<page=B>Pharloom was not born of that monarch, Old One. Power existed in these lands even before she bound them beneath her.<page=B>Grnk. Seek the old hearts of our kingdom and the last successors to bear their strength.<page=M>They’re still out there, hidden away, much faded by the pale one’s long dominion. You must make them stir.<page=M>We will teach you how, in the way befitting a Weaver, a sombre song to reach down into their memories and enliven them a final time.
original_zh_text: &lt;page=M&gt;这是我们可以做的口头禅，实用且强大。相当于君主吗？&lt;hpage&gt;即便如此，我也不会把我的东西给你。你需要强大的力量来处理这个问题。你认为我会在其他地方找到它吗？&lt;page=M&gt;“Farum”-哦，哦！王国是可以实现的王国。&lt;page=B&gt;这不是国王的错。这种力量在这些土地被控制之前就已经存在了。&lt;page=B&gt;边境！“他将寻找我们王国的最后一位长者和继承人并夺取权力。&lt;page=M&gt;他们仍然在那里，隐藏在苍白的漫长统治之下。&lt;page=M&gt;我们将教您如何在适合您组织的忧郁歌曲结束时激活自己。

original_en_text: Owoww, what a rotten turn! Keep your nasty junk to yourself, then!
original_zh_text: 哇，多么大的变化啊！把垃圾留给我。

original_en_text: O-hoho! Share some of your little clicky-clackies with us, help us fill our pockets. If you do, we’ll share a sneaky secret with you!
original_zh_text: 哦，哦，哦！分享您的歌曲以填满您的口袋。如果是这样，我们将分享您的秘密。

original_en_text: Miss grown-up, for your continued huntings you should climb up, up above here, above the tallest spinning towers!<page>Hidden in the dark thickets are strange bugs who call up dancing flames. So pretty! So warm!<page>But when Nuu tried to crawl near, the flames became angry and swooped all around!
