Poor Nuu was half roasted!<page>Nuu leaves it to you, miss grown-up, to climb up there and cut those flames apart. For our journal, such must be done.
original_zh_text: 先生，为了继续狩猎，我们必须爬到最高的旋转塔的顶部。&lt;page&gt;黑暗的丛林里隐藏着一只奇怪的昆虫。他称之为火焰。&lt;page&gt;然而，当他的妹妹试图靠近时，火焰变得如此猛烈，到处都是。诺诺&lt;page&gt;您已经接受了您的责任。站起来关灯。这对杂志来说至关重要。

original_en_text: Poshanka! Child Wielding Needle, have you seen trace of my master nearby? I feel she was here only recently!<hpage>I cannot say for certain, Shakra, though if she travels seeking skilled opponents, these steps would serve her well. The warriors watching over them are formidable.<page>True! Impressive guardians they are, fighting defensively and loath to leave their stations. They swing their weapons with a cold brutality that should not be underestimated.
original_zh_text: 博尚卡！博尚卡！我是芬恩男孩。你看到大师的指纹了吗？看起来我们刚刚到。&lt;hpage&gt;脉轮，我不知道，但如果您正在寻找经验丰富的对手，这一步适合您。&lt;page&gt;制片人！！他们是令人印象深刻的门将，防守很困难，不想离开自己的位置。他们武器的残酷性和残酷性不容低估。

original_en_text: Poshanka, Hornet Wielding Needle. For that is your name, is it not? I have heard it spoken in this land with reverence.<page>I had hoped you would accept my summons. In these moments one is good, but two is best.<hpage>I would not deny the wish, Shakra. A sombre ceremony seemed likely at this trail’s end, and I am sadly proved correct. This then is your master?<page>The fiercest of my tribe, here she lies. I called her master, true, but she was mother just as much, more by far than the bug who bore me.<hpage>Among the many marvels of this kingdom, she found a fine place to meet her end.<page>Ended by age... My tribe would call that shame, but I see only strength unbeaten.<page>Even as her shell betrayed her, she walked this kingdom’s breadth. It was her trail followed that allowed me to share witness to its dignity.<page>Hornet Wielding Needle, you too have journeyed these many paths, as my master before us. Join me now for her song-sending.<page>It is time for her soul to walk beyond her shell...
original_zh_text: 你的脊柱里插了一根针，对吧？我在这个国家听到了这句话，我恭敬地说。&lt;page&gt;我希望你能更好地理解我的话：一个好，两个。&lt;hpage&gt;路的尽头，有一种黑暗的良心，但不幸的是我发现他是对的。&lt;page&gt;我叫她老师，她也是一位母亲。&lt;hpage&gt;在这个王国的众多奇迹中，他找到了一个结束生命的地方。&lt;page&gt;我的部落称之为耻辱，但我只看到不可战胜的力量。"&lt;page&gt;尽管他的身体背叛了她，但他还是回到了他的王国。"&lt;page&gt;黄蜂倒下了，你们很多人都来了，就好像你们是我们面前的老师一样。&lt;page&gt;是灵魂离开身体的时候了。

original_en_text: From this safe vantage, I can keep watch for threats while I work. These lowlands are brittle and dangerous. Keep your weapon close.
original_zh_text: 在安全方面，可以识别对工作场所的威胁。较低地区脆弱且危险。关掉枪。

original_en_text: Have you tried your claw at the games? Rollicking good fun, don’t you think?<page>I wonder if I could score a little higher if I tried again...
original_zh_text: 你玩的时候戴指甲吗？你不觉得这很有趣吗？&lt;page&gt;如果您再试一次，您的分数会更高。

original_en_text: After all... it’s you that she wants... is it not?

Hoi! Magnificent! May our mighty contest of shells commence.<page>But a final note, nimble bug! If ever you run off course or desire a quick convene, simply play what music you’re able and my companion shall whisk you back to our starting line.<page>Now! The track calls us. Allow me a moment to assemble a course worthy to test our skill.<page>
original_zh_text: 这是一个很棒的技巧！兔子比赛已经开始了。&lt;page&gt;如果你想迅速离开地面并平静下来，就播放一些你可以播放的音乐。我的朋友会带我回到起跑线。&lt;page&gt;快点，现在！随着时间的推移，我们将组织有用的课程来测试我们的技能。&lt;page&gt;

original_en_text: <hpage>Hold your gratitude, little one. The dead are stirring.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;一个发烧去世的小男孩满怀感激地玩耍。

original_en_text: <hpage>It is time, shamans. I have the hearts, enough as requested. Enough to build your spell, yes?<page=B>Aye. We’re ready. Still, it’s a sad set you’re holding there, strength such as few shall ever know... and all about to burn for Pharloom’s saving.<page=S>I’ll warn ya, Old One, this first part might not be pleasant, but we’ll get you in there, deep as needed.<page=M>Now you’ve only to ready yourself for what comes after. Lay up on the dais and we’ll begin.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;“萨蒙，现在是时候了。我会这么做的，够了。一个咒语就足够了，不是吗？实际上？&lt;page=B&gt;是的，我们已经准备好了，但你看到的是一场悲伤的表演。一股几乎未知的力量。一切都被烧毁是为了赎罪。&lt;page=S&gt;第一部分可能会让你不舒服，但如果你愿意的话你可以参与。&lt;page=M&gt;我们必须为即将发生的事情做好准备。"

original_en_text: Charting the heights of this great mount would prove a mighty challenge. For now, I have seen only its base.<page>Once I have completed the search for my master, I would like to return and attempt the climb in full.
original_zh_text: 山的高度很困难，所以现在只能看到它的地基。&lt;page&gt;找到主人后，我想去一次真正的徒步旅行。

original_en_text: Worm-ridden caverns, shaking and unstable. There remain faint signs that pilgrims once travelled these tight paths.
original_zh_text: 这个被昆虫感染的洞穴很大，狭窄的街道上有朝圣者的小路。

original_en_text: Hooof... let us stop the duel there.<page>I... hoof... I hope in my excitement I did not... hoof... bring down my lance too heavy upon you, sister.<hpage>It was combat honourably conducted, sirs. But now, we should all of us keep moving. It will not remain quiet here for long.<page>Y-yes, of course. Our good works are never done, and we must press ever on. There is no time to waste!
original_zh_text: 我接到电话，要求我们结束这场战斗。&lt;page&gt;我的意思是，先生。情感（情感）&lt;hpage&gt;先生们，这是一场光荣的战斗，但现在我们必须展望未来。这个地方已经很久不安静了。&lt;page&gt;当然，我们的善行永远不会停止，所以请继续。我们没有时间可以浪费！

original_en_text: Don’t let defeat weigh on you, nimble bug! Simply step to the challenge. Let us soar swift together again!
original_zh_text: 灵活对待错误以避免失败冲突是一项挑战。他想再次在一起！“

original_en_text: <hpage>What cause saw you first ascend to this Citadel, Garmond?<page>Mine is only the most sacred quest, sister! One shared with my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>We sought this Citadel, to stand before its rulers, and demand their answer! By force if necessary! All for our dear village to whom we pledge our shells. <page>The fearsome haunting of thread, it overcame our fair folk.... We are all that remain, left to carry their memory, and the hope to see some justice paid.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;你为什么想参观城堡？&lt;page&gt;“姐姐，我的追求是最神圣的，我与我最忠诚的伴侣、我心爱的儿子分享其中之一。&lt;page&gt;让我们调查这座城堡，会见它的统治者，并找到答案。如有必要，我们将使用您的力量。亲爱的城市！我们将提供丝绸。&lt;page&gt;我们美丽的人民克服了线程中的可怕问题--我们想离开人民、他们的记忆，并以某种方式看到正义得到伸张。

original_en_text: Ahh, a fellow pilgrim. I’ve been praying alone here too long, with only the wind’s voice to join mine.<page>We’re so close. Our pilgrimage is almost over. Just one final, brutal climb, hm?<hpage>The Citadel is near, pilgrim. You must have had some strength in you. Few of your fellows seem to reach these heights.<page>Aye, the roads become lonelier the longer they’re travelled and the higher we climb.<page>It takes a lot of luck and a lot of faith to make it this far, though I’m sure I don’t need to tell you that.
original_zh_text: “我的朝圣者们，我在这里独自祈祷了很长一段时间，只有风的声音让我的声音更响了。&lt;page&gt;朝圣之旅即将结束，但这是最后一步吗？实际上？&lt;hpage&gt;很少有人能达到这个水平。&lt;page&gt;是的，走得越长，爬得越高，路就会越孤独。&lt;page&gt;到达这里需要很大的运气和信心，但我认为你不应该这么说。

original_en_text: Huu... You have done it... Huu. Huu... Hoof.<page>Never would I have believed, a shell so fast in all of Pharloom! Wonder of wonders!<page>You have proven it, nimble bug, fulfilled my wish, seen my pace matched and beaten, my limits broken wide.
original_zh_text: 电话来了，你做到了，你打了电话。感觉。&lt;page&gt;富勒姆的球不可能跑得这么快。奇迹&lt;page&gt;你已经尝试过了，狡猾的昆虫，你已经看到我的愿望成真，我的脚步再次团结起来，我的界限被打破。

original_en_text: Gurro! I have a notion for you, sister. What say we cross our weapons here before we move on? Engage in some rollicking combat together? Have no fear, I will not strike a mortal blow!
original_zh_text: 来吧来吧来吧来吧“我有一个想法，我们一起去吧。“我们应该一起战斗吗？“别担心，我不会打你的。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir knight, I am sorry... This was the only means to free you from the cursed threads.<page>Hohhhh... fret not.... little one...<page>Be proud... you’ve grown so strong!<page>Zaza... let us just rest a little... and then we’ll be away...
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;“对不起，奈特先生。只有这样我们才能摆脱这个该死的陷阱。&lt;page&gt;是的，正确的。别担心这个人。&lt;page&gt;你为自己如此强大而自豪！&lt;page&gt;是他！我们休息一下然后出发吧。

original_en_text: Nuu’s wish, it is granted. But miss grown-up will continue cutting creatures and adding them to our journal, of course?<hpage>I will. Knowing a creature’s form and habits is an advantage that can decide the outcome of a battle. Recording these details is worth the effort.<page>Oh yes! Is very much worth it! Nuu hopes you will share your new learnings with her often!<page>And take a gift to help with your huntings, miss grown-up! Nuu will add a pocket to your tool pouch, for the bringing of many tools on your hunts!<page>
original_zh_text: 诺亚的愿望将会实现，但女性会继续切割这些生物并将它们添加到报纸上吗？&lt;hpage&gt;我们知道，了解生物体的形状和习惯是决定战斗结果的优势。&lt;page&gt;走吧，走吧！非常值得！他们经常分享新知识。&lt;page&gt;我们有一份礼物可以帮助您狩猎！Net为您的装备增加了口袋，让您在狩猎时携带大量装备！&lt;page&gt;

original_en_text: Just a piece of a mask, innit? Don’t ask us where the other bits are... you’ll have to sniff ‘em out for yourself!
original_zh_text: 这只是一个面具，不是吗？你在干什么？不要问别人你在哪里，听听自己的意见。

original_en_text: <hpage>Nuu, I have completed your request, recording many creatures of Pharloom in the journal.<page>Oooh, ooh! Ma ma ma! Look here at the marvelous beasts and bugs, all listed so beautifully!<page>Miss grown-up, so many creatures now you have cut and beat and smashed! Their essences linger on you, their scents mixing with your own!<page>Oooh, ma... Nuu simply must sample it for herself!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;不，我同意了你的请求，并在日记中记录了很多人的存在。&lt;page&gt;哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！妈妈！妈妈！看看怪物和昆虫！&lt;page&gt;男人和女人，你们杀死了许多生物，杀死了许多人。你的精华会让你惊叹不已，你的香水会与你的香水混合在一起！&lt;page&gt;妈妈！好吧，你可以自己做。

original_en_text: You go on ahead. Zaza and I will keep guard here and catch any stragglers.
original_zh_text: 紫色和我来这里是为了保护和阻止幕后黑手。

original_en_text: Nuu understands, ma. To sup on such a fierce predator’s juices would be divine... but is not right to do. Such behaviour is unfriendly.<page>Nuu’s wish to see many fine beasts, though... miss grown-up, you have surely granted it! All of Nuu’s thanks goes to you!
original_zh_text: 我不知道，妈妈，我很想享受这个残酷掠食者的果汁，但这是谎言。“她不友好。&lt;page&gt;“教授，我希望看到很多美丽的动物，我同意你的观点。感谢您为我所做的一切！

original_en_text: I will soon leave these crumbling roads, but if you stop by the settlement below we may meet again. I pass there often to trade with the pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 我很快就会离开这条不稳定的道路，但如果我在殖民地下面停下来，我就会再次见到你。

original_en_text: Here, the trail of the stag touched pale... We hunted her, felled her, as none before were able...<page>Proof it became, of our majesty... mark of our divine right...
original_zh_text: 这里驯鹿的足迹已经变成蓝色，所以让我们猎杀它们并剪断它们。因为没有人能做到。&lt;page&gt;这是我们的尊严。”“神圣法律的象征。"

original_en_text: Beautiful this, a glowy little piece of somethin’. Stinks of them horrid crawling whisperers a bit, so might be dangerous. You should take it! Give us your rosaries and lighten my claws of it!
original_zh_text: 它们是如此美丽而明亮的小东西。闻起来很难闻，所以很危险。你必须接受这一点！“把你的念珠给我，点燃我的指甲。"

original_en_text: Ho, sister! A grand victory achieved, again. The haunted might of this place cannot stand against our pure hearts!
original_zh_text: 姐姐，这个地方的幽灵力量无法阻挡我们纯洁的心！

original_en_text: <page=M>This task before you... This is mortal power you would claim, the hearts of bugs. It will cost their last strength to save this land.<page=M>Even we have some hesitation in this. Despite our desire to touch their power, we’d never wished to see it expended so utterly.<hpage>Better to leave your land weak in wonder, if it means your shells, and those of your fellows, stay intact.
original_zh_text: &lt;page=M&gt;这就是所谓的人类的力量，或者昆虫的心灵。我们需要最后的力量来拯救世界。&lt;page=M&gt;我们想利用它的力量，但我们不希望它完全耗尽。&lt;hpage&gt;最好的解决方案是让土壤变得脆弱。这意味着您和您的伴侣之间没有任何联系。

original_en_text: Gurrrooooo! Gallantly answered, sister! Prepare your weapon!
original_zh_text: 来吧来吧来吧来吧勇气，兄弟们，准备好你们的武器！

original_en_text: Uaahhhhh! Miss grown-up... your journal is bursting with every sort of creature! Overflowing! Surely, we can call this complete!<page>To think, that such a task could even be done! So clever is Nuu, to have set such a fierce predator onto the work!<hpage>These vast lands hold so much life, and to catalogue it all has taught me greatly. It is an effort worth continuing even after I leave this kingdom.<page>Ooh ma, such a hunger is worthy indeed! You and I are of accord, miss grown-up, hunters both. Our methods are different but our appetites have become very similar!<page>Nuu has for you this token, a symbol of all your efforts, and a marker of your true nature. It carries with it her sweet, sweet smell!
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。哦，是的！陛下，报纸上全是生物泄密事件！你可以称之为完成。&lt;page&gt;当我想到这一点时，我可以做好这份工作。我们足够聪明，可以与这些邪恶的掠食者合作！&lt;hpage&gt;这片广阔的土地上生活着多种生命形式，对它们进行分类非常有用。即使你离开了王国，也值得追随。&lt;page&gt;我们都是成年女性，我们都是猎人。虽然方法不同，但胃口却非常相似。&lt;page&gt;“我创造这个符号是为了象征他的努力和本性。

original_en_text: All bowed before we princes green...
original_zh_text: 每个人都喜欢绿色王子。

original_en_text: <hpage>What cause sees you travelling these blighted lands, Garmond? Do you also seek the Citadel above?<page>Aye! But do not mistake a valorous adventurer for a mere pilgrim. Mine is a sacred quest, shared with my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>We seek that Citadel not for its gifts. Nay, sister! We seek its rulers, to demand their answer! By force if necessary! For our dear village to whom we pledge our shells. <page>The fearsome haunting of thread, it overcame our fair folk... We are all that remain, left to carry their memory, and the hope to see some justice paid.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;“你知道我为什么来到这片荒野吗？“你在找楼上的城堡吗？&lt;page&gt;哦，是的！哦，是的！但不要将勇敢的冒险家与纯粹的朝圣者混为一谈。我的使命是一项神圣的使命，它将由我最忠诚的同伴，亲爱的扎扎来完成。&lt;page&gt;找到城堡不是礼物，也不是妹妹！我们正在寻找他们的领导者并寻找答案！如有必要，将使用武力。以我们所爱之人的名义，我们乔装。"&lt;page&gt;我们美丽的人民克服了线程中的可怕问题--我们想离开人民、他们的记忆，并以某种方式看到正义得到伸张。

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Shakra. It was a welcome surprise to hear your call echo through these crumbling tunnels. How goes the search for your master?<page>Poshanka! It is a difficult task to track anything in these caverns while the worms ceaselessly churn the rock.<page>Still, I can see that my master has travelled here. Her path within this land winds strangely... I wonder at her intent.<page>It is no matter though. She can enlighten me when again we meet. Until then, I will continue in her shadow.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;很高兴通过松散的隧道听到你的声音。&lt;page&gt;博尚卡！博尚卡！只要蠕虫在岩石上摇摆，追逐这个洞穴里的任何东西都会很困难。&lt;page&gt;我看到老师们来了。走在地球的街道上。&lt;page&gt;很很高兴认识你，我躲在你的影子里。

original_en_text: Lockin’ us up in a place like this... what a shameful act!
Come now beast, let us hear your voice! Sing with me, sing with me, sing sing sing! Make caverns echo and great roads ring!
original_zh_text: “来吧，傻瓜，让你的声音听起来。一起唱歌。一起唱歌。

original_en_text: Very well, sister. Perhaps it is better that we all just rest here a little longer.
original_zh_text: “是的，姐姐，你需要在这里休息。

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You forfeited the race? It is true that sometimes a reset is needed, for the health of mind and shell.<page>But what say you now? Surely you are eager to return to the track. Let us soar swift together again!
original_zh_text: 这是一个明智的错误！你输了比赛吗？事实上，为了心脏和皮肤健康，重新启动有时是必要的。&lt;page&gt;但你现在在说什么？我想回到法庭。他想再次在一起！“

original_en_text: These black threads... they reach upwards with such a powerful longing. No wonder they can force themselves through even mighty stone!
original_zh_text: 黑线。带着这个愿望，我伸出了手。难怪他能在岩石上行走。

original_en_text: Us snitchbugs can wriggle into any place we want, but with this key even a big oafy bug like you can get through a locked door!
original_zh_text: 举报人可以去任何地方，但有了这把钥匙，即使是像你这样的白痴也可以带着它进门！

original_en_text: <page=M>Through their march, at the far border of these lowlands, seek the last queen of the ant hunters. We can sense her still... just.<page=B>In youth, her voice united the wild tribes. Gave them the strength to resist the pale monarch’s will... longer than most at least.
original_zh_text: &lt;page=M&gt;他们发现了最后一位穿越平原边界的猎人女王。但我仍然能感觉到。孤独，孤独，孤独……...&lt;page=B&gt;当他年轻的时候，他的声音比大多数部落更长地将野蛮部落团结在一起，或者至少给了他们抵抗苍白统治者意志的力量。

original_en_text: Let us head on, sister! Together we shall step forward under guidance of our faith!
original_zh_text: 加油，姐妹们！我们必须用信仰引导我们。

original_en_text: Needle Child. Hakk! I encountered a settlement near here, at the core of a vein of old bells. The bugs there were snared silent on a web of Silk.<page>It seemed the pernicious trap of some unseen predator. I left quickly, making sure to avoid the glimmering threads.<hpage>I passed the town myself. The thread sickness, I’ve seen its like upon the roads, but there it does not discriminate.<hpage>The curse that strikes the town, it is driven, focused. A cold use of Silk at a concerning scale.<hpage>If the path permits, I will investigate its source.
original_zh_text: 这家伙是根针，看看！我们在附近的老钟楼中心找到了一处房产。蚊子被困在网里。&lt;page&gt;就像隐形捕食者的死亡陷阱一样，你会跑到火焰前面。&lt;hpage&gt;我在城里走了一圈，在街上看到了它，但没有歧视。&lt;hpage&gt;诅咒袭击了这座城市，你集中注意力。这种尺寸的丝绸用于冷却。&lt;hpage&gt;如果道路允许，我会查看来源。

original_en_text: What say you, nimble bug? Though no reward remains to give, I would delight to soar together with you again!
original_zh_text: 速度误差是什么意思？虽然没有奖励，但我很高兴再次和你一起飞行！

original_en_text: Snnnrk... Zaza... Snnnrnrrk... Look sharp my lad...
original_zh_text: M. M. M. S. S. S. S. S. A. A. A.SNRK. Snnnrrrk，我的孩子，你很漂亮。

original_en_text: You haven’t enough rosaries for trading? The mad pilgrims in the overgrown village near here always carry some with them.<page>Will you take what you need from them? Leaving them to wander their path endlessly is a false mercy.
original_zh_text: 有很多经销商可以更换吗？在附近的绿色城市，热情的朝圣者总是能提供一些东西。&lt;page&gt;你能给我我需要的东西吗？被误导的善意会无限地纠缠他们。

original_en_text: Ho, what clever traps the red-shells lay out in defence of their lands!<page>Impressive that you managed to survive such a brutal blow. Your shell must be mighty thick!<hpage>Thick enough, though I’d rather have avoided the trap altogether.<hpage>I’ll let it be a reminder to remain wary, even when no foes are nearby.
original_zh_text: 哦，这是一个大陷阱，红哈米保护地球！&lt;page&gt;我很高兴能在这场艰苦的战斗中幸存下来。皮肤应定期清洁。&lt;hpage&gt;我想完全避开陷阱，但它太厚了。&lt;hpage&gt;当你周围没有敌人时要小心。

original_en_text: Well, what a pleasure. The road has carried you back to me.<page>Care for a few games of dice, while we’re here? For the same wager, a beat of rosaries? Just sit here beside me and we’ll begin.
original_zh_text: 哦，多么荣幸啊，这条路把你带到了我身边。&lt;page&gt;你想在这里玩吗？我可以用同样的赌注赢得彩票吗？坐在你旁边。让我们现在开始吧。

original_en_text: These docks, I thought them small when first I passed. Now I feel the structure’s true bulk hides below the molten lake.
original_zh_text: 当我参观这个港口时，我以为这是一个小港口，但我意识到熔岩湖下面隐藏的结构体积。

original_en_text: The bellways, gilded veins that run throughout the lands. Supposedly, they were once used for travel?<br><br>These pins will mark stations on your map.
original_zh_text: 地球的金色住所，钟楼。您在旅行中使用过它吗？&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;松树代表地图上的车站。

original_en_text: Again... to see... this land abandoned... betrayed...<page>...And a throne I could not sit alone...<hpage>You were mortal bugs, caught beneath a being pale... Devotion or destruction... these are the only fates my kind allow.
original_zh_text: 我回来了看，地球荒凉，被背叛了。&lt;page&gt;...没有王座，没有人坐在那里。&lt;hpage&gt;达洛格是我们人民唯一能承受的命运。

original_en_text: The world has grown much dangerous, but still we must learn! Cut through the black threads, miss grown-up, and hunt down every beast of Pharloom!
original_zh_text: 世界变得越来越危险，但我们必须学习！战斗黑线，崇拜诸神，追逐法老的所有野兽！

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you too brave these bogs? The heights of Pharloom offer harsh welcome.<page>So winds my master’s path, and so I follow. Yet true you speak! This is no place for me.<page>That Citadel’s shadow falls heavy here. I can sense its horrid bulk besides.<page>It is no surprise to see it choke these caverns dank and stagnant. That monstrosity of metal and stone cares not for the lands it consumes.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;沙库尔，你在瓶子里勇敢吗？我们受到了上面的热烈欢迎。&lt;page&gt;我主的道是可耻的，我将追随他。这不是我的家。"&lt;page&gt;我看到了城堡，感受到了它的规模。&lt;page&gt;难怪你会在潮湿、停滞的洞穴里窒息。金属或石头怪物并不关心它们吸收的地球。

original_en_text: My master would have found her way to these wilds, I am sure. Her warrior’s sense has no equal. Surely, I must be drawing closer to her!
original_zh_text: 上帝找到了一条穿过沙漠的路。他们的战士精神无与伦比。我应该离她很近。

original_en_text: Leave us to our noble hunt, sister! The Citadel’s twisted bugs still infest these gilded halls. Many are their numbers, but we shall see their life’s thread severed.
original_zh_text: 开始您的高贵狩猎吧！城堡里的昆虫仍然生活在金色的房间里。然而，许多人的生命线却被切断了。

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>The shell of the red-hunters makes for a vivid marker indeed.
original_zh_text: 您可以用它来显示地图上的重要地点和记忆。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;红色猎人壳是生命的象征。

original_en_text: How dank and fetid are these ancient roads, sister! My delicate whiskers are nearly overcome by the stench of evil in the air.<page>Woe betide those with delicate senses, such as poor Zaza here. The shadow of that ghastly Citadel falls heavily upon this place!<hpage>I’ve seen many mighty structures fall to decay in my time. Such places often become home to predators. Keep your sights trained on what lurks in the fog, sirs.
original_zh_text: 路又湿又臭！空气中的难闻气味差点伤到我柔软的胡须。&lt;page&gt;有些人对情绪很敏感，比如贫穷的孩子。这座可怕城堡的阴影就落在这里！&lt;hpage&gt;在我的时代，我目睹了许多美丽建筑的倒塌。这些地区通常是掠食者的家园。小心不要躲在雾中。

original_en_text: Hoy, you been creepin’ around this dusty old place for while then, eh? You must be carryin’ a lot of goodies with you! Let a poor old snitchfly ‘ave a quick look!
original_zh_text: 你在这个尘土飞扬的老地方已经很久了吗？应该有很多好东西！我们来看看记者。

original_en_text: I’m Sherma, by the way. Just another humble pilgrim like yourself. If you ever need assistance on the road ahead, sing out my name and I’ll be sure to find you. Me and my lucky chime are at your service!
original_zh_text: 我也是一个和谢尔曼一样谦虚的人，如果您在旅途中需要帮助，请唱我的名字。你和我的工作很棒。

original_en_text: We ain’t leavin’ ‘til we’re done pilfering! You be off, if you’re so scared!
original_zh_text: 出去快跑！“如果你害怕，就跑吧。

original_en_text: Please take some rosaries in exchange, red maiden!<page>Though in these dark times their promise of holy reward may never be met, still they carry with them our fondest well-wishes.
original_zh_text: “霍恩先生，我想换个座位。&lt;page&gt;在这个黑暗的时代，上帝的回报承诺可能永远无法实现，但它给我们带来了最好的祝福。

original_en_text: Gate, gate, gate! Nicest gate I’ve met!<br>Gate, gate, gate! Greatest miracle yet! Ha ha ha!
original_zh_text: 贝维！勇气！勇气！门！我见过的最好的门！&lt;br&gt;门！门！门！有史以来最伟大的奇迹，哈哈。

original_en_text: <page=M>Those docks, atop the lake of flame, they still possess the means to pass below, though you’d be the first in an age to dare the descent.<hpage>Then my path is clear. Remain in your sanctuary and await my return. If this land can be saved, you may have a part to play yet.
original_zh_text: &lt;page=M&gt;这条海岸线位于弗拉米斯湖的顶部，下面还有一条运河，但你将是这个时代的第一个挑战。&lt;hpage&gt;我的道路是明确的。“穿上外套，等你回来。“如果我们能保护这片土地，我们就可以利用它一点。

original_en_text: Ho, what clever traps the red-shells lay in defence of their lands!<page>I’ve narrowly avoided a few nasty ends myself. It certainly adds a thrill to my investigations...
original_zh_text: 哦，这是一个大陷阱，红哈米保护地球！&lt;page&gt;我差点死了，这让我对研究充满了热情。

original_en_text: Well now! How brilliant! In all these fine games you have matched my scores and more!<page>What wonder to be here, and able to witness a display of such profound talent.<hpage>Besting your scores proved an immense challenge, Seth, and yet you seem to have achieved them yourself with relative ease.<page>You flatter me! But yes, my own aptitude continues to surprise me. So many skills I cannot recall learning... <page>But do not underplay your own achievements, for they too are significant, inspiring even!<page>In fact, for my deep respect I insist you take this small medallion. I found it within my belongings, and know not where I came upon it, but it has a most pleasant sense.<page>Let it serve as marker of a friendship I feel has only just begun.<hpage>Thank you, Seth. I shall keep it close.
original_zh_text: 我没事，我没事！好吧，好吧！好的！这会很棒的！在所有这些伟大的游戏中，你的分数等于我的分数，甚至更好！&lt;page&gt;很高兴看到这样的人才。&lt;hpage&gt;塞斯，打破计数是一个巨大的挑战，但结果似乎相对简单。&lt;page&gt;他们会爱上我的！我对自己的才华感到惊讶，但我不记得我学到了多少技术。&lt;page&gt;所以不要低估结果。&lt;page&gt;“出于尊重，请保留这枚小奖牌。我在我的文章中找到了它。我不知道在哪里找到它，但这是最好的感觉。&lt;page&gt;作为友谊的象征，我认为这只是一个开始。&lt;hpage&gt;谢谢你塞斯，我会继续。

original_en_text: While we rest for the journey ahead, care to test your luck with a game of dice? You know how to play, I trust?<hpage>I’m sure I can grasp the rules quickly enough, sir. What is the wager?<page>A beat of rosaries on each roll. What say you? Sound fair? Let our worries roll away with the dice!
original_zh_text: 为什么不在休息时摇晃一下骨头来碰碰运气呢？“你知道怎么玩吗？实际上？&lt;hpage&gt;我很快就会学会规则。&lt;page&gt;每排都有几颗珍珠。你能听到我说话吗？小心您的数据！

original_en_text: Hrm...? Oh, hoy there! ‘Tis a pleasure to meet you here at the end of our long journey, sister.<page>I am Sherma, a simple pilgrim like yourself. What a wonder to find ourselves finally here, eh?<page>Rising at last to the heights of the Citadel and being amongst so many of our brothers and sisters... it is a blessing indeed. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice belies some hesitation in that belief, little pilgrim. To have travelled this far is to have seen the reality of this broken place. What do you make of it, truly?
original_zh_text: 这是什么？你在干什么？天哪，它在这里。“很高兴在这段漫长的旅程结束时见到你。&lt;page&gt;我是一个萨满，一个普通的朝圣者，就像你一样，如果我最终到达那里，你不会感到惊讶吗？&lt;page&gt;随着时间的推移，我爬上了城堡，成为众多兄弟姐妹中的一员。这确实是一种祝福。是的，这是一种祝福。&lt;hpage&gt;小小的朝圣者，把这种恐惧隐藏在你的信仰中。当我来到这里时，我看到了这个荒凉地方的现实。你怎么看？

original_en_text: Hoy! You again? This place used to be nice and quiet, but now we can’t get a moment’s peace!
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿。你也是吗？这里曾经是一个和平的地方，但现在不再和平了。

original_en_text: Ahh, sister! You have awoken. I hope that our powerful strikes did not leave you in too weak a condition.<page>We would even be willing to duel again, if you still have the strength!
original_zh_text: 哦，姐姐！他们醒来，希望强大的攻击不会削弱他们。&lt;page&gt;如果你坚强，你就会再次战斗。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir Guardian... I scarcely thought we would meet again after our encounter.<page>Hm? Apologies friend, I fear I don’t recognise you. And I’m sure I would remember such a striking figure!<hpage>...Pay no heed, sir. It seems I mistook you for another.<hpage>You are... a traveller through these quaking lands, I take it?<page>I suppose I am indeed! I was born into this world not long ago, waking beside a lake with only this weapon laying beside me.<page>Seth is my name, though I know not who gave it to me.<page>The custom of the newly-born is to explore the world, is it not? So that is what I have set out to do! I will rest here a moment, then continue my journey.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;自从我们见面以来，我就没有想过再见面。&lt;page&gt;这是什么？你在干什么？“对不起，我不认识你。“我会记住这样一位伟人。”&lt;hpage&gt;...“我认为你和其他人一样。&lt;hpage&gt;你是谁？我认为你是一个旅行者，在颤抖的地球上旅行。&lt;page&gt;我以为是他！“就在我来到这个世界之前，我在湖边醒来，手里拿着这把枪。&lt;page&gt;我不知道是谁给我的，但塞斯是我的名字。&lt;page&gt;孩子们有探索世界的习惯，不是吗？让我们从这里开始！我要休息一下，开始我的旅程。

original_en_text: Miss grown-up! What sweet surprise for Nuu! The world rumbles and the black threads stretch. Not safe now to wander.<page>But you! You are adult yes? Fully grown? Ready to hunt, no matter the darkness?<hpage>Certainly I am no child, young one.<page>Perfect then! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you would seek Pharloom’s many fabulous bugs and cut them.<page>Cut them with your blade! Cut them with your mature spirit! Cut them with your savage adult heart!<page>Would you help Nuu? Before it all ends? Could you take her scroll, and fill its pages with the learnings of your cuts?
original_zh_text: 陛下，夫人！这对我们来说是一个巨大的惊喜！在一个黑线延伸的世界里，行走是危险的。&lt;page&gt;但我们做到了！他们是成年人吗？总增长？“你准备好打猎了吗？“你准备好面对黑暗了吗？”&lt;hpage&gt;当然，我不是一个孩子。&lt;page&gt;更多在这里。你必须许个愿！“要做到这一点，你可以在灯塔里找到很多新鲜的昆虫并将它们切割。&lt;page&gt;你用刀切它！用一颗成熟的心摧毁它，考验一颗成熟的心。&lt;page&gt;你需要帮助南希吗？一直到最后？你能带一个卷轴来填写你的编辑知识页吗？

original_en_text: ...Great strides move the world, but small steps shouldn’t be overlooked...<page>...One mystery leads to another. Scrutinising the belly of the thing will prove useful...<hpage>The meaning behind your musings is as opaque as ever. Would you converse with me directly, sir?<page>...Trust yourself. And each other. The solution is always within grasp...
original_zh_text: ...你可以用一大步触摸世界，但你不能用一小步忽视它。&lt;page&gt;...一个谜团引发另一个谜团。我建议你仔细研究一些东西的顶部。&lt;hpage&gt;像往常一样，冥想的意义是不明确的。&lt;page&gt;...如果你相信自己，别人的反应总是在你的控制之下。

original_en_text: The creatures of this wood can disguise themselves amongst the many branches. Watch for unexpected movement and be prepared to strike.
original_zh_text: 这片森林中的生物可以躲在许多树枝后面。注意意外步骤，做好进攻准备。

original_en_text: Spider dear, what a delight to have you visit! It is oh so lonely here at the bottom of the world.<hpage>I cannot share your mirth, child. Your small rebellion above now causes this kingdom’s collapse.
original_zh_text: “蜘蛛先生，我很高兴你在这里，在世界的尽头，你是孤独的。&lt;hpage&gt;我无法与你分享你的幸福，这导致了一场小叛乱，导致了王国的崩溃。

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Shakra. I had a sense I would find you in these winding tunnels, filled as they are with the marks of combat.<page>Poshanka! You trust your instincts rightly. The red-shelled warriors who carved out these roads make for excellent opponents indeed.<page>I would gladly spend much time here, testing myself against their blades and cunning traps, but I must keep to my task. As should you!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;早上好，我相信我能找到它，因为夏奇拉斗争的遗迹堆积在蜿蜒的隧道中。&lt;page&gt;博尚卡！博尚卡！红十字会是唯一可以跨越这条路线的组织。&lt;page&gt;我很高兴在这里度过了这么长时间，试图与他们的剑和狡猾的陷阱作斗争，但我必须继续我的使命。“你也应该是你。

original_en_text: Hahhh... hahhh... oh, sister. What a toll it exacts on us... this endless combat! Certainly when peace finally comes, we will be in the right mind to appreciate it...<hpage>You place too much burden upon yourself, sir.<hpage>Though I share your ambition to free this land from its curse, I counsel you to rest, even if only for a short while.<page>Us, rest? While you, my dear sister, fight on so gallantly? Hahhhh... we cannot.<page>What would our old village think of us, were we to quit our charge? No, regardless of what you may believe, there’s strength enough still in these old shells!
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿！哈！“姐姐，这对我们来说是一个巨大的损失。当然，当和平到来时，我们会怀着正义的心感恩。&lt;hpage&gt;你给自己带来了太多的负担。&lt;hpage&gt;尽管我和你一样雄心勃勃，希望将这个国家从诅咒中解放出来，但我建议你至少休息一下。&lt;page&gt;我们休息一下，好吗？他怎么能这么勇敢地战斗？哈！不不&lt;page&gt;如果我们放弃进攻，这个古老的村庄会怎么想？不管你信不信，这个古老的贝壳仍然有足够的力量！

original_en_text: <hpage>Child, I hold the means to descend. Let us meet one final time, and quell this black ruin of our making.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我的孩子，还有一段路要走。让我们最后一次回来，让我们创造的黑色废墟安静下来。

original_en_text: <hpage>Learning about a land’s inhabitants is a worthwhile undertaking. Perhaps you are more grown than you realise, Nuu.<page>Ma! Such delicious praise will make Nuu shrivel! Go now! Hunt, and prey, and begin our learning!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;很高兴见到这个国家的人民。你可能比你想象的更成熟。&lt;page&gt;妈妈！这种赞美让我感到苦恼。狩猎、狩猎、教学。

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle. What do you make of this huge, groaning structure?<hpage>The scale of it all impresses me. If this is merely an outpost of the Citadel above, then their capital must be grand beyond measure.<page>Yokkala... Perhaps so. They must have prized indeed the work done here, to build something so vast in such a dangerous place.
original_zh_text: 一个孩子挥舞着针。您觉得这个巨大的结构怎么样？&lt;hpage&gt;如果它是一个更高的前哨基地，它的资本就会显着增长。&lt;page&gt;洋子先生，也许他很感激在危险的地方做了一些非凡的事情。

original_en_text: Seek swift to calm our crying land, Hornet Wielding Needle. And know that I shall remain here, to stand against these husks gone dark.
original_zh_text: 蜜蜂挥舞着针头，试图迅速治愈我的眼泪，我想留在这里与这个黑色的贝壳作斗争。

original_en_text: I’ll bring the healing supplies to the settlement with all haste, red maiden.<page>Fear not on my behalf. My fellow pilgrims are all praying for me, and thereby no harm will befall me!
original_zh_text: “洪女士，请尽快拿到治疗材料。&lt;page&gt;“别担心，我的朝圣者正在祈祷我不会受伤。

original_en_text: ‘Tis now my charge to care for those who stay here, including yourself. If I can aid you in any way, please let me know!
original_zh_text: “我的工作是照顾住在这里的人，包括你。“如果有什么我可以帮忙的，请告诉我！" "

original_en_text: Oh, what a shock! Discovered again so easily! Like a hapless little hatchling!<page>If you’re going to make a sport of tracking me, I’ll have to redouble my efforts at camouflage!
original_zh_text: 天哪，这太震惊了！您可以轻松重新开始！他看起来像个不幸的孩子。&lt;page&gt;如果你想把我视为一项运动，我必须采取更多措施来隐藏它。”

original_en_text: The jagged crest looming over all of Pharloom. Its whipping winds and bitter cold would pierce the strongest shell.
original_zh_text: 落基山脉覆盖整个法罗群岛，强风和极冷渗透到最强的盆地。

original_en_text: Ahh, the shining bench has risen for us! Pharloom’s kindness to we pilgrims is inexhaustible!<page>Please rest, red maiden, and fear not. Our kingdom watches over us all!
original_zh_text: 给我们一盏灯！我们不是无辜的法老。&lt;page&gt;“安息吧，红女，不要害怕，我们的王国会保护我们所有人。

original_en_text: Join your voice with mine, red maiden! You, me, and my lucky chime will sing together until the great gate opens!
original_zh_text: 加入我的声音，红女孩！你和我，还有我快乐的仆人，我们将一起唱歌，直到门打开。

original_en_text: Hrm? Hoy there! I was looking for somewhere to rest my weary shell and found this cosy station!<hpage>These lands are dangerous. I had thought perhaps some harm had come to you.<page>Harm? O red maiden, have faith! No harm can come to us on this holy ascent! We only need to keep our gaze upwards.<page>Isn’t this all so terribly grand? The great stone steps, the winds lifting us up like the voices of a choir, and just beyond it all is our pilgrimage’s end. The great Citadel at last!
original_zh_text: 这是什么？你在干什么？早上好，我正在寻找一个地方来休息我疲惫的身体，我找到了这个舒适的度假村！&lt;hpage&gt;土地很危险，可能会受伤。"&lt;page&gt;你在指责我吗？“我的红男孩，相信我。”在这个神圣的扬升中，我们什么也不做！小心点，朋友。&lt;page&gt;是不是太大了？我们的朝圣之旅结束了，我们走过了一个巨大的石阶，它像风中的钟一样将我们举起。

original_en_text: She and her like have red-rocky shells to protect their softnesses. Inside is very sweet! Very hard to crack them open though, so is best to wait. Is always best to wait!
original_zh_text: 她和她的同伴们有一个红石壳来保护他们的甜蜜。里面很甜。但是，最好等待，因为它很难打破。

original_en_text: <hpage>Gladly, Shakra. Upon this stone, let us test our shells.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;夏奇拉，我为你高兴。对于这块石头，我们将尝试使用贝壳。

original_en_text: Well met, sister. Though the beastly Citadel has finally been slain, still the lands caught beneath it suffer!<page>The evils long done by that cursed place have sunk into the kingdom’s very foundations, and now they rise up as a black sickness.<hpage>This darkness, it is a curse deadlier than the Haunting... a force from far below that will consume all if given the opportunity.<page>Hmm... Just so! And while wickedness still stalks these lands, our hornlance shall not rest!
original_zh_text: 野兽的城堡已经倒塌，但地球仍然在受苦。&lt;page&gt;这片被诅咒之地的邪恶早已埋藏在王国的根源中，像黑色的疾病一样蔓延。&lt;hpage&gt;这种黑暗是一种比鬼魂更致命的诅咒，一种来自下方的力量，当机会出现时，它会包围一切。&lt;page&gt;是的，是的，是的……...哦，是的！哦，是的！我们的邪恶永远不会停止，直到它覆盖地球。

original_en_text: Sturdy gaaaaa-aaate, I don’t ask you break or beee-eeend,<br>Just open a little for me, and my tall maiden frieeee-eeend!
original_zh_text: 我不会打你，我不会打你。&lt;br&gt;为我和我伟大的处女朋友打开它！

original_en_text: These waters, at land’s edge... and the shrine atop... our furtive escape... our brief retreat from rule...<page>So many moments spent simple... joyful... free...
original_zh_text: 这些水是地球的尽头，他们有牧师。我们走得更远，超出了规则。&lt;page&gt;它们往往很简单：自由和幸福。

original_en_text: What say you, sister? Shall we join together in valiant combat?
original_zh_text: 我说了什么，姐姐？我们应该勇敢战斗吗？

original_en_text: Oh red maiden, sorry to have lured you into such danger!<page>And those poor bugs, bewitched by the thread. No sin could possibly warrant such a fate...<hpage>Your pity is not misplaced, but better suited for another time. For now, you should look to your own care.<page>Ah... yes. I should get these healing supplies back to the pilgrims’ settlement above. My brothers and sisters have waited long enough.
original_zh_text: “洪小姐，很抱歉让你陷入危险。&lt;page&gt;犯罪的人没有这样的命运。&lt;hpage&gt;她的同情心还不错，但下次会更好。现在他必须照顾好自己。&lt;page&gt;是的，正确的。是的，治疗材料必须退回上述朝圣中心。我的兄弟姐妹已经等了很长时间了。

original_en_text: <hpage>The parasite writhing within my shell has a violent aversion to the void. <hpage>Despite the protection granted by the Everbloom, even now I can feel those wretched roots preventing my descent.<hpage>If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;寄生虫走在贝壳上，讨厌清理它们。&lt;hpage&gt;尽管有永恒的色彩的保护，我仍然感受到了贫困的根源，使我免于衰落。"&lt;hpage&gt;如果我想跳过地球并将其与黑暗的诅咒分开，我必须首先找到一种方法来追赶入侵者。

original_en_text: Many foes await us. Shall we duel with one another before moving on?
original_zh_text: 有很多敌人在等着我们，但我们必须战斗并继续前进吗？

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Nuu. You have travelled far from your lodgings, I was not expecting to meet you in these lowlands.<page>Oh, hello again miss grown-up! Yes, Nuu is not the fastest, but she goes great distances to follow the scent of learnings.<page>And look what Nuu has found! A great big beast, cracked open and broken apart! There is much to learn from him, so Nuu will savour it all slowly.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;没想到会在这个地势低洼的地方见面，远离你住的地方。&lt;page&gt;- 是的，威尔不是最快的，但在呼吸学习方面还有很长的路要走。&lt;page&gt;他还有很多东西要学，所以努会慢慢品尝。

original_en_text: With this quill, you can add any new areas you discover to the maps that you own. We pluck these quills from Golpeni hunted by my tribe. Their hollowed shafts make the perfect charting tool.
original_zh_text: 此笔可用于在地图中添加新区域并发现其所属区域。我从赫尔的恐慌中捡起了这支笔，我的部落正在追捕它。电缆是一个很好的绘画工具。

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle, how far our wanderings take us! The cold air here bites through our shells as true as any blade. Warm yourself by my lantern while I call. <hpage>Pharloom is a land of harsh extremes. Perhaps that is, in part, why the pilgrims have a culture of testing themselves against it so fervently.<page>Perhaps. When I first encountered them, I had little respect for the weak, rag-bundled bugs. Too cowardly to even carry a weapon!<page>But... Dondakku. Sometimes we judge too quickly. There is a subtle strength to them, though it is difficult for me to truly understand it.
original_zh_text: 孩子们带来了针头，我们的流浪者带我们回来了！冷空气流经我们的浴室。当我打电话时，他们用灯光给我取暖。&lt;hpage&gt;法罗群岛是一个残酷的国家，这可能是朝圣者如此渴望体验这种文化的原因之一。&lt;page&gt;当我第一次看到它时，我可能不喜欢这些脆弱的爬行动物。&lt;page&gt;更多... ...有时他们判断得太快，拥有难以理解的微妙力量。

original_en_text: Ahh, the caress of this warm water on my weary limbs is welcome indeed. As soothing as a psalm, haha!<page>Will you splishy-splash in the holy bath with me, red maiden? We can sing together to aid in our rejuvenation!
original_zh_text: 热水抚摸着我疲惫的手臂。它们很受欢迎。休息就像诗歌。"&lt;page&gt;红女孩，对吧？你愿意和我一起洗个神圣的澡吗？让我们一起唱歌，帮助您康复！" "

original_en_text: Want yer clicky-clackies threaded nice and tight? Old Grindle will do it gladly, if you let ‘im snitch a few for hisself...
original_zh_text: 您希望你们的关系变得更好、更持久吗？如果他没有直接向老格林德尔汇报，他会很高兴。

original_en_text: D-do not judge me a doubter! The Citadel is a holy place indeed, resplendent and vast beyond my wildest hopes!<page>But yet... the grand halls ache with silence, and I see suffering in the shadows wherever I peer too deeply.<page>Fear, and pain... why were these things allowed into our paradise? Have my brothers and sisters not yet earned their holy reward?
original_zh_text: 请不要认为我是一个怀疑论者。这座城堡确实是一个神圣的地方，雄伟而广阔，超出了我最疯狂的希望！&lt;page&gt;更多... ...大客厅里一片寂静。尽管他望向远方，但他还是能看到阴影中的痛苦。&lt;page&gt;恐惧和悲伤？为什么我们可以进入天堂？我的兄弟姐妹没有得到上帝的奖励吗？

original_en_text: ...Crossed weapons, sleeping of course, but shaped unlike any you’ve seen before...<page>...To travel underneath is one thing, but travelling up above may require a different sort of sight...<hpage>Sir Herald... It seems rare coincidence for us to meet in this distant land. Unless, perhaps, you followed me here?<page>...A path that meets itself is an ill portent indeed. Those who peer sideways know well enough...<page>
original_zh_text: ...显然，跨界车是为睡眠而设计的，但事实并非如此。&lt;page&gt;...发生的事情是一回事，发生的事情又是另一回事。&lt;hpage&gt;除非你跟着我，否则在遥远的国家见面似乎是一个奇怪的巧合。&lt;page&gt;...你的道路是一个坏兆头。我周围所有看到我的人。&lt;page&gt;

original_en_text: Nice little pair of rolly-rollies we got ‘ere. Sure to bring luck to any snitchin’ expedition...
original_zh_text: 有一个有趣的小预告片，为原告的冒险带来了好运。

original_en_text: ...The elements do not conspire against you. They have their own desires...<page>...When one spies a great peak, the natural inclination is to begin climbing...<page>...The little left-behind... you’ve decided, then? A companion for the journey...
original_zh_text: ...这不是针对你的阴谋。&lt;page&gt;...当一个人遇到一座山时，自然的倾向是开始攀登它。&lt;page&gt;...¿那么，你做出了什么决定？旅游公司

original_en_text: <hpage>Feel guilt at your absence, sir, but know the end was inexorable, the outcome set, whether you remained or not.<page>Do not seek to console me, warrior... This memory is mine alone... I’ll not brook your brutish intrusion...<page>You who dare trespass this sacred chamber, ready yourself... to see us, and know us, Verdania’s rulers, together in our finest form...
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我为你的缺席感到内疚。但如果没有，后果是不可避免的，甚至是致命的。&lt;page&gt;“别安慰我，士兵。“这些记忆是我的，我无法忍受你们的野蛮攻击。&lt;page&gt;准备好，准备好进入这个神圣的房间。你看看我们，你就了解我们。“韦尔达尼亚的领导人将以最好的状态与我们同在。

original_en_text: If you choose to rest here, I will watch over you, Child Wielding Needle. These charts require long attention, and my own sleep is far off yet.
original_zh_text: 如果你决定在这里放松，我会照顾你。这些画需要很长时间来照顾，而我的梦想还很遥远。

original_en_text: Beasty, beastly, big fat beast! Strong as a boulder, or a rock at least! Let’s sing together ‘til you’re released!<page>Oh! Look here red maiden, this poor creature is all tangled up in white bindings! Surely you know a song for unsticking such stickiness?<hpage>It will take a power greater than song to break these bindings, little one. In my current diminished state even I can not cut through them.<page>Well, worry not! If something is needed, the road will bring it to us!
original_zh_text: 野兽，野兽，野兽！像石头一样坚强，或者至少像石头一样坚强，我们会一起唱歌，直到我们获得自由。&lt;page&gt;哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！看，洪老师，这个可怜的小东西被一条白线绑着。&lt;hpage&gt;打破这种束缚需要比一首歌更大的力量，因为我的弱点无法打破它。&lt;page&gt;好的，别担心！如果你需要什么，道路就会给你。

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You abandoned the race? Surely it was only an error?<page>In the pursuit of speed all reason can ofttimes be lost, left in the wind as it were.<page>At least you seem recovered of your lapse. And surely you are eager now?<page>We must sprint on! Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 这是一个明智的错误！你放弃游戏了吗？这只是一个错误，不是吗？“&lt;page&gt;在追求速度的过程中，整个心灵往往会消失，就像被风吹走一样。&lt;page&gt;至少他从错误中恢复过来了。&lt;page&gt;我们要冲刺了，出发吧！

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle. These are stale roads, ill-fitted for warriors such as ourselves.<page>There is fair combat here against the roach-beasts and their keepers, but the air is sickly and the water writhes with parasites.<hpage>This environment is harsh indeed, though life seems to adapt itself to many hardships. Do you believe your master travelled these roads?<page>I had thought not at first, but upon closer search I found the fragments of a trail winding through these fetid ruins.<page>Perhaps she saw something here that I did not? Her senses are often keen where mine are clouded.
original_zh_text: 路很旧，不适合我们这样的士兵。&lt;page&gt;蟑螂和它的饲养员之间的战斗是正确的，但空气很痛苦，水中充满了寄生虫。&lt;hpage&gt;尽管环境非常困难，但生活似乎已经适应了许多挑战。你认为你已经走上了这条路吗？&lt;page&gt;一开始我并不相信，但当我仔细观察时，我发现废墟的气味中有一条蜿蜒的小路。&lt;page&gt;如果我的感觉是盲目的，那么你的感觉往往是敏锐的。

original_en_text: Hold there, sister! A great beast stalks this land, swooping and screeching like an ill-mannered tyrant!<page>Zaza has been following the creature’s scent, and now I’m sure we’re almost upon it! We’re so close my whiskers are bristling!<page>Such a beast is worthy quarry for the valiant, aye? What say you, shall we hunt the creature together?
original_zh_text: 巨兽跳到地上，像尖叫的暴君一样倒下！&lt;page&gt;扎扎一直在追逐这个生物的气味，但它很快就会消失。当我们走近时，我剪掉了胡子。&lt;page&gt;为了一个勇敢的人，这样一只野蛮的野兽难道不值得去死吗？是的，对吧？你觉得这些动物怎么样？

original_en_text: Many of Pharloom’s bugs have useful equipment and items to trade. It would do you well to keep track of their locations with this pin.<br><br>These pins will mark vendors on your map.
original_zh_text: 许多法洛马昆虫都有有用的设备和物品。借助虹膜监控情况是一件好事。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;酒吧代表地图上的卖家。

original_en_text: Basic tool’o the job, here. Throw your big needle and scratch shinies straight off your target’s shell!
original_zh_text: 使用大针直接从镜壳捕获光线！

original_en_text: ...Oh. Wyrm child. No surprise it’s you who meets me here.<page>Following me are you? Or calling me? It is true I would not have sought the lands below if not for your grand actions within them.<page>But now, having journeyed their breadth, what singular sights I beheld... Flaming lakes, tangled woods, caves consumed by sand and frost...<page>Remarkable things all, though given their void claimed state it seems you and I may be the last to hold those memories.<hpage>I cannot allow that outcome, Herald. I act now to save that place, both for myself and for those bugs still alive within.<hpage>As one who has seen so much, tell me simply, do you believe my efforts in vain?<page>Me? Certainly you can ask, but I cannot provide good answer. I’ve no mind for outcomes. Always my vision is too clouded by the present.<page>Only the journey... the now. For myself, that is the purpose, and as far as my sight can see.<page>If any other could come to understand that state, Wyrm child, I suspect it may be you... <page>Though maybe not yet, not this present, hmmm? Maybe in a future far, when your actions might hail me so again?<page>Alas, from these quaking caves it is past time I made my swift exit. Ours each may be long and winding roads, but I hope you too come to know the many joys upon the path...
original_zh_text: ...¡哦，魔鬼！我对此并不感到惊讶。&lt;page&gt;你愿意和我一起去吗？还是你在打电话给我？如果不是你在地球上的奇迹，我永远不会找到那片土地。&lt;page&gt;但现在，当我走过广阔的世界时，我看到了一些奇怪的风景：温暖的湖泊、交织的森林、被沙子和冰包围的洞穴。&lt;page&gt;尽管有这些惊喜，尽管你声称自己处于空虚的状态，但你和我是最后一个拥有这种记忆的人。&lt;hpage&gt;我试图拯救这个地方。这是为了我和生活在那里的昆虫。&lt;hpage&gt;你认为我作为熟人的努力是徒劳的吗？&lt;page&gt;你在干什么？你可以问一个问题，但你不能给出一个好的答案。无论结果如何，我的观点总是错误的。&lt;page&gt;据我所知，一次旅行，这就是我的目标。&lt;page&gt;维隆的儿子，如果有人知道情况，我想就是你。&lt;page&gt;这可能不是真的，但它不是礼物。实际上？在遥远的将来，他的行为将再次受到我的尊重。”&lt;page&gt;是时候穿越这个可怕的洞穴了。它可能漫长而曲折，但要享受它。

original_en_text: You would fight alone, sister? You would be undefeatable with me by your side! And Zaza also! You need only ask, and our hornlance would be yours.
original_zh_text: 姐姐，你一个人吗？“如果我和你在一起，你就是无敌的。我们的仇恨是你的，我们的仇恨是你的，我们的仇恨是你的。

original_en_text: ...Do they realise it would only be the beginning? If they cleave themselves free, they would need to find their way anew...
original_zh_text: ...¿你知道这只是开始吗？当我们摆脱奴隶制时，我们必须找到一条回头路。

original_en_text: My hopes go with you, red maiden. They will follow you into the deepest darkness, and beyond!
original_zh_text: “我的希望与你同在，红小姐。他们会跟随你进入黑暗的深渊。

original_en_text: Fierce red-shells nest across these wide caverns. Battle with them is most intense. Impressive are the warriors of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 较轻的贝壳在大洞穴中筑巢。我们与他们的斗争是激烈的。法老的军队令人印象深刻。

original_en_text: <hpage>Even if only your shadow remains, to release your mother’s grip my blade would see it slain.<page>Then why hold, even this moment? Surely terror hasn’t suddenly claimed your hardened heart?<page>Take the final plunge, spider. Join us in my drowning palace, and let oblivion swallow us all.<hpage>Oblivion may take you, child. My own life, I shall not sacrifice.<hpage>I have survived the fury of your land. I have borne its barbs and its blades, and I have seen wonder behind its dangers.<hpage>But always, child, I remain a daughter of Hallownest. And the void below all things, that darkness I will fear no longer...
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;如果影子仍然存在，我的剑会杀死她，并将我的母亲从奴隶制中释放出来。&lt;page&gt;为什么现在坚持？恐惧能使一颗冰冷的心突然消失吗？&lt;page&gt;愿你和我在一起，被遗忘在我沉没的宫殿里。&lt;hpage&gt;“我的孩子，即使你忘记了我的命，我也不会死。" "&lt;hpage&gt;我忍受了你们人民的愤怒，我忍受了荆棘和刀剑，我看到了他们危险背后的奇迹。&lt;hpage&gt;“我的孩子，我永远是肯尼思的女儿。在这空虚中，我不再害怕黑暗。

original_en_text: Oooh! Greedy are you? Mean to poor li’l snitchbugs like us? Won’t survive out there without our secrets, oh no no!
original_zh_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！你是你的老师吗？这对我这样的记者来说是一件坏事吗？没有秘密我就活不下去。

original_en_text: Our last race was grand, yes? But I see now I set too mild a challenge for one as spritely as yourself!<page>I prepared only to race, but you arrived bringing destiny! In you my wish may finally be granted, the barriers of speed broken wide!<page>Are you prepared nimble bug? The time is upon us. The final test for the swift and spry!
original_zh_text: 这个游戏真的很酷，不是吗？事情不是这样运作的，不是吗？然而，我发现你对人们提出的挑战既充满活力，又太温和了。&lt;page&gt;我正在为比赛做准备，但命运却给了我！在你身上，我的愿望实现了，速度之墙也被打破了。&lt;page&gt;你准备好了吗？期末考试时间到了。

original_en_text: Miss grown-up has hunted much, so soon is time for Nuu to venture out, she thinks. Keep your sights keen, for to meet in the wilds would be a delight!
original_zh_text: 据他说，现在是冒险的时候了，因为成年人和年轻女性已经在进行大规模狩猎。当你睁开眼睛时，你会很高兴在大自然中找到它！

original_en_text: O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!<hpage>Are you too a prisoner here, small bug? If we ally our efforts, escape could be made that much easier.<page>Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! Just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦，哦，哦！他们似乎有点不相容。&lt;hpage&gt;“巴格，你知道吗？“你是囚犯吗？“他们让逃跑更容易。&lt;page&gt;这是什么？你在开玩笑吗？监狱里没有盟友，当你去闻气味时，你就撞到了墙上！

original_en_text: A scroll detailing the scents and tastes of Pharloom’s various bugs and beasts.
original_zh_text: 轮子描绘了秋天昆虫和动物的各种气味和气味。

original_en_text: Miss grown-up! Nuu had fear that the awful rumblings of the world or sticky black threads had snatched you away from her!<hpage>I have survived, Nuu, and shall fight on while my strength remains.<hpage>The kingdom has grown darkly dangerous, but this hearth-home seems to still provide some safety. I suggest you remain here for now.<page>Of course! Nuu shall stay inside. The sickening sense of those twisted threads has spoilt the joy of my venturings.<page>You though, miss grown-up... is now not the perfect time to fully complete our journal?<page>The world-rumblings will surely have scared up many creatures from their hiding places! So go and hunt, and show sweet Nuu what you learn!
original_zh_text: 陛下，夫人！他担心世界的可怕噪音和项链上的黑线会把他从她身边带走！&lt;hpage&gt;只要我还活着，我就会努力奋斗。&lt;hpage&gt;这个王国变得越来越危险，但烟囱似乎仍然提供安全保障。我强烈建议您在这里住一段时间。&lt;page&gt;是的，不！扭曲的线条造成的不愉快感觉破坏了冒险的乐趣。&lt;page&gt;这不是写日记的最佳时机吗？&lt;page&gt;世界末日肯定会吓到许多生物，他们将无法躲藏。所以去打猎吧，向我们展示你学到的美丽的NO！

original_en_text: Why spurn a little duel, sister? Surely it would put us in good stead for the trials ahead!<hpage>If we were to duel it would doubtless be illuminating. Unfortunately, I lack the time for such frivolity. Farewell, sirs.
original_zh_text: 为什么要放弃一点战斗？这将有利于未来的测试。&lt;hpage&gt;如果你想与之抗争，这是非常令人兴奋的。不幸的是，我们没有时间讨论这些问题。再见，先生。

original_en_text: <hpage>Cowards. Here you hide, even as you cause your own land’s demise.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;懦夫在躲藏，但他们正在摧毁他们的土地。

original_en_text: Ka, va! Your shell is ridden with those gruesome maggots. It was a foolish choice of yours to swim in their sickly pools.<hpage>This was by no means desired, Shakra. For now, I think it best you remain at limb’s length. <hpage>I shall not abide this infestation long. By Silk or by rest I shall soon see myself cleansed.
original_zh_text: 等等，等等！它的壳里充满了可怕的昆虫。在泳池里游泳是一个愚蠢的选择。&lt;hpage&gt;莎拉，这不是我想要的。&lt;hpage&gt;此类袭击不会持续太久。如果丝绸断裂或折断，就会迅速取出。

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You seem to have lost your way upon the course. Surely it was only an error? You already seem recovered of your lapse.<page>You are eager to run again, yes, yes? Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 这是一个明智的错误！我想我迷路了，这只是一个错误，不是吗？他似乎从错误中恢复过来了。&lt;page&gt;你想再次参选吗？来吧来吧

original_en_text: ...One can visit the past, but then memories become contradictory...<page>...When the call rings out again, will you let your previous actions cloud your vision?<page>...By claw, by voice... History always rises to meet us...
original_zh_text: ...人们可以回顾过去，但他们的记忆是矛盾的。&lt;page&gt;...当你的手机再次响起时，你是否被过去的行为欺骗了？&lt;page&gt;...通过我们的指甲，通过我们的声音，历史总是站出来欢迎我们。

original_en_text: Oooh, ma. Miss grown-up, you deny poor Nuu? So sour!<page>Think of all the delectable learnings can we dig out of the creatures living here!
original_zh_text: 妈妈！你会拒绝穷人吗？太酸了。&lt;page&gt;想想你可以从生活在这里的生物身上学到什么有趣的东西！
爆炸性土壤（爆炸性地形）

original_en_text: But wait! Before you depart. Your exceptional skill requires an equally fine reward!<page>This shining shard of ancient mask is yours! Take it. Cherish it. And know, you shall forever have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 等等等等有才华的人在离开之前需要得到奖励。&lt;page&gt;面具是你的，你必须接受它，关心它，你会永远感激它。

original_en_text: This is a fine shiny-shiny, ain’t it? Those dirty old raggedies like to carry these around, and we like to snitch ‘em away when we can! O-ho-ho!
original_zh_text: 肮脏的老人喜欢戴它们，并且想尽可能地责怪它们！哦，哦，哦！

original_en_text: Ooooh ma, you make Nuu so happy! Hunt down the creatures of this land, and record them in this scroll!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的妈妈，您让我们非常高兴。

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings Shakra, in these drifts consumed by crust and sand.<hpage>These caverns have returned to nature, but I see evidence of bold structures buried throughout.<page>The shells of their builders rest in a tower above. A grand tribe they seemed, and strong fighters I’m sure. Alas, they exist now only as hardened husks.<page>Lament, Child Wielding Needle! We lived too late to match their claws.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;在这些被树皮和沙子吸引的游泳者中，有一个美丽的萨卡亚致敬。&lt;hpage&gt;尽管洞穴已经回归自然，但仍然可以看到隐藏在洞穴中的大胆结构的证据。&lt;page&gt;建筑师们站在塔顶，他们就像一个伟大的部落，我认为他们是强大的战士。“它就像一个壳。&lt;page&gt;可怜的针，你的指甲已经太晚了。

original_en_text: Don’t despair, pilgrim frieeeee-eeend,<br>Lift your sight and raise your voice!<br>Have no fear, pilgrim truuuuu-uuuuue,<br>Believing is a happy choice!<page>Hoy there! Aren’t these fields marvellous? And above us are the bountiful moors, where every pilgrim can fill their belly!<hpage>These hot fields are a wonder indeed, but hunters prowl the long grass. Playing your instrument will only alert them to your presence.<page>Well then, alert them I shall! For where many gather, great songs are sung!
original_zh_text: “别担心，我的朝圣者。&lt;br&gt;睁开眼睛，提高声音！&lt;br&gt;不要害怕，朝圣者Truuu@u&lt;br&gt;我认为这是一个幸福的选择！&lt;page&gt;早上好，嗯？这个地方怎么样？我们上方是一片肥沃的沙漠，朝圣者可以在那里装满他们的船只。&lt;hpage&gt;温暖的田野是一个真正的奇迹，但猎人们在长长的灌木丛中漫步，演奏着乐器，只记得他们的存在。&lt;page&gt;我会记住你。“很多人唱了一首美妙的歌！

original_en_text: <hpage>Some pilgrims have made an encampment in a safer place than this, high on the other side of the Citadel.<hpage>They would surely allow you to stay there, if you could resist causing them mischief.<page>An en-camp-ment, eh? Sounds like a jolly place for old Grindle! Mayhaps we’ll have a sniff around later.<page>That’s a good tip, that. And you’ve just done given it to us for free! O-hoho, head fulla muck you got!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;一些朝圣者在城堡的另一边扎营，那里比这里安全。&lt;hpage&gt;如果你和我一起玩，他们就会让我留下来。&lt;page&gt;夏令营怎么样？看起来像一个快乐的老地方Grindle！再见，女孩。&lt;page&gt;这是一段美好的回忆，您免费传承下去！我脑子里有屎。

original_en_text: Well well! Seems I won the last of your rosaries. Luck is granted to the faithful, it is sung, so I must be very faithful indeed.<page>If you happen on any more rosaries though, I’d be well happy to play you again.
original_zh_text: 你有这个！我明白了！我得到了最后一朵玫瑰。有了信仰和好运歌曲，我必须忠诚。"&lt;page&gt;当我回到罗萨里奥时，我想再次和他一起踢球。

original_en_text: <hpage>Already, I have cut down many of this lands inhabitants, but I agree, documenting those creatures is a worthwhile undertaking.<hpage>If time still permits, I shall do as you wish.<page>Ma! How wonderful for Nuu! Go now! Hunt, and prey, and begin our learning!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我杀死了这片土地上的许多居民，但我同意记录这些生物是值得做的事情。&lt;hpage&gt;如果我有时间，我会做你喜欢的事。&lt;page&gt;妈妈！享受它真是太棒了。来吧来吧狩猎、狩猎、教学。

original_en_text: Hoho, free at last! Locked up in here much too long, we was. Nasty place to keep a poor little snitchbug like Grindle.<page>Hoy, you’re smellin’ fancy! You got some pockets under your cloak? Hidin’ away some goodies for us to pilfer?<hpage>Beware your greed, thief. You’d be dead before your claw reached my cloak.<page>O-hoho! Never mind then, bully. Plenty of tasties lying around for us down here. We smells ‘em!
original_zh_text: 终于自由了！这是教育像格林德尔这样的举报人的好地方。&lt;page&gt;嘿，好臭啊！夹克下面有一个口袋，可以隐藏你可以偷的好东西。&lt;hpage&gt;贪婪的小偷，你的指甲还没碰到我的外套，你就死了。&lt;page&gt;哦，哦！很多好吃的东西在等着你。我能闻到！

original_en_text: <hpage>Your master has been found, Shakra. Your task in these lands is finished. Will you now return to your tribe? <page>I shall not return, Hornet Wielding Needle... I cannot. To leave my tribe’s nest-plains, that journey has only one direction. <page>This has always been our way, our long leaving, for those few who survive till age seeks to claim their shell, and those fewer who choose to send them on.<page>But these lands, Pharloom... My nest-plains I once saw so grand, now they become small. A place for birth, and growing, but a place too narrow to live a bug’s life full.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;“脉轮，大师找到了他。我们在地球上的使命已经完成。你想回到部落吗？&lt;page&gt;我不会回到巢穴。我不能，先生。我要离开部落巢穴，进入平原。"&lt;page&gt;我们分开了，分开了很长一段时间。有些活着的人想把尸体还给他们，所以他们决定把尸体还给他们。&lt;page&gt;法老的人民曾经在大平原看到过我的巢穴，但现在它们变得越来越小。这是你出生和长大的地方，但它太小了，昆虫无法完全生存。

original_en_text: This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... <page>Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? <hpage>It is a difficult thing to explain simply... Her strength was needed, what was left, to cut Pharloom free of its black thread threat. It was a savage act, no doubt, but the reason was just.<hpage>Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.<hpage>For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.
original_zh_text: 死亡似乎是最近发生的，但它就在这里。&lt;page&gt;是你吗？是的，对吧？是什么力量支撑着这个洞穴？如果是这样，将来会发生什么？&lt;hpage&gt;他们消失了，他们消失了，不幸的是，我的针杀了她。&lt;page&gt;“是你吗，小姐？“为什么？您正在寻找如此重要的东西吗？&lt;hpage&gt;你需要你的力量来消除黑线农场的威胁，这很难简单解释。毫无疑问，这是野蛮的行为，但原因是显而易见的。&lt;hpage&gt;随着时间的推移，洞穴看到了再次成长和繁荣的机会，但再生可能是一项艰巨的任务。&lt;hpage&gt;如果你想成功，就必须依靠像你这样的昆虫来播下第一颗种子。

original_en_text: <page=M>Hold it, Old One! That intruder writhing within your shell... <page=S>Our ritual ain’t gonna work while that cruel creature’s present. We’d be tugging at its memories as much as your own.<hpage>Then free me of the affliction. Surely you have the skill?<page=S>Not for this! Our power’s all of soul and that thing’s all physical. You’re gonna need more traditional tools of healing.<page=B>Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.<page=B>She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.
original_zh_text: &lt;page=M&gt;等待老人。凶手在贝壳上上吊自杀。&lt;page=S&gt;如果出现暴力生物，你的意识就会停止工作，你就会恢复记忆，就像你会恢复记忆一样。&lt;hpage&gt;为了让我摆脱痛苦，你需要这些技能，对吧？实际上？&lt;page=S&gt;一切的力量都来自灵魂，一切的力量都来自身体。&lt;page=B&gt;她寻求庇护，寻找巴尔哈特，据我所知，她被赶出了潮湿的沙漠。&lt;page=B&gt;他拥有完成使命的工具和在当下生存的狡猾。

original_en_text: When travelling in unfriendly lands, it is important to remember safe places to camp.<br><br>These pins will mark benches and other rest spots on your map.
original_zh_text: 在敌对国家旅行时，记住安全露营很重要。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;该条形图表示一系列地图和其他区域。

original_en_text: Nuu takes time with her creatures, she must inspect closely. Thick arms, flakey hair, delicate eyes... Nuu will inspect it all!
original_zh_text: 你必须花时间和动物在一起，仔细研究它们。粗手，脏头发，长眼睛，这一切谁也管不了。

original_en_text: Maiden, strong, wreathed in red,<br>Shield her shell, bless her thread!<br>She fights for us until the end,<br>Please protect my dearest friee-end!
original_zh_text: 戴着红王冠的女孩。&lt;br&gt;保护您的皮肤，祝福您的线条！&lt;br&gt;他战斗到最后。&lt;br&gt;保护我的朋友。

original_en_text: If chance allows, visit the tower above. It is an impressive sight, not overgrown by the crust upon these caverns, but rather formed full of the material itself. <page>If the old tribe of this place were able to guide its growth to such grand degree... then they possessed a power to rival even that Citadel.
original_zh_text: 如果有机会，您可以参观塔。这是令人印象深刻的风景。这个洞穴的地壳并不是郁郁葱葱的绿色，而是充满了物质。&lt;page&gt;如果这个古老部落能够继续发展到这一步，其实力将堪比堡垒。

original_en_text: These strange, shuffling pilgrims... In the camp below they were docile enough, but up here they seem to have lost their senses. They cry out to the darkness and attack their fellow travellers.<page>Yakkanesh! Keep your weapon drawn and your bearings true! The way ahead is winding, and to lose one’s way invites only death.<page>I am a navigator amongst my tribe and have been making maps of these lands. I can trade them with you, and supplies, if you wish.
original_zh_text: 这些奇怪的朝圣者撤退到下面的田野里并跟随他们，但在这里，他们似乎失去了心，攻击了他们的同伴，并在黑暗中大喊大叫。&lt;page&gt;他掏出手枪，指着正确的方向。如果你迷路了，你就会死。&lt;page&gt;我是一个部落的飞行员，如果我们可以交换货物和货物，他们绘制了这片土地的地图。

original_en_text: Ma, ma! Much hunting has you done, and so many sweet little creatures in our records!<page>Nuu is drooling from such excess of learnings! Please keep working, miss grown-up!
original_zh_text: 妈妈！妈妈！这里有很多狩猎活动，我们的登记册上有很多美丽的生物！&lt;page&gt;“女士，继续工作。

original_en_text: In my land, that is the way warriors greet each other. For though you are a child barely hatched, you are also a warrior. Your stance, your weapon, your movements all proclaim it so.
original_zh_text: 我们国家的士兵向我们致敬。你是一个新生儿，但你也是一名士兵。

original_en_text: O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!<hpage>We meet again, little thief. Are you familiar with this place?<hpage>If we ally our efforts, our escape could be made that much easier.<page>Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! You can just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦，哦，哦！他们似乎有点不相容。&lt;hpage&gt;“您好，先生，您知道这个地方吗？”&lt;hpage&gt;他们让逃跑变得更容易。&lt;page&gt;这是什么？你在开玩笑吗？他在监狱里没有盟友，所以他爬上墙嗅。

original_en_text: <hpage>Safe journey, tall bug.<page>This is Pharloom, warrior. Safety is a myth.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;早上好，一路顺风。&lt;page&gt;他是一位法老和士兵，安全是一个神话。

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Seth. It is a welcome surprise to see you here amongst these festivities.<page>Hullo, hullo! Yes, my wandering was long, and I began to fear I would meet my end in those sticky swamps below.<page>How lucky I was to stumble upon the home of these friendly revellers!<page>They said I could be a flea here with them, so of course I agreed. Seems as good a place as any to call home, at least for a time.<page>Now I just need to grow a little fur and sprout some wings, eh? Ha ha!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;早上好，很高兴在塞斯的派对上见到你。&lt;page&gt;嘿嘿，是的，这么长时间过去了，我开始害怕死在闪闪发光的沼泽下。&lt;page&gt;我们很幸运能够看到这所美丽的房子！&lt;page&gt;他们说我可以在这里制作薯条，所以我当然接受了。这对每个人来说都是一个美好的地方，至少在一段时间内是这样。&lt;page&gt;你需要翅膀和贝壳，对吧？哈！

original_en_text: Swamps born in the Citadel’s shadow. There is evidence the waters here once ran clear.
original_zh_text: 水诞生于城堡的阴影中。证据是水是干净的。

original_en_text: Tangled roads choked beneath bramble and root. The flora is often as deadly as the creatures who call this place home.
original_zh_text: 这条路充满荆棘和根源。这些植物通常与它们栖息的生物一样致命。

original_en_text: What say you, nimble bug? The test of endurance remains at your ready! Let us stride fast forth!
original_zh_text: 速度误差是什么意思？准备好考验你的耐心。“走，走，走。"

original_en_text: Zaza and I will fight through these cursed lands until every last one of the black-twisted fiends has been cut down!
original_zh_text: 我和我将杀死这片被诅咒的土地上所有黑色和扭曲的恶魔！

original_en_text: <page=M>Hurry, Old One. The ritual can’t commence while you remain host to that writhing root.<page=B>Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.<page=B>She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.
original_zh_text: &lt;page=M&gt;“过来，老头，当你熟练地弯曲根时，意识就不会开始。&lt;page=B&gt;她寻求庇护，寻找巴尔哈特，据我所知，她被赶出了潮湿的沙漠。&lt;page=B&gt;他拥有完成使命的工具和在当下生存的狡猾。

original_en_text: The red-shells, hiding through the fields, stalking the boney beasts. They are part of it, somehow, the life that flourishes here.<page>Even haunted, they seem to lose less of themselves... What anchor allows them to retain such strength?
original_zh_text: 一只红色野兽躲在田野里，追赶一只骨兽。出于某种原因，它们是生活繁荣的一部分。&lt;page&gt;即使你是鬼，你也不会经常迷路，那么你会怎么办？谁将拥有权力？

original_en_text: Oh, but of course I sing! I am Sherma, a pilgrim just like you. I hear the call of the great Citadel just like every other devout soul.
original_zh_text: 当然，我会唱歌。我是一个萨满，一个朝圣者，就像你一样，和其他快乐的灵魂一样，我听到了伟大城堡的召唤。

original_en_text: Hoy! Hoyyyy! You there! Get us out of here! Since when’s a little light thievery worth a lifelong sentence?
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿。我在这里！“把我扔出去！“盗窃什么时候可以判处无期徒刑？

original_en_text: Our great Citadel has lost its voice, and now the black threads rise up to tear its shell apart. I fear holy Pharloom is truly dying...<page>But I still have hope, red maiden! Though kingdoms may fall, life endures still, and we bugs can build our lands anew!<hpage>I share your hope, Sherma. Remember though that whatever is built next belongs not to the past, but to you.<hpage>Your instincts are strong. Let it be those that guide you, rather than any reverence toward a kingdom’s corpse.<page>Oho, you flatter me so! But it is my fellows who shall guide me, those whose voices sing out still, even in these ruined times...
original_zh_text: 我们伟大的城堡正在失去声音，黑线正在升起，打破它的外壳。&lt;page&gt;一个王国可能会消亡，但生命仍然存在，昆虫可以重建地球。&lt;hpage&gt;谢尔曼，我和你一样，但你后来创造的是你的，而不是过去的。&lt;hpage&gt;他有很强的直觉。不要害怕那些在地面上指导你的人的尸体。&lt;page&gt;你会钦佩我的！我的同伴引领我。他们的声音在这毁灭的时刻歌唱。

original_en_text: Hahhh... well met, sister. The task of hunting down these black-twisted fiends is no small one, eh? Still, we must not rest! Not while the cries of the innocent echo from every corner of the kingdom!
original_zh_text: 对，对！杀死恶魔容易吗？但你不能休息！当整个王国都能听到无辜者的哭声时！

original_en_text: Sign yourself as a snitch! And scoop up more rosaries from your bested foes. Just watch it when you’re snitchin’ that you don’t lose sum’a your own...
original_zh_text: 注册为举报人！玫瑰花再次被敌人夺走。当你说你错过了一些东西时要小心。

original_en_text: What’s this? The spider arrives at last, here to stand acquiver at our startling Citadel.<hpage>Pale child, you return only to mock? Your lands have yet to prove my match. This sleeping Citadel shall be no different.<page>Spider, dear. Why must you remain so distressingly... optimistic? The power that waits above, you cannot conceive, her who would snuff that hope with barely a glance.<hpage>Fool child. You still think me blind to the form of your liege? Having come this far?<hpage>This land’s grandeur, the devotion of its bugs, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is in the thrall of a creature beyond bug, one of that higher caste.<hpage>Whatever its desire for my Silk and my shell, it shall find I’m quite attached to both.
original_zh_text: 这是什么？蜘蛛终于成为这座美丽城堡的买家。&lt;hpage&gt;他是一个蓝色的男孩，不是吗？你又减少了吗？“你们的国家还没有被证明是我的敌人，沉睡的圣人也没有改变。&lt;page&gt;“亲爱的，亲爱的，你为什么这么乐观？“我不认为我有那种力量;它很快就扼杀了希望。&lt;hpage&gt;傻孩子，你以为我永远见不到你的国王吗？是的，对吧？&lt;hpage&gt;地球的美丽，昆虫的忠诚，以及围绕着它们的诅咒。&lt;hpage&gt;他的王国由一个超凡的存在统一，那就是蠕虫，最高种姓之一。&lt;hpage&gt;无论你多么渴望丝绸和贝壳，你都会发现你对两者都有着强烈的依恋。

original_en_text: Is hard work, learning so much from creatures, but for Nuu is very fulfilling. Now go and hunt, and prey, miss grown-up!
original_zh_text: 我学到了很多生物学知识，这对Nova非常有用。“我们去打猎吧。" "

original_en_text: Hoy there, fancy bug! How you farin’, now that the ‘ole world’s creakin’ and crackin’ around us? Desperately needin’ some supplies, I’ll wager! Heh heh!<hpage>You seem in good spirits, thief. Are you not disturbed by the great rending of the kingdom?<page>Heh, end of the world don’t bother ol’ Grindle none. We’ll just go find another one to plunder, won’t we?
original_zh_text: 多么可爱的狗啊！现在，一个“旧世界”正在我们周围展开，我们迫切需要物资。&lt;hpage&gt;“小偷，你看起来不错。“你害怕你的王国崩溃吗？”"&lt;page&gt;“嘿，世界末日了，别担心，你在寻找格林德尔奖杯吗？”"

original_en_text: <page=M>Our spells’re woven, our parts prepared. Whenever you’re ready, lay up on the dais and we’ll begin.<page=M>Best you don’t dawdle now. Pharloom’s time is short, and those hearts won’t go on beating forever.
original_zh_text: &lt;page=M&gt;我们的订单已经完成，我们的零件也准备好了。准备好后，坐在舞台上出发。&lt;page=M&gt;法罗的时间很短，他的心不会永远跳动。

original_en_text: No more talk, warrior. Permit me this final moment of memorial.<hpage>As you wish, sir. I shall disturb you no longer.
original_zh_text: - 别告诉我，记住你生病的最后一刻。&lt;hpage&gt;反正我不会再打扰你了。

original_en_text: <hpage>Another time perhaps, sir. My own tasks cannot be easily ignored.<page>Then I shall continue to train in anticipation of that future moment!<page>Having met, it is inevitable. Fate calls us to compete!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;“下次，他的工作不会轻易被忽视。&lt;page&gt;继续我们的旅程！&lt;page&gt;命运需要竞争。

original_en_text: Oh, welcome miss grown-up! Come to inspect the red-rocky creatures, like Nuu? We have found a very big one. Fresh, but not too fresh!<hpage>A pair of beasts attacked me here, burrowing through the stone with their spiral shells. I cut this one down, and the other fled.<page>Ooooh ma! Really? Nuu wishes that she had the pair! She could have studied much. Unlucky, to miss such a big feast of learnings!
original_zh_text: 欢迎，先生们。看看那些红石生物，比如Nu。我发现了一些很酷的东西。很新鲜，但不是很新鲜。&lt;hpage&gt;两只野兽袭击了我，用螺旋壳在石头上钻了一个洞。一个被剪掉，另一个被隐藏。&lt;page&gt;哦，妈妈！-实际上？我希望你有一对。我非常怀念这次学术活动。

original_en_text: We must press on... There is so much more... for us to do...
original_zh_text: 如果我们不前进，其他人就会前进。

original_en_text: I see much wasted effort in these docks. There is too much flourish to the form of it all. The ways of others are strange indeed...
original_zh_text: 这种形式有很多繁荣，我们消耗了很多能源。

original_en_text: Nimble bug! We both know our previous run was only warm-up, yes? Only a tiny test to prepare for the real match, Hoi hoi!<page>Well that match is now! A new track worthy of your skill, and mine. No longer merely a test!<page>Meet the challenge and my speed full. Let us break through our limits and see what waits beyond!
original_zh_text: 这是一个明智的错误！上一场比赛很火爆，不是吗？为真正的游戏做准备是一次考验，不是吗？实际上？&lt;page&gt;来吧，游戏开始了！这首歌配得上她的才华。这不再只是一个测试。&lt;page&gt;我们必须全力以赴挑战它。让我们出国看看会发生什么！

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>With these I often mark the locations of worthy foes.
original_zh_text: 您可以用它来显示地图上的重要地点和记忆。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;它经常被用来评价他人。

original_en_text: Hoi hoi! A nimble opponent appears. At last! At last!<hpage>I was intrigued by the challenge you issued on the bell settlement’s wishwall, sir, though having reached this place I wonder at your choice of location.<hpage>If you seek challengers you should choose somewhere less far afield. It is rare chance any bug would journey to a cavern so distant.<page>True, perhaps. Though once discovered, could there be a more perfect spot? This giant, boney body, so distant from Pharloom’s ails.<page>Here, freely, we can test our speed and our sleek shells. Here we may race!<page>You must be eager to step to the task, challenger? Fulfil my wish! Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 这是什么？我们有一个灵活的合作伙伴。无限（无限）&lt;hpage&gt;我对挑战殖民野心的高墙非常感兴趣。我们已经到达了这个地方，但我很想知道您选择了哪里。&lt;hpage&gt;如果您正在寻找竞争对手，请选择一个不太远的地方。到目前为止，很少有昆虫能爬进洞穴。&lt;page&gt;这可能是真的，但一旦你明白了，理想是什么？巨大的骨尸距离国家农场很远。&lt;page&gt;您可以自由测试您的速度和敏捷性。你可以在这里竞争。&lt;page&gt;挑战者？你想做这样的事情吗？希望我的愿望能够实现！让我们一起探索界限！

original_en_text: Uahhhhh... So close... Nuu could almost taste it.
original_zh_text: 是的，非常近，你可以步行。

original_en_text: Ho! Are you observing them too, hunter? The red-shells are plentiful here, stalking these vast grassy plains and the last of its bony beasts.<page>Compared to the caves below, this lush growth feels even greater. Have we crawled close to the source of their sustenance?<page>I must discover its secret! I will! By my father’s wish, and for hope that our dying lands might find means to endure.<hpage>Just be careful, young one. I urge you. Here you’ve reached the ants’ heart-domain.<hpage>There may be discoveries worth making, but a single mistake will see your shell’s sharp end.
original_zh_text: 哦，哦，哦！“你在看猎人吗？“广阔的牧场和最后一只骨兽之间，有一个红色的贝壳。&lt;page&gt;这种茂密的生长物比下面的洞穴感觉好得多。&lt;page&gt;我们必须揭露这个秘密！你必须这样做！凭借父亲的意志和希望，我们控制了死亡之地，并能够找到生存之路。&lt;hpage&gt;我们已经来到了蚂蚁的心脏。&lt;hpage&gt;你可能会发现一些有价值的发现，但错误会使外壳变得锋利。

original_en_text: Hoy! Did you see it, red maiden? The great gate heard my song and, in its infinite and ancient kindness, opened the way forward for us!<page>What luck for us to meet at this moment! We can set off on the great road together!<page>Or p’raps I’ll tarry here just a little longer. I want to sing a song of gratitude to this noble gate!
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿。你看到这个了吗？红老妇人，门，听我的歌，以无限的怜悯为我们开辟道路！&lt;page&gt;我现在很幸运见到你！我们一起度过了一段美好的旅程！&lt;page&gt;让我们为这座高贵的大门唱一首感谢之歌！

original_en_text: In these lands names are given freely, are they not? I am Shakra, Wielding Rings. If our hunts intertwine again, I will have new maps to trade.<page>Until then, farewell, Child Wielding Needle.
original_zh_text: 在我们国家你说自己的名字是不是太随意了？你是一个脉轮，一个戒指。当狩猎恢复时，您将收到一张新地图。&lt;page&gt;和拿着针的孩子说再见。

original_en_text: This place is holy, yes... but I worry at the suffering of our fellow pilgrims. So many are hurt or exhausted!<hpage>Your doubts and worries will not heal them, little one.<hpage>If you would aid your fellows, you can start by dressing their wounds. The simple rags found around the settlement will do for bandages.<page>Oh, that’s an excellent idea, red maiden! Normally I’d think a song would suffice, but... yes, more direct action is certainly needed.<page>And the Citadel itself shall provide the materials! Praise be to this holiest of holy places!
original_zh_text: 它是神圣的，但我们担心我们的朝圣者。&lt;hpage&gt;你的怀疑和担忧无法治愈你，儿子。&lt;hpage&gt;如果你想帮助朋友，就从治愈伤口开始。在膝盖上用一块简单的布作为调味料。&lt;page&gt;通常，我认为一首歌就足够了，但我需要更直接的行动。&lt;page&gt;堡垒将祝福这个神圣的地方。

original_en_text: Fear not, brothers and sisters! If we work hard and keep our faith, the Citadel will provide for us... I have no doubt!
original_zh_text: 兄弟姐妹们，不要害怕。如果我们努力工作并保持忠诚，上帝就会滋养我们。

original_en_text: <page=M>The hearts you seek, we can share their locations as best we know.<page=M>Three will be needed to construct our spell and draw clear memory of the flower from your Silk.<page=S>Bring us the hearts, Old One. Make’em beat, fierce and final. See for yourself the forgotten strength of this land of bugs before we burn those memories in its saving.
original_zh_text: &lt;page=M&gt;如果您正在寻找一颗心，我们将尽力与您分享这个地方。&lt;page=M&gt;您需要三个人来建立我们的咒语，并为您的丝绸花朵带来生动的回忆。&lt;page=S&gt;亲爱的朋友们，请把你们的心交给我。最后，我失败了。在保留这些记忆之前，让我们来看看这些被遗忘的昆虫的大地力量。

original_en_text: This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... <page>Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? <hpage>It is a difficult thing to explain simply... A test was needed, to ensure my strength before a greater challenge soon to come.<hpage>Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.<hpage>For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.
original_zh_text: 这只巨型蚂蚁似乎最近死了，但它就在这里。&lt;page&gt;是你吗？是的，对吧？是什么力量支撑着这个洞穴？如果是这样，将来会发生什么？&lt;hpage&gt;他们消失了，他们消失了，不幸的是，我的针杀了她。&lt;page&gt;“是你吗，小姐？“为什么？您正在寻找如此重要的东西吗？&lt;hpage&gt;这很难简单解释，但面对我们面临的巨大挑战，我们需要测试来展示我们的实力。&lt;hpage&gt;随着时间的推移，洞穴看到了再次成长和繁荣的机会，但再生可能是一项艰巨的任务。&lt;hpage&gt;如果你想成功，就必须依靠像你这样的昆虫来播下第一颗种子。

original_en_text: Burrowed paths of the red-shells. Their stores and shrines are frequent throughout. These tunnels must grant them swift passage about the fields below.
original_zh_text: 洪北路上的洞穴里点缀着商店和神社，隧道很快穿过下面的田野。

original_en_text: <hpage>If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;如果我想跳过地球并将其与黑暗的诅咒分开，我必须首先找到一种方法来追赶入侵者。

original_en_text: So I am freed, despite no request of mine for aid.<hpage>And I do not ask gratitude. The key merely fit the lock. If you choose, stay in here and wait till your shell hardens to crust.<page>No. I shall depart shortly. With my way clear, my wish again propels me, though I tried to avoid it.<hpage>Then safe journey, tall bug. I’ll not pry further. Clearly you bear your own burden.
original_zh_text: 我在没有寻求帮助的情况下被释放。&lt;hpage&gt;这把钥匙只能打开锁，您必须留在这里直到水槽关闭。&lt;page&gt;我的路很明确，我试图避免它，但我的愿望把我带回来了。&lt;hpage&gt;很棒的旅行，可爱的昆虫！我不会再学习了。你的体重扛在肩上。

original_en_text: Mm, mrm? Oh, hoy again!<page>I hadn’t meant to drop off like that. It’s hard to stay awake in such a cosy place, isn’t it?
original_zh_text: 这是什么？嘿，他们回来了！&lt;page&gt;在这样舒适的地方醒来很难，不是吗？

original_en_text: Oh hear me pray, please hear me sing,<br>My path’s ahead, but here’s the thing,<br>I can’t squeeze past, o gate of bone,<br>So please wake up, and help...oh?
original_zh_text: 听我的祈祷，听我的歌曲。&lt;br&gt;我的路就在我面前，但他就在那里。&lt;br&gt;你无法从骨门进入。&lt;br&gt;“起来帮助我。“实际上？

original_en_text: <page=M>Up top of those caves lost to wind and sand rests a crusted old ruler, a once great warrior king.<page=M>In their prime, they and their order held half of Pharloom under hardened claw. Some bugs relished that strength. Most lived in fear of it.
original_zh_text: &lt;page=M&gt;在布满沙子的洞穴顶部，有一位疲惫不堪的老君主，他曾是一位伟大的士兵和国王。&lt;page=M&gt;在鼎盛时期，他们和他们的指挥官用爪子控制了半个帕拉姆。昆虫喜欢这种能量。大多数人生活在恐惧和恐怖中。

original_en_text: Oooh ma! Sweet surprise for Nuu! You are adult, yes? Fully grown? Ready to hunt?<hpage>Certainly I am no child, young one.<page>Perfect then! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you would seek Pharloom’s many fabulous bugs and cut them.<page>Cut them with your blade! Cut them with your mature spirit! Cut them with your savage adult heart!<page>Would you help Nuu? Could you take her scroll, and fill its pages with the learnings of your cuts?
original_zh_text: 哦，妈妈！联合N.惊喜是伟大的。你是成年人了吧？实际上？总增长？“你准备好狩猎了吗？”»&lt;hpage&gt;当然，我不是一个孩子。&lt;page&gt;更多在这里。你必须许个愿！“要做到这一点，你可以在灯塔里找到很多新鲜的昆虫并将它们切割。&lt;page&gt;你用刀切它！用一颗成熟的心摧毁它，考验一颗成熟的心。&lt;page&gt;你需要帮助南希吗？你能带一个卷轴来填写你的编辑知识页吗？

original_en_text: Guurroooo! Scoundrel! Fiend! Who dares wake brave Garmond from his well needed kip?<hpage>I’ve no intent to disturb, sir bug. I am merely passing these towers and sought to better understand the lay of the place.<page>Hmmph! Knowing the battlefield? A warrior’s reason! Just look at you! Your stance and blade, almost alone they declare a fight.<page>As the bravest of knights, if direct challenge were offered, honour would see noble Garmond accept!<page>Fortunate that seems not your intent. In truth, I’m still sleeping off something of an altercation myself. Had our meeting called for a knightly duel, you’d not have had the luck to behold my finest form.
original_zh_text: 大师！天啊天哪！恶魔！谁来把勇敢的哈蒙德从他迫切需要的睡眠中叫醒？&lt;hpage&gt;恩塞托先生，我没有打扰地穿过塔楼，以便更好地了解这个地方。&lt;page&gt;我的天啊！你了解战场吗？但士兵是有理由的，他的立场和刀刃是宣战的唯一理由。&lt;page&gt;作为最勇敢的骑士，如果他曾经挑战过他，哈蒙德勋爵一定会同意的！&lt;page&gt;愤怒不是你的意图，也不是你的意图。事实上，我在这次讨论中睡着了。如果这是一场骑士决斗，你不会更好地看到我。

original_en_text: Hoy then, what’s a fancy-prancy bug like you creepin’ into Grindle’s cosy little nook for?<page>Heard we had some nice stuff, did ya? O-hoho! All kinds of tasty goodies find their way here, that’s for sure.<hpage>I care little for how you procured your goods, thief. If you have something worth trading, I may part with my rosaries.<page>Well, we never say no to a fair swap, heh heh! Now take a look at what we’s got...
original_zh_text: 嘿，你觉得怎么样？当你爬进格林德尔舒适的角落时，这只奇妙的昆虫是什么样子？&lt;page&gt;我听说你有一个好儿子，不是吗？真的吗？哦，哦，哦！在这里，你会发现很多美味的食物。&lt;hpage&gt;无论你怎么买，如果有什么值得交换的东西，你都可以扔掉。&lt;page&gt;没有人对公平贸易说“不”。让我们看看我们有什么。

original_en_text: Now I shall remain, and train. And know! Though I have no more rewards to give, you are welcome to grace my track, as many times as you wish.
original_zh_text: 我会这么做的，我知道。没有什么比这更好的了，但如果您愿意，请加入我们。

original_en_text: The sharp-faced bugs of these drizzled caves love to swoop and play, don’t they? If only I could understand their beautiful language...
original_zh_text: 雾洞里的酸性昆虫喜欢潜水和玩耍，不是吗？实际上？我希望我能理解你美丽的语言。

original_en_text: ...At the bottom of a well, you can only look up. The past is hidden from those who look forward...<page>...Those echoes may guide you still. Yes, that’s true. For the kind-hearted, a weapon can also be a friend...<page>...You’re so eager to follow in her footsteps. But what are you leaving for those who come next?
original_zh_text: ...井深处，你只能看到那些看到未来的人所隐藏的过去。&lt;page&gt;...这种感觉会感动你。是的，是的。好人可以有枪当朋友。&lt;page&gt;...他真的很想追随他的脚步。你想为下一个留下什么？

original_en_text: Hoof... Always you impress... nimble bug...<page>As many times as you may, let us speed forth! Gladly will I strive to match your spritely grace.
original_zh_text: 我感觉到了。你总是令人印象深刻，这是一种速度非常快的昆虫。&lt;page&gt;尽快。我想和你一样好。
