original_en_text: This poor traveller finds her resolve waning. When I first greeted her, her voice was so hoarse I scarcely heard it!<page>’Tis no cause for worry, though. My song will lift her from her torpor! Join your voice with mine, red maiden, and together we shall rouse our fellow pilgrim!
original_zh_text: 可怜的旅行者注意到他的决心已经减弱。当我第一次和她打招呼时，我几乎听不到她的声音。&lt;page&gt;别担心，我的音乐会会让你免于瘫痪。红女人，你和我，我们将唤醒朝圣者！

original_en_text: In time, even these great steps will be swept away by the sands. Nothing is immovable.
original_zh_text: 随着时间的推移，就连这把巨大的梯子也会被拖进沙子里。

original_en_text: Ooh ma ma! Look here, miss grown-up! Very fascinating creature here, all dead in bits now, but still good!<page>She takes the shape of the woods for her body, and her hair like bitter leaves! Clever, thinks Nuu!<hpage>This creature staked its territory here and attacked as I passed through.<hpage>You should not linger long. Her tribe remains hidden amongst the branches, disguised and waiting to strike.<page>Oooh! So the cutting-up was done by you? Nuu gives her warm thanks! Now Nuu can inspect this creature well, all its gooey insides and crunchy shell!
original_zh_text: 妈妈，先生，大家。“这里的迷人生物已经死了，但它们还好好的！"&lt;page&gt;你的身体像森林，你的头发像落叶。&lt;hpage&gt;这些生物在这里开辟领地，当它们经过时，就会发起攻击。&lt;hpage&gt;他的部落躲在树枝之间，等待着受到攻击。&lt;page&gt;哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！你剪了吗？感谢您的到来！来自地幔的光线使我们能够很好地研究这种生物，包括它粘性的内部空间和脆弱的外壳。

original_en_text: {0} out of {1} PS4™ save files were successfully imported.<br>Clear save slots to import PS4™ save files.
original_zh_text: {0}离我远点！{1}PS4 TM保存的文件已被导入。&lt;br&gt;清理日志位置并导入PS4日志文件。

original_en_text: Change language in the Main Menu
Reduce to improve performance on lower end systems.
Higher frame rate mode for displays that support 120Hz. Resolution will be reduced.
original_zh_text: 支持120 Hz显示器的高频帧率模式，从而降低分辨率。

original_en_text: Adjust slider until the frames touch the edges of the screen
original_zh_text: 调整鼠标，直到边界接触屏幕边缘。
死亡是永恒的，死亡是永恒的。

original_en_text: Prevents screen tearing. Leave on for a smoother experience.
original_zh_text: 避免屏幕损坏，享受流畅的体验。

original_en_text: Limit maximum frame rate for a consistent experience.
original_zh_text: 限制最大帧率以获得持久体验。

original_en_text: Show names of Kickstarter backers alongside their contributions.
original_zh_text: 查看Kickstarter赞助商的姓名和贡献。

original_en_text: Adjust the scale of the HUD. Will reset on game exit if set to ‘Off’.
original_zh_text: 如果您将HUD的大小更改为“Off”，它将在游戏结束时重置。

original_en_text: This game saves data automatically at certain points.<br>Please do not turn off the software while this symbol is displayed.
original_zh_text: 游戏自动存储特定积分的数据。&lt;br&gt;在看到符号之前，不要关闭程序。

original_en_text: Hear the hero’s voice during exploration and combat.
original_zh_text: 探索并聆听战斗中英雄的声音。

original_en_text: Reduce to improve performance on lower end systems.
Failed to find compatible save data.
{0} out of {1} PS4™ save files were successfully imported.
original_zh_text: {0}离我远点！{1}PS4 TM保存的文件已被导入。

original_en_text: Reduces colour banding, but may effect performance on lower end systems.
original_zh_text: 这会减少磁带的大小，但可能会降低系统性能。
所取得的进展一直保持着。

original_en_text: Press a button on the controller or connect a new controller to activate
original_zh_text: 单击“驱动程序”按钮，或连接新驱动程序并激活它。

original_en_text: Adjust brightness to your desired level.
original_zh_text: 将亮度调整到所需的水平。

original_en_text: Continue playing without a user?<br>Your progress will not be saved
original_zh_text: 不允许用户玩吗？&lt;br&gt;您的进度将不会被保存。

original_en_text: Show in-game messages when completing a feat.
original_zh_text: 游戏结束后，您将收到一条消息。

original_en_text: Show in-game messages when earning an achievement.
original_zh_text: 完成此结果后，您会在游戏中看到一条消息。

original_en_text: Oi! I’m wishin’ for that bothersome bellringer! That you readin’ this? Then head up top beside the shrine. Might be we two should have a little chat...
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿。我喜欢按这个无聊的钟。你读过吗？我们在寺庙里，可以互相交谈。

original_en_text: One part of the Threefold Melody, entrusted to the industrious Architects.
original_zh_text: 三重旋律的一部分留给了勤奋的建筑师。

original_en_text: The Pollen Heart has been claimed from Nyleth.
original_zh_text: 花粉核是从尼罗河中收集的。

original_en_text: Return to the Citadel’s Stage, beside the Whispering Vaults.
original_zh_text: 回到保险箱旁边的钥匙。

original_en_text: That the age may pass, this shroom its witness.
original_zh_text: 时间不多了，这就是证据。

original_en_text: Flintbeetles have awoken in the Marrow. The gems that grow in their bellies provide a pure, constant warmth. Harvest these treasures and be rewarded!
original_zh_text: 胃中生长的珍珠提供清洁且持久的卡路里。寻找宝藏并获得奖励。

original_en_text: Confront the one who haunts the lands of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 让我们面对那些在农场受苦的人。

original_en_text: Find aid in Deep Docks to access its diving bell and descend beneath Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 在深水码头寻求帮助，进入潜水钟，然后下到灯塔下。

original_en_text: If the world is truly ending, I would test my pin in combat one last time. Come to my home at border’s edge and accept my challenge!
original_zh_text: 如果世界真的毁灭了，我会在最后的战斗中测试这个符号。来到我的家，在边境尽头，接受我的挑战！

original_en_text: Investigate the resting sites marked by Steel Seer Zi to uncover the location of her vassal.
original_zh_text: 探索马克的安息之地并找出汉塞尔的人在哪里。

original_en_text: Speak to Creige of the Halfway Home in Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 我刚刚回到格雷厄姆莫尔，正在和克里克交谈。

original_en_text: Turn in the Horn Fragment to Bellhart’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 他试图通过在伯哈特的墙上安装一根管子来赚钱。

original_en_text: Ascend through the lands of Pharloom and reach the Citadel at the kingdom’s peak.
original_zh_text: 他们将穿过帕洛姆土地，到达王国顶部的城堡。

original_en_text: Hunt Hokers in the Far Fields and collect Spine Cores.
original_zh_text: 远处田野里的猎鹰，收集柱子的核心。

original_en_text: Return to Steel Seer Zi and inform her of Sula’s escape.
original_zh_text: 他们返回汉塞尔茨并向苏拉报告了逃跑的情况。

original_en_text: Crull and Benjin of Sinner’s Road
Those blasted crawbugs are fouling up my roof! I’ve come up with a clever solution to keep them away, but I’ll need some help. Enquire at the Halfway Home if you’re fit for the task.
original_zh_text: 这家伙在屋顶上炸了！我找到了一个很好的解决方案来阻止他们，但我需要帮助。

original_en_text: Search for traces of the courier, Tipp, and track his location.<br><br>Tipp was last seen in lower Shellwood.
original_zh_text: 搜索您的邮箱并跟踪其位置。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;蒂普最后一次出现在舍伍德下城。

original_en_text: Those mad, violent pilgrims who haunt the great path... we could make use of their shawls here in Bone Bottom. And felling them would surely be a mercy!
original_zh_text: 暴力的朝圣者，没有精神污染的街道，面纱深入骨髓。

original_en_text: In Deep Docks, find a way to descend beneath Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 在浅水海岸上，有一条通往灯塔的小路。

original_en_text: Enliven and acquire the old hearts of Pharloom.
One part of the Threefold Melody, entrusted to the Conductors.
original_zh_text: 三重旋律的一部分留给了这个人。

original_en_text: Turn in the Broodmother’s Eye to Songclave’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 她的羊的眼睛转向渴望太阳能墙，她得到了报酬。

original_en_text: Fragile egg containing a young Silkeater Queen. Though the Queen cannot gather Silk itself, with time and care it could be raised to breed more Silkeaters.
original_zh_text: 在一个易碎的蛋里，有一个年轻的丝绸女王。女王不能独自采摘丝绸，但如果她有特殊的时间和注意力，她可以繁殖和繁殖更多的丝绸。

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle, I have caught fresh scent of my master in those stricken swamps beside the Citadel. I ask you now to follow, to meet together at trail’s end.
original_zh_text: 作为鹰之子，他在城堡附近荒凉的沼泽中闻到了主人新鲜的气味。

original_en_text: Return to Fleamaster Mooshka of the Flea Caravan, in the Marrow.
original_zh_text: 他回到跳蚤车队。回到跳蚤之王巴黎的骨髓。

original_en_text: As was warned long ago, the black times have come. There is one last act to perform. Meet us at what was once called Fleatopia.
original_zh_text: 正如我所说，黑暗时代已经到来，最后的场景已经到来。让自己发现曾经被称为“坏乌托邦”的东西。"

original_en_text: Search for traces of the merchant, Jubilana, and track her location.<br><br>Jubilana was last seen near the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 他们正在寻找商人祖比利并追踪他的位置。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;阵亡将士纪念日最后一次出现是在城堡纪念碑附近。

original_en_text: Our dear merchant left to scavenge treasures from the Citadel’s Memorium. She’s been gone far too long. Please make sure she’s safe!
original_zh_text: 我们珍贵的商人去挖掘城堡纪念碑的宝藏。你很久以前就离开了。

original_en_text: Seek out the distressed bug near the Blasted Steps Bellway.
original_zh_text: 在贝尔维尤爆炸性楼梯附近寻找危险的昆虫。

original_en_text: Give the Spine Cores to the Seamstress waiting in Far Fields.
original_zh_text: 将柱核心移动到远程压力场时钟。

original_en_text: Collect Plasmium from Plasmium buds in the lower Wormways.<br><br>Plasmium can be extracted from buds using a fully charged stab from the Needle Phial tool.
original_zh_text: 下一个蠕虫将从Plasma Minimizza的逃逸蠕虫中收集血浆。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;使用带针的工具来接种荆棘，然后从树枝上提取血浆。

original_en_text: Play the Threefold Melody before the statues at the Citadel’s heart.
original_zh_text: 在城堡中心的雕像前玩“三重旋转”。

original_en_text: Donate rosaries to aid the Songclave’s residents.
original_zh_text: 他们祈求念珠帮助宋卡人民。

original_en_text: Travel to Pinstress’s home at the far edge of Blasted Steps and accept her challenge.
original_zh_text: 爆炸性的游行结束后，他去了平斯特雷斯的家并接受了他的挑战。

original_en_text: Deliver to Mask Maker on Mount Fay.
original_zh_text: 口罩制造商被移交给费桑。

original_en_text: Donate shell shards to aid the construction of an icon of hope.
original_zh_text: 我们将为您提供一个外壳来帮助您创造自己的偶像。

original_en_text: Turn in the Grass Doll to Bellhart’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 在伯哈特的愿望墙上传递一个娃娃并获得奖品。

original_en_text: Sweetness! Sourness! Bitterness! I need it all with hastiness! If you have the precious fruits, come to me in Mosshome and share all you have!
original_zh_text: 大面积的酸！痛苦，继续前进！如果您有珍贵的水果，请来莫索分享您所拥有的！

original_en_text: Present the filled out Hunter’s Journal to Nuu at the Halfway Home in Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 猎人的日记描述了格里莫瓦家中的一只昆虫。

original_en_text: Speak to Fleamaster Mooshka of Fleatopia.
original_zh_text: 自由的乌托邦正在寻找一位伪装的老师。

original_en_text: Search the gilded heights of the Citadel for the melody of the Conductors.
original_zh_text: 从城堡的黄金高处寻找表演的旋律。

original_en_text: Give the Plasmified Blood to the Alchemist at the top of the Wormways.
original_zh_text: 请将您的血浆捐赠给维尔姆斯顶上的炼金术士。

original_en_text: Deliver to the Survivors’ Camp in the Marrow.
Learn the Threefold Melody and open the path to the Citadel’s crest.
original_zh_text: 学习三重旋律并登上城堡顶部。

original_en_text: Confront the Caretaker and his family in the Ruined Chapel beside Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 一座废弃的教堂靠近骨头底部，矗立在警卫和他们的家人面前。
这是保罗收集稀有食物的地方。

original_en_text: The Architect’s Melody has been learned.
Deliver to Mergwin in Choral Chambers.
original_zh_text: 我向合唱团的梅尔·格温致敬。

original_en_text: Hunt Crawbugs in Greymoor and collect their Ragpelt.
original_zh_text: 它们捕食螃蟹并在阴影中收集碎片。

original_en_text: The Conductor’s Melody has been learned.
Our settlement sits defenceless! No more! When the worst comes, we must stand ready. Bring us pins of the choirbugs, those blades still sharp and strong.
original_zh_text: 我们的系统无法容忍这种情况。当最坏的情况发生时，我们必须做好准备。叶子保持锋利和强壮，以恢复角虫的脊柱。

original_en_text: Track down Flintbeetles in the Marrow and defeat them to collect Flintgems.<br><br>Flintbeetles can be tracked by their stone-sheddings and their aromatic dung.
original_zh_text: 跟随弗林特到骨头，击败他们，并收集弗林特的宝石。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;其厚度可以追溯到石头碎片或粪便气味碎片。

original_en_text: Search for traces of the merchant, Jubilana, and track her location.<br><br>Jubilana was last seen in the lower Choral Chambers.
original_zh_text: 他们正在寻找商人祖比利并追踪他的位置。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;最后，祖比利出现在了一楼的小号室里。

original_en_text: Donate rosaries to complete the rebuilding of Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 他们祈祷玫瑰经完成伯哈特的重建。

original_en_text: Acquire Steel Spines from Crull and Benjin in Sinner’s Road so Yarnaby can remove the parasite.
original_zh_text: 库鲁尔和本金在罪人之路买了一把勺子，这样雅纳比就可以摆脱寄生虫了。

original_en_text: Deliver supplies to the Caretaker in Songclave.
Give the Ragpelt to Creige of the Halfway Home in Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 他把毛巾递给克里克，克里克回到格拉莫尔。

original_en_text: Give Pale Oil to Plinney of Bellhart.
Horrible cries have been heard from that prison beside the Citadel. What profanities must be happening within to cause such awful sound?
original_zh_text: 我听到监狱旁边的城堡里传来可怕的尖叫声。

original_en_text: Use the diving bell in Deep Docks to descend beneath Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 您可以使用Deep Dock Bell进入农场。

original_en_text: How do all of these wretched, lost bugs keep finding their way here?! Each hungry and squalling for shelter! We need more rosaries, so empty your pockets.
original_zh_text: 为什么这只消失的小虫子要找你？每个人都在挨饿，他们正在支付住房。

original_en_text: Track down the wailing creature in the Slab and slay it.<br><br>The creature can be tracked by its slime trail.
original_zh_text: 找到一个在桌子上哭泣的生物并杀死它。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;粘液中可以检测到微生物。

original_en_text: Hard forged spines, intended for use in heavy machinery and able to pierce through even the toughest shell.
original_zh_text: 重型机械中使用的硬锻造脊柱即使在最硬的外壳中也可以穿孔。

original_en_text: Return to the Snail Shamans in the Ruined Chapel beside Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 萨满-最终回到教堂废墟附近的骨头底部。

original_en_text: Hunt pin-wielding choirbugs of the Citadel and collect Fine Pins.
original_zh_text: 随着合唱团的到来，歌手朱迪摇动松树，为城堡收集珍贵的松树。

original_en_text: Deliver supplies to the Fleamaster Mooshka in Fleatopia.
original_zh_text: 自由大师：马斯卡的乌托邦
Wormway炼金术士就是其中之一。

original_en_text: Deliver the Steel Spines to Yarnaby in Greymoor so they can remove the parasite.
original_zh_text: 他们将无氧钢的尖端移至灰烬坑中以杀死寄生虫。

original_en_text: Turn in the Shining Cogs to Songclave’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 闪闪发光的牙齿冲向宋卡的愿望墙并赢得奖品。

original_en_text: I’ve heard tell pilgrims sometimes fall down that big hole beside the settlement. Nasty way to end your journey, before it even begins. I could build a bridge, if I only had the materials!
original_zh_text: 据说朝圣者有时会掉进定居点附近的大洞里。在旅程开始之前，这是一种很难结束的方式。如果你有足够的材料，你就可以做你的腿。

original_en_text: One part of the Threefold Melody, entrusted to the secretive Vaultkeepers.
original_zh_text: 三重旋律的一部分被发送给神秘的警卫。

original_en_text: Our haunted brethren wandering the great halls still wear their fine white cloaks. This settlement would greatly benefit from their protection. Please fetch some for us!
original_zh_text: 我们的鬼兄弟总是穿着柔软的白外套走在走廊上。这个解决方案在保护方面更有帮助。请给我带点东西来。"

original_en_text: Turn in the Flintgems to Bone Bottom’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 如果你把克里姆林宫送到骨头底部的欲望之墙，你就会得到奖励。

original_en_text: Deliver the Roach Guts to Crull and Benjin of Sinner’s Road.
original_zh_text: 向罪人捐赠昆虫器官是经过循环和主路的。
他说他正在进入你的心。

original_en_text: Give the Pollip Hearts to Greyroot of Shellwood.
original_zh_text: 她穿着皮革衣服，走在灰色的街道上，拥抱着保罗的心。

original_en_text: Collect Pollip Hearts from the purple flowers of Shellwood.
original_zh_text: 收集树皮上紫罗兰花的珊瑚虫。

original_en_text: Give the collected Plasmium to the Alchemist at the top of the Wormways.
original_zh_text: 我把收集到的勺子交给了虫孔上方的炼金术士。

original_en_text: The old merchant pilgrim, Jubilana, was seen wandering down in the Choral Chambers, but she never made it up here. Has some foul fortune befallen her?
original_zh_text: 人们可以看到一位古老的朝圣商人走过唱诗班参加禧年，但他不在那里。

original_en_text: A huge red-shell stole my precious keepsake and disappeared into the fields! Please chase down the thief and recover my treasure!
original_zh_text: 一个巨大的红色贝壳偷走了珍贵的纪念品，从乡村消失了！追小偷，抢走宝藏。

original_en_text: Find Pinstress on the stormward side of Mount Fay and defeat her in battle.
original_zh_text: 在山坡荒凉的一侧，圆周率遇到了芬萨，芬萨在战斗中被击倒。

original_en_text: Harken, ye holy! Our home has been cleansed of evil, but now we are tasked with restoring its former glory! Share your rosaries with us, that the work may begin.
original_zh_text: 我们的国家已经被清除了邪恶，但现在我们的任务是让它恢复昔日的辉煌。

original_en_text: Deliver the rare delicacies to Mergwin in the dining chamber of the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 城堡内的餐厅供应来自美根的稀有菜肴。

original_en_text: Search the mechanised core of the Citadel for the melody of the Architects.
original_zh_text: 在城堡的机械化中心发现建筑师的旋律。

original_en_text: Venture inside the Citadel and confront the veiled bugs.
original_zh_text: 进入城堡与隐藏的昆虫搏斗。

original_en_text: Attend this Sentinel’s request, Hunter in Red. Meet in halls high, the chamber of its fellows. The way shall be marked.
original_zh_text: 红色猎人的房间是朋友的房间。您会看到指南。

original_en_text: I am Mooshka, humble stranger to this land and master of the Flea Caravan! I wish for aid, that all fleas may travel safely together!
original_zh_text: 我是马斯克。一个生活在这片土地上的卑微陌生人，跳蚤车队的主人！我们需要帮助来确保所有跳蚤都能安全地一起行动！

original_en_text: Speak to Fleamaster Mooshka of the Flea Caravan, in the Marrow.
For the sake of our ailing brothers and sisters, I will descend into the holy Whiteward and search for healing supplies. If you are able, please join me! Company will make the work much merrier.
original_zh_text: 为了我生病的兄弟姐妹，我在神圣的白言中寻找治疗材料。

original_en_text: Deliver supplies to Mort in Pilgrim’s Rest.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者有一个座右铭：休息。

original_en_text: Acquire the necessary components to build a powerful trap.
original_zh_text: 您将获得构建强大陷阱所需的组件。

original_en_text: Use tools to acquire organs of various types so Huntress may feed her brood.
original_zh_text: 通过使用工具获取各种器官，猎人可以为小狗提供食物。

original_en_text: Retrieve Pale Oil from the Citadel.
Heavy cloth sack containing tools, trinkets and medical aids.
original_zh_text: 装有医疗设备、配件和辅助设备的沉重行李。

original_en_text: Turn in the Silver Bells to Bellhart’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 巴哈特的愿望挂在墙上，给了他一块银表并得到报酬。

original_en_text: Up towers spinning, near the surgeon spurned,
original_zh_text: 塔倒塌了，附近的外科医生被拒绝了。

original_en_text: Return to Huntress with the organs.
Deliver Liquid Lacquer to the Mask Maker upon Mount Fay.
original_zh_text: 液体墨水必须发送给不起作用的口罩制造商。

original_en_text: Deliver supplies to the fixer Flick in Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: Bone Bottom Flick将材料发送给维护人员。

original_en_text: Donate rosaries to aid the rebuilding of Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 他捐赠了几颗珍珠来重建伯哈特。

original_en_text: Find a means to play the Sacred Cylinder within the Whispering Vaults.
original_zh_text: 想办法在神圣宝藏的柱子上低语。

original_en_text: The work of restoring our sacred home is almost complete! May those blessed with rosaries share them with us for this holy purpose!
original_zh_text: 大教堂的重建工作已接近完成，那些默默祈祷的人可以为了这个神圣的目的分享它！

original_en_text: O Beastfly, raging through the scorching wildlands below! May you hinder good pilgrims no longer! May you be struck down by a holy fury!
original_zh_text: 野兽和苍蝇，看看下面燃烧的沙漠！不要让其他朝圣者停下来！上帝的愤怒将会被击败。

original_en_text: Collect Plasmified Blood from infected creatures in the Wormways.<br><br>Plasmified Blood can be extracted with a fully charged stab from the Needle Phial tool.
original_zh_text: 血浆和血液是从感染蠕虫的生物体中收集的。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;血浆化血液可以使用满载的针头从针头设备中提取。

original_en_text: Turn in the Fine Pins to Songclave’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 在宋卡的愿望墙上种上一根刺，赢取奖品。

original_en_text: The Hunter’s Heart has been claimed from Skarrsinger Karmelita.
original_zh_text: 亨特的心脏被扫描仪偷走了。

original_en_text: If this place must provide shelter for every ragged bug who wanders in, we’ll need supplies and currency. So if you’re reading this, empty your pockets!
original_zh_text: 如果这个地方是所有流浪驱虫剂的避难所，那么服务和资金是必要的。如果您正在阅读这篇文章，请清空您的口袋

original_en_text: Donate shell shards to aid the building of a bridge.
original_zh_text: 其中一些贝壳被用来建造桥梁。

original_en_text: Search the cloistered wing of the Citadel for the melody of the Vaultkeepers.
original_zh_text: 在城堡的封闭一侧寻找财务主管的旋律。

original_en_text: Hunt a Skull Tyrant of the Marrow.
Search for traces of the courier, Pill, and track his location.<br><br>Pill was last seen in lower Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 找到药丸并跟踪它们的位置。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;最后一个出现的人是劳里·格雷莫。

original_en_text: Turn in the Pilgrim Shawls to Bone Bottom’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 它是通过将朝圣者的头皮放在骨头底部的欲望墙上来实现的。

original_en_text: Defeat the many creatures of Pharloom and fill out the Hunter’s Journal.
original_zh_text: 杀死坑中的许多生物并填写猎人日记。

original_en_text: The road is hard for we pilgrims. I want to build a beautiful symbol of hope, to stand beside Bone Bottom and welcome all those who are about to begin their long journey.
original_zh_text: 我想创造一个美丽的希望象征，欢迎所有那些从骨子里开始漫长旅程的人。

original_en_text: Donate shell shards to aid repairs around Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 它释放了贝壳的碎片并重建了周围的骨头底座。

original_en_text: Donate rosaries to aid the growing Songclave.
original_zh_text: Suncraft捐赠了念珠来帮助它们成长。

original_en_text: Dive into the void and cut Pharloom free.
Hunt haunted pilgrims of Pharloom and collect Pilgrim Shawls from their bodies.
original_zh_text: 他和法勒姆一起监视朝圣者并收集他们的桌子。

original_en_text: In the darkest of shadows, all is made clear. Pharloom draws its final breath, and we few remaining must bear its dying pain. Come to the Citadel’s Stage and let us suffer together.
original_zh_text: 在最深的黑暗中，一切都变得清晰起来。留下来的人将不得不忍受死亡的痛苦。

original_en_text: Hunt the Muckroaches of Sinner’s Road and collect Roach Guts from their bodies.
original_zh_text: 在罪人的街道上追逐昆虫并收集他们的棍棒。

original_en_text: Seek fleas across the lands of Pharloom and guide them to the Flea Caravan.
original_zh_text: 您在法罗姆的土地上发现跳蚤，并将它们带到跳蚤大篷车。

original_en_text: Speak to the Druid in Mosshome.
Scale the Citadel and ensnare its monarch in a deadly trap.
original_zh_text: 进入城堡并将你的国王困住。
它是朝圣者的安息之地。

original_en_text: Deliver supplies to Flick at the Survivors’ Camp.
original_zh_text: 我们将把弗里克的物资运送到幸存者营地。

original_en_text: Meet with Sprintmaster Swift at the furthest border of the Far Fields.
original_zh_text: 我在体育场后面遇到了斯威夫特。

original_en_text: Turn in the Crown Fragment to Bone Bottom’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 从主骨壁上切下王冠即可获得奖励。

original_en_text: Collect Mossberries from the moss-covered areas of Pharloom’s lowlands.
original_zh_text: 椰子是在法勒姆平原椰子覆盖的地区采摘的。

original_en_text: The Vaultkeeper’s Melody has been learned.
original_zh_text: 我学习了《金库守护者》的旋律。

original_en_text: Need help-help quick! Me brother Pill is gone missing, vanished somewhere in Greymoor! Please, to help me find-find him!
original_zh_text: 我知道我需要一些帮助。我的兄弟菲尔在某个地方失踪了。

original_en_text: Race Sprintmaster Swift to discover Pharloom’s fastest bug.
original_zh_text: 与Sprintmaster Swift竞争，发现Pharloom中最快的错误。

original_en_text: Cage of one who raged against the silken lie,
original_zh_text: 笼子里的人对丝绸非常生气。

original_en_text: Past cradle’s peak, last test of fitness,
original_zh_text: 经过摇篮上衣和最终的体能测试

original_en_text: Fell heart of frost, who soars on high,
original_zh_text: 它从冰中心坠落并爬得很高。

original_en_text: Scorched field on edge, shells black and burned,
original_zh_text: 大地将燃烧成红色，树皮将燃烧成黑色。

original_en_text: Over camp collapsed to the black thread plight,
Search for traces of the pilgrim, Sherma, and track his location.<br><br>Sherma was travelling to the Citadel’s Whiteward.
original_zh_text: 找到朝圣者泽曼并找到他的位置。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;谢尔曼正在去怀特伍德城堡的路上

original_en_text: Speak to Fleamaster Mooshka and commence the final ceremony.
original_zh_text: 与自由大师穆什卡交谈并开始最后的仪式。

original_en_text: Awaken the old bells throughout the lands.
Return to Runt with the organs.
original_zh_text: 从长远来看，他将重返该机构。

original_en_text: When searching the bellveins carefully, you can sometimes find rare, silver bells. If we can salvage some, the material would be of great use!
original_zh_text: 如果你仔细观察这些物种，你会发现一种罕见的银色物种。如果能节省材料，材料就会有很大的帮助！

original_en_text: Return to Bellhart’s wishwall to collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 让我们回到伯哈特雕像的愿望墙。

original_en_text: Rise above the Citadel and confront the one who haunts the lands of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 去城堡，面对污染农田的人们。

original_en_text: Track down the Savage Beastfly in the Far Fields and defeat it.<br><br>The Beastfly can be tracked by its shell sheddings and claw marks.
original_zh_text: 跟随远处的飞行野兽并击败它。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;贝壳和下垂的腿上可以看到苍蝇。

original_en_text: Search for Shakra and her master in Bilewater.<br><br>Shakra can be tracked by her trail of rings.
original_zh_text: 他在比尔沃特遇到了沙克和他的老师。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;沙库尔能够追踪到戒指。

original_en_text: Be you nimble? Be you quick? If you would prove yourself Pharloom’s fastest bug, meet me at the furthest border of the Far Fields! With all haste!
original_zh_text: 快吗？我可以加快速度吗？如果您想证明您是秘鲁最快的昆虫，请在费尔菲尔德最偏远的边境与我见面！快跑！

original_en_text: Give the Mossberries to the Druid of Mosshome.
A distressed bug was heard calling for help near the Bellway atop the great sandy steps. Will no one come to the sad wretch’s aid?
original_zh_text: 我听到生病的昆虫在贝尔维尤附近的一个巨大的沙楼梯上呼救。

original_en_text: Reach the source of the black threads within the Abyss.
Bring the old hearts to the Snail Shamans in the Ruined Chapel beside Bone Bottom.

original_en_text: Achieve the high score in all Flea Games and become the Grand Champion.
original_zh_text: 押注游戏中的每一个筹码，你就会成为冠军。

original_en_text: Break the silken curse ensnaring the town of Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 摧毁困扰伯哈特市的丝绸诅咒。

original_en_text: Descend into the bellway and defeat the hostile creature within.
original_zh_text: 进入钟楼并杀死敌人生物。

original_zh_text: 当王国掌握在教会手中时，

original_en_text: Deliver the Queen’s Egg to Styx of Sinner’s Road.
original_zh_text: 你怎么能把女王的蛋给罪人呢？

original_en_text: Hunt Cogworks in Cogwork Core and collect Shining Cogs.
original_zh_text: 在Cogwork分数中查找Cogworks并收集Channing Cogworks。

original_en_text: Hunt cloaked choirbugs of the Citadel and collect Choir Cloaks from their bodies.
original_zh_text: 在亨特城堡合唱团，收集合唱团服装。

original_en_text: Return to the Grand Gate and open the way to the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 打开通往城堡的道路，返回大门。

original_en_text: Investigate the ritual site beside Bonegrave.
original_zh_text: 查看博尼格雷夫斯附近的仪式场地。

original_en_text: The Encrusted Heart has been claimed from Crust King Khann.
A Skull Tyrant, largest of the Marrow’s loathsome bony predators, prowls the caves above the great path. Slay the beast and keep us all safe!

original_en_text: Track the one who stole Gilly’s keepsake near the Bellshrine between Deep Docks and Far Fields.
original_zh_text: 跟踪一名男子，在新海和帕尔帕之间的钟楼寺庙附近偷走了一块行会令牌。

original_en_text: Scale the Citadel and confront the one who haunts the lands of Pharloom.

original_en_text: Pale glaze used in the preparation and protection of bone masks.
original_zh_text: 一种用于制备和保护骨面具的轻质瓷釉。

original_en_text: Give the collected components to the Caretaker of Songclave.
A lotta repairs to be done around here, but I need more materials! All I wish for is some shell shards so I can get to work. Not asking too much, am I?

original_en_text: My dear little courier was last seen in Shellwood. Please someone, find Tipp and send him home, along with all of his precious stock!
original_zh_text: 我最喜欢的信使最后一次出现是在舍伍德。有人带着贵重物品送他回家找疯子！

original_en_text: Such horror upon the roads! Those black mounds formed of husks and bugs, corrupting everything around. If only someone would cut them down and grant the poor souls their rest!

original_en_text: Turn in the Choir Cloaks to Songclave’s wishwall and collect the reward.

original_en_text: Track the Second Sentinel by their markers left near Songclave.

original_zh_text: 我们感受到了他工作的残酷性和我们最终的命运。&lt;page&gt;如果你有能力，就来把她带走。我的力量消失了，人们通常需要更多时间。&lt;hpage&gt;“我来这里不是为了看看你是什么样的人，而是为了在皇帝面前提醒你你是什么样的人。&lt;hpage&gt;“我想摆脱这种心跳，但我认为我的意图是值得的。&lt;hpage&gt;我努力工作，拯救这个星球免受电线和真空致命疾病的侵害。&lt;page&gt;就是这里！如果可能的话，动物们为大自然感到自豪。

original_en_text: <hpage>Your land’s fate has turned too dire, child. I cannot delay now to help you in your growth.<page>Sssss... So huntersss live... kill... only for selvesss... same as siblings...
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我的孩子，你们星球的命运正在恶化。我们不能再等了。&lt;page&gt;碰撞的声音。猎人当场死亡。只允许拍摄兄弟姐妹的肖像。

original_en_text: These fields are hot and harsh, a miserable place for we pilgrims, and just above are the dreary moors, a place once of abundance lost to falling silt and murky rain.<page>The lands in every direction punish us, but such is our test. Above it all, the Citadel shines, our destination and our reward...<page>I’ll make it there, you’ll see. I’ve easily earned my place in such a paradise.
original_zh_text: 田野炎热荒凉，对于朝圣者来说是一个不幸的地方，上面是一片荒凉的沙漠，石灰和雨水土壤已经失去了肥沃的土壤。&lt;page&gt;所有国家都在惩罚我们，但这是对我们的考验。&lt;page&gt;“我要去，你会看到，在这个天堂里很容易找到一个地方。

original_en_text: <hpage>Is this place your permanent home, sir, or do you only make camp?<page>We pilgrims have no home, there is only the path. We climb, and suffer, and are thusly judged.<page>I will linger here only a moment, for the sake of trade. Once I’ve gathered enough rosaries, I’ll be holy enough to ascend without fear.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;这是你永恒的家吗？或者他只是露营？&lt;page&gt;朝圣者没有家，他们有街道;我们说话，我们受苦，我们审判。&lt;page&gt;当你吃足够的念珠时，你就会变得足够神圣，可以毫无恐惧地崛起。

original_en_text: <hpage>On the far side of Pharloom, I chanced upon a bug starkly similar to yourself.<hpage>From her home, her dress, and her skill, I am guessing you share some relation?<page>Aye. Met my sister, you did, in order at least. Glad to hear she’s still among the living.<page>Last to hold true to the old ways of the pin, she was... I sure ain’t sharing many of those violent values no more.<page>I’ll warn you, stray one, my sister might seem all cheer and charm, but buried beneath there’s the soul of a killer.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;在灯塔的另一边，我发现了一只像你一样的昆虫。&lt;hpage&gt;从你的房子、你的衣服、你的能力来看，你认为这和这个有什么关系？&lt;page&gt;是的，他们看到了我妹妹，至少情况良好。&lt;page&gt;你是最后一个承受压力的人。"&lt;page&gt;我姐姐可能看起来快乐而迷人，但她有着杀手的灵魂。

original_en_text: You would deny my brood their strength, ssspiidderr? A cruel creature you are. Surely your sssmall shell needs hardly so much?
original_zh_text: 我们的孩子会被剥夺权力吗？你是一个残酷的生物。你需要SS small丝绸吗？

original_en_text: I’ll string your rosaries tight, for a modest fee. It’s the safest way to keep them close.

Uoohhh... Sister, my aching shell’s close to breaking. My voice weakens... I can hardly sing a word.<hpage>I fear the path ahead will be no easier for you, ma’am. If you can not abandon your pilgrimage, you should at least rest well before continuing.<page>Ahh... but impurities stalk our every step, sister. If we rest too long, they shall catch us. So... so it is sung...
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。我生病的身体快要爆炸了，声音微弱，几乎无法唱歌。&lt;hpage&gt;不幸的是，前面的路并不容易，如果不能放弃朝圣之旅，至少值得休息一下。&lt;page&gt;是的，正确的。陪我走每一步，姐姐！如果你休息太久，你就会接住它，我就会唱歌。

original_en_text: That golden knight’s out there, sister, cutting down the lost, keeping us safe.<page>Reckon this place would’ve already been overrun if not for them’n their noble blades.
original_zh_text: 姐姐，黄金骑士来这里是为了摧毁迷失的人并保护我们。"&lt;page&gt;如果不是奉承，这里早就热闹了。

original_en_text: Take some beads for your effort, miss bellringer, and know this sad lot’ll be survivin’ a little longer thanks to you.
original_zh_text: “贝林格夫人，你努力的明珠。“谢谢，这种悲惨的命运将持续一段时间。

original_en_text: S’done! The parts are prepared. I’m headin’ up now to set the heavy thing.<page>Even with the trap laid, best be guessin’ her on top won’t go down so simple. She’ll sense what’s comin’.<page>That blade of yours is gonna have to do its work ‘fore this thing can snap.<hpage>I’d expected such, sir. And I am ready. Set your snare. I shall attend shortly.
original_zh_text: “结束了，我准备好了，我胖了。&lt;page&gt;即使设置了陷阱，最好假设它不会轻易掉下来。&lt;page&gt;在它被折断之前，刀片必须工作。&lt;hpage&gt;我以为他已经准备好给你设下陷阱了，所以我立即加入了你。

original_en_text: Everything is falling apart, my dear one. Be sure to share your rosaries with me before it’s too late!
original_zh_text: 请在为时已晚之前分享我的祈祷！

original_en_text: Lots of stories being sung about you, dear one. Gathering supplies, saving lost bugs... all sorts of good deeds!<page>Very clever to craft such a reputation for yourself. If you keep it up, you’ll fast become a legend among these simple sorts.<hpage>I’ve no interest in becoming one, madam. In my long life, I’ve known enough legends, watched them rise and fall and fade away, many times.<page>Is that so, dear? How humble you are! You should know though, this old pilgrim has her sight keenly trained on you! Nothing gets by old Jubilana!
original_zh_text: 你会有很多故事。收集消耗品并拯救丢失的昆虫。移动时一切都很美丽！&lt;page&gt;如果你坚持下去，你很快就会成为这个简单角色的传奇。&lt;hpage&gt;在我一生中的很长一段时间里，我仔细研究传说，看着它们一次又一次的兴衰。&lt;page&gt;不是吗，亲爱的？多么谦虚啊！但要确保朝圣者的眼睛舒适地看着你。

original_en_text: It was you, wasn’t it? Ringin’ that great clanging bell just now! Right when I’m tryin’ to get some sleep!
original_zh_text: 你真的是吗？噪音很大！当我试图睡觉的时候！

original_en_text: Please don’t go too far, sister. Right here’s the only safety you’ll find within this whole cursed place.
There must be a few more goodies to gather up here, and I don’t need you lingering around in the meantime. Blessings, and farewell!
original_zh_text: 这里有一些好东西，这次我们就不用到处闲逛了。祝福和再见！

original_en_text: Well, well! See here what your brash behaviour has wrought, bellringer!<page>Just as I predicted, this once-peaceful sanctuary is now crawling with all sorts. We’ve the beginnings of a shabby little settlement, all huddled around this old shrine!<hpage>These poor bugs, all are victims of the Citadel and its insidious attraction. This place draws them up, into its maw, only to consume them, utterly.<page>Aye, inside and out, s’nothing but a grand, gilded lie. Well, at least these few stragglers can enjoy a moment’s safety. Poor fools...
original_zh_text: “看看你的傲慢，柏林。&lt;page&gt;曾经是一个安静的避难所，现在挤满了各种各样的人。我们创建了一个小而严格的殖民地，将一切聚集在这座古老的寺庙周围！&lt;hpage&gt;这种可怜的昆虫已经成为性魅力和微妙魅力的受害者。这个地方会吸引它们，把它们放在你的胃里，让它们完全吸收。&lt;page&gt;是的，这只是一个金色的谎言。至少，留下来的人可以享受安全的时光。可怜的傻瓜！"

original_en_text: A precious order passed down by the holy conductors. Rare now to find these old texts, and rarer still to find a bug able to read ‘em.
original_zh_text: 这些古老的文本很难找到，发现错误比阅读更难。

original_en_text: Ooh, what a turn-up! I’d feared t’was naught but meself left sane about these halls. Seems this old bug’s luck has not yet worn thin!<hpage>It was more than luck that saw me to you, madam. I promised the wish of bugs concerned for your safety.<hpage>I urge you to head their way now, beside the old bell, up and over.<hpage>A small settlement has formed there, and the bell, reawakened, seems to ward away the worst of the Citadel’s many dangers.<page>A settlement? In these long-haunted halls? Are you telling naughty little lies, dear one? Well, I suppose there’s not too much danger in going and seeing the truth for meself.
original_zh_text: 哦，那太好了！我认为这很棒，但我专注于这个房间。显然，这个老错误的可能性并没有消失！&lt;hpage&gt;我同意你的愿望，并担心巴布斯的安全。&lt;hpage&gt;我建议你朝它的方向走，爬过旧时钟。&lt;hpage&gt;这里形成了一个小殖民地，伯曼人被召回，他们似乎能够保护城堡免受最严重的危险。&lt;page&gt;和解？你在这所老房子里吗？“我认为看到真相并不危险。

original_en_text: Be away then, dear one, and leave me to gather up my trinkets and baubles.<page>If this settlement of yours truly has bugs settled safe, I’ll be able to make some lucrative trades. Blessings and farewell!
original_zh_text: “好吧，亲爱的，让我拿走我的小东西。&lt;page&gt;如果您的协议安全地解决错误，我就可以从事有利可图的业务。

original_en_text: It’s feelin’ almost time, eh, bellringer? You and her who waits up there. That fated meeting won’t hold forever... Ready to make your play, to oust one ruler and claim her place?<hpage>I’ll not deny some part of me desires that outcome... Dominance, it seems, is baked deep in my blood, as too, no doubt, for the one up top.<hpage>And yet, another part resists... A part, over time, I find myself siding with more...<hpage>That part wishes not to claim a monarch’s mantle, rather it would see my freedom regained, and this kingdom’s bugs unshackled from their pale chains.<page>...Remarkable idea you’re speakin’ there, bellringer, a world cut free. Not a wish I’ve had much cause to hope on, serious like... but I ain’t so surprised to hear you speak it.<page>For all your helpin’, I been seein’ it clearer. You’ve still got the monarch in you, alright, and the glare of a Weaver, but the ambition... that’s wild different from both.<hpage>If you have already guessed to my desire, sir, and share some part of it, would you offer me aid in the conflict to come?<page>Aye... Maybe, yes. I can barely bear to tell it... But there’s an idea, one rare discussed, for fear of her up there sensin’ the score.<hpage>You have conceived a method, I take it? A way to see a monarch... removed? And me left free from claiming her station?<page>...We have, me and what remains of my family. S’a trap, of a sort, beyond the skill of this Citadel, one to go further than just her binding. You’d be just the hunter to set it, if you’re dare enough to try...
original_zh_text: 我相信时间越来越近了。你和我都在等你。命运不会永远持续，不是吗？你准备好开始推翻统治者并夺取王位的计划了吗？&lt;hpage&gt;我不能否认我对结果的部分希望。领导力似乎深深植根于我的血液中，我毫不怀疑我将在最高层占据主导地位。&lt;hpage&gt;有些人甚至抵制。“随着时间的推移，我变得越来越孤立。&lt;hpage&gt;他们不想穿君主的衣服，但他们想让我自由，让王国的昆虫从他们苍白的枷锁中解放出来。&lt;page&gt;...“你是多么自由，贝林格，这是一个自由世界的好主意。如果我告诉你我也不会惊讶。&lt;page&gt;“谢谢你的帮助，我知道。我在纺织行业有天赋，但我有抱负。&lt;hpage&gt;如果您能猜出您的愿望并分享其中一些愿望，这有助于解决即将发生的冲突吗？"&lt;page&gt;是的，也许我是。我不能说，但有些想法很少被讨论，因为我害怕听到人声。&lt;hpage&gt;你认为我们能找到君主吗？你不认为我可以取代他吗？&lt;page&gt;...这是一个超出了这座城堡能力和锁链的陷阱。如果你有勇气面对挑战，你就是一名猎人。

original_en_text: What’s that you got there, bellringer? Stole someone else’s soul for yourself?<hpage>You speak of the remnant I found in the muck-choked caves beside the Citadel? This is soul siphoned from a once powerful bug.<hpage>It’s only a thin mix now, but there is still some strength left. At peak, their talents must have been impressive.<page>Aye, they was that. I knew the bug, in ‘is prime, long time back. Braver’n most, and as little a fan of this Citadel as you yourself.<page>Went seekin’ alliance with those basic bugs of the swamps. Thought they’d both gain from the union... Scheming defiance, or some such stupidity!<page>Now he’s as dead as he was daft! Don’t go tryin’ ta make friends in Pharloom, bellringer. Nothin’ good comes of it.
original_zh_text: 铃声响了，你在做什么？为自己窃取别人的灵魂？&lt;hpage&gt;你有没有提到在城堡附近的泥坑里发现的遗骸？灵魂来自强大的昆虫。&lt;hpage&gt;我们是一个弱势群体，但我们仍然很强大。他的才华在巅峰时期令人印象深刻。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的，对。我认为这个错误发生在很久以前，在黄金时代，当时最勇敢的人都不喜欢像你这样的城堡。&lt;page&gt;在潮湿地区可以看到与这些必需细菌的联盟，我们每个人都从联盟中受益。&lt;page&gt;别试图和灯塔交朋友，贝林格。没有什么好的结果。

original_en_text: Hmph. Bellringer, you might think me a dullard, but I understand this place and have well-good senses.<page>Brought here, weren’t you? From beyond the border of our lands?<hpage>You are correct. The one who waits atop this Citadel... Through their hospitality, I arrived in this kingdom. I seek now to return that welcome in kind.<page>Hmph. Beastly words, them. Finely spoken, but beastly all the same.<page>I just pray you don’t bring any more unneeded pain down on the heads of these gormless little pilgrims...
original_zh_text: - “嘿，博林格，你可能认为我是个白痴，但我了解这个地方，我感觉很好。&lt;page&gt;你带我来这里的吗？你在干什么？在我国边境？&lt;hpage&gt;“你说得对，人们正在城堡里等你。多亏了他的热情款待，我才得以进入王国。你也将受到欢迎。&lt;page&gt;他说话像动物一样，而且说得很好，但他仍然很狂野。&lt;page&gt;我祈祷那些毫无意义的朝圣者不再遭受不必要的痛苦。

original_en_text: Found it all, did ya, bellringer? Then join me and let’s get to preppin’! I’ll be askin’ both your Silk and your claws ‘fore the construction.
original_zh_text: 你找到了一切，不是吗？真的吗？关于Bellinger让我们一起做饭吧！在建造之前，我们要求了丝绸和钉子。

original_en_text: The Citadel chose us, granted us a little more living. For what purpose though, who could say?
original_zh_text: 上帝选择了我们，给了我们更多的生命。

original_en_text: If’n your wantin’ that trap made, you’d best get to collectin’. I’ll point you toward what’s needed, best as I can.
original_zh_text: 如果你需要这个陷阱，就抓住它。我会尽我所能告诉你你想要什么。

original_en_text: Heard you did the savin’ for our dear merchant there? I’ve seen her about, sneaking and scrounging, even a’fore you was ringing that bell.<page>She’s a useful sort, but don’t let her age be foolin’, she’s still the sharpest mind for a deal.<page>Won’t be long till there’s nary a rosary about this shrine that ain’t found its way into her pockets.
original_zh_text: 听说你为一位身价不菲的雇佣兵攒钱，在敲门之前，我看到你在乞讨。&lt;page&gt;他是一个有用的人，但即使他老了也不要骗他。&lt;page&gt;过了一会儿，寺庙里的念珠就放进了我的口袋。

original_en_text: Bellringer... Re-thinkin’ on that trap, are ya? It’s a mad method, for sure, but you’d be just the hunter to set it, if’n you’re dare enough to try...
original_zh_text: 谁在敲钟？你会重新考虑你的陷阱吗？当然，这是一个疯狂的方法，但如果你有勇气尝试它，你就是安装它的疯狂猎人。

original_en_text: <hpage>Grant me your aid, sir. If your trap provides a path to freedom, both for myself and your land’s bugs, I may indeed choose to trigger it.<hpage>What work do you require of me now to see your service made?<page>It’s my family’s strength you’ll need be seeking, bellringer, us three ol’ bugs still alive, spread ‘cross this kingdom, and one poor cousin dead and drained in swamps choked rotten.<page>Each has power. Raw, savage stuff! For you, they’ll give it, if for their fascination at the act, or the thrill of defiance... or because they have no choice at all.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;如果你的陷阱给了我和你土地上的昆虫一条自由之路，我会决定挑衅你。&lt;hpage&gt;您想做什么来验证您的服务？&lt;page&gt;我们的王国里还有三种活着的昆虫，还有一个可怜的表弟淹死在沼泽里。&lt;page&gt;每个人都有力量！对于你来说，野蛮人，如果他们进入或经历叛逆情绪，他们对你没有选择或选择。

original_en_text: Real fine key this. No doubt it’ll open the way to somewhere special. Somewhere full of goodies, I’ll bet. Find the lock, and it’ll practically pay for itself!
original_zh_text: 这是一把好钥匙。我们可以带您去一个特殊的地方。这个地方到处都是好东西。事实上，一旦你找到了城堡，它就可用了，你就可以使用它了！

original_en_text: <hpage>Caretaker, I bring supplies from the town of bells below the Citadel.<page>And badly needed they are, miss bellringer. Ain’t much finding or foraging happening with this mob, what with them choir types all stalkin’ about the chambers beside.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;贝尔·巴特勒的城堡从村里运来货物。&lt;page&gt;贝林格先生的听众非常需要它，但他的唱诗班在隔壁房间漂浮，他们都在一个地方。

original_en_text: Buried in the warren of bells, at Pharloom’s core, seek my sullen uncle. That one has power to spare.
original_zh_text: 当你发现一个黑暗的叔叔埋在农场中间时，你有额外的力量。

original_en_text: So you found this place too, sister? This Citadel’s grand promise has been strangled away by cursed thread, but at least the great bell here grants us some sanctuary.<page>We’re amongst the blessed few... granted just a little more living.
original_zh_text: “你找到这个地方了吗，朋友？“城堡的壮丽景色充满了诅咒，但至少这里的巨大时钟为我们提供了庇护所。&lt;page&gt;我们是少数，是我们生活的一小部分。

original_en_text: Off you go now, dear one. If it’s my trinkets you covet, you can trade me your rosaries up at the shrine. Blessings and farewell!
original_zh_text: 如果你想要我的孩子，请把你的念珠带到圣所。

original_en_text: Ooohh... If we’re no longer pilgrims... What are we?
original_zh_text: 如果我们不是朝圣者，我们是什么？"

original_en_text: Crafty types used to go all a’clamour for this metal. S’not much to look at, but I still remember its value.
original_zh_text: 人们非常尊重金属。他们看不到任何东西，但记住它的价值。

original_en_text: This shrine, awakened... it calls out to ‘em, you see. “It’s safe here. Come on over!” ringing in the ears of every lost pilgrim and grubby so-and-so unlucky enough to have made it to this blasted Citadel with their wits intact.<page>Well, what’s done is done, and what’s rung is rung. Just make sure you come back here soon, you lout! I ain’t dealing with all the fresh intake myself!<hpage>If time permits, sir bug, I shall visit again.
original_zh_text: 寺庙醒了，它正在召唤你，米伦！迷失朝圣者和受污染穷人的声音在他耳边回响，他的智慧传遍了这座废弃的城堡。"&lt;page&gt;“你做了什么？回来吧，傻瓜。"&lt;hpage&gt;伯格先生，如果你有时间，我会回来的。

original_en_text: Guess I shouldn’t be surprised. It’s a fool act to try such a thing... Maybe even to think on it. Your kind ain’t designed to die.
original_zh_text: 难怪你认为尝试是愚蠢的，而且像你这样的人注定会死。

original_en_text: For the last part, I’ll also be needin’ that rune setter you’re carryin’. Clever old Weaver tool, that thing, and the perfect base on which to stretch our power.<page>Once you’ve collected for yourself the other critical parts, I’ll ask you pass it over as well.
original_zh_text: 在最后一部分，你必须调整你拥有的符文。“这是一种古老而聪明的织物工具，也是扩大我们权力的完美基础。&lt;page&gt;在收集了对您重要的其他组件后，我要求您将它们交给我。

original_en_text: Find the husk of my cousin, claimed by the scorned bugs of the swamps. A careless fool to let himself be taken, and dead they might be, but some glimmer of his soul can still be sensed.
original_zh_text: 如果你找到了你表弟的壳，沼泽里的昆虫就会把它捡起来。他们鲁莽、有自我缺陷，可能会死去，但他们仍然能感受到灵魂的光芒。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have the items requested. Craft me your trap that we may see these lands free.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我想我需要一些东西。让我成为你的陷阱，让这片土地自由。

original_en_text: T’was a good deed you did up above, dear one, saving me from them screeching flocks. Not seen the like of it in a long, long time.<page>I’ve returned with all sorts of new goodies, too. Let’s see if anything I’ve scavenged will fit your fancy.
original_zh_text: 你做得很好，把我从哭泣的绵羊手里救了出来。我不怕你。我已经很久没有见过这样的事情了。&lt;page&gt;我给你带了个新的看看合不合你的口味。

original_en_text: Don’t think I ain’t see’in it, bellringer! A whole lotta helpin’ you’ve been up to, both here and down below!<page>S’a strange mantle you’re takin’ for yourself, seeing all them bugs saved and wishes promised.<hpage>You find it strange, sir? I’ve found some solace in the service, and the rewards received have proved a boon on my journey.<page>Aye! But it ain’t your place now, is it? I see well what you are, Weaver’n more! It’s below your station! You ain’t no common sort meant for carin’ on us low folk.<hpage>I could say the same for you, who still chooses to remain cowled. You continue to pose as only a simple pilgrim. Don’t you think it’s past time you ceased the performance?<page>Leave off, Old One! Permit a bug their small disguise! It’s been a pleasant thing to play simple. And I weren’t calling for change, even if you seem insistent on bringing it!<hpage>Change was unavoidable, sir, whether I arrived or not. The monarch stirs. Its threads stretch far. My presence only accelerates the inevitable.<page>So what’re you hopin’ for, eh? Planning to usurp, to perch above us all as queen? Build up our hopes only to string us all in your own beastly web? Such is the way of Weavers and gods both...
original_zh_text: 我不敢相信我看到了这个，贝林格，如果我在这里，我会非常有帮助。&lt;page&gt;你穿的外套很奇怪，你会看到所有的蠕虫都被救出来了，你的愿望就会实现。&lt;hpage&gt;你认为这很罕见吗？在我的事工中，我找到了安慰，在我的旅程中，我得到了福音的回报。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的！哦，是的！但现在不同了，不是吗？事情不是这样运作的，不是吗？“威尔，你知道你是谁。我不是一个批评下层阶级的普通人。&lt;hpage&gt;我也可以这么说，但我仍然穿着牛仔裤。“你是一个朝圣者。"&lt;page&gt;去吧，老头。伪装成一只小昆虫。简单的游戏很有趣。我不寻求改变。我坚持这么做！&lt;hpage&gt;无论是否发生变化，这都是不可避免的。国王看起来很兴奋。&lt;page&gt;你想做什么才能赢得王位？我们都被困在野兽的网中了吗？上帝和上帝做到了这一点。

original_en_text: You keep at all that helpin’, you’re gonna start inspiring it in others! Best you think serious about what effect you might be causin’, bellringer!<page>Too much hope could prove a dangerous thing, ‘specially for all these bugs starved so long of it.
original_zh_text: 如果你继续提供帮助，你就会激励他人。柏林，你最好认真对待你的影响力！&lt;page&gt;太多的希望是危险的，尤其是对于所有渴望希望的昆虫来说。

original_en_text: Now, why don’t you hurry back to the shrine and let them all know what a good job you’ve done?<page>There might be a few more goodies to gather up on my way back, and I don’t need you lingering around in the meantime. Blessings and farewell!
original_zh_text: 现在，他们为什么不去寺庙告诉他他们做得有多好呢？"&lt;page&gt;回家的路上可能有什么好东西，或者暂时不需要步行。

original_en_text: Simply forged, and simply styled. Designed to open all sorts of different locks, if they be basic enough.
original_zh_text: 它容易锻造，也容易形成。如果足够简单的话，它的目的就是打开各种类型的锁。

original_en_text: Sister, sister! Let me confide in you! As I ascended the Citadel’s chambers to reach this place, I swear I heard the laughter of a child!<page>Wasn’t much more than an echo, and I confess me fear’s been playing awful tricks on me... and yet that voice still keeps ringing in my head.<page>Surely though, no bug so young and lively could survive within those heartless halls?
original_zh_text: 姐姐！“姐姐！“我相信你！当我走进城堡时，我发誓我听到孩子们在笑。&lt;page&gt;这只是一个回声，但我承认恐惧起着重要的作用，但它的声音仍然在我的脑海里。&lt;page&gt;对吧，对吧？这些小昆虫如何在恶劣的环境中生存？

original_en_text: Sister, you seen ‘em out there? Our new champion, that golden knight stalking the Citadel’s crumbling halls?<page>Tall, righteous bug. Not much for conversing. Still! I’d be long dead if not for their appearance.<page>And I ain’t the only one. Others have spoken of the knight’s timely deeds and rare bravery.<page>We’re desperate for any protection we can get, and that gleaming champion’s been offering their aid almost as much as you yourself.
original_zh_text: 姐姐，你看到了吗？我们的新冠军金骑士在城堡的废墟中漫步？&lt;page&gt;他个子很高，不太谈论正义。如果不是他们，他们早就死了。&lt;page&gt;有人谈到骑士们及时的行动和非凡的勇气。&lt;page&gt;我们迫切需要一切可能的保护，这位光荣的冠军给了我们与你们相同的支持。

original_en_text: If you’re going to keep skulkin’ around here while I work, you may as well buy something. Take a look dear one, don’t be shy!
original_zh_text: 如果我工作时你想躲在这里，就给你买点东西吧，亲爱的，看，别害羞！"

original_en_text: And last, as the base, seek a weapon of Weavers past. Should still be one left, down there in their largest nest, a snare to set a rune’o searing Silk. Our own trap’ll be woven tight about it.
original_zh_text: 最后，作为基金会，我们放弃了纺织品。符文必须有另一个陷阱，将燃烧的丝绸运送到更大的巢穴。陷阱正在转动。

original_en_text: Admit it! You done it! You shifty li’l bell-runger!<hpage>You have chosen a curious place to rest, sir. Do you perhaps know something of this shrine and its companions in the lands below?<page>Oh, so you ask funny questions as well as cutting bells free, eh? You certainly ain’t a pilgrim, but you’re clearly not of the Choir either. No! I know exactly what you are...<page>A bell-ringing lout! A weirdo! Don’t you realise what you’ve done, waking that shrine back up?<page>That bell has rung out far and wide! The wretched and the lost will have heard its call. They’ll be making their way here now.<page>Well, what’s done is done, and what’s rung is rung. Just make sure you come back here soon, you lout! You can help me deal with all the dirty little pilgrims and desperate scavengers who turn up.
original_zh_text: 我们会承认的！我做到了！你是《古兰经》的先知。&lt;hpage&gt;你知道这座寺庙和它的卫星，他们选择了一个奇怪的地方吗？&lt;page&gt;有一些有趣的问题和免费电话。你不是朝圣者，但你也不是唱诗班。不，不，不！不，不！我知道你是谁，你知道的。&lt;page&gt;贝尔看起来像个傻瓜。多么奇怪啊！“你知道我为重建圣殿做了什么吗？”&lt;page&gt;远处的钟声响起，迷路的人们听到了他的哭声。&lt;page&gt;你所做的，你所做的，现在你可以回去帮助傻瓜、肮脏的朝圣者和绝望的掠食者。

original_en_text: Oi! What’s this? Suddenly havin’ second thoughts? For sure it’s a frightful thing to attempt, but you’ve already put in all the leg work!<page>She up top’ll already be sensin’ your goal, vague-like maybe, but there ain’t no worth to backin’ out now.
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿。你在干什么？你突然改变主意了？当然，我害怕尝试，但我会尽我最大的努力！&lt;page&gt;她已经觉得你就像玛丽一样，但现在她不应该放弃。

original_en_text: Stretch a spool out nice and long with this fine-wrought tool. The perfect purchase if you’re planning to hoard a lot of Silk for yourself!
original_zh_text: 我们将使用这个伟大的工具来开发电影。如果您正在考虑购买大量丝绸，这是完美的选择！

original_en_text: You keep at all that helpin’, you’re gonna start inspiring it in others! Best think serious about what effect you might be causin’, bellringer!<page>Too much hope could prove a dangerous thing, ‘specially for all these bugs starved so long of it.
original_zh_text: 如果你继续提供帮助，你就会激励他人。柏林，请认真考虑您的影响！&lt;page&gt;太多的希望是危险的，尤其是对于所有渴望希望的昆虫来说。

original_en_text: Ooohh... What new horror now besets us?<page>Is this fresh punishment for our sins, or yet another test to prove our faith?<hpage>It is neither, good bug. In this disaster you bear no blame.<hpage>Hold close to your companions, and I will work swift to see this madness stilled.
original_zh_text: 他现在害怕什么？&lt;page&gt;这是对我们罪恶的新惩罚吗？这是对信仰的考验吗？&lt;hpage&gt;她们都是好母亲，对这场灾难不负责任。&lt;hpage&gt;随着合作伙伴的加入，我们将尽快结束这场疯狂。

original_en_text: For the base, we’ll be needin’ a weapon of Weavers past. Search down low, aside the paths of bone, inside their largest nest. S’a snare device, one to set a rune’o searing Silk.
original_zh_text: 最大的巢穴需要韦伯过去的武器，它们着眼于骨头的路径，鲁尼用来燃烧丝绸的陷阱。

original_en_text: I swear I heard it, sister... That laugh! It almost sounded like they were enjoying themself...
original_zh_text: “我听到你的微笑，女士。看起来你玩得很开心. ...

original_en_text: Hold this while makin’ music and you’ll soon hear its function. Amplifies song, it does! Sends it out full and bright. Ideal if you’re ever planning on performing for a crowd.
original_zh_text: 当你播放音乐时，你可以感觉到你手的功能。这首歌真的很好听。它会产生完整而明亮的声音。如果您正在为观众准备演出，这将是您的完美选择。

original_en_text: How about we get your loose beads all strung up safe? I’ll pinch a few for their braiding, but that’s surely worth it for the peace of mind.
original_zh_text: 如果所有珍珠都被收集起来会发生什么？我还会带一些T恤和一些布料，但出于安全原因，它们是值得的。

original_en_text: Ooh, I’m glad I wriggled my way over here! What a bounty’s been laid out by our benefactors, those generous Conductors! Giants amongst bugs they are, all-seeing and kind!<page>It’s beautiful here, and goodies are everywhere. Only enough for one though, deary, so don’t be greedy! You know I got here first. Blessings, and farewell!
original_zh_text: 一位伟大的礼物捐赠者和慷慨的司机！它们是巨大的昆虫，它们什么都知道，而且它们很好。&lt;page&gt;太美了，到处都是好东西。够自己吃了！我是第一个到达的。恭喜你，先生！

original_en_text: You stay close, sister. Them halls beside are crawling with haunted husks.<page>Wandering will only bring death, pointed and painful!
original_zh_text: “小心点，姐姐。隔壁的房间里堆满了鬼壳。&lt;page&gt;朝圣只会带来死亡、腐败和苦难！

original_en_text: Have you done it yet, bellringer? Wriggled deep? Discovered the depths of obsession that brought this place so low?<hpage>If you speak of this Citadel and its Silk, Caretaker, then yes, I now know the start of it. <hpage>In the ward down below, I saw it clear, the hollowed husks, and the many torturous implements... machines to instill a bug with thread, that would see their life extended.<page>Aye! That’s it, in part! But there’s more scale to it than all that. Just think of’em greedily shoving the Silk into their shells, the madness that overcame them, eternal life for mortal bugs! Then think on how long it’s all gone on...<hpage>...The children born of them, and all the pilgrims after... The Silk has seeded deep into this kingdom’s shells, generations deep...<hpage>No wonder Pharloom’s bugs proved such easy prey for that haunted thread. It had only to seek for itself to reach them.<page>Ho ho! Now you’re seein’ it, bellringer! These poor pilgrims, all born bound to the cruel system of our world, now stricken in its new cursed web.<page>You at least are free from it. And free to shake it all up... if’n that’s your choosing.
original_zh_text: 你已经做到了，贝琳达？你有深深的恐惧吗？你有没有注意到，这种依恋的深度使这个地方如此之低？&lt;hpage&gt;如果你对城堡、丝绸和卫兵感兴趣，是的。&lt;hpage&gt;在下面的房间里，我们可以清楚地看到挖掘出来的子弹和酷刑武器。该机器使用流量来引入错误，从而延长其使用寿命。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的！哦，是的！把它切成碎片！梯子比这个大。想象一下，贪婪地从水槽里挖出丝绸并拼命地把它拔出来。想想它会持续多久。&lt;hpage&gt;...他们的孩子和跟随他们的朝圣者。丝绸深深植根于这个王国的外壳中，代代相传。&lt;hpage&gt;难怪法老的昆虫轻易被鬼童吃掉。你只需要找到自己就能找到它。&lt;page&gt;这是什么！“你知道吗，柏林？“出生在我们残酷政权下的可怜的朝圣者现在被这个新的被诅咒的网络俘虏，现在他们在同一个地方。&lt;page&gt;至少你可以把它拿出来。您可以自由地改变任何您想要的东西。

original_en_text: Well, well, if it isn’t my very own shadow, the clever little red-cloak! You still following me around, trying to pinch away some of the goodies I sniff out?<hpage>You mistake my intent, ma’am, somewhat ungenerously. The pilgrims of the settlement below were worried by your long absence. It was on their behalf that I tracked you, again.<page>Is that so? What a worrying bunch of busybodies they are! I’m still able to fend for meself!<page>Hmph... and yet, perhaps ‘tis a warm thing that I remain in their thoughts so. I hadn’t expected that. And I can’t deny that you too have done me a good turn once more.<page>That awful flock almost had me, truth be told, and I still have to wonder at your intentions, dear one... but bless you, all the same!
original_zh_text: 好吧，好吧，如果不是我的影子，红外套！你还在追我吗，想杀一个闻起来像我的好人？&lt;hpage&gt;我知道你误解了我的意图，而且你并不慷慨。来自邻近殖民地的朝圣者担心他长期缺席。"&lt;page&gt;是这样吗？这是一群真正参与其中的人！你一定要吃！"&lt;page&gt;是的，是的，是的……...但以这种方式留在你的脑海里对我来说可能是一件很热的事情。此外，我不知道我在做什么。我知道这不会发生。"&lt;page&gt;说实话，这个可怕的金额几乎到了我的头上，我仍然想知道你的意图，爱是一种祝福！

original_en_text: Looking for goodies of your own, dear one? You’d do well to avoid the dark vaults near here. They say the keepers inside were jealous hoarders even before the silken curse came down.<hpage>You have more familiarity with the Citadel than most, madam. How long have you spent here, surviving amongst the haunted corridors?<page>Oh, long enough. S’not such a bad lot, all told. The memories of my pilgrimage have all faded now, but a life spent in the Citadel’s golden halls was all I ever wished for.<page>And lo and behold, my humble wish was granted! Certainly, the place might be a bit past its prime, but it’d be churlish of me to complain now, wouldn’t it?
original_zh_text: 您正在寻找的东西对您有利吗？甚至在丝绸诅咒之前，里面的警卫就是一个嫉妒的牧师。&lt;hpage&gt;你比大多数人更了解自己的姓氏。你在那栋鬼屋里住了多久了？&lt;page&gt;她对朝圣之旅的所有记忆都消失了，但她仍然想住在城堡的金色房间里。&lt;page&gt;当然，这个地方可能正处于鼎盛时期，但现在抱怨是不道德的，对吧？实际上？

original_en_text: Part of an ancient mask, or a fractured shard of someone’s visage? With the full thing, you’d be better able to protect your shell.
original_zh_text: 您可以补充旧面膜或某人面部的一部分，以更好地保护皮肤。

original_en_text: What a calamity has befallen our holy Citadel! I ain’t never seen anything like it in my long life.<page>Times like this, we must be sure to help each other. Dig deep, dear one, I’ll be needing a lot of rosaries to survive what’s comin’!
original_zh_text: 圣城遭遇了多么可怕的灾难啊！在我的一生中，我从未见过这样的事情。&lt;page&gt;在这个时代，我们需要互相帮助。亲爱的朋友们，深深地沉浸在其中。我们必须经历一些需要很多袖子的事情！

original_en_text: All your work, and look! They keep arrivin’. It’s bugs aplenty up here now. Hapless, weak, but alive they are!<hpage>More scared than weak, they seem to me. It is heartening knowing these few have survived safe for your care.<page>That’s your work, bellringer! Not mine. Ringin’ and helpin’! Hope they recognise your efforts, ‘cause I ain’t providing much, and I ain’t one for fighting if that Choir and their pins ever come callin’.
original_zh_text: 看看我们所有的工作！他们会继续来。现在有很多bug。他们软弱，软弱，活着。&lt;hpage&gt;恐惧不仅仅是软弱，我很高兴我照顾了你并活了下来。"&lt;page&gt;“贝尔，你不是我的助理。我没有提供太多，所以我想感谢你的努力。"

original_en_text: Stop and share some of your rosaries before you go scurrying off again, dear one. I’m sure to have something that’s to your liking!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的朋友们，在再次匆忙之前，请停下来冥想并分享。

original_en_text: Half a spider’s spool. You’d just have to find its match. Them ol’ Weavers built some fine things alright. They’re all long dead, but their craftwork still gleams bright.
original_zh_text: 一张半蜘蛛纸。您需要做的就是找到您的游戏。“工作”做得很好。尽管他早已去世，但他的作品仍然闪闪发光。

original_en_text: A gleaming find for you climbing types. With this in your claw, you’ll be able to stick to walls for as long as you like!
original_zh_text: 美丽的入口是攀岩的理想场所。你的脚靠在墙上能站多久？

original_en_text: Down in the mosslands, still clinging to her failed chapel, my sister’ll part with her power, if asked kind enough.
original_zh_text: 我姐姐痴迷于教堂在泥泞的田野里的失败，如果有人说我很好，我就会放弃我的权威。

original_en_text: <hpage>Grant me your aid, sir. If your trap provides a path to freedom, both for myself and your land’s bugs, I may indeed choose to trigger it.<hpage>What work do you require of me now to see your service made?<page>It’s my family’s strength you’ll need be seeking, bellringer, us three ol’ bugs still alive, spread ‘cross this kingdom, and that sad soul you’re already carryin’ there, the last of my poor cousin, dead and drained in those rotten swamps.<page>Each of my family has power, raw, savage stuff. For you, they’ll give it, if for their fascination at the act, or the thrill of defiance... or because they have no choice at all.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;如果你的陷阱给了我和你土地上的昆虫一条自由之路，我会决定挑衅你。&lt;hpage&gt;您想做什么来验证您的服务？&lt;page&gt;我必须在我的家人身上找到力量，一只钟，三只还活着的老虫子，还有你带来的悲伤灵魂，可怜的最后一个死去的人，他死于干燥和腐烂。&lt;page&gt;我们的家庭里有一些强大、原始、野蛮的东西。因为对你来说，是因为当他们进来时，当他们经历叛逆情绪时，要么给你选择，要么你别无选择。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have opened the way above these halls, and bested the white knight that stood as guardian.<hpage>Child of the monarch, she claimed herself at the end, and her shell suggested it true, a being born purely from Silk woven tight. <hpage>That such a feat is possible... I have seen life woven from Silk before, but tiny, transient... Never like this...<page>Aye, bellringer! You’ve slain a marvel indeed... Well, flawed marvel, at least.<page>One to keep far from she was, least for us mortal sorts. Look of a child and a mind to match, but her’s been up wanderin’ this Citadel longer’n most. Even in its long silence, way ‘fore you came and roused its ire. <page>Might’a seen herself this place’s protector, keepin’ it clean and quiet as she did. Course quiet meant most crossin’ her path found a painful end from her pin.<page>I’d be sayin’ thanks for the slaying, but with all the other husks now awoken and enraged, a bug’s chances ain’t grown by much.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我打破了这个洞，击败了白衣骑士。&lt;hpage&gt;毕竟，她自称是君主的女儿，她的贝壳证明了这一点，她是一种编织细丝绸的自然生物。&lt;hpage&gt;我见过生命与丝绸交织在一起，但它从未如此短暂和短暂。&lt;page&gt;贝林格先生他扼杀了奇迹至少，这是一个不完美的奇迹。&lt;page&gt;至少对于我们人类来说，我们还很遥远。我同意，她看起来像个小女孩，但她已经在这座城堡里走了很长时间了。即使在这漫长的沉默中，在你挑衅之前。&lt;page&gt;他可能认为自己是这个地方的守护者，以保持它的干净和安静，但这个过程的沉默意味着他遇到的大多数人都有一个悲惨的结局。&lt;page&gt;我想感谢他杀了他，但昆虫存在的可能性很低，因为所有其他贝壳都醒着，愤怒着。

original_en_text: Hello again, dear one. Looks like we both made it up here, safe as told. And what a shock to find you were speaking the truth about this place!<page>A settlement like this in the Citadel, nice and safe, cloistering so many bugs with minds intact! Never seen anything like it, nor even imagined such.<page>Makes trading away all of my nice bits and baubles much easier. After all, I want to take lots and lots of rosaries with me when my strength finally fails!
original_zh_text: 再见亲爱的我们和解了，我们很安全。“我很惊讶你所说的关于这个地方的话是真的。&lt;page&gt;城堡很好、安全，而且远离昆虫。有了这样的设施，心不变！我以前从未见过这样的事情，我无法想象。&lt;page&gt;我所有漂亮的小工具都让交易变得容易。当我的力量耗尽时，我会大量使用罗杰！

original_en_text: Oho? You linger here still? Perhaps, like myself, you have been bewitched by the Plasmium’s beautiful glow?<page>Then join me, you must! A new assistant is needed. Together we shall unlock the secrets of this wondrous substance!
original_zh_text: 你在干什么？是的，对吧？你想和我玩吗？和我一样，你也被美丽的山景迷住了。&lt;page&gt;和我们在一起！请跟我来！我需要一个新助理。让我们一起探索这种神奇的材料的秘密！

original_en_text: There, you are replete with wonderful Plasmium once more! You can begin injecting it at once. Now, off with you!
original_zh_text: 另外，你还有一道很棒的菜！您可以立即开始注射。对，对，对！

original_en_text: Assistant... You will help, yes? The buds have ripened... The Plasmium harvest can begin...
original_zh_text: “拜托，助理，你能帮帮我吗？“真的吗？“球已经打了。血浆的回收已经开始。

original_en_text: Leave your fear behind... Cast it off like an old shell. Give me what I need...
original_zh_text: 像旧壳一样扔掉它，给他们你需要的东西。

original_en_text: Bring the Pure Plasmium. It must be tested... ingested.<page>Ready the Needle Phial to full charge... Strike deep the ripened buds. Return that precious liquid life to me... Assistant.
original_zh_text: 获得清洁血浆需要吸入测试&lt;page&gt;准备好安装别针，尽情享受成熟的按钮吧。让宝贵的生命流淌。

original_en_text: Excellent! With two bugs at the task, the rate of discovery shall greatly increase!<page>Now! Before he up and vanished, my previous assistant seeded the warrens below with Plasmium buds.<page>The buds should be ripening as we speak, and the nectar within must be extracted before they reach maturity.<page>With the right tool in claw, collecting the nectar is an easy process. I’ll even lend you my own Needle Phial for the job.<page>Once you locate a bud, simply charge the Phial until readied, then release its needle into a bud’s core. Do it right, and it’ll suck out the nectar in one clean pop!<page>Return them to me when you’ve retrieved the necessary samples. With the right nectar, and the right testing, Plasmium can reveal even more of its wondrous properties!
original_zh_text: 这太不可思议了！任务中的两个错误将大大加快检测速度。&lt;page&gt;快点，现在！在我醒来消失之前，我的前助理在我下面的小屋里培养了一种寄生微生物。&lt;page&gt;如前所述，纽扣必须成熟，其中所含的蜂蜜必须在成熟前提取。&lt;page&gt;使用合适的美甲工具，蜂蜜收集就是一个简单的过程。我借给你一根针。&lt;page&gt;当您找到按钮时，用针填充它直到准备好，然后将针放置在按钮的中心。一旦你离开它，它就会看起来干净并吮吸蜂蜜。&lt;page&gt;收集完所需的样本后，请将样本退还给我。通过正确的蜂蜜和正确的测试，血浆显示出更令人惊叹的性能。

original_en_text: Assistant, that odour... aahhh... you have the Plasmified Blood...

Keep using the Plasmium Phial, and enjoy all the wonderful effects it has on your body. Once your Plasmium reserve runs dry, visit me again.<page>I’ll charge a few rosaries for refills, but you can be confident that every bead goes towards our vital studies!
original_zh_text: 继续使用等离子火焰，享受它对您身体的所有美妙影响。如果您没有血浆，请联系我们。&lt;page&gt;我们正在收集一些帐户，但我们相信每个帐户都将用于重要的研究！

original_en_text: Do you fear the Plasmium, even now? Ahhh... Assistant... open your mind to the possibilities...
original_zh_text: 你恐高吗？哦，是的！他的助手敞开心扉，抓住了机会。

original_en_text: Assistant... What we might become... together.
original_zh_text: 帮助我们了解我们是谁以及我们是谁。

original_en_text: Ahhhh. Yes... Assistant. So loyal... Take the Needle Phial... find the buds below. They are ripe...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract that Pure Plasmium.<page>This shell shall become what you need it to be... Plasmium can cure all.
original_zh_text: 哦，是的，对。他的助手很忠诚。更换针的位置。请按下面的按钮进行搜索。他们成熟了。&lt;page&gt;菲尔，我已经尽了最大努力来深入研究纯血浆。&lt;page&gt;血浆可以治愈一切。

original_en_text: Assistant! You’re still dallying about here? I’ve an eager need for pure Plasmium, fresh from the bud.<page>Just one fully charged stab of my Needle Phial straight into a ripe bud! You’ll suck the Plasmium right up!<page>Now, pop down into those worm warrens and extract it for me! What could possibly be more important?
original_zh_text: 助理！你想和我玩吗？我需要一个干净的等离子按钮。&lt;page&gt;您需要做的就是将针头装满并直接按下成熟按钮。它吸收血浆。&lt;page&gt;进入蠕虫的王国，为我挖掘它！什么是重要的？

original_en_text: <hpage>I am curious about the equipment you have here, and the blue liquid contained within. What study consumes you?<page>Ahh yes! So this miraculous substance intrigues you too! A wonder beyond wonders, miracle made material!<page>Plasmium! A naturally occurring elixir with no equal! It heals wounds and strengthens shells! I suspect it can even defy death itself!<hpage>Plasmium, you call it? I have encountered its like before, or else a substance of remarkable similarity...<page>Highly unlikely! The grey and barren soil of the mainland could never produce something as singular as this, and that is undisputable fact!<page>Plasmium was discovered by my master at the farthest edge of Pharloom, hidden deep in salt-stricken waters. I brought it to these caves under her direction, to study how it flourishes in a foreign place.<page>Perhaps, like myself, you have been bewitched by the Plasmium’s beautiful glow? Would you assent then, to assisting me in my studies?
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我对你们的设备和那里的蓝色液体很感兴趣。什么样的研究消耗能源？&lt;page&gt;是的，正确的。是的，是的，这种令人惊叹的材料也会让你着迷！超越惊喜的奇迹，精彩的材料！&lt;page&gt;等离子体前所未有的自然奇观可以治愈伤口并增强外壳。我相信我能忍受死亡。&lt;hpage&gt;这座山叫什么名字？你以前见过他吗？他们看起来非常相似。&lt;page&gt;不可否认的事实是，这片大陆灰色而荒凉的土地从未产生过如此奇怪的东西。&lt;page&gt;这些等离子体被发现隐藏在法罗群岛边缘附近的深水中，在他的指导下，它们被带到一个洞穴中研究它们如何在未知的地方繁衍生息。&lt;page&gt;你可能和我一样对这段美丽的段落着迷。

original_en_text: Plasmium is a marvel of nature! And a new assistant is sorely needed. Together, let us unlock its secrets!
original_zh_text: 高原是一个自然奇观。我需要一个新助理。让我们一起发现这个秘密吧！

original_en_text: Oho? A new face! Not here to bother, I hope? I’ve critical studies underway in these twisting tunnels and can afford no distractions!<page>You haven’t met Zango, my assistant, by chance? An indolent sort? Short, slovenly, rather unreliable-seeming?<hpage>In a dark cave below here, I encountered a shell not dissimilar from your own. I suspect your assistant may have met an unfortunate end.<page>Ah ha! That careless buffoon. No surprises then. That lump never shone with the talent for true discovery.<page>Now! To my work I must return! With my assistant so rudely dying on me, I’ve tasks enough for two bugs.<page>Unless you have further interest in my precious Plasmium, kindly leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: 你在干什么？是的，对吧？新面孔！“你不想打扰我，是吗？实际上？我们正在对这条蜿蜒的隧道进行严格的研究。&lt;page&gt;你从未见过助理，是吗？什么样的休息？速度、速度、可靠性。&lt;hpage&gt;在下面黑暗的洞穴里，我发现了一些与它的壳没什么不同的东西。&lt;page&gt;哦，哦，哦！公众从未表现出发现的天赋，这并不奇怪。&lt;page&gt;快点，现在！我得回去工作了！我的工作可以容忍两个错误，因为我的助理死了，他不尊重我。&lt;page&gt;如果你不关心我珍贵的血浆，那就让我休息吧。"

original_en_text: Oh? Those who hesitate learn nothing, you know! The wondrous bright glow of Plasmium makes all things clear!
original_zh_text: 你在干什么？真的吗？我不认识嫌疑人。等离子体令人难以置信的明亮光线将揭示一切！

original_en_text: <hpage>I have retrieved the Pure Plasmium, as requested. Know that, in your current state, I feel some reservation passing it to you.<hpage>This path your research takes... The final result may not be pleasant.<page>Pure Plasmium? No... Assistant... You must not doubt... It is precious. Perfect. It was needed... You have done well. As always...
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;需要的时候我会拿起盘子。我很担心你现在的情况。&lt;hpage&gt;学校继续这样做，最终的结果可能并不令人愉快。&lt;page&gt;血浆干净。不，我们不能怀疑这一点。是的，我说了。

original_en_text: These lands have taken the Plasmium well... the soil has drunk it deep, and the creatures bloom so beautifully... have you seen them?<hpage>The effect of your Plasmium on the beasts here is all too evident. Great change has been inflicted upon them.<hpage>There is an echo also of other infections I have witnessed. I wonder at the meaning of it all... or if I am perhaps imagining similarities where there are none.<page>Assistant, ahhh... you grow more inquisitive... We both seek deeper insight...<page>Could we... peer deeper inside somehow...? Let us think on it...
original_zh_text: 土壤是如此饱和，我看到这些生物盛开美丽的花朵。&lt;hpage&gt;桌子对动物的影响在这里非常明显。&lt;hpage&gt;这和我见过的其他感染很相似。“我想知道你的意思。你可以想象一个地方和另一个地方一样。&lt;page&gt;你越来越好奇，我们都在寻找想法。&lt;page&gt;你能帮我看看吗？让我们想想时间。

original_en_text: Ahhhh... Assistant... greed was ever your greatest failing. Do not guard your discoveries so jealously...
original_zh_text: 哦，哦.助手们的贪婪是他最大的失败。不要冒后果的风险。

original_en_text: For you... dear assistant... drink deep my liquid life...
original_zh_text: 亲爱的助手，喝我生命中的液体吧。

original_en_text: Since you have proven yourself a capable assistant, take this delightful implement of my own invention, a Plasmium Phial.<page>With it, you can inject precious Plasmium straight into your body. Almost painlessly!<hpage>Your tool certainly looks sharp enough to pierce my shell, sir, but why should I want to do so?<page>Because filling your body with Plasmium is so beneficial! It protects you from harm! And it feels so exquisitely good!<page>My assistant and I have been injecting Plasmium into the local flora and fauna since we arrived. No ill effects have been observed, and so we can conclude that the process is utterly, completely safe.<page>Keep using the Plasmium Phial, and enjoy all the wonderful effects it has on your body. original_en_text: Ahh, and exactly the required amount! A satisfactory effort, assistant!<page>With this pure Plasmium extract, I may finally come to understand this wondrous substance.
original_zh_text: 这是我们需要的数量。好的先生.&lt;page&gt;在这种纯血浆提取物的帮助下，我终于能够理解这种令人惊讶的物质。

original_en_text: Assistant... You will help, yes? The buds have ripened... The Plasmium harvest can begin...
original_zh_text: “拜托，助理，你能帮帮我吗？“真的吗？“球已经打了。血浆的回收已经开始。

original_en_text: <hpage>Take it, sir, though what insight it will grant you I cannot say.<page>Have faith, dear assistant... A glorious form... a glorious future, shimmering back at us...
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;你不知道这对你意味着什么，但你必须接受它。&lt;page&gt;亲爱的朋友们，经过这一切，我了解到，最伟大的知识只能来自于对血浆的信仰。&lt;page&gt;他收集的血液闪闪发光。光明的未来摆在我们面前。

original_en_text: You decline, Assistant? You cannot. The buds... The harvest. It must occur... For the source, and your saving...
original_zh_text: 助理，你说“不”了吗？我们不能，我们需要收获，你的收入和储蓄。

original_en_text: You would refuse?! There is much work to be done, and it is all so achingly slow when I have no aid!
original_zh_text: 你不会答应的！有很多工作要做，但如果你不帮忙，一切都会变慢。

original_en_text: Ohhhhh... Assistant? Is that you?... You return at last, my friend?<hpage>Sir, you are in a disturbing state. This substance sprouts from within your shell. Time will see it consume you entirely. Would you seek aid?<page>No... No... Assistant... you are confused. A wonderful thing, we become. The Plasmium, our great research... We have progressed.<page>The research must continue. Soon... I shall become a source.
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。助理？是你吗？朋友们，你们终于回来了吗？&lt;hpage&gt;这种物质是由感知产生的。随着时间的推移，它会告诉你你已经完全精疲力尽了。你需要帮助吗？&lt;page&gt;不，对等离子体的研究正在增加。&lt;page&gt;调查将很快继续. ...我将成为源头。

original_en_text: Assistant! Have you come to refill your reserve of Plasmium?
original_zh_text: 助理！你是来装血浆的吗？

original_en_text: Oho? A new face! Not here to bother, I hope? original_en_text: There... more. Let it seep deep into your shell... do not begrudge the pain...
original_zh_text: 你离开了. ...不要嫉妒痛苦。

original_en_text: The Pure Plasmium... you have it. I can... smell it on you.
original_zh_text: 等离子体-我能闻到你的味道。

original_en_text: Through consumption of the blood... we shall at last attain enlightenment...<page>For your reward... take the gland from within my shell... my gift to you.<page>I have no more need of it... and it shall grant you... unending reserves of Plasmium...<page>Yes... Plasmium. Pure... beautiful... Plasmium...
original_zh_text: 他们会吃血，并在适当的时候被揭露。&lt;page&gt;作为奖励，请把我皮肤上的铁除掉。&lt;page&gt;我们不再需要它，我们将为您提供无限的山地保护区。&lt;page&gt;“是的，先生。李说.关于血浆

original_en_text: Assistant! How goes your work? Have you extracted a sufficient amount of Plasmium for me?
original_zh_text: 助理！你的工作怎么样？血浆是否足够？

original_en_text: Excellent! With two bugs at the task, the rate of discovery shall greatly increase!<page>Now! original_en_text: Are you so enchanted by the Plasmium that you will not part with it? You are more like that dolt Zango than I first thought!<page>Its enlightenings are beyond your meagre mind! Give me the phial, assistant, or the deeper secrets of this substance will never be revealed!
original_zh_text: 你不想因为被这个美丽的国家吸引而放弃吗？珊瑚看起来比看起来更重要。&lt;page&gt;请给我一瓶并帮助。否则，这个问题最深的秘密永远不会被揭露。

original_en_text: Aahhh... and you have been using your Plasmium... good. Let me replenish your reserve...
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。血浆利用率高。我们将尊重您的预订。

original_en_text: Now. Share the discovery... Take this Plasmium Phial... Plunge it deep. Feel its vigour soak your shell...<page>If more is needed... If the Plasmium runs dry... return. Visit me again... That you may live, long... my loyal assistant.
original_zh_text: 快速分享结果。小瓶板：感受皮肤的活力，你就会感受到它。&lt;page&gt;如果您需要更多。当你的血浆枯竭时，再看看我，你会活很长一段时间。
您的第一个愿望将会实现。

original_zh_text: 100%完成游戏，并在钢魂模式下完成游戏。

original_en_text: Open all of the Citadel’s Ventrica Stations
original_zh_text: 我们将解锁城堡中的所有亚特兰蒂斯站点。
我们将使用所有的丝绸技术。
在茂密的森林中建立您的职业生涯。

original_en_text: Acquire a map of each area
Record all items in the Materium
Rescue all of Pharloom’s lost fleas and receive their final gift
original_zh_text: 保存所有丢失的芯片并获得您的最后一份礼物。

original_en_text: Defeat Grand Mother Silk and entrap her with the Soul Snare
original_zh_text: 他击败了丝绸奶奶，并将她锁在了灵魂陷阱中。

original_en_text: Rescue half of Pharloom’s lost fleas
original_zh_text: 我救了一半丢失的跳蚤

original_en_text: <hpage>Very well. This final rite... what would you have me do?<page>The time... of birth is close. Now give... its shell. Host... the final rite.<page>The time of birth... is near.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;好吧，好吧，这是一种仪式。你想让我做什么？&lt;page&gt;时间是什么？出生的时刻即将到来，现在让我告诉你，他是宴会上的最后一位客人。&lt;page&gt;出生的时间越来越近了。

original_en_text: You may rest here in this sacred place, but know, if you choose to step further, you shall see my weapon raised.
original_zh_text: 你可以在这个神圣的地方休息，但如果你决定走得更远，你会看到我的手降临。

original_en_text: The time... the time of birth approaches. The bud cries. Yearning. The final rite may begin.<page>White shell. Red cloak. Bug strong and old. The time of birth is near. Aid now the final rite.
original_zh_text: 现在是时候了，出生的时刻已经到来，谎言在尖叫，投票已经开始。&lt;page&gt;皮肤白皙。红色外套。昆虫强大而古老。出生的时间越来越近了。我会帮助你完成最后的仪式。

original_en_text: P... Pollip Hearts. Gathered. Gathered all. All that is needed, is given.
original_zh_text: P.C.先生，我不知道。息肉心脏将你们联系在一起，并为她提供她需要的一切。

original_en_text: <hpage>I hear your request, but I must decline. My travels will take me far beyond this wood.<page>Decline. No. Decline, not. The time of birth approaches. The first rite must begin.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我听了你的请求，但我不得不拒绝。“我的旅程远远超出了这些树林。&lt;page&gt;他没有跌倒，他被拒绝，分娩的时候已经到来。第一场仪式开始了。

original_en_text: <hpage>If you have knowledge or power to grant, I will aid you. These Pollip Hearts you desire... they can be found about the wood?<page>P... Pollip Hearts. Found in the wood. Yes, bug.<page>Seek out the purple blooms. Inside... the hearts.<page>The time of birth approaches. Pollip Hearts are needed. Bring them, bug, and power will be shared.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;如果您有任何知识或技能，我们可以帮助您。你能在树上找到你想要的聚乙烯吗？&lt;page&gt;P.S.我不知道我是波利菲莫斯的核心。我在树林里发现了他。&lt;page&gt;我正在寻找粉红色的花。心，心，心。&lt;page&gt;我需要鲤鱼灵魂来承载它们，昆虫和力量来分享。

original_en_text: Bug. Cloaked by red. The time of rebirth approaches.<page>First rite is completed. Prepared. For the time of birth.<page>Take... take. The refuse of the rite.
original_zh_text: 穿上红色外套，是时候恢复了。&lt;page&gt;第一次仪式结束后，他们准备分娩。&lt;page&gt;雷沃. ...是的，我坚决拒绝。

original_en_text: Rrrr... rite. The first rite must begin. Pollip Hearts are needed.
original_zh_text: 是的，是的，是的……...开始干杯。你需要一颗宽广的心。

original_en_text: <hpage>I am unable to help you. Not now. Perhaps another traveller will offer aid.<page>None... none come now. Once times, many bugs. Many. Now none. The final rite... the time of birth approaches...
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;您无法帮助自己，但您可以帮助其他旅客。&lt;page&gt;有很多错误是没有人会犯的，有些人会犯的，但到目前为止还没有最终的事件。

original_en_text: Bug. Red cloak. Far-travelled. Bring it here... the bud.<page>It calls. It cries for the rite. Offer it.
original_zh_text: 红色连衣裙离这里很远，请把它带到这里。&lt;page&gt;我们需要意识，我们提供意识。

original_en_text: Then go no further, that peace may remain between us.
original_zh_text: 你不必再去了。我们之间有和平。

original_en_text: The bud... weak. New. It must be nourished.<page>Nnn... nourished. It will be nourished.
original_zh_text: 这是一个弱消息. ...他们需要被喂食。&lt;page&gt;天哪！“你可以养活我们。

original_en_text: Seek out the purple blooms. Inside... the precious hearts.<page>The time of birth approaches. Pollip Hearts are needed. Bring them, bug, and power will be shared.
original_zh_text: 我正在寻找粉红色的花。宝贝宝贝&lt;page&gt;我需要鲤鱼灵魂来承载它们，昆虫和力量来分享。

original_en_text: Bug. Only you are left. None more tread here. None.<page>For the rite. The Pollip Hearts. They are needed. Bring them here, for the rite.
original_zh_text: 这个bug是你的，没有人能把它放进去，号码是&lt;page&gt;事故期间。我是波利普的心脏。您必须在这里参加活动。

original_en_text: The first rite. Rite of the pollip. The first rite can begin.
The precious hearts... Give them. For the time of birth, for the rite, they must bleed...

The... the time of birth approaches. Now, the rite of the pollip.<page>Bug. Only you are left. None more tread here. None.<page>For the rite. The Pollip Hearts. They are needed. Bring them here, for the rite.
original_zh_text: 这是什么？出生的时候到了，这是一个警察仪式。&lt;page&gt;只剩下你一个人了，没有人能进来。&lt;page&gt;事故期间。我是波利普的心脏。您必须在这里参加活动。

original_en_text: Shhhh... shell. White mask, red cloak.<page>Bug. A living bug.<hpage>A bug I am, at least in part, but you are something quite different. I apologise if I have roused you from some deep slumber.<page>Slumber. Long sleep. But now is the waking.<page>Growth. Time of birth. The time of birth approaches.<page>Heed, bug. The time of birth approaches.
original_zh_text: 红面具（红面具）&lt;page&gt;虫神还活着！&lt;hpage&gt;我是一名舞者，至少在某种程度上是这样，但你太不同了。&lt;page&gt;这是一个漫长的梦想，但现在是时候醒来了。&lt;page&gt;现在是分娩的时候了。&lt;page&gt;“小心，鲍勃。该分娩了。

original_en_text: Th... the bud. It must be offered. It calls for it... for the rite.
original_zh_text: 这是什么？它会给你一颗不可或缺的种子。

original_en_text: The time will come... Soon. The time of birth approaches.
Halt, stranger. I am charged forever to guard the sacred shrine beyond.<page>Any who wish to pass must cross their weapon with my own.
original_zh_text: “停下来，陌生人，我的职责就是永远守护那座遥远的寺庙。&lt;page&gt;无论谁走过，他都必须牵着我的手。"

original_en_text: You may remain here and rest, if you choose. I am no enemy of yours. Only if you try to step beyond will I raise my weapon against you.<hpage>Then tell me, warrior, of the shrine you guard. These caves on wood’s edge seem long forgotten.<page>Some things may be hidden, but never forgotten. The shrine remains to remember the wood’s first seed, her that once was and always is.<page>I am the last bound to protect it. Sadly, in that service, many have fallen to my blade.
original_zh_text: 我不是你的敌人。我只会在我想去找你的时候在你的手中。&lt;hpage&gt;“兵哥哥，你在哪座寺庙守着？“森林边缘的洞穴似乎早已被遗忘。&lt;page&gt;有一些隐藏的东西，你永远不会忘记。森林中的第一颗种子总是在寺庙里庆祝。他总是这样做，尽管他已经习惯了。&lt;page&gt;不幸的是，在这起事件中，很多人都被我的剑击倒了。

original_en_text: A machine with a symbol of a bench.
Play ancient melodies by stringing Silk along the needle.
original_zh_text: 他在琴弦上演奏了一首古老的歌曲。

original_en_text: A lock with the mark of ‘Indolent’.
A lock with the mark of ‘First Sin’.
original_zh_text: 该钥匙被确定为“重大犯罪”。"

original_en_text: A lock with the mark of ‘Apostate’.
original_zh_text: 一块上面有叛徒象征的石头。”

original_en_text: Chase down prey and leap great distances.
Silk will regenerate while resting at a bench.
original_zh_text: 当丝绸躺在沙子上时，它就会再次生长。
把它拿出来（把它拿出来）

original_en_text: Weave runes of blazing Silk upon enemies.
original_zh_text: 他们正在与敌人进行激烈的丝绸竞争。

original_en_text: Summon the Beastlings and return together to their mother.
original_zh_text: 我们打电话给动物，回到母亲身边。

original_en_text: Pierce through enemies in a blur of blade and Silk.
original_zh_text: 细剑和丝绸可以刺穿敌人。
