original_en_text: Attack by whipping a storm of Silk around oneself.
original_zh_text: 银色风暴正在攻击他们的环境。

original_en_text: Charge power in the needle, then release as a deadly attack.
Silk Skills can be equipped in the Crest screen of the Menu.
original_zh_text: 丝绸塔可以通过佳士得菜单屏幕安装。

original_en_text: Silk will be expended. Strike enemies to replenish Silk.
original_zh_text: 丝绸将被消耗。我们将包围敌人并提供丝绸。

original_en_text: Strike enemies repeatedly to become focused, making needle attacks deadlier.<br>Heighten focus with additional strikes, and further increase lethality.
original_zh_text: 它反复攻击敌人以引起注意，并且在刺伤时变得更加致命。&lt;br&gt;使用额外的打击来提高注意力并增加杀伤力。

original_en_text: Fling the needle as a harpoon and launch forcefully towards it.
original_zh_text: 像长矛一样扔针，然后用力扔。

original_en_text: Cling to sheer surfaces and leap to rapidly scale heights.
original_zh_text: 靠近陡峭的表面并快速跳跃。

original_en_text: Fling the needle upwards and launch to tremendous heights.
original_zh_text: 取出针头并将其滑向高位。

original_en_text: Silk will be expended. Strike enemies to replenish Silk.
original_zh_text: 丝绸将被消耗。我们将包围敌人并提供丝绸。

original_en_text: A lock with the mark of ‘Heretic’.
Strike enemies repeatedly to build focus.<br>Once focused, needle attacks will become deadlier.
original_zh_text: 反复攻击敌人，集中力量。&lt;br&gt;如果你集中注意力，针灸可能会更致命。
把它拿出来（把它拿出来）

original_en_text: A small tunnel leading downward.<br>Descend to Pharloom?
original_zh_text: 下面有一个小隧道。&lt;br&gt;你在法戈吗？

original_en_text: Its pale light wards against the void.
Fragile flower taken from a deep and distant memory.
original_zh_text: 脆弱的花朵是从遥远的记忆中诞生的。

original_en_text: Fabled feather down, layered within the cloak. Leap again while airborne.
original_zh_text: 传奇般的羽毛飘落在斗篷上堆积，我再次跳到空中。

original_en_text: Regained the power to regenerate Silk within one’s shell.
original_zh_text: 恢复皮质纤维的再生能力。

original_en_text: Bind Silk around the needle to deflect enemy attacks and instantly strike back.
original_zh_text: 如果你把丝绸绑在针上，敌人就会立即依附起来进行反击。

original_en_text: A lock with the mark of ‘Apostate’.
original_zh_text: 一块上面有叛徒象征的石头。”

original_en_text: Flare the cloak to ride strong winds or glide gracefully.
original_zh_text: 打开外套，跟随强风或优雅地滑落。

original_en_text: Mimic the song of the Bell Beast.
original_zh_text: 听起来像野生动物的声音。

original_en_text: Completion quantities will be displayed in Menus.
original_zh_text: 您需要填写的金额会显示在菜单中。

original_en_text: A small tunnel leading upward.<br>Ascend to the surface?
original_zh_text: 一条隧道已经建成。&lt;br&gt;肤浅的？

original_en_text: Eva’s soul and strength reside within.
original_zh_text: 伊芙的灵魂和力量在她身上。

original_en_text: View a detailed map of the world in the Map pane of the Menu.
original_zh_text: 您可以在菜单的“地图”面板中查看世界地图。

original_en_text: Equip Silk Skills in the Crest screen of the Menu.
original_zh_text: 在佳士得的屏幕上展示您的丝绸技巧。

original_en_text: Spin lethal talons from thread that seek out enemies.
original_zh_text: 从团队中取出致命的爪子并找到敌人。

original_en_text: Ascend through the lands of Pharloom to reach the Citadel at the kingdom’s peak.
original_zh_text: 他们将穿过帕洛姆土地，到达王国顶部的城堡。

original_en_text: Silk will be expended. Strike enemies to replenish Silk.
original_zh_text: 丝绸将被消耗。我们将包围敌人并提供丝绸。

original_en_text: View Objectives in the Tasks screen of the Menu.
original_zh_text: 动作菜单在屏幕上显示目标。

original_en_text: The state of the world can be sensed.
Attack by throwing the needle forward. Silk will be expended.
original_zh_text: 攻击正在进行中，丝绸正在被消耗。

original_en_text: Soar above foes. Reach new heights. Strike from above.
original_zh_text: 飞越敌人并达到新的高度。从上面攻击。

original_en_text: Sprint at blinding speed, beyond one’s natural limits.
original_zh_text: 它们以惊人的速度奔跑，超越了自然的极限。

original_en_text: Draw out memories of Pharloom’s forgotten past.
to view a map of the current area.
original_zh_text: 查看该地区的当前地图

original_en_text: <page=S>Miss courier! Pharloom’s bugs are wishing, waiting, sad and scared. The deliverings are needed, now more than more!
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=S&gt；快递小姐！Pharrom&#8217;虫子在许愿、等待、悲伤和害怕。现在需要更多的货物！

original_en_text: But what’s this?! I smell something on you right now! You have a relic for me!
original_zh_text: 但是什么；是这个吗？！我现在闻到你身上的味道了！你给我留了个遗物！

original_en_text: Aha! The spines! Specimen, you have them! Then it is time, indeed! Bzzt! To free you of your wriggling torment, and show my genius clear!
original_zh_text: 啊哈！刺！样本，你有！那么，确实是时候了！Bzzt！把你从扭动的折磨中解放出来，把我的天才表现出来！

original_en_text: Oh my, what a state you’re in! You look like you’re one breath away from keeling over dead!<hpage>I will continue to live, madam, but I am indeed afflicted. A parasite has taken root within my shell... Perhaps you have something that could help me? A medicine?<page>Mmm, not so sure I stock anything like that. You should ask Pavo there. It’s his job to give directions and such, so he may have some useful advice.<page>In the meantime... shopping itself is a type of medicine, isn’t it? You should buy something now. Given your condition, this might be your last chance!
original_zh_text: 哦，我的天哪，你真是个状态；回来！你看起来像你；你离倒地不远了！&lt;hpage&gt;我会继续活下去，夫人，但我确实很痛苦。寄生虫在我的壳里扎根了。..也许你有什么可以帮助我的？药？&lt;page&gt;嗯，我不太确定我有没有这种存货。你应该问问那里的帕沃。它&#8217;他的工作是指路之类的，所以他可能会有一些有用的建议。&lt;page&gt;与此同时。..购物本身就是一种药物，不是吗；不是吗？你现在应该买点东西。鉴于你的情况，这可能是你最后的机会！

original_en_text: <page=S>Ughhh! What-what is this? Your body is all twisting, creaking! Horrid fiend inside! <hpage>A parasite has lodged deep inside my shell. It has taken some strength of will to keep its thrashing at bay.<page=T>With a shell like such, you cannot be taking no deliverings! Infect the goods you would-would!<hpage>Very well, couriers. If I somehow manage to remove the parasite, I may return to offer aid.
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=S&gt；啊！这是什么？你的身体都在扭曲，吱吱作响！里面是个可怕的恶魔！&lt;hpage&gt;一只寄生虫已经深入我的壳内。它需要一些意志力来阻止它的猛攻。&lt；页面=T&gt；有这样的壳，你不可能不收货！感染你会感染的货物！&lt;hpage&gt;很好，快递员。如果我设法清除寄生虫，我可能会回来提供帮助。

original_en_text: What do you want, slave?<hpage>Slave? I am a traveller, stranger, not a slave.<page>Grnk. Exactly what a slave would say. Begone!
original_zh_text: 你想要什么，奴隶？&lt;hpage&gt;奴隶？我是个旅行者，陌生人，不是奴隶。&lt;page&gt;Grnk。这正是奴隶会说的。别闹了！

original_en_text: <hpage>Soon, Pavo, I shall calm the chaos. Please guard these bugs safe till then.<page>Of course, dear resident! Of course! Know all our faith, and our wishes go with you.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;很快，帕沃，我会平息混乱。在那之前，请保护好这些虫子的安全。&lt;page&gt;当然，亲爱的居民！当然可以啊!了解我们所有的信仰，我们的愿望与你同在。

original_en_text: Loose rosaries will escape your pockets at the worst of times, and I’m a deft claw at stringing them tight! I can string you a whole necklace, safe and stylish.
original_zh_text: 在最糟糕的时候，松散的念珠会从你的口袋里溜走，而我；我擅长把它们捆得很紧！我可以给你串一条完整的项链，既安全又时尚。

original_en_text: <hpage>I have taken your wish, Tipp. If I find your brother safe, I’ll be sure to send him back this way.<page>My many thanks, miss saving! You are brave-brave. Same as brother! My faith goes all with you!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我已经实现了你的愿望，蒂普。如果我发现你哥哥安然无恙，我；我一定会用这种方式把他送回去。&lt;page&gt;非常感谢，拯救小姐！你真勇敢。和哥哥一样！我的信仰与你同在！

original_en_text: Up there, in that Citadel, the fabled oil is waiting. Bestow it upon this fine pinmaster, and your blade shall sing louder yet.<hpage>I will find the oil, pinmaster. Keep your skills sharp.
original_zh_text: 在那里，在那个城堡里，传说中的石油正在等待。把它放在这位优秀的琴师身上，你的刀刃会唱得更响。&lt;hpage&gt;我会找到油的，品管大师。保持你的技能敏锐。

original_en_text: Now now! What’s all this? Infested are you, bzzt?<page>Do you even know who I am? Why, ‘tis the great Yarnaby, genius physician, unfairly outcast, who now towers before you!<hpage>I apologise for intruding upon your work, but if you are the skilled physician you claim, I ask your assistance.<hpage>A parasite has wormed its way inside of me. Its roots twist and pull inside my shell, draining my strength. If you possess the skills and tools, I would see it removed.<page>Bzzt! Well, well! So you’re a special, sickly specimen, are you?! That changes matters, yes. Turns them on their head!<page>Let me see. Hm. Not haunted, indeed. No Silk-sickness. But something strange has certainly clawed its way in!<page>These “roots” that torment you so... I’m not altogether familiar with them, but it matters not!<page>If there’s something nasty inside a shell that must come out, we use great Yarnaby’s Extricator! It’s your only hope, bzzt!<page>...Hmmm, but to crack your stiff shell we’ll first need some extra strength. The healing can be done, yes! But before that my mighty Extricator needs an upgrade!
original_zh_text: 现在！什么；就这些吗？你感染了吗，bzzt？&lt;page&gt;你知道我是谁吗？为什么，#8216；是伟大的雅娜比，天才医生，被不公平地抛弃了，现在在你面前巍然屹立！&lt;hpage&gt;很抱歉打扰了你的工作，但如果你是你声称的熟练医生，我请求你的帮助。&lt;hpage&gt;一只寄生虫在我体内爬行。它的根在我的壳内扭曲和拉扯，耗尽了我的力量。如果你拥有这些技能和工具，我会把它删除。&lt;page&gt;Bzzt！好，好！所以你&#8217;你是一个特别的、病态的人，是吗？！改变很重要，是的。把他们翻过来！&lt;page&gt;我想一下。嗯，确实没有闹鬼。没有丝绸病。但肯定有什么奇怪的东西闯进来了！&lt;page&gt;这些&#8220；根&#8221；那让你如此痛苦……我；我对他们不太熟悉，但这并不重要！&lt;page&gt;如果存在&#8217;如果壳里有什么讨厌的东西必须出来，我们使用伟大的Yarnaby；外向者！它&#8217;这是你唯一的希望，bzzt！&lt;page&gt;…嗯，但为了打破你僵硬的外壳，我们；我首先需要一些额外的力量。治愈是可以做到的，是的！但在此之前，我强大的Extricator需要升级！

original_en_text: Travellers should always keep spare shards close by. We Bellharters were once praised for our fine claw-work. An art lost on most modern pilgrims... excepting yourself I’m sure.
original_zh_text: 旅行者应该把多余的碎片放在附近。我们贝尔哈特人曾经因我们精美的爪形作品而受到称赞。这是一种大多数现代朝圣者都没有的艺术。..除了你自己，我；我肯定。

original_en_text: What a persistent little worm you are. Amuse me then. Why did you cut those poor bugs from their comforting curse?<hpage>There was old power in the creature that guided the thread, and a talent of Silk, now taken, that shall prove useful to me.<hpage>That the town is freed and its service returned is a benefit too. I may ofttimes feel myself apart from these bugs, but even I recoil to see Silk strung in such sickening service.<page>Grnk. To free them was no favour. But the gathering of power... In that goal, we may understand each other some.
original_zh_text: 你真是个顽固的小虫子。那就逗乐我吧。你为什么要把那些可怜的虫子从它们安慰的诅咒中解脱出来？&lt;hpage&gt;引导这根线的生物有着古老的力量，还有一种丝绸天赋，现在被拿走了，对我来说会很有用。&lt;hpage&gt;这座城镇的解放和服务的恢复也是一个好处。我可能经常觉得自己和这些虫子分开了，但即使是看到丝绸被串在如此令人作呕的服务中，我也会退缩。&lt;page&gt;Grnk。释放他们不是好事。但是权力的聚集。..在这个目标中，我们可能会相互理解一些。

original_en_text: Ahh... I smell something on you. Heavy with the past, you are. You have a relic for me, don’t you?
original_zh_text: 啊。..我闻到你身上有什么味道。你背负着沉重的过去。你有一个遗物给我，唐；你呢？

original_en_text: <hpage>Your skills are impressive. My needle sings from your care. But I must ask, can the blade be honed further?<page>You seek further sharpening? Further than Plinney does provide? Impertinence! But... Maybe? But... No...<hpage>You hesitate? Then it is possible? Are you incapable? Should I seek others within the kingdom?<page>Wait! Yes. Seek not others, but an oil, fabled and fine. With it the Citadel once brought gleaming edge and point to its pins.<page>Though the Citadel’s pinmasters are long past, some small store of that miraculous elixir may remain within its halls.<page>Were even a meagre drop pilfered, and gifted upon Plinney, your blade could shine brighter still...<page>Just know, dear friend, the veiled bugs would be oh so unkind to the thief who’d claim that fine prize for themself.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;你的技能令人印象深刻。我的针因你的照顾而歌唱。但我必须问，刀刃还能再磨吗？&lt;page&gt;你想进一步磨砺吗？比Plinney提供的更多？冒失！但是。…也许吧？但是。…不。。。&lt;hpage&gt;你犹豫了？那么有可能吗？你无能吗？我应该在王国里寻找其他人吗？&lt;page&gt;等待对。不要寻找别人，而要寻找一种传说中的石油。有了它，城堡曾经带来了闪闪发光的边缘，并指向了它的别针。&lt;page&gt;尽管城堡；pinmasters已经过去很久了，一些小商店的神奇灵丹妙药可能会留在大厅里。&lt;page&gt;哪怕只是偷了一滴，送给普林尼，你的刀刃也会更亮。..&lt;page&gt;亲爱的朋友，你要知道，戴面纱的虫子对小偷来说太不友善了；我会为自己争取那个好奖的。

original_en_text: You’ve a tool pouch on you? I can add a few pockets so you can carry more tools, and more shards to make’em. My sewing skills are quite renowned in these parts.
original_zh_text: 您&#8217;你身上有工具箱吗？我可以添加几个口袋，这样你就可以携带更多的工具和更多的碎片；我的缝纫技术在这些地区很有名。

original_en_text: <page=S>Miss saving! We are together, at last! My brother and myself, both returned to safety’s safe.<hpage>I am pleased you have found one another. If you are planning to venture out again, I would urge you reconsider for the sake of your shells.<page=S>We know it! Muchly-much! We cannot be leaving this home of bells. No more! Heres we will remain, for shells to survive. <page=T>But we instead did plan, together, clever! Yes-yes. Those pilgrims, them that pass, maybes they will help? For small reward as we have?<page=T>Even you, miss saving! Yes-yes! Saving is done. Our wishes now we ask. Now is time for miss courier!
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=S&gt；救命小姐！我们终于在一起了！我哥哥和我都回到了安全地带；很安全。&lt;hpage&gt;我很高兴你们找到了彼此。如果你打算再次冒险，我会敦促你为了你的贝壳而重新考虑。&lt；页面=S&gt；我们知道！太多了！我们不能离开这个钟声之家。不要了！我们将留在这里，让贝壳存活下来。&lt；页面=T&gt；但我们一起做了计划，聪明！是的，是的。那些朝圣者，那些路过的人，也许他们会帮忙？像我们这样的小奖励？&lt；页面=T&gt；即使是你，想念拯救！是是！保存完成。我们的愿望现在我们问。现在是快递小姐的时候了！

original_en_text: Lost within that fortress above, the fabled oil of my profession... Such sharpness one could achieve...<page>But, oh! ‘Tis an awful thing. Too cruel, the many stabbing pins you’d face in its seeking.
original_zh_text: 迷失在上面的堡垒里，我职业中传说中的石油。..这样的清晰度是可以实现的。..&lt;page&gt;但是，哦！ &#8216;这是一件可怕的事情。太残忍了，你身上有很多刺；d面对它的追寻。

original_en_text: We’ve made a good start on the painting, resident! Give us a little more time and your bell’ll be shining like new.
original_zh_text: 我们&#8217;我在这幅画上开了个好头，居民！给我们多一点时间和你的铃声&#8217;会像新的一样闪闪发光。

original_en_text: Hnff... So the slave comes seeking?<page>I’ve heard it. Wishing on a world cut free, yes? Along with my nephew up there. Sounds he’s sunk as simple as you.<hpage>Will you not provide your aid, bug? This trap he plans requires power, and I suspect you’re hoarding more than most.<page>Oh no. I’ll give it. Not in the hope you’ll succeed... Bah! In that, there’s slim chance. I give just to see that restless energy unleashed.<page>So much soul, found and formed. Generations of it, all going to waste. Better it’s given a chance to blaze.
original_zh_text: Hnff。..所以奴隶来找？&lt;page&gt;I&#8217;我听说了。希望世界自由，是吗？还有我的侄子在上面。听起来他&#8217;就像你一样简单。&lt;hpage&gt;虫子，你不提供帮助吗？他计划的这个陷阱需要力量，我怀疑你；重新囤积比大多数人都多。&lt;page&gt;哦，不；我会给你的。不要指望你；我会成功的。..呸！在这方面，有&#8217;机会渺茫。我付出只是为了看到这种不安分的能量被释放出来。&lt;page&gt;如此多的灵魂，被发现和形成。一代又一代，都要浪费了。更好&#8217;它有机会燃烧。
一个上锁的行李寄存处。&lt;br&gt;喊出来？

original_en_text: <hpage>Madam, my shell has been overcome by a foreign force. Plasmium, it has been called in your land.<hpage>Though the substance provides some regenerative aid, I feel my mind at dangerous risk of being overtaken.<page>Bzzt! Maybe overtaken is good? Better even? Why go thinking yours is a mind so precious?<page>The great Yarnaby treats the sick! Not those that benefit from their afflictions. Enjoy its advantage and leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;夫人，我的壳被一股外国势力盖过了。质粒，在你们的土地上被称为质粒。&lt;hpage&gt;虽然这种物质提供了一些再生帮助，但我觉得我的大脑有被超越的危险。&lt;page&gt;Bzzt！也许被超越是好事？甚至更好？为什么要认为你的头脑如此珍贵？&lt;page&gt;伟大的Yarnaby治疗病人！不是那些从痛苦中受益的人。享受它的优势，让我安静！

original_en_text: What? What now? What’s all that great racket? What is it?<hpage>Greetings, ma’am. If you are disturbed by the rending of these lands, I fear some blame is mine to bear.<page>Pah. I care not for the miseries and struggles of them outside! None of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 什么？现在怎么办？什么；有那么大的球拍吗？这是怎么一回事？&lt;hpage&gt;你好，马&#8217;如果你对这些土地的破坏感到不安，恐怕我该承担一些责任。&lt;page&gt;帕。我不在乎他们在外面的痛苦和挣扎！他们都没有我敏锐的洞察力，我对过去的尊重！&lt;page&gt;不过，你似乎有能力。也偷偷摸摸。如果你发现任何精美的旧物，任何有历史的东西，把它带到这里来。I&#8217;我接受。

original_en_text: <page=S>Keep safe, miss courier! You and your deliverings, fragile both can be!
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=S&gt；保重，快递小姐！你和你的交付，脆弱的都可以！

original_en_text: <page=T>Do not wait, miss courier! You hold the deliverings, so nows you must away! A quick-quick bug, you must become yourself.
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；别等了，快递小姐！你拿着货物，所以现在你必须离开！一个快速的bug，你必须成为你自己。

original_en_text: <hpage>Tipp, I have promised a wish to an old bug of the Citadel, ingredients for a dish to stir a gourmand’s stomach.<hpage>Do you hold in your belongings a Courier’s Rasher? It seems a key element.<page>Courier’s Rasher! Not me, miss savings! Smelly, fatty foods, good for most. Not good for my sensitive stomach!<page>You want-want my brother, Pill! Pill is big. Pill loves rashers! Can prepare them fresh for you, but first, Pill must be found, saved, safe-safe!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;小费，我答应给城堡里的一只老虫子许个愿，这是一道能搅动美食家的菜肴的配料；的胃。&lt;hpage&gt;您的物品中是否有快递员&#8217;拉舍尔？这似乎是一个关键因素。&lt;page&gt;快递&#8217;拉舍尔！不是我，想念储蓄！气味难闻、油腻的食物，对大多数人都有好处。对我敏感的胃不好！&lt;page&gt;你想要我弟弟，皮尔！药丸很大。药丸喜欢皮疹！可以为你准备新鲜的药丸，但首先，药丸必须找到、保存、安全可靠！

original_en_text: Bzzt! What now?! Not another bother for the great Yarnaby?<hpage>Madam, I have returned with the spines requested. Allow me to enter, that you may remove this parasite from my shell.
original_zh_text: Bzzt！现在怎么办？！对伟大的Yarnaby来说不是又一个麻烦了吗？&lt;hpage&gt;夫人，我已经带着要求的刺回来了。请允许我进去，这样你就可以把这种寄生虫从我的壳里取出来。

original_en_text: That blade! By claw! My finest work by far. Pharloom may ail, but across its morbid dim, your needle will shine bright.
original_zh_text: 那把刀！用爪子！我迄今为止最好的作品。药剂师可能会生病，但在它病态的昏暗中，你的针会闪闪发光。

original_en_text: Care to refresh yourself in a steaming spa? Given your hard labours, I’m sure your shell would thank you for it.
original_zh_text: 想在热气腾腾的水疗中心放松一下吗？鉴于你的辛勤劳动，我；我相信你的贝壳会感谢你的。

original_en_text: Twine-strung globes filled with gleamflies. These’ll brighten up even the darkest bell.
original_zh_text: 满是闪闪发光的苍蝇的串起的地球仪。这些&#8217;即使最黑暗的钟声也会亮起来。

original_en_text: <page=S>Another egg. Another grossy eater queen. Delivery for the big-big creature beyond the roaches. Maybe this one travels safer than last?
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=S&gt；另一个鸡蛋。另一个粗俗的食客女王。为蟑螂以外的大型生物送货。也许这次旅行比上次更安全？

original_en_text: Specimen, we must! There are secrets to uncover, bzzt! Progress can not be denied!
original_zh_text: 标本，我们必须！有秘密要揭开，bzzt！进步是不可否认的！

original_en_text: <page=T>With your shell all a’wriggle, you can’t be taking no deliverings! Infect the goods you would!<hpage>Very well, couriers. If I somehow manage to remove the parasite, I may return to offer aid.
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；带着你的外壳；扭动，你可以&#8217;不要不收货！感染你想要的货物！&lt;hpage&gt;很好，快递员。如果我设法清除寄生虫，我可能会回来提供帮助。

original_en_text: Bzzt! Bravo! A specimen who sees my brilliance!<page>The task for you is simple. Head over into that tangled mess of cages, on the roads above the moors.<page>Two bugs hide away there, Benjin and Crull. Simple types, woefully ignorant... yet they have been useful in procuring me materials.<page>It’s Steel Spines I need. A full bundle of them, forged hard and sharp. Tougher than I’ve ever had. Tough enough to crack stone! And to pierce your thick shell, bzzt!<hpage>Then prepare your machine for my return, madam. I shall soon return with the spines, for I am eager to see myself freed.
original_zh_text: Bzzt！好极了！一个看到我才华的标本！&lt;page&gt;你的任务很简单。走进荒野上方道路上杂乱的笼子里。&lt;page&gt;有两只虫子躲在那里，本金和克鲁尔。简单的类型，可悲的是无知。..然而，它们在为我采购材料方面很有用。&lt;page&gt;它&#8217;我需要的钢纺锤。整整一捆，锻造得又硬又尖。比我更坚强；我曾经有过。坚硬得足以劈开石头！为了刺穿你的厚壳，bzzt！&lt;hpage&gt;那么，夫人，请为我准备好你的机器。我很快就会带着刺回来，因为我渴望看到自己重获自由。

original_en_text: <hpage>I will find the oil, pinmaster. My needle has seen much use in this cruel kingdom, and I suspect many more battles are due. I will value your further skills upon my blade. <page>It is a dangerous wish you accept of this poor pinmaster. I welly hope this one’s professional desire does not cost you your life.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我会找到油的，品管大师。我的针在这个残酷的王国里有很多用处，我怀疑还有更多的战斗要打。我会珍惜你在我的刀刃上的进一步技能。&lt;page&gt;你接受这个可怜的拼音大师的愿望是危险的。我非常希望这一次&#8217;他的职业欲望不会让你付出生命的代价。

original_en_text: If you insist on surviving your infestation, seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out, high up into the moors, last I heard.
original_zh_text: 如果你坚持要在感染中幸存下来，那就去找那个被贝尔哈特放逐的人，小Yarnaby。我最后一次听说，她被赶了出去，高高地冲进了荒野。

original_en_text: I’ll waste no more words on a slave. Begone.
original_zh_text: I&#8217;我再也不会在奴隶身上浪费口舌了。求你了。

original_en_text: <page=T>More deliverings for those sad survivors in their cave below. <page=S>Deliver them quick-quick, miss courier! They will help much.
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；为下面洞穴里那些悲伤的幸存者提供更多的救援物资。&lt；页面=S&gt；快送，快递小姐！他们将提供极大的帮助。

original_en_text: That cry upon you, sister! Those are the sour sobs of a grey and twisted thing.<hpage>You speak of the bud? It is a mysterious thing indeed. In the dank swamps above the moor, I sought towards its plaintive wails, and found it resting there... Waiting, it almost seemed.<hpage>But you speak of its form, without sighting it upon me. Is it a thing familiar to you?... Have you heard these cries before?<page>Aye, yes! Not your own specimen, surely, but way back, other travellers did sometimes carry similar. Odd types they all were. Offerings they’d call the crying things, and towards the core of Shellwood they would trek.<page>Never I did see one again, not the buds nor the bugs that brought the gift...<page>If you’re planning to follow their path, I’ll wish on your safety, but ‘tis an ill omen to hear such sad sounds returned after so long.
original_zh_text: 你哭了，姐姐！那是一个灰色扭曲的东西发出的酸涩的哭泣声。&lt;hpage&gt;你说的是花蕾？这确实是一件神秘的事情。在沼泽地上方潮湿的沼泽地里，我朝它哀嚎的叫声走去，发现它停在那里。..等待，它几乎看起来。&lt;hpage&gt;但你谈到它的形状，却没有在我身上看到它。你熟悉它吗？你以前听过这些哭声吗？&lt;page&gt;是的，是的！当然，这不是你自己的标本，但很久以前，其他旅行者有时也会携带类似的标本。他们都是奇怪的类型。他们提供的产品&#8217;我会召唤那些哭泣的东西，然后他们会朝着Shellwood的核心跋涉。&lt;page&gt;我再也没有见过一个，无论是花蕾还是带来礼物的虫子。..&lt;page&gt;如果你；重新计划走他们的路，我；我希望你安全，但是；听到这么长时间后又传来如此悲伤的声音，真是不祥之兆。

original_en_text: What? What, what? Who is it? What’ve you got? What do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveller, one hoping you were not too badly affected by the cursed snare set upon this town.<page>Pah! What binds them outside means nothing to me. None of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 什么？什么，什么？是谁？什么；有吗？你想干什么？&lt;hpage&gt;我只是一个旅行者，希望你没有受到这个城镇被诅咒的陷阱的严重影响。&lt;page&gt;呸！把他们绑在外面的东西对我来说毫无意义。他们都没有我敏锐的感觉，我对过去的尊重！&lt;page&gt;不过，你似乎有能力。也偷偷摸摸。如果你发现任何精美的旧物，任何有历史的东西，把它带到这里来。I&#8217;我接受。

original_en_text: And now! This pinmaster must work! Let the sharpening begin!
original_zh_text: 现在！这个pinmaster必须工作！让磨刀开始吧！

original_en_text: Hff. The noise from above has returned, that pitiful clamour. The threads have been cut.<page>You... It was you who cut them. Do not deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I defeated the cruel creature above the town, and awoke the old bell stilled by Silk. Are you displeased?<page>Displeased! If I breathe, if I live, I am displeased. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, and a nuisance... begone.
original_zh_text: Hff。上面的噪音又回来了，那可怜的喧闹声。线被剪断了。&lt;page&gt;你。..是你剪的。不要否认！&lt;hpage&gt;我为什么要否认呢，先生？我打败了镇上的那个残忍的生物，唤醒了丝绸敲响的旧钟。你不高兴吗？&lt;page&gt;不满意！如果我呼吸，如果我活着，我就不高兴。只有死人才满意。&lt;page&gt;你是个奴隶，是个讨厌鬼。..走开。

original_en_text: Resident! What a marvel you are, continuing to dare the wilds and darkness, and returning home to us unscathed.<hpage>I return with hope worth sharing, Pavo. I have seen a way to calm this chaos, one I now work swiftly towards.<hpage>The chance remains slim, but if this town can hold, and my efforts succeed, Pharloom may see a future yet.
original_zh_text: 居民！你继续挑战荒野和黑暗，毫发无损地回到我们身边，真是奇迹。&lt;hpage&gt;我带着值得分享的希望回来了，帕沃。我已经找到了一种方法来平息这场混乱，我现在正迅速朝着这个方向努力。&lt;hpage&gt;机会仍然很渺茫，但如果这个城镇能够坚持下去，我的努力取得成功，Pharlomb可能会看到未来。

original_en_text: The Citadel crafted some marvellous machines, and this looks to be one of its finest! Apparently sent by some creepy slitherer hidden away up there, for sale only to you!
original_zh_text: 城堡制造了一些神奇的机器，这看起来是它最好的机器之一！显然是由某个隐藏在那里的令人毛骨悚然的骗子寄来的，只卖给你！

original_en_text: It’s my calling it is, to gather the relics of the past. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 它&#8217;这是我的使命，收集过去的遗迹。如果你发现任何精美的旧物，任何有历史的东西，把它带到这里来。I&#8217;我接受。

original_en_text: <hpage>I can not aid you, couriers. Not now. My own tasks are too pressing to consider taking on your deliveries. <hpage>With luck, some pilgrims may pass with sound mind and strength remaining. They may choose to promise your wishes.<page=T>Then we shall pray they come, miss saving! Our thanks go muchly with you, still.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我帮不了你，快递员。不是现在。我自己的任务太紧迫了，不能考虑接受你的交货。&lt;hpage&gt;幸运的是，一些朝圣者可能会以健全的头脑和力量通过。他们可以选择答应你的愿望。&lt；页面=T&gt；那么，我们将祈祷他们来，拯救小姐！我们仍然非常感谢你。

original_en_text: Hff. The noise from above has returned, that pitiful clamour. The threads have been cut.<page>You... It was you who cut them down. Do not deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I severed the thread and defeated the creature guiding the curse upon the town. Are you displeased?<page>Displeased! If I breathe, if I live, I am displeased. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, and a nuisance... begone.
original_zh_text: Hff。上面的噪音又回来了，那可怜的喧闹声。线被剪断了。&lt;page&gt;你。..是你把它们砍下来的。不要否认！&lt;hpage&gt;我为什么要否认呢，先生？我割断了线，打败了那个在镇上诅咒的生物。你不高兴吗？&lt;page&gt;不满意！如果我呼吸，如果我活着，我就不高兴。只有死人才满意。&lt;page&gt;你是个奴隶，是个讨厌鬼。..走开。

original_en_text: <page=T>We’s heard the word! Many fleas together, settled high in Pharloom, calling out their wants of us!<page=T>Clever grubbers, fleas, but theys too need-need our deliverings. See them served, miss courier! Always goodly-good to gain the thanks of fleas.
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；我们&#8217;我听到这个词了！许多跳蚤聚集在一起，栖息在Pharloom的高处，呼唤着它们对我们的渴望！&lt；页面=T&gt；聪明的蛆虫、跳蚤，但它们太需要我们的帮助了。快递小姐，请看他们的服务！总是很好地获得跳蚤的感谢。

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. I’d ask to trade, but your store seems a little bare.<page>Ahem! Well, yes. Our little town’s seen some dire times, and now my courier’s gone and got themself lost.<page>But don’t worry! I’ve a few small things, still! And if that courier ever makes it safely back, we’ll have plenty more treasures to haggle over.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;你好，店主。I&#8217;我想交易，但你的店似乎有点空。&lt;page&gt;啊哼！嗯，是的。我们的小镇&#8217;我曾经历过一些艰难的时刻，现在我的信使——；他走了，把自己弄丢了。&lt;page&gt;但是不要&#8217;别担心！I&#8217;我还有一些小事情！如果那个快递员能安全回来，我们；我还有很多宝藏要讨价还价。

original_en_text: Bzzt! Leave me in peace! The great Yarnaby treats the sick! Not those that benefit from their afflictions. Enjoy its advantage and leave me in peace!<hpage>Very well, madam. I did not mean to waste your time.
original_zh_text: Bzzt！让我安静！伟大的Yarnaby治疗病人！不是那些从痛苦中受益的人。享受它的优势，让我安静！&lt;hpage&gt;很好，夫人。我不是故意浪费你的时间。

original_en_text: Bonva! It is done, brave warrior. By my expert claw, your strange blade has received some fast-sharp shine. It shall cut cleaner than ever before.<hpage>Your efforts provide great aid, pinmaster. You have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 邦瓦！完成了，勇敢的战士。用我专业的爪子，你那把奇怪的刀刃迅速地闪闪发光。它将比以往任何时候都更干净。&lt;hpage&gt;你的努力帮了大忙，老师。我感谢你。

original_en_text: <page=T>Miss courier! What horror here! The caves shake-shake, crying pain of hurt most savage.<page=T>And see all our poor friends below, newly found, crowded inside this home of bells, hearts fast for fear.<page=S>But what-what for you? You are here to help, yes-yes? The deliverings, they are needed now at most! When caves turn dark, the deliverings are essential, more than more.
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；快递小姐！这里真恐怖！洞穴摇晃着，哭得最疼最野蛮。&lt；页面=T&gt；看到我们下面所有的可怜的朋友，新发现的，挤在这个钟声的家里，害怕得心跳加速。&lt；页面=S&gt；但对你来说呢？你是来帮忙的，是吗？交货，现在最多需要！当洞穴变暗时，运送货物是必不可少的，甚至更多。

original_en_text: <page=T>The deliverings! They are broken-broke! Gone and spilled!<page=T>Do not lose hearty-heart, miss courier! This is Pharloom! Danger, deadly. In times as these, is a rarer thing for goods to get to their goings.<page=S>Would you try-try again? For the bugs so much in need of their deliverings?
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；交付！他们被打破了！走了，洒了！&lt；页面=T&gt；别灰心，快递小姐！这是Pharloom！危险，致命。在这样的时代，货物很少能运出去。&lt；页面=S&gt；你能再试一次吗？对于那些如此需要交付的虫子来说？

original_en_text: Those bugs, cowering in their gleaming bells. Grnk. They claim a common calling, to serve the pilgrims as they make their path upwards.<page>Such a crucial role they award themselves, surely worthy of praise!<page>A sweet lie, of course. They, like their predecessors, are simply too weak and fearful to venture any farther. A settlement born from indolence.
original_zh_text: 那些虫子蜷缩在闪闪发光的铃铛里。Grnk。他们声称有一个共同的使命，即在朝圣者向上行进时为他们服务。&lt;page&gt;如此关键的角色，他们奖励自己，当然值得称赞！&lt;page&gt;当然，这是一个甜蜜的谎言。他们和他们的前辈一样，只是太软弱和害怕，不敢再冒险了。因懒惰而产生的定居点。

original_en_text: <hpage>He would have been wise to do so. If, on my travels, I happen upon the errant bug, I’ll make sure to send him your way.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;他这样做是明智的。如果在我的旅行中，我碰巧遇到了错误的虫子，我；我一定要送他去。

original_en_text: By claw! Are you then our saviour in the shell? Standing so calm and cool on entrance to Plinney’s bellhome!<hpage>What clue, sir, tells of my part in your town’s liberation?<page>Why your blade, fierce warrior! Any fine pinmaster would detect the sign of deadly work upon that needle’s edge.<page>T’was a vile curse that struck here. No simple bug, nor basic pin could have granted our release. No!<page>That blade though, so expertly clutched in claw. That could welly have met the task. It was you who cut us free, yes?<hpage>I’ll grant you’ve sharp sight, pinmaster, and your saving is fortuitous. This blade that restored your town would now benefit from your service.<page>Welly, yes! I’ve a busy backlog of pins to tend, but your gracious heroism decrees that unique weapon receives my care this very moment! What’s say I take a look?
original_zh_text: 用爪子！那么，你是我们壳中的救世主吗？站在Plinney入口处如此平静和冷静；欢迎光临！&lt;hpage&gt;什么线索，先生，告诉我在你们镇上的角色；解放？&lt;page&gt;为什么是你的剑，凶猛的战士！任何优秀的针匠都会发现针上有致命工作的迹象；的边缘。&lt;page&gt;T&#8217;这是一个卑鄙的诅咒。没有简单的bug，也没有基本的pin码可以让我们发布。不！&lt;page&gt;不过，那把刀刃，用爪子紧紧地抓着。这完全可以完成任务。是你救了我们，对吧？&lt;hpage&gt;I&#8217;我会答应你的；我眼光敏锐，品管大师，你的救是偶然的。这把修复你城镇的剑现在将受益于你的服务。&lt;page&gt;嗯，是的！I&#8217;我有一大堆别针要处理，但你的英勇行为表明，这件独特的武器此刻正受到我的照顾！什么；你说我看看？

original_en_text: More, then! Bring me more relics of the past! Records, seals, idols! Let’s gather up the history of the world and hoard it all here, nice and safe!
original_zh_text: 那么，更多！给我带来更多过去的遗物！唱片、印章、偶像！让我们&#8217;我们收集世界历史，把它们都藏在这里，又好又安全！

original_en_text: <page=S>Many deliverings still need making, miss courier! We is much needing your help, when you is ready for the giving of it-it!
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=S&gt；许多快递仍需制作，快递小姐！当你准备好提供帮助时，我们非常需要你的帮助！

original_en_text: Done, it is! Marvel of Pharloom! See how it gleams, your long, fine blade. Havast! That the pins of our land all once held such shine. So much we have lost...<hpage>This is fine service, pinmaster. It has been a long age since I have seen my needle such. I had not remembered the finesse of its forging.<page>Welly, ho! It is certain! Yours is a blade of finer make than most, one of few that could bear even more sharpening.<page>If ever upon your long road more oil is acquired, seek my service with haste! Who knows what form we could find deeper within your weapon’s sharpened steel!
original_zh_text: 完成了！Pharloom的奇迹！看看它是如何闪闪发光的，你那又长又细的刀刃。哈瓦斯特！我们这片土地的徽章曾经如此闪耀。我们失去了太多。..&lt;hpage&gt;这是很好的服务，pinmaster。我很久没见过我的针了。我不记得它锻造的技巧了。&lt;page&gt;哇！这是肯定的！你的刀刃比大多数刀刃都要好，是少数能承受更锋利的刀刃之一。&lt;page&gt;如果你在漫长的道路上获得了更多的石油，赶紧寻求我的帮助！谁知道我们能在你的武器深处找到什么样的形态；锋利的钢！

original_en_text: <hpage>For the moment, I can not aid you, couriers. My own tasks are too pressing.<page=T>Then we shall hope you see them soon achieved! If the deliverings are not made, Pharloom’s bugs will suffer muchly-much!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;目前，我无法协助你们，快递员。我自己的任务太紧迫了。&lt；页面=T&gt；那么我们希望你能看到它们很快实现！如果没有交货，Pharrow&#8217;虫子会受很多苦！

original_en_text: <hpage>It is fortune to see you returned, pinmaster. The roads between here and that deep woods’ grave crawl with violent foes. I had concerns for your safety.<page>Brave warrior, my hero! T’was indeed a fearful scramble home, but safe I now am! And a warmly pleasure to see you too, for the world has darkened indeed!<page>In such times, the task for a pinmaster is clear, to polish and sharpen and refine, suchly that the glimmer of your blade may pierce through the encroaching murk!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;看到你回来真是幸运，品管大师。这里和那片深林之间的道路；与凶猛的敌人一起爬行。我担心你的安全。&lt;page&gt;勇敢的战士，我的英雄！T&#8217;回家确实很可怕，但我现在安全了！我也很高兴见到你，因为世界确实变暗了！&lt;page&gt;在这样的时代，一个品管大师的任务是明确的，打磨、磨砺和精炼，这样你的刀刃的微光就可以穿透不断侵蚀的黑暗！

original_en_text: <page=S>We is got requested times a’many for this, a queeny egg of those eaters of Silk. Wish from big, sticky creature, near many roaches caged. Wants it muchly! <hpage>The creature, I have met them, a timid, fawning sort. Nonetheless, their tending of Silkeaters can be a benefit for me.<hpage>If a queen delivered could improve their harvest, I too would gain from the trade.<page=S>Miss courier, and big, sticky creature? Both are like to liking things so grossly-gross? We think yous are muchly strange...
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=S&gt；我们收到了请求次数a＆#8217；许多人对此表示不满，这是那些吃丝绸的人的蛋。愿望来自一个又大又粘的生物，靠近许多被关在笼子里的蟑螂。非常想要！&lt;hpage&gt;我见过这种动物，一种胆小、讨好的动物。尽管如此，它们对食丝动物的照顾对我来说还是有好处的。&lt;hpage&gt;如果女王能够提高他们的收成，我也会从贸易中获益。&lt；页面=S&gt；快递小姐，又大又黏的生物？两个人都喜欢这么恶心的东西吗？我们觉得你很奇怪。..

original_en_text: <page=T>Miss saving! We thought us safe, brothers together at last, but what horror even here! The caves shake-shake, crying pain of hurt most savage.<page=T>And see all our poor friends below, newly found, crowded inside this home of bells, hearts fast for fear.<page=S>But what-what for you? You are here to help, yes-yes? The deliverings, they are needed now at most! Alas, for our shells to survive we cannot now leave this home of bells. No more. Heres we must remain.<page=T>But we instead did plan, together, clever! Yes-yes. Those strong ones, like yourselfs, maybes they will help? For small reward as we have?<page=S>Our savings is done, and the caves turn dark. Now the deliveries are needed, desperate. Now is time for miss courier!
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；救命小姐！我们以为我们安全了，兄弟们终于在一起了，但即使在这里也太恐怖了！洞穴摇晃着，哭得最疼最野蛮。&lt；页面=T&gt；看到我们下面所有的可怜的朋友，新发现的，挤在这个钟声的家里，害怕得心跳加速。&lt；页面=S&gt；但对你来说呢？你是来帮忙的，是吗？交货，现在最多需要！唉，为了让我们的贝壳存活下来，我们现在不能离开这个钟的家。没有了。我们必须留在这里。&lt；页面=T&gt；但我们一起做了计划，聪明！是的，是的。那些强壮的人，就像你自己一样，可能会有所帮助？像我们这样的小奖励？&lt；页面=S&gt；我们的积蓄用完了，洞穴里一片漆黑。现在急需运送物资。现在是快递小姐的时候了！

original_en_text: What? What, what? Who is it? What’ve you got? What do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveller. May I ask, though, what work occupies you here?<page>What occupies me, you ask? The past! The voices of ages gone by, they speak to me through what is left behind.<page>Those outside, those dreary pilgrims and bell-adorned dullards... none of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 什么？什么，什么？是谁？什么；有吗？你想干什么？&lt;hpage&gt;我只是一个旅行者。不过，我可以问一下，你在这里做什么工作吗？&lt;page&gt;你问我，我在忙什么？过去！岁月的声音，他们通过留下的东西对我说话。&lt;page&gt;外面的人，那些沉闷的朝圣者和戴着铃铛的白痴。..他们都没有我敏锐的洞察力，我对过去的尊重！&lt;page&gt;不过，你似乎有能力。也偷偷摸摸。如果你发现任何精美的旧物，任何有历史的东西，把它带到这里来。I&#8217;我接受。

original_en_text: Your continued help to Bellhart has not gone unnoticed, miss traveller.<page>In these terrible times, it’s rare enough to see any wish granted. Now to see such care come from a stranger! Why, that’s simply unheard of!<hpage>I have seen the scale of suffering wrought across Pharloom, Pavo. And I will admit, fulfilling these requests may do little to affect the cause... Even still, I have found it a rewarding task.<hpage>To aid another... The small warmth of it, I had almost forgotten.
original_zh_text: 旅行者小姐，您对贝尔哈特的持续帮助并没有被忽视。&lt;page&gt;在这些可怕的时刻，它；很少有人能实现任何愿望。现在看到这样的关心来自一个陌生人！为什么；这简直闻所未闻！&lt;hpage&gt;我目睹了帕沃的法尔布隆所遭受的巨大苦难。我承认，满足这些要求可能对事业影响不大。..即便如此，我还是觉得这是一项有益的任务。&lt;hpage&gt;帮助另一个人。..那小小的温暖，我差点忘了。

original_en_text: It’s my calling it is, to gather the relics of the past. Look at my collection, if you fancy! Look, look!
original_zh_text: 它&#8217;这是我的使命，收集过去的遗迹。如果你喜欢的话，看看我的收藏！看，看！

original_en_text: <page=T>Goods for the camp at base, where pilgrims’ journey starts. We muchly hope this delivering goes well!
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；基地营地的货物，朝圣者在那里&quot；旅程开始了。我们非常希望这次交付顺利！

original_en_text: <page=S>You have the good-goods, miss courier! Now only the deliverings needs doing. Don’t wait here-here!
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=S&gt；你有好货，快递小姐！现在只需要交付。唐&#8217;别在这里等！

original_en_text: Off with you! Head over to that tangled mess of cages, in those roads above the moors.<page>Those two bugs, Benjin and Crull, can surely scrounge up what I need. A full bundle of hard, sharp spines!
original_zh_text: 滚开！走到沼泽地上方那些道路上杂乱的笼子前。&lt;page&gt;那两只虫子，本金和克鲁尔，肯定能找到我需要的东西。一捆又硬又尖的刺！

original_en_text: That blade! By claw! It is done. Sharper than this pinmaster would have believed achievable. Shining pale and clear.<page>Bonva! Stranger, you have granted my wish, and more. Your blade is accomplishment to match those of great pinmasters past.<page>Pharloom may ail, but throughout its morbid dim, your needle will shine bright.
original_zh_text: 那把刀！用爪子！完成了。比这位站长所认为的更锋利。闪耀着苍白而清澈的光芒。&lt;page&gt;邦瓦！陌生人，你满足了我的愿望，甚至更多。你的剑术是一种成就，可以与过去伟大的Pinmaster相媲美。&lt;page&gt;药剂师可能会生病，但在它病态的昏暗中，你的针会闪闪发光。

original_en_text: What? You refuse to pass it on? What good do you think it’ll do you?!
original_zh_text: 什么？你拒绝传递它？你认为这有什么好处；你愿意吗？！

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay safe, Pavo. Keep these poor bugs close and their spirits from sorrow.<page>None shall leave these walls, dear resident, and all still are welcome. Any that can be saved.<page>Better we bugs be together, here at the end of it all.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;保重，帕沃。让这些可怜的虫子靠近，让它们的精神远离悲伤。&lt;page&gt;没有人会离开这些墙，亲爱的居民，所有人仍然受到欢迎。任何可以挽救的。&lt;page&gt;我们虫子最好在一起，在这一切结束的时候。

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay alert on your journey home, pinmaster. If you encounter other bugs upon the road, I advise you avoid them as you are able.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;在回家的路上保持警惕，品管大师。如果你在路上遇到其他虫子，我建议你尽量避开它们。

original_en_text: Auugh! Bzzt! Again the world lashes out at me!<page>But the pain... it means nothing to Yarnaby!<page>Nothing can deter my great work! Not for long! I must not be stopped!
original_zh_text: 啊！Bzzt！全世界再次对我大发雷霆！&lt;page&gt;但是疼痛。..这对Yarnaby来说毫无意义！&lt;page&gt;没有什么能阻止我的伟大工作！不会太久的！我不能被阻止！

original_en_text: <page=S>A new destination this-this! And desperate these supplies are asked.<page=T>Deliverings for them-them escaped from the crumbled camp beside the bone, those few still living.<page=T>Hurting and hungry, those few must be.
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=S&gt；这是一个新的目的地！迫切需要这些物资。&lt；页面=T&gt；对他们来说，他们从骨头旁边的破败的营地中逃脱了，那些仍然活着的人。&lt；页面=T&gt；那几个人一定又饿又痛。

original_en_text: <page=T>It is yours, miss courier! Meats prepared fresh as fresh, in our special way.<page=T>Miss courier must know! Our rasher is delicious, strong, fatty food, but is not long to last. If not stored quick, it-it is flavour fast turns foul.<hpage>If the rasher is likely to spoil, then I shall make fast for the Citadel. I’ve no desire to see your efforts, or your scant supplies wasted.
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；这是你的，快递小姐！以我们独特的方式新鲜烹制的肉类。&lt；页面=T&gt；快递小姐一定知道！我们的皮疹是美味、强壮、油腻的食物，但不会持续太久。如果不快速储存，它的味道很快就会变臭。&lt;hpage&gt;如果鲁莽者可能会破坏，那么我将迅速前往城堡。I&#8217;我不想看到你的努力或你的微薄物资被浪费。

original_en_text: Shellwood’s grown more dangerous in recent times, but I’m a lifelong catcher, right down to my core. Ain’t nothing that’ll change that.
original_zh_text: 贝壳木&#8217;最近变得更危险了，但我；我是个终身接球手，从核心到核心。Ain&#8217;没什么&#8217;我会改变的。

original_en_text: I rarely sell objects as intriguing as this. Supposed to improve a bug’s natural ability to heal! Can’t say I’ve felt its effects myself, but then I keep more healthy than most.
original_zh_text: 我很少卖这么有趣的东西。本应改进一个bug&#8217;他天生具有治愈的能力！可以&#8217;不要说我；我自己也感受到了它的影响，但后来我比大多数人都更健康。

original_en_text: Yes... This fits my collection well. Look, then! Look at what I have!
original_zh_text: 对。..这很适合我的收藏。那你看！看看我有什么！

original_en_text: Ahh. ‘Tis your choice, warrior. If you’re choosing different in times ahead, Plinney shall be here to provide eager aid.
original_zh_text: 啊。 &#8216;这是你的选择，战士。如果你；在未来的不同时期，普林尼将在这里提供紧急援助。

original_en_text: My sickly friend! Pavo can sense that you are ailing, but fret not! For in Bellhart, pilgrims may rest and recuperate until they are fit to travel once more!<hpage>Your hospitality is appreciated, Pavo, but I fear rest alone will not suffice for this illness. A parasite has taken root inside me, one I can not remove through strength alone.<hpage>Tell me, are there any you know who might help me? A healer, or a physician?<page>A physician? Well... we did once have one... A frightening fiend! Callous and crude in her practice. For the health of glorious Bellhart we voted, unanimously, to expel her!<page>I know not where she buzzed away to, and I prefer to keep it that way! But if you really must seek her out, you might start by speaking to the old hermit skulking beneath the Bellway.<page>Yes... that hermit seems mad, but he has a way of accumulating knowledge. He might be able to tell you where that wretched physician is lurking.
original_zh_text: 我生病的朋友！帕沃能感觉到你生病了，但别担心！因为在贝尔哈特，朝圣者可以休息和休养，直到他们适合再次旅行！&lt;hpage&gt;谢谢你的款待，帕沃，但我担心独自休息不足以治疗这种疾病。一种寄生虫已经在我体内扎根，我无法仅靠力量将其清除。&lt;hpage&gt;告诉我，你知道谁可以帮助我吗？治疗师，还是医生？&lt;page&gt;医生？好。…我们曾经有过一次。..一个可怕的恶魔！她的练习冷酷无情。为了贝尔哈特的健康，我们一致投票决定开除她！&lt;page&gt;我不知道她飞到哪里去了，我更喜欢这样！但如果你真的必须去找她，你可以先和躲在贝尔韦下面的老隐士谈谈。&lt;page&gt;对。那个隐士看起来很疯狂，但他有积累知识的方法。他也许能告诉你那个可怜的医生潜伏在哪里。

original_en_text: We are lucky to have you, miss traveller. In Bellhart you are always welcome, you and your big, sharp blade!
original_zh_text: 我们很幸运有你，旅行者小姐。在贝尔哈特，你和你那锋利的大刀刃永远受欢迎！

original_en_text: <hpage>What do you remember of your time caught upon the thread, Pavo?<page>Oh, ahh. It is difficult... Upsetting even to think. Strange, sad memories, not my own, and my own thoughts smothered amidst the tangle.<page>If one could choose to connect themself to something grander, that curse may seem a wonder. For myself, it now seems a horror.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;帕沃，你还记得你被线缠住的时候吗？&lt;page&gt;哦，啊。这很难。..甚至思考都会感到不安。奇怪的、悲伤的回忆，不是我自己的，我自己的想法淹没在混乱之中。&lt;page&gt;如果一个人可以选择将自己与更伟大的事物联系起来，那么这个诅咒似乎是一个奇迹。对我来说，这现在似乎是一种恐怖。

original_en_text: Oh! Ohhhh! They shall join... Union upon your thread... A gift, for your waking. A world strung to serve...<hpage>Creature, your claws guide those cursed threads, but you are not their source. What role do you play in this vile affliction?
original_zh_text: 哦！他们将加入。..团结在你的线上。..一份礼物，为了你的清醒。一个等待服务的世界。..&lt;hpage&gt;生物，你的爪子引导着那些被诅咒的线，但你不是它们的源头。你在这场卑鄙的苦难中扮演什么角色？

original_en_text: <page=T>But hold, miss courier! Before depart you mustly know, all deliverings are in needing of great-great care!<page=S>No bump! No shake! No taking funny transport! Only leg, claw, wing must be used to see them where they need be going.<page=S>Carry the deliverings safe-safe, miss courier! Cared for like your own shell.
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；但是等等，快递小姐！出发前你必须知道，所有的送货都需要非常小心！&lt；页面=S&gt；没有颠簸！不要摇晃！不要乘坐滑稽的交通工具！只有腿、爪子和翅膀才能看到它们需要去的地方。&lt；页面=S&gt；快递小姐，把货物安全地运出去！像照顾自己的壳一样照顾。

original_en_text: <page=T>Those good-goods, all packed fresh for the clever fleas. Take thems up for us, miss courier. Maybe new friends you might be making with your service? Yes-yes?
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；那些好货，都是为聪明的跳蚤新鲜包装的。快递小姐，帮我们把它们拿起来。也许你会用你的服务结交新朋友？是吗？

original_en_text: Bzzt! Who’s bothering me now?! Leave the great Yarnaby in peace! Shoo shoo!
original_zh_text: Bzzt！谁&#8217;现在打扰我了吗？！让伟大的亚拉比安息吧！嘘嘘！

original_en_text: <hpage>I am sick, madam, and badly in need of your service. I’ve become host to a vile infestation. It leeches my strength, and attempts to wrest control of my shell.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我生病了，夫人，急需您的服务。I&#8217;我成了一场卑鄙的瘟疫的宿主。它夺走了我的力量，试图控制我的外壳。

original_en_text: Halfwits, the lot of them! Such grand achievement, wrought by Yarnaby! A bug healed full by my marvellous machine!<page>A few weaklings expire, and they all raise their claws. Is there no place for progress in their tiny minds?!
original_zh_text: 傻瓜，他们中的很多人！Yarnaby取得了如此伟大的成就！我的神奇机器治好了一只虫子！&lt;page&gt;少数弱者会死去，他们都会举起爪子。在他们幼小的心灵中，难道没有进步的空间吗？！

original_en_text: Bellhart’s lost much of its lustre, but we still offer some comfort to the pilgrims who climb this high.
original_zh_text: 贝尔哈特&#8217;它失去了很多光泽，但我们仍然为攀登如此之高的朝圣者提供了一些安慰。

original_en_text: <page>Dear resident! To see you return alive is such a glimmer of light, even as the dark descends upon us all.<hpage>All these pilgrims gathered here... I had not expected so many to survive. The destruction beyond these bells suggested worse.<page>Indeed! Things should be worse! Would be worse, but for your tall warrior friend, her of those shining rings, who so fortunately chose our town to camp.<page>That brave bug now acts alone to guard our town and those pilgrims who flee for it.<page>For her efforts, our shells have stayed safe, though how long she can remain at that task... I do not dare to consider.
original_zh_text: &lt;page&gt;亲爱的居民！即使黑暗降临在我们所有人身上，看到你活着回来也是一道微光。&lt;hpage&gt;所有这些朝圣者都聚集在这里。我没想到会有这么多人幸存下来。这些钟声之外的破坏表明情况更糟。&lt;page&gt;的确！情况应该更糟！如果不是你那位高大的战士朋友，她那闪闪发光的戒指，那么情况会更糟，她很幸运地选择了我们的城镇露营。&lt;page&gt;那只勇敢的虫子现在独自行动，守卫着我们的城镇和那些为之逃亡的朝圣者。&lt;page&gt;由于她的努力，我们的炮弹一直很安全，尽管她能在这项任务上呆多久。..我不敢考虑。

original_en_text: My brother, Pill, still out there. Help-help others he must be, taking good-goods all across. I’m is only hope he stay safe-safe, but gone long is Pill. Too long!<page>On the wishwall, I’m placed my wish-wish, that my brother returns to me, and these bells of safety’s safe.<hpage>I shall check the wall, Tipp. If your wish aligns with my journey, I may track him down.
original_zh_text: 我哥哥，Pill，还在外面。他必须帮助别人，把好东西都拿走。I&#8217;我只希望他能安然无恙，但药丸已经死了很久。太久了！&lt;page&gt;在许愿墙上，我；我表达了我的愿望，希望我的兄弟回到我身边，还有这些安全的钟声；很安全。&lt;hpage&gt;我去看看墙，蒂普。如果你的愿望与我的旅程一致，我可能会找到他。

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. Given the hardships of the lands beyond these bells, your store seems in remarkable order. <page>Aye, well, we’ve had our tough times too! Of once bustling Bellhart, only a few residents now remain.<page>But things are turned around for old Frey! Ho, yes! The town at least feels briefly at peace, and my courier has returned with fresh goods to trade. <page>Whether pilgrim or traveller, mine is the finest store you’ll have the fortune to visit throughout our blighted lands.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;你好，店主。考虑到这些钟声之外土地的艰辛，你的商店似乎秩序井然。&lt;page&gt;是的，好吧，我们；我也经历过艰难的时刻！曾经繁华的贝尔哈特，现在只剩下少数居民了。&lt;page&gt;但老弗雷的情况已经好转了！啊，是的！这座城镇至少暂时平静下来，我的快递员带着新鲜商品回来了。&lt;page&gt;无论是朝圣者还是旅行者，我的商店都是你最好的商店；我将有幸参观我们这片荒芜的土地。

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, shopkeeper. Your shelves are looking better stocked. I see the courier made their way back to you safely.<page>Oh yes, the cheeky little so-and-so came by and dropped his cargo off at last.<page>Poor dear was so shaken by his misadventures, I almost didn’t have the heart to dock his earnings.<page>All’s well now, though! Take a look at the lovely new goods I have available!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;再次问候，店主。你的货架看起来库存更好。我看到快递员安全地回到了你身边。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的，那个厚颜无耻的小某某走过来，终于把货物放下了。&lt;page&gt;可怜的亲爱的被他的不幸所震撼，我几乎没有；我不忍心扣减他的收入。&lt;page&gt;全部&#8217;不过，现在好多了！看看我现有的可爱的新商品！

original_en_text: Ohhhh! She is here! The rare birthling! Precious child of Wyrm and Weaver!<page>Spawn of those who dared to flee. She has found her way home... at last.<page>How fine her shell, and Silk, and claw... For you, mother... let me claim her all for you!
original_zh_text: 噢！她来了！罕见的分娩！Wyrm和Weaver的宝贝孩子！&lt;page&gt;那些敢于逃跑的人的后代。她找到了回家的路。…终于。&lt;page&gt;她的外壳、丝绸和爪子真是精致。为了你，妈妈。..让我为你把一切都据为己有！

original_en_text: A fine purchase you’ve made! Allow us a moment and we’ll get it set up in your bellhome.
original_zh_text: 一个很好的购买你＆#8217；我做了！请给我们一点时间，我们&#8217;我会把它放在你的行李寄存处。

original_en_text: Ah! That relic you possess! A cylinder of the Citadel’s sacred vault! That there is a mighty find. You will give it, yes?<hpage>I will not, seeker. To extract what knowledge it holds, this cylinder requires a listening device, one you do not possess.<hpage>If it were passed, whatever secrets it contains would remain forever hidden from us both.<page>Pah... If it will not speak to me, I do not want it! Don’t trouble me until you have something worth my taking!
original_zh_text: 啊！你拥有的那个遗物！城堡的圆柱体&#8217;这是神圣的拱顶！这是一个巨大的发现。你会给的，是吗？&lt;hpage&gt;我不会的，探索者。为了提取它所掌握的知识，这个圆柱体需要一个听音装置，一个你没有的听音装置。&lt;hpage&gt;如果它通过了，它所包含的任何秘密都将永远对我们俩隐藏。&lt;page&gt;帕。..如果它不跟我说话，我不想要它！唐&#8217;除非你有值得我拿走的东西，否则不要打扰我！

original_en_text: <page=T>The deliverings, all broken-broke? Would you try-try again, miss courier? Pharloom’s bugs are so much in need of your help!
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；交付的货物，都碎了吗？快递小姐，你能再试一次吗？Pharrom&#8217;这些虫子非常需要你的帮助！

original_en_text: Bonva, traveller! You have the oil! Will you allow me to work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: 邦瓦，旅行者！你有油！你能让我在你的刀刃上创造奇迹吗？

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, weary pilgrim! Though glorious Bellhart may be past its finest shine, it still remains the last friendly stop before the Citadel. <page>It is the task of I, fair Pavo, to extend the warmest of welcome to those passing devout, such as your good self!<page>Now! I insist you enjoy our remaining hospitality, if only for a moment. We’ve wares to buy and services to enjoy!<page>Even in our reduced state, you’ll find ours as cosy a stop as can be offered in these ailing lands.
original_zh_text: 欢迎，欢迎，疲惫的朝圣者！虽然辉煌的贝尔哈特可能已经过了它最辉煌的时期，但它仍然是城堡前的最后一站。&lt;page&gt;我，公平的帕沃，有责任向那些逝去的虔诚者，比如你的善良自我，表示最热烈的欢迎！&lt;page&gt;现在我坚持要你享受我们剩下的款待，哪怕只是片刻。我们&#8217;有商品可买，有服务可享受！&lt;page&gt;即使在我们缩减的状态下，你；我会发现我们在这些境况不佳的土地上尽可能舒适地停留。

original_en_text: My sickly friend! I can sense that you are ailing. Has the black curse struck even your sturdy shell?<hpage>This illness stems from a different source, Pavo. A parasite has taken root inside me, one I can not remove through strength alone.<hpage>Tell me, are there any you know who might help me? A healer, or a physician?<page>A physician? Well... we did once have one... A frightening fiend! Callous and crude in her practice. For the health of glorious Bellhart we voted, unanimously, to expel her!<page>I know not where she buzzed away to, but the world beyond the bells is full of danger. If you must seek her service, I expect she would not have travelled far...
original_zh_text: 我生病的朋友！我能感觉到你病了。黑诅咒打到你坚固的外壳了吗？&lt;hpage&gt;这种疾病源于另一个源头，帕沃。一种寄生虫已经在我体内扎根，我无法仅靠力量将其清除。&lt;hpage&gt;告诉我，你知道谁可以帮助我吗？治疗师，还是医生？&lt;page&gt;医生？好。…我们曾经有过一次。..一个可怕的恶魔！她的练习冷酷无情。为了贝尔哈特的健康，我们一致投票决定开除她！&lt;page&gt;我不知道她嗡嗡地走到哪里去了，但钟声之外的世界充满了危险。如果你一定要找她帮忙，我想她不会走得太远。..

original_en_text: Welly, nay? Certainly you make the safer choice. Better to keep one’s shell intact.
original_zh_text: 嗯，不是吗？当然，你会做出更安全的选择。最好留一个；外壳完好无损。

original_en_text: <page=T>Supplies for the rest-stop in the fields. We is used to like this delivering, when we was young and muchly brave.
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；其余的补给停在田里。当我们年轻勇敢的时候，我们习惯于这样的演讲。

original_en_text: This town feel safe, just, but I’m is worries for others. Is Pharloom needing its good-goods?<page>Many bugs helped by us couriers, me and brother Pill. Special now when danger grows big-big.
original_zh_text: 这个城镇感觉很安全，只是，但我；m是为别人担心。Pharmaloom需要它的好产品吗？&lt;page&gt;我们快递员、我和Pill兄弟帮助了许多虫子。特别是在危险越来越大的时候。

original_en_text: I saw it! Took my wish off the board, you did! Heading out after my stray courier, then?<hpage>My own tasks see me travel far, shopkeeper. If, on my journey, I happen upon the errant bug, I’ll make sure to send them your way.<page>Then you’ll have my thanks and more! It’s a rare bug who’d brave the wilds to aid a fellow.
original_zh_text: 我看到了！把我的愿望从黑板上拿走了，你做到了！那么，是去追我的流浪快递员吗？&lt;hpage&gt;店主，我自己的任务让我走得很远。如果在我的旅途中，我偶然发现了错误的虫子，我；我会确保把它们寄给你。&lt;page&gt;然后你&#8217;我会得到我的感谢和更多！它&#8217;这是一种罕见的虫子；我勇敢地走出荒野去帮助一个人。

original_en_text: For a spool bearing no Silk, it’s surprisingly heavy. Do you think perhaps it could be a gift left behind by the old creeping ones?
original_zh_text: 对于没有丝绸的卷轴，它；它出奇地重。你觉得这可能是老爬虫留下的礼物吗？

original_en_text: If you really must find that wretched physician, speak to the old hermit lurking beneath Bellhart. He knows much more than he admits of the world...
original_zh_text: 如果你真的必须找到那个可怜的医生，和潜伏在贝尔哈特下面的老隐士谈谈。他知道的比他承认的要多得多。..

original_en_text: Welly, done! What miracle to work again upon steel so fine. Few pins left in Pharloom could attain such a sheen!<page>You must tell me, traveller, wherever did you come upon so splendid a weapon?<hpage>The blade was a gift, given by a noble tribe of my homeland. They forged the strongest steel, though it was rarely seen beyond their hive.<hpage>That tribe has now long passed, and with them the secrets to their craft.<page>Ahhh. If they are gone, it’s a rarer piece than would be guessed! But what grand luck for this humble pinmaster to have worked with such a weapon!
original_zh_text: 干了！在如此精细的钢铁上再次工作，真是奇迹。Pharloom上剩下的别针很少能达到这样的光泽！&lt;page&gt;旅行者，你必须告诉我，你在哪里找到这么漂亮的武器的？&lt;hpage&gt;这把刀是我家乡一个贵族部落送给我的礼物。它们锻造了最坚固的钢铁，尽管在蜂巢之外很少见到。&lt;hpage&gt;那个部落已经过去很久了，他们手艺的秘密也随之而去。&lt;page&gt;啊。如果他们走了，它；这是一件比想象中更罕见的作品！但是，这位谦逊的拼音大师能使用这样的武器，真是太幸运了！

original_en_text: <page=T>Good-goods for the pilgrims up high! Thems brave ones, settled up on that big-big Citadel.<page=S>These deliverings they will muchly need, miss courier. Carry them safe-safe, for us!
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；好东西给高高的朝圣者！他们勇敢地定居在那座巨大的城堡上。&lt；页面=S&gt；快递小姐，这些货物他们非常需要。为我们安全地带着它们！

original_en_text: Bzz-zzt! You hesitate! But your fear of my Extricator is born from mere ignorance, and you can overcome it with effort. Take a moment. Reconsider!
original_zh_text: 嘘，嘘！你犹豫了！但你对我的传道者的恐惧源于无知，你可以通过努力克服它。请稍等片刻。重新考虑！

original_en_text: The great Yarnaby can rid you of those nasty “roots”, but to crack your stiff shell my mighty Extricator needs an upgrade!
original_zh_text: 伟大的Yarnaby可以让你摆脱那些讨厌的东西&#8220；根&#8221；，但要破解你坚硬的外壳，我强大的Extricator需要升级！

original_en_text: Hello again! Fancy buying something special before your tasks whisk you away?
original_zh_text: 你好！想在任务把你带走之前买点特别的东西吗？

original_en_text: <hpage>Couriers, I require a rasher of meat, for an old bug in the Citadel. Can you prepare it for me?<page=T>A bug up-up? Theys knows our finest food? If theys appreciate, we can prepare it most prompt! Miss courier has only to ask.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;信使们，我需要一片肉，因为城堡里有一只老虫子。你能为我准备吗？&lt；页面=T&gt；出毛病了？他们知道我们最好的食物吗？如果他们喜欢，我们可以尽快准备！快递小姐只要问就行了。

original_en_text: A sturdy desk is the heart of any bellhome! Use it to take stock of your situation or organise your artefacts.
original_zh_text: 坚固的桌子是任何行李寄存处的核心！用它来评估你的情况或组织你的文物。

original_en_text: These roots that torment you so... I’m not altogether familiar with them, but it matters not!<page>If there’s something inside a body that must come out, we use great Yarnaby’s Extricator! It’s your only hope, bzzt!
original_zh_text: 这些折磨你的根…我；我对他们不太熟悉，但这并不重要！&lt;page&gt;如果存在&#8217;这是身体内部必须出来的东西，我们使用伟大的Yarnaby；外向者！它&#8217;这是你唯一的希望，bzzt！

original_en_text: You’d ask my aid, but won’t assist yourself? Then leave! Remain suffering, and stop being a bother to me, bzzt!
original_zh_text: 您&#8217;我请求我的帮助，但我赢了；你不能自助吗？那就走！继续受苦吧，别再打扰我了，bzzt！

original_en_text: Fellow resident! The world quakes and crumbles, but while my shell stays safe, my shop stays open.
original_zh_text: 老居民！世界会震动和崩溃，但只要我的外壳保持安全，我的商店就会继续营业。

original_en_text: Welly, nay? You hold the precious oil for yourself? For what purpose do you deny a pinmaster their work? There is only I alive to work with such a wondrous substance!
original_zh_text: 嗯，不是吗？你为自己保留了珍贵的石油吗？你为了什么目的拒绝一个pinmaster的工作？只有我活着，才能用这种神奇的物质工作！

original_en_text: Find that wretched physician fast, dear resident! I know not where she buzzed away to, but the world beyond the bells is full of danger.<page>If you must seek her service, I expect she would not have travelled far...
original_zh_text: 亲爱的住院医生，快去找那个可怜的医生！我不知道她嗡嗡地走到哪里去了，但钟声之外的世界充满了危险。&lt;page&gt;如果你一定要找她帮忙，我想她不会走得太远。..

original_en_text: What? What now? What’s all that great racket, what is it?<hpage>Greetings, ma’am. It is only I. If you are disturbed by the rending of these lands, I fear some blame is mine to bear.<page>Blame, is it? Pah. Those who come after us can apportion blame as they see fit.<page>For now, my collection is the only thing that matters! I must protect it!
original_zh_text: 什么？现在怎么办？什么；这么大的球拍，是什么？&lt;hpage&gt;你好，马&#8217;是的。只有我。如果你被这些土地的破坏所困扰，恐怕我该承担一些责任。&lt;page&gt;怪我吧？帕。那些追随我们的人可以按他们认为合适的方式分摊责任。&lt;page&gt;目前，我的收藏是唯一重要的东西！我必须保护它！

original_en_text: <page=S>A delivery deadly, dangerous, fiercably cold, for old bug up there that does need it much-much! Serves us all he does, so we serve back.<page=T>And great test for you, miss courier! Most challenging-challenge this. The lacquer to bring is sloshy-slosh. A hard carry even for the best.<hpage>I have met this maker. His is a long service, worthy of respect. I will be glad to aid his efforts.
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=S&gt；这是一种致命、危险、严寒的分娩方式，对于那里非常需要它的老虫子来说！他所做的一切都为我们服务，所以我们也为他服务。&lt；页面=T&gt；这对你来说是一个巨大的考验，快递小姐！这是最具挑战性的挑战。要拿来的漆很邋遢。即使是最好的，也很难携带。&lt;hpage&gt;我见过这个制造商。他的长期服务，值得尊敬。我很乐意帮助他的努力。

original_en_text: <page=S>Deliverings for the waystation in the fields at Pharloom’s edge, a small rest-stop, still serving.<page=S>This journey is maybe not so very hard for you, miss courier? We think you is perfect for this wish!
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=S&gt；为Pharloom田间的中转站交货&#8217;s边缘，一个小休息站，仍在服务。&lt；页面=S&gt；快递小姐，这次旅行对你来说可能不是很难吧？我们认为你非常适合这个愿望！

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, travellers all! Rest your weary shell and revive your flagging spirit!<page>Bellhart! Glorious, gleaming, and very very safe! Stay a while before you begin your final climb!
original_zh_text: 欢迎，欢迎，各位旅客！休息你疲惫的外壳，重振你萎靡不振的精神！&lt;page&gt;贝尔哈特！光彩照人，闪闪发光，非常安全！在开始最后一次攀登之前，先呆一会儿！

original_en_text: Go and rest! Bzzt! Free yourself of your trifling ailment and leave me in peace! The great Yarnaby has no time for petty maladies!<hpage>Very well, madam. I did not mean to waste your time.
original_zh_text: 去休息吧！Bzzt！摆脱你的小病痛，让我安息吧！伟大的雅娜比没有时间治疗小病！&lt;hpage&gt;很好，夫人。我不是故意浪费你的时间。

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. It seems you’ve recovered well from that silken affliction.<page>Ah! Well, I’m a clever bug. When that strange thread struck down from above, I shut up tight and huddled in my bellhome.<page>Might’ve been a problem for the others about here, but my store was flush with supplies, so no fear I’d go hungry.<hpage>Your preparedness served you well then, and it seems your store is still well-stocked.<page>Oh yes, even my supplier is back to work, so I have plenty of goods to show you!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;你好，店主。看来你&#8217;我从那场丝绸般的痛苦中恢复得很好。&lt;page&gt;啊！好吧，我；我是一只聪明的虫子。当那根奇怪的线从上面下来时，我紧紧地闭上了嘴，蜷缩在行李房里。&lt;page&gt;可能&#8217;这对这里的其他人来说是个问题，但我的商店里物资充足，所以不用担心；d饿了。&lt;hpage&gt;你的准备工作对你很有帮助，看来你的商店仍然有充足的库存。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的，就连我的供应商也回来了，所以我有很多货物要给你看！

original_en_text: Welly now! You have the oil, traveller! Allow me to bring about a shine bright as none before!
original_zh_text: 好了！你有油，旅行者！请允许我带来前所未有的光辉！

original_en_text: But, hold! There is something more about you... I’ve sliced the shells of countless filthy pilgrims! All those plain, greying innards! Yours are something else entirely!<page>It tickles at my mind, still! Bzzt! What is it of your shell that eludes even my perfect, precise perception?<page>Would you show me, specimen? Go on! Let the great Yarnaby peer at your deeper, darker secrets!<hpage>I’ve no desire to see my shell pried into further, healer. Your service has succeeded, and taken its toll in pain. I hope only that I never again need to seek your aid.
original_zh_text: 但是，等等！还有更多关于你的事。..我&#8217;我切下了无数肮脏朝圣者的贝壳！所有那些朴素、灰白的内脏！你的完全是另一回事！&lt;page&gt;它仍然在我脑海中发痒！Bzzt！你的外壳是什么，连我完美、精确的感知都无法理解？&lt;page&gt;你能给我看看标本吗？去吧！让伟大的Yarnaby窥探你更深层次、更黑暗的秘密！&lt;hpage&gt;I&#8217;我不想看到我的壳被进一步戳破，治疗师。你的服务取得了成功，并在痛苦中付出了代价。我只希望我再也不需要你的帮助了。

original_en_text: If ever upon your long road more oil is acquired, seek my service with haste! Who knows what form we could find deeper within your blade’s sharpened steel!
original_zh_text: 如果你在漫长的道路上获得了更多的石油，赶紧寻求我的帮助！谁知道我们能在你的刀刃深处找到什么形状；锋利的钢！

original_en_text: Gahh! Who keeps making all that racket out there?! Such horrid shaking and screaming. The crucial work is being spoiled! Bzzzt!
original_zh_text: 哈！谁一直在外面吵闹？！如此可怕的颤抖和尖叫。关键的工作被破坏了！Bzzzt！

original_en_text: The operation... a success! The simpletons hiding in that blasted bellvein would shudder into dust if they saw how much I achieve without them!<hpage>Madam... I shan’t lie, that was an ordeal such as I have rarely suffered...<hpage>And yet, the parasite does seem to have been... unbound somewhat. Whatever remnant still lingers in my shell feels calmed, enough for me to claim its power as my own.<hpage>Perhaps this is a fortunate result after all.<page>Of course. Of course! Great Yarnaby has healed you! Shout it through the caverns. Scream it from the great spinning towers!<page>Just make sure they hear you in the so-called ‘civilised’ settlements of this ignorant land!
original_zh_text: 手术。..成功！那些躲在爆炸的钟形静脉里的傻瓜，如果他们看到没有他们我能取得多大的成就，他们会吓得浑身发抖！&lt;hpage&gt;夫人。..我要；别撒谎，那是我很少经历的磨难。..&lt;hpage&gt;然而，寄生虫似乎确实如此。..有点松散。无论我的壳里还有什么残骸，我都会感到平静，足以让我把它的力量据为己有。&lt;hpage&gt;也许这毕竟是一个幸运的结果。&lt;page&gt;当然。当然可以啊!伟大的亚拉比治好了你！在洞穴中大声呼喊。从巨大的旋转塔中大喊！&lt;page&gt;只要确保他们听到你在所谓的&#8216；文明&#8217;这片无知之地的定居点！

original_en_text: A mighty collection of the past, is it not? If only I could hoard all of history here with me!
original_zh_text: 这是对过去的强大收藏，不是吗？要是我能把所有的历史都藏在这里就好了！

original_en_text: Fellow resident, welcome home! The world may quake and crumble, and threaten its end, but while my shell stays safe my shop stays open.
original_zh_text: 各位居民，欢迎回家！世界可能会地震和崩溃，并威胁到它的终结，但只要我的外壳保持安全，我的商店就会继续营业。

original_en_text: Yes... yes! Bzzt! Finally, a specimen worthy of my mighty Extricator! My beautiful, unfairly-maligned Extricator! Come this way, bzzt...
original_zh_text: 对。…是的！Bzzt！最后，一个值得我强大的演说家的样本！我美丽的、被不公平地诽谤的演说家！这边走，bzzt。..

original_en_text: By claw! Who is this bold warrior, standing so calm and cool on entrance to Plinney’s bellhome!<hpage>Merely a traveller, sir, though one whose blade could benefit from your service.<page>Your blade! Of course, fierce warrior! Any fine pinmaster would detect the sign of deadly work upon that needle’s edge.<page>If your weapon sharpened would see our lands that much safer, then honour decrees it receives my care this very moment! What’s say I take a look?<hpage>
original_zh_text: 用爪子！这位勇敢的战士是谁，站在普林尼入口处如此冷静和冷静；欢迎光临！&lt;hpage&gt;只是一个旅行者，先生，尽管他的刀刃可以从你的服务中受益。&lt;page&gt;你的刀！当然，凶猛的战士！任何优秀的针匠都会发现针上有致命工作的迹象；的边缘。&lt;page&gt;如果你的武器磨得锋利，我们的土地就会安全得多，那么荣誉法令就在此刻接受我的照顾！什么；你说我看看？&lt;hpage&gt;

original_en_text: Come back with those spines, or not at all! The great Yarnaby’s time is precious, bzzt! I will not be distracted from my work!
original_zh_text: 带着那些刺回来，或者根本不回来！伟大的Yarnaby；她的时间很宝贵，bzzt！我不会从工作中分心的！

original_en_text: Ahh... how welly romantic t’would’ve been, had the lost pilgrims struck me down beside her grave, to lie together forever as the world crumbles all ‘round...<page>But fortune has claimed otherwise! And perhaps ‘tis best for this humble pinmaster to continue his trade a little longer. These uncertain times will bring much new work, I should think!
original_zh_text: 啊。..多么浪漫；将&#8217;如果迷失的朝圣者把我打倒在她的坟墓旁，我会永远躺在一起，因为世界正在崩溃；圆形。..&lt;page&gt;但命运却并非如此！也许——；这位谦逊的品管大师最好再继续他的交易一段时间。我想，这些不确定的时期会带来很多新的工作！

original_en_text: What’s this... twitching inside of you? A slave within a slave! Given over your shell to grow something greater?<hpage>A parasite has made its home within me. It saps my energy, and I can not purge it with strength alone...<page>Grnk. Lie down and die then, for all I care. Allow that wriggling thing its chance at life.<page>Or else... hff. Go seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out, high up into the moors, last I heard.
original_zh_text: 什么；这就是。..在你内心抽搐？奴隶中的奴隶！给你的壳长更大的东西？&lt;hpage&gt;寄生虫在我体内安家。它消耗了我的能量，我无法独自用力量清除它。..&lt;page&gt;Grnk。那就躺下死吧，不管我怎么想。让那个扭动的东西有机会活下去。&lt;page&gt;否则。..hff。去找那个被贝尔哈特放逐的人，小雅娜比。我最后一次听说，她被赶了出去，高高地冲进了荒野。

original_en_text: More, then! Bring me more relics of the past! Records, seals, idols! Let’s gather up the history of the world and hoard it all here, nice and safe!<hpage>If I happen upon more curiosities of this kingdom’s past, I may visit again. Until that time, keep yourself safe.
original_zh_text: 那么，更多！给我带来更多过去的遗物！唱片、印章、偶像！让我们&#8217;我们收集世界历史，把它们都藏在这里，又好又安全！&lt;hpage&gt;如果我偶然发现更多关于这个王国的好奇心；过去了，我可能会再来。在那之前，请确保自己的安全。

original_en_text: <page=T>More for you, miss courier! Lacquer, filled fresh, for the maker on the mount. We have much, so don’t worry for our supply. <page=S>To climb the frozen peak, it is a journey most difficult! Our thanks go full with you that tries again!
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；给你更多，快递小姐！漆，填充新鲜，为制造商在山上。我们有很多，所以不要；别担心我们的供应。&lt；页面=S&gt；攀登冰冻的山峰，是一段最艰难的旅程！我们衷心感谢您再次尝试！

original_en_text: <page=T>More meats for you, miss courier! Best you be delivering it swiftly quick! If left not stored, our rasher’s flavour fast turns foul.
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=T&gt；给你更多的肉，快递小姐！最好是快速交付！如果不储存，我们的皮疹&#8217;他的味道很快就变臭了。

original_en_text: Shoo I say! Unless you’ve brought a worthy specimen, with something truly nasty inside them, bzzt! Otherwise, leave the great Yarnaby in peace!
original_zh_text: 我说！除非你；我带来了一个有价值的标本，里面有一些真正令人讨厌的东西，bzzt！否则，让伟大的亚拉比安息吧！

original_en_text: Miss saving! Thanks again for you and your big-big blade! I’m is made it back, and grumpy grub-grub got her goods. She seemed happy, even!<page>I’m won’t be travelling out for a while-while methinks. Too many beasties! All about theys are. Even those pilgrims! All now going angry, a bit like old grub-grub.<hpage>This town remains safe for the moment, Tipp. You’re a smart bug to stay within its walls.
original_zh_text: 救命小姐！再次感谢你和你的大刀！I&#8217;m回来了，脾气暴躁的grub grub得到了她的货物。她看起来很高兴，甚至！&lt;page&gt;I&#8217;m赢了&#8217;我想暂时不要出去旅行。野兽太多了！他们都是。即使是那些朝圣者！现在大家都很生气，有点像老蛆虫。&lt;hpage&gt;这个城镇目前仍然安全，蒂普。您&#8217;呆在墙里是个聪明的虫子。

original_en_text: You’ve a good, solid bell up there, though its surface is showing its age. Why not have us paint it fresh? A protective coat and a little flair!
original_zh_text: 您&#8217;我上面有个结实的铃铛，虽然它的表面已经显示出它的年龄了。为什么我们不把它漆成新的？一件防护服和一点天赋！

original_en_text: <hpage>You seem hard at work, good bug. Are you a hunter, of a sort?<page>Of a simple sort, aye. I’m a pondcatcher around these parts. The last remaining, in fact! <page>Us few Bellharters are badly needing for fresh food, so my lone shell’s carrying quite the responsibility.<page>At least Shellwood Pond’s still full of good meat, ‘specially if your aim with a longpin’s as good as mine.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;你看起来工作很努力，好虫。你是猎人吗？&lt;page&gt;很简单，是的。I&#8217;我在这些地方捡积水。最后剩下的，事实上！&lt;page&gt;我们这些Bellharters非常需要新鲜食物，所以我唯一的贝壳&#8217;他承担着相当大的责任。&lt;page&gt;至少贝壳木池塘；它仍然充满了美味的肉；特别是如果你用长销瞄准的话；它和我的一样好。

original_en_text: My part’s been given, slave. We’ve no more need to speak.<page>Go and spin your spider’s web. Allow our kingdom’s restless soul its chance to blaze.
original_zh_text: 我的部分&#8217;已经给了，奴隶。我们&#8217;我不需要再说话了。&lt;page&gt;去旋转你的蜘蛛&#8217;s web。允许我们的王国&#8217;不安分的灵魂有机会燃烧。

original_en_text: <hpage>I have more oil, pinmaster. Its acquisition was no small task, but if it aids my blade, those challenges will be well rewarded.<page>Even more oil? What preposterous luck! That unseen gift, in quantity unheard, discovered by a single bug!<page>Would you pass the oil, traveller, and perhaps a few rosaries for the ongoing effort? Allow this pinmaster to again work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我有更多的油，pinmaster。收购它并非易事，但如果它能帮助我的刀刃，这些挑战将得到很好的回报。&lt;page&gt;更多的石油？多么荒谬的运气！那看不见的礼物，数量闻所未闻，是由一只虫子发现的！&lt;page&gt;你会把油、旅行者，也许还有一些念珠递给正在进行的努力吗？让这个pinmaster再次在你的刀片上工作奇迹？

original_en_text: An exquisite item, containing a cherished memory. I have an excellent memory myself, but I’m sure you can make good use of it.
original_zh_text: 一件精致的物品，包含着珍贵的回忆。我自己的记忆力很好，但我；我肯定你能好好利用它。

original_en_text: Don’t act the fool, specimen! Bzzt! Share more of yourself, that I may gain greater understanding! Learning! What other hope is there to save our blighted, thankless world?! <hpage>I have declined, bug. Whatever you seek, you shall not find it either upon or within my shell.
original_zh_text: 唐&#8217;别装傻，小家伙！Bzzt！多分享自己，这样我才能更好地理解！学习！还有什么希望能拯救我们这个被摧残、吃力不讨好的世界呢？！&lt;hpage&gt;我拒绝了，虫子。无论你寻求什么，你都不会在我的壳上或壳内找到它。

original_en_text: <page>Miss traveller! Thanks to your valiant contributions, our little town’s starting to feel like its old self again. Homes have been hoisted, and the square shines!<hpage>I have seen the changes myself, Pavo. It is pleasing to hear my contributions have not been in vain. <page>Indeed! Your generosity is a guide for others! We’ve only one thing now sorely missing...<page>Bugs! What is a town without its residents? Age, scarcity, deadly thread... Bellhart is beset by endless ills. Now there’s just us remaining few as you’ve met.<page>In recognition of your noble efforts, and as one small step to solving the problem, I have decreed a grand gift should be given! A bellhome of your very own!<page>A place to reflect. A bed to lay in. It’s hanging up there at the top, beside our good pinmaster. <hpage>I have no plans to settle, Pavo, but for now my task in Pharloom remains, and while it does, a residence may prove useful.<page>Of course! Of course! Your fortitude inspires us all! And if trouble ever descends anew, it surely won’t hurt to have a resident warrior close at claw!
original_zh_text: &lt;page&gt;旅人小姐！感谢您的英勇贡献，我们的小镇&#8217;她又开始感觉自己像以前一样了。房屋已被吊起，广场闪闪发光！&lt;hpage&gt;我自己也看到了变化，帕沃。很高兴听到我的贡献没有白费。&lt;page&gt;的确！你的慷慨是他人的指南！我们&#8217;我现在只缺一件东西。..&lt;page&gt;漏洞！一个没有居民的城镇是什么？年龄、稀缺、致命的线索。贝尔哈特被无尽的疾病所困扰。现在有了&#8217;只有我们和你一样少&#8217;我见过。&lt;page&gt;为了表彰您的崇高努力，并作为解决问题的一小步，我已经下令应该赠送一份大礼物！一个属于你自己的行李寄存处！&lt;page&gt;一个反思的地方。一张可以躺的床；它挂在最上面，在我们优秀的拼音老师旁边。&lt;hpage&gt;帕沃，我没有定居的计划，但目前我在法洛姆的任务仍然存在，尽管如此，一个住所可能会证明是有用的。&lt;page&gt;当然可以啊!当然可以啊!你的坚韧激励着我们所有人！如果麻烦再次降临，它肯定会赢；有一个常驻的战士靠近爪子也没什么坏处！

original_en_text: If you refuse to share your secrets, then distract me no more, specimen! Bzzt!<page>There is still much work ahead for the great Yarnaby! Much thought, much learning!<page>Though the ungrateful world shuns me, still, by my own claws shall it be saved!
original_zh_text: 如果你拒绝分享你的秘密，那就别再分散我的注意力了，标本！Bzzt！&lt;page&gt;伟大的Yarnaby还有很多工作要做！多思考，多学习！&lt;page&gt;尽管这个忘恩负义的世界对我避而远之，但我仍将用自己的爪子拯救它！

original_en_text: Welly’o! What a fearful fright you’ve saved poor Plinney from! Such a delight, at longest last, to see that fine needle dance and sing!
original_zh_text: Welly&#8217;哦！你吓得多可怕啊&#8217;我救了可怜的普林尼！终于，看到那支漂亮的针在跳舞和唱歌，真是太高兴了！

original_en_text: <hpage>Again, pinmaster, I must ask your skilled service. I bring another gland of oil.<page>Oil, so much! This bug is past surprise! It is time methinks, to see your blade’s work finished! To bring about a shine bright as none before!<page>Welly now! Why wait? Would you have me begin, traveller?
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;再一次，品管大师，我必须请你熟练的服务。我带来了另一个油腺。&lt;page&gt;油，这么多！这个bug是过去的惊喜！我认为，是时候看看你的刀刃了；他的工作完成了！带来前所未有的光彩！&lt;page&gt;好了！为什么要等？旅行者，你能让我开始吗？

original_en_text: <hpage>These are deadly roads to wander, pinmaster, especially with the black soaked threads tearing the lands apart.<hpage>Your greatest chance for safety lies in Bellhart, with your fellows. You can protect one another, and perhaps in time rebuild.<page>Oh yes, of course! T’was not Plinney’s wish to abandon his dear bellfriends, but with the world now ending, I had to come and say one last farewell to my sweet Melatolla.<page>I should be returning though, quite rightly. Our town will be needing a pinmaster’s fine work now more than ever!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;这些是致命的流浪之路，pinmaster，尤其是那些浸透了黑色的线把土地撕裂了。&lt;hpage&gt;你最大的安全机会就在贝尔哈特，和你的同伴们在一起。你们可以互相保护，也许及时重建。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的，当然！T&#8217;不是普林尼；他想抛弃他亲爱的行李员，但随着世界末日的到来，我不得不来向我亲爱的梅拉图拉道别。&lt;page&gt;不过，我应该回来了，这是完全正确的。我们的小镇需要一个拼音大师；他现在比以往任何时候都做得好！

original_en_text: Yes... yes. This is a mighty collection indeed!<page>So many relics safely piled up in here, nice and safe! I’ve done so well to gather it all up!<hpage>If your collection pleases you, some acknowledgement of my own contribution to its growth is not undue.<page>Pah! Is it gratitude you seek?<page>I will allow you to keep viewing my collection. That is gratitude enough for what little you’ve given me!
original_zh_text: 对。…是的。这确实是一个强大的收藏！&lt;page&gt;这么多文物安全地堆放在这里，又好又安全！I&#8217;我收集得很好！&lt;hpage&gt;如果你的收藏让你满意，那么承认我自己对它的成长所做的贡献并不是不恰当的。&lt;page&gt;呸！你寻求的是感激吗？&lt;page&gt;我会允许你继续浏览我的收藏。这已经足够感谢你的一点点了；给了我！

original_en_text: <page=S>Once was common, this delivery, for the bugs in their camp beside the bone. Now even this is-is challenge.<page=T>Down there at base, where many pilgrims’ journey start. To ready for their climb, these deliverings will give much value.
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=S&gt；曾经，这种运送方式很常见，因为虫子在骨头旁边的营地里。现在，即使是这也是一个挑战。&lt；页面=T&gt；在那里的基地，那里有许多朝圣者；旅程开始。为了准备攀登，这些交付物将具有很大的价值。

original_en_text: Would you pass the oil, traveller, and perhaps a few rosaries for their ongoing effort? Allow this pinmaster to again work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: 你会把油、旅行者，也许还有一些念珠送给他们吗？让这个pinmaster再次在你的刀片上工作奇迹？

original_en_text: Found some fancy trophies on your travels? Then you’ll be needing these shelves to show them off!
original_zh_text: 在旅行中发现了一些精美的奖杯？然后你&#8217;我需要这些架子来展示它们！

original_en_text: Just passing through these lands, are you, miss? I’d warn you not to stray far from Bellhart, but you’ve the look of one who can manage themself.
original_zh_text: 小姐，你只是路过这片土地吗？I&#8217;我警告你不要远离贝尔哈特，但你；我看起来像个能自我管理的人。

original_en_text: If you’re heading out across the pond, be wary of the other catchers. They’re all long lost to Pharloom’s Haunting.<page>Weak minds, the lotta them. Still, their longpins remain sharp enough.
original_zh_text: 如果你；重新穿过池塘，小心其他捕手。他们&#8217;我们早就输给了Pharloom；s闹鬼。&lt;page&gt;软弱的头脑，很多他们。尽管如此，它们的长别针仍然足够锋利。

original_en_text: Well, well! Welcome to you, our newest resident! I hope you’re finding your new home to your taste.<hpage>It is a finely forged bell, madam. I am fortunate to have a safe space to rest, even if my stay here may be short.<page>However long you’re with us, I’ve been holding onto some fine goods that’ll cosy up your home. This stuff ain’t for the riff-raff winding through, but a fellow Bellharter deserves the finest!
original_zh_text: 好，好！欢迎您，我们的新住户！我希望你&#8217;重新找到符合你口味的新家。&lt;hpage&gt;这是一个精心锻造的钟，夫人。我很幸运能有一个安全的地方休息，即使我在这里的停留时间可能很短。&lt;page&gt;不管你多久&#8217;我们在一起，我；我一直持有一些优质商品；我会把你的家收拾得很舒适。这些东西是；虽然这是一场闹剧，但贝尔哈特人值得拥有最好的！

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, weary pilgrim! Though glorious Bellhart may be past its finest shine, it still remains the last friendly stop before the Citadel. <page>It is the task of I, fair Pavo, to extend the warmest of welcome to those passing devout, such as your good self!<hpage>Your town seems returned to healthy form, good bug. I had some concern that, upon cutting you free, I’d find only husks.<page>Yes, well, many ahh... err... most of our residents did not fare so well... Still, it’s no good to dwell on dark things! We shall build, and grow, and welcome! As is any good bellbug’s task.
original_zh_text: 欢迎，欢迎，疲惫的朝圣者！虽然辉煌的贝尔哈特可能已经过了它最辉煌的时期，但它仍然是城堡前的最后一站。&lt;page&gt;我，公平的帕沃，有责任向那些逝去的虔诚者，比如你的善良自我，表示最热烈的欢迎！&lt;hpage&gt;你的城镇似乎恢复了健康，好虫子。我有些担心，在解放你之后，我；我只找到外壳。&lt;page&gt;是的，好吧，很多啊。..呃。..我们的大多数居民都不太好。..尽管如此，它&#8217;沉湎于黑暗的事物是没有用的！我们将建设、成长、欢迎！就像任何好的bellbug一样&#8217;的任务。

original_en_text: You’ve met Frey, miss? She’s usually stocking useful items for travellers such as yourself.
original_zh_text: 您&#8217;我见过弗雷，小姐？她&#8217;我们通常为像你这样的旅行者储备有用的物品。

original_en_text: The perfect choice! Your bell’s about to be looking the finest in town. We’ll get the work started straight away.
original_zh_text: 完美的选择！您的铃声&#8217;这将是城里最漂亮的。我们&#8217;我马上开始工作。

original_en_text: If you’re ever finding that bellhome a little bare, make sure to speak with Frey. She’s been known to gather all sorts of fancy furnishings.<page>That stock’s useless for a passing pilgrim, but for a new resident it’s just the stuff to turn a bell into home.
original_zh_text: 如果你；如果你发现行李寄存处有点光秃秃的，一定要和弗雷谈谈。她&#8217;众所周知，他收集各种花哨的家具。&lt;page&gt;那只股票&#8217;对于一个路过的朝圣者来说是无用的，但对于一个新居民来说却是无用的；这正是把铃声变成家的东西。

original_en_text: <page=S>Up-up, in the big Citadel, a new place we heard is now claimed safety-safe! Theys too needing our deliverings, we is sure!<page=T>That Citadel. We knows its truths! Not so nicely-nice as pilgrims tells! Even if brave bugs would settle, danger still is close!<page=S>They would need deliverings, for food, for healings, for protection. Please takes them, miss courier!
original_zh_text: &lt；页面=S&gt；在上面的大城堡里，我们听说一个新地方现在被宣布安全！我们确信，他们也需要我们的货物！&lt；页面=T&gt；那个城堡。我们知道它的真相！不像朝圣者告诉的那么好！即使勇敢的虫子会安顿下来，危险仍然迫在眉睫！&lt；页面=S&gt；他们需要运送食物、治疗和保护。快递小姐，请收下！

original_en_text: Tarano! We shall work, now as never. What joy you grant this humble artisan, traveller. Let us seek that shine thought lost within these lands...
original_zh_text: 塔兰诺！我们将一如既往地工作。你给这个卑微的工匠、旅行者带来了多大的快乐啊。让我们寻找在这些土地上失去的光辉思想。..

original_en_text: <page>Welly, ho! That oil! You have it! That rare substance, hoarded close by the Citadel. Few are the pinmasters of our age that ever chanced to work its wonders.<page>Would you see it, traveller? The finest work of this fair pinmaster and your blade sharper still! Pass me the oil, and we can commence!
original_zh_text: &lt;page&gt;哇！那油！你有！这种稀有物质，藏在城堡附近。在我们这个时代，很少有人能碰巧创造奇迹。&lt;page&gt;你看到了吗，旅行者？这位漂亮的针匠做得最好，你的刀刃更锋利了！把油递给我，我们就可以开始了！

original_en_text: Welly, yay? Reconsider my offer? Your blade would gleam at my fine skill!
original_zh_text: 嗯，是吗？重新考虑我的提议？你的刀刃会因我的高超技艺而闪闪发光！

original_en_text: <hpage>Madam, I am sickly. Maggots of the fetid bogs beyond the moors writhe upon my shell. I would ask your aid in removing them.<page>Maggots! That’s all you bring the great Yarnaby?! My time is precious! Only for the seriously afflicted! The truly, hideously enfeebled. Bzzt!<page>Find a bench, or a bed, or a rock! It’s only rest you need. Settle yourself somewhere, and those maggots will soon wriggle themselves out of your shell.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;夫人，我生病了。沼泽外恶臭沼泽的蛆在我的壳上扭动。我请求你帮忙把它们搬走。&lt;page&gt;蛆！那就是&#8217;你只带了伟大的雅娜比吗？！我的时间很宝贵！只为那些受严重折磨的人！真正的、可怕的衰弱。Bzzt！&lt;page&gt;找一条长凳、一张床或一块石头！它&#8217;你只需要休息。在某个地方安顿下来，那些蛆虫很快就会从你的壳里爬出来。

original_en_text: Welcome, fellow resident! Can I interest you in something special before you’re away again on your travels?
original_zh_text: 欢迎光临，居民！我能在你面前给你一些特别的东西吗；你又去旅行了吗？

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. It seems you’ve recovered well from that silken affliction.<page>Ah! Well, I’m a clever bug. When that strange thread struck down from above, I shut up tight and huddled in my bellhome.<page>Might’ve been a problem for the others about here, but my store was flush with supplies, so no fear I’d go hungry.<hpage>Your preparedness served you well then. Although... your store now seems quite bare.<page>Ahem. Yes. I’ll admit, the wait was longer than I’d anticipated, and a bug has to eat...<page>I’ll have more to offer you once my courier turns up. No doubt he’s been avoiding Bellhart since the curse set its sights on us.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;你好，店主。看来你&#8217;我从那场丝绸般的痛苦中恢复得很好。&lt;page&gt;啊！好吧，我；我是一只聪明的虫子。当那根奇怪的线从上面下来时，我紧紧地闭上了嘴，蜷缩在行李房里。&lt;page&gt;可能&#8217;这对这里的其他人来说是个问题，但我的商店里物资充足，所以不用担心；d饿了。&lt;hpage&gt;你的准备对你很有帮助。虽然。..你的商店现在看起来很空。&lt;page&gt;啊哼。对。I&#8217;我承认，等待的时间比我长；d预料到了，虫子不得不吃东西。..&lt;page&gt;I&#8217;一旦我的快递员出现，我会给你更多的东西。毫无疑问，他；自从诅咒把目光投向我们，我们就一直在避开贝尔哈特。

original_en_text: You bother me again? Begone, I said!<hpage>I ask only if you know what has happened to the bugs above us. They hang trapped in a vast snare of thread.<page>Hff. Hardly surprising. That there’s the final fate for all in Pharloom. Just come seeking a little sooner for them above.<page>Surely, oh surely, you don’t imagine your own end will be different? All that hunger, and fear, and pride, filling your fragile heart. You too are bound to end ensnared!<page>Grnk! Begone. In Pharloom, only a fool believes themselves free.
original_zh_text: 你又打扰我了？求求你，我说！&lt;hpage&gt;我只问你是否知道我们头顶上的虫子发生了什么事。它们被困在一个巨大的线陷阱里。&lt;page&gt;Hff。这并不奇怪。在那里&#8217;这是Pharloom所有人的最终命运。请尽快前来为他们寻找。&lt;page&gt;当然，哦，当然，你不知道；你能想象自己的结局会不一样吗？所有的饥饿、恐惧和骄傲，填满了你脆弱的心。你也注定会被困住！&lt;page&gt;哼！求你了。在Pharloom，只有傻瓜相信自己是自由的。

original_en_text: You want to cut them down? Hff. Yes, you look cruel enough.<page>Once the strings are cut, pain will return to them. They will remember fear and longing.<page>What a choice you make for them! Such power you grant yourself!
