original_zh_text: 你想把它们砍掉吗？Hff。是的，你看起来很残忍。&lt;page&gt;一旦绳子被剪断，疼痛就会回来。他们会记住恐惧和渴望。&lt;page&gt;你为他们做出了多么大的选择啊！你赋予自己这样的力量！

original_en_text: <hpage>Pinmaster, I have acquired oil with which my needle may see further sharpening.<page>Bonva! What wonder? What wish? To steal a gift so fine. Few are the pinmasters of our age who ever worked with such a substance.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;小师傅，我弄到了油，我的针可以用它进一步磨尖。&lt;page&gt;邦瓦！什么奇迹？什么愿望？偷这么好的礼物。我们这个时代很少有人用过这种物质。

original_en_text: How grand! To face an opponent with a bit of energy.<page>You’re a skilled one, clear enough. I hope my training has granted some insight.
original_zh_text: 这太棒了！现在他面临着一个强大的对手。&lt;page&gt;你是一个非常有能力、头脑清晰的人，我希望你的教育是一种鼓励。

original_en_text: So rude! To raise a Pinstress from their deep meditation!<page>You carry on with that kind of brash behaviour and you’re likely to be stuck quick through!<hpage>I’m surprised to find a bug of sound mind alive in such an inhospitable place. You are a warrior learned in the blades of this land?<page>Aye! A Pinstress! Your needle there might fit you fair, strange as it is’n all, but it’s the pin that’s the glorious weapon of Pharloom.<page>Given I’m now awake, maybe you’d fancy a little training? Care to test the power of a Pinstress? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two.
original_zh_text: “公主醒了。&lt;page&gt;如果你继续保持这种傲慢的态度，你很快就会遇到麻烦。&lt;hpage&gt;令人惊讶的是，健康的昆虫生活在如此荒凉的地方。你是在这个国家学习的士兵吗？&lt;page&gt;哦，是的！哦，是的！你的针可能适合你，但尽管它很奇怪，它却是法老光荣的武器。&lt;page&gt;既然你醒了，为什么不练习呢？发现女巫的力量。这个老师会教你一些东西。

original_en_text: It’s a right long time since I’ve felt so vigorous. All those dulled pilgrims were useless for testing my talents.<hpage>Your blade proved an impressive challenge, Pinstress. I’ve travelled the length of this kingdom, yet the strength and skills hidden throughout continue to surprise me.<page>You bear your own strange strengths, needle bug. If only we’d met in less troubled times, just think of all we could have learned from one another!
original_zh_text: 很长一段时间，我都没有那么多精力了。这不是对我才华的考验。&lt;hpage&gt;尤雅·布莱克公主对我来说是一个巨大的挑战，但她隐藏的力量和能力仍然让我惊讶。&lt;page&gt;你有一种奇怪的力量，针虫。想一想，如果你们已经认识了，那么你们可能已经认识了！

original_en_text: Bold choice, needle bug. Let’s get our shells a’shaking!
original_zh_text: 祝你好运，昆虫。创建一个shell

original_en_text: <hpage>These sands mark the edge of Pharloom’s territory. I was brought to this land through the caverns beyond.<hpage>Something at this kingdom’s height still hungers for me. Were I to flee now, I would again be pursued.<hpage>Until I find the source of that hunger, and slay it, I will not be free.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;沙子标记了蓝色区域的边界。我来到这片土地，穿过一个遥远的洞穴。&lt;hpage&gt;在这个王国里，更伟大的事情等待着我。如果你现在逃跑，他们会再次追赶你。&lt;hpage&gt;在我找到饥饿的根源并消除它之前，我永远不会自由。

original_en_text: Back again, needle bug? Surely you’ve more important places calling than these sandy steps?<hpage>I shan’t stay long, Pinstress. Your home and your skills offer a sense of safety rare about these lands.
original_zh_text: “你回来了，上帝？“还有什么比这楼梯更重要的吗？”" "&lt;hpage&gt;您的家和技术能给您带来一种在这些国家很难找到的安全感。

original_en_text: Find the vassal... pale It. Return them to us... Save us both from the Masters’ wrath.
Needle bug! With those black quakes, Pharloom’s finale is fast arriving.<page>Raise your blade! Let’s see at least one of us end true to our nature!
original_zh_text: 随着这场黑色地震，灯塔的终结迫在眉睫。&lt;page&gt;举起刀！让我们看看是否至少有一个人忠于我们的本性！

original_en_text: Ah ha! Needle bug! Who else would dare wake a Pinstress with such force?!<page>Saw my wish, I’m guessing? Here hopin’ to fulfill it?<hpage>I know what you are seeking, Pinstress... a death duel, an end from battle, not cavern’s collapse.<hpage>I can oblige... to a point... But a greater challenge still awaits me below.<page>Whatever else you’re about, you might be finding it futile now, needle bug. The black quakes... Pharloom’s finale arrives.<page>So let’s stop the yapping, aye! How’s ‘bout we begin? Let’s see at least one of us end true to our nature!
original_zh_text: 哦，哦，哦！谁能用这种力量唤醒公主？&lt;page&gt;你看到我的愿望了吗？你为什么不留在这里？&lt;hpage&gt;我知道我在寻找什么：不是战斗的结束，不是洞穴的倒塌，而是一场死亡决斗。&lt;hpage&gt;我本可以说“是”。“但在某种程度上，这是一个更大的挑战。&lt;page&gt;无论你做什么，你都会认为这是浪费。这是一次黑色地震。这就是法老的结局。&lt;page&gt;让我们停止这些愚蠢的事情吧。你在干什么？让我们看看是否至少有一个人忠于我们的本性！

original_en_text: Creature, higher... It has been sent... by Masters served... to retrieve Zi’s vassal lost?
original_zh_text: 生物学，让它服务。失落的王子回来了

original_en_text: No. No. No... My saviour slain!<page>Why do you do this, cruel slasher? Why must I stay, and serve, so long, long, long?<hpage>That void must not be called, bug. Already it attacks these lands with enough force to end them. To summon it stronger will only hasten that fall.<hpage>For this moment at least, your shell is saved. It was only by wish of your steel companion, and fear of her Masters’ punishment, that I arrived in time.
original_zh_text: 不不&lt;page&gt;凶手，你为什么要这样做？为什么要花这么长时间？&lt;hpage&gt;这个错误不是空的。他们将以足够的力量攻击地球。仅仅掌权就会加速衰退。&lt;hpage&gt;至少这一次，壳保住了，铁友的意志和对主人惩罚的恐惧，我及时赶到了。

original_en_text: Gah! Bested fair, and yet you choose to stay the killing blow?<hpage>I can test you, Pinstress, and myself for what’s to come, but I will not cut you down.<hpage>Despite its quakes, Pharloom’s demise is not as certain as it seems. I shall act to change that fate.<hpage>If I succeed at my task, the land that remains will require the watch of strong bugs like you.<page>Well, ain’t you an inspiration! Makin’ me seem a right fool, here thinkin’ only on the end while you’re looking to a future fair...<page>Seems you’ve beaten me twice, needle bug, both my pin’s edge, and my heart’s resolve...
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。哦，是的！接受致命打击是正确的选择吗？&lt;hpage&gt;你和我，伯恩斯和我可能会考验自己，但我不会原谅你。&lt;hpage&gt;尽管发生了地震，农场的死亡并不像看起来那么确定。&lt;hpage&gt;如果我成功了，地球上的其他地方将不得不由像你这样强大的昆虫来保护。"&lt;page&gt;没有灵感？你让我看起来像个傻瓜，在这里最后一次，在未来寻求正义。&lt;page&gt;我觉得自己好像被打了两下，针头折断了我的针头，我决定。

original_en_text: <hpage>Not for your Masters, but by my own will I may aid you, Zi, as long as the path permits.<hpage>Of your vassal, I have met one before, a scurrilous, scheming sort, and well able to remain hidden.<hpage>If your own servant shares similar disposition, they may prove hard to retrieve. Where would you advise I begin my search?<page>Zi has sensed their movement... She knows their places of rest. For pale It... Zi shall mark their chart.<page>Seek the vassal... Retrieve them, or their corpse... either is appropriate... either will aid... to avoid the Masters’ wrath.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我可以帮助你，不是为了你的主人，而是如果道路允许的话。&lt;hpage&gt;他看着他的一个仆人。肮脏、险恶、隐藏得很好。&lt;hpage&gt;如果你的仆人有类似的倾向，康复可能很困难。&lt;page&gt;他听到了就休息了。孩子们画了一张地图。&lt;page&gt;顾客要么埋葬他们，要么寻找他们的尸体：两者都符合资格。或者他们可以帮助你。为了避免主人生气。

original_en_text: So rude! To raise a Pinstress from their deep meditation!<page>You carry on with that kind of brash behaviour and you’re likely to be stuck quick through!<hpage>I’m surprised to find any bug still alive in such an inhospitable place. You are a warrior learned in the blades of this land?<page>Aye! A Pinstress! Your needle there might fit you fair, but the pin that’s the glorious weapon of Pharloom, least it was... It’s sure starting to feel like Pharloom doesn’t have long left.<page>Well, given I’m now awake, and time’s suddenly short, maybe you’d fancy a little training? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two?
original_zh_text: “公主醒了。&lt;page&gt;如果你继续保持这种傲慢的态度，你很快就会遇到麻烦。&lt;hpage&gt;我惊讶地发现昆虫竟然生活在如此荒凉的地方。你是在这个国家学习的士兵吗？&lt;page&gt;哦，是的！哦，是的！诗人，你的荆棘可能对你有好处，但荆棘是法老荣耀的武器，而法老似乎已经离开很久了。&lt;page&gt;你刚刚醒来，时间已经过去了，不是吗？你想练习一会儿吗？也许你的老师会教你这个。

original_en_text: Off with you now, needle bug. I’ve respect for you and your sharp blade, but my hospitality shouldn’t be abused.
original_zh_text: 我尊重你和你的指甲，但你不应该滥用我的热情好客。

original_en_text: Dunno if you’ve heard it, needle bug, but supposedly there’s a gleaming secret hidden at this mountain’s core.<page>Meant to be a marvel, or so my sisters past once told, a giant cavern all of crystal.<hpage>I have visited the core, Pinstress. It was a remarkable site indeed. I only hope that it shall not soon be lost.<page>Course you’ve seen it! Master at the blade and at the seeking. You’ve proven yourself an imposing talent. <page>Well, given you seem done up here, maybe it’s time you get back to your all important business?
original_zh_text: 你可能听说过，但在这座山的中心，有一个明亮的秘密。&lt;page&gt;至少姐妹俩是这么说的。“这是一个奇迹，”他说，“一个充满水晶的巨大洞穴。&lt;hpage&gt;我看了看中心。这是一个非常美丽的地方。我希望它在不久的将来不会消失。&lt;page&gt;你当然知道！他是一位剑术和学问的大师。他们展示了自己的才华。&lt;page&gt;也许是时候回到最重要的事情上了。

original_en_text: <page>But the seer knows nothing! Nothing of the pain. All small Sula’s to bear... To watch, watch these lands dying, slow, the bugs suffering, falling, while our shell sustains...<page>The steelhearts feel so little... but we forced to serve, we endure it all. We alone. Why?<hpage>...Others may know that pain, small bug... Or at least something similar.<page>So will you chain me again? Herd me by point of your blade, and knowingly return me to that pain?<hpage>...I will not. I will inform the child of steel of what has transpired here, but I cannot force any bug to return to a task so cruel.<page>Then, then... Sula is free? At least to run? By your mercy, bug, these legs must move, quick, quick and far, far!
original_zh_text: &lt;page&gt;先知不知道什么是痛苦。看着地球慢慢干涸，昆虫悲惨地倒下，我们的甲壳类动物生存下来。&lt;page&gt;在钢铁般的头脑中，这并不重要，但我们必须服务并忍受它。&lt;hpage&gt;...其他人感到疼痛和昆虫，或者至少是类似的东西。&lt;page&gt;他会再次入狱吗？你用刀把我拉出来让我受苦吗？&lt;hpage&gt;...你不会告诉孩子们这里发生了什么，但你不能强迫昆虫做如此残酷的事情。&lt;page&gt;南方自由了吗？我需要跑步吗？可怜的虫子，这只脚必须走得更快，更远，更远！

original_en_text: Zi must watch, record... and wait... Always she is true to her function... Ore-bound... To duty.
original_zh_text: 紫色总是可见或记录。他总是忠于自己的积蓄。

original_en_text: A mighty battle we had, my friend... Time now you get to your all important business. I’ll be wishing for your success.
original_zh_text: 先生们，先生们，我们打了一场艰苦的战斗，现在是开始重要工作的时候了。

original_en_text: ...Creature, higher... Its meeting. Zi’s awakening... It is not chance... It has been sent to Zi, yes? By Masters served?... To retrieve her vassal lost?
original_zh_text: ...高级生物学会议正在进行中。“维奥莱特醒了。这不是巧合，是紫色的，对吧？实际上？大师的服务。如何挽回失去的客户？

original_en_text: <hpage>Pinstress, why do you choose to live amidst these storm-swept caverns? Surely there are more hospitable places?<page>Somewhere gentler? Warmer? I’d only go soft! How else is one expected to maintain their wits?<hpage>Then this is not a place of hiding? That Citadel up top seems no friend to the free, or the strong who’d choose to remain apart.<page>...Aye. Well, yes. That too’s a reason, though one that shames me some.<page>Our grand Citadel learnt well from the training of Pinstresses past. Then it went and turned those teachings upon us!<page>Despite our superior skills, our numbers have always been few, and their strength overwhelmed.<page>Of my once revered order, only two of us remain, wormed away in Pharloom’s forgotten corners, and my pin-sibling, she’s lost herself to more peaceable pursuits.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;为什么你选择住在一个被风暴摧毁的洞穴里？还有更受欢迎的地方吗？&lt;page&gt;你想去安静的地方吗？温暖的？我只是软弱！我们怎样才能保持智慧？&lt;hpage&gt;这不是藏身之处吗？上面的城堡对于决定离开的自由而强大的人们似乎并不友好。&lt;page&gt;...”是的，这是原因之一。这里人很多。&lt;page&gt;我们宏伟的城堡从女演员过去的训练中吸取了教训，他把这一教训强加给了我们！&lt;page&gt;我们的技术很出色，但人数少，实力难以承受。&lt;page&gt;按照我所遵循的命令，我们被困在帕拉姆一个被遗忘的角落，我们的兄弟姐妹在寻找更和平的和平中迷失了方向。

original_en_text: <hpage>I cannot yet leave this land. Until I slay its source, this kingdom’s hunger for me will never abate.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;如果我们不消灭这个国家的根源，我们对这个国家的愿望就永远不会得到满足。

original_en_text: Pale It... You would reject the role? Are you not tamed, bound, by Masters?... You would know... obedience is essential.<page>Recall, the fate of those who defy... Even you higher... Especially you higher...<page>...Compression... We have suffered it. We would never wish it upon another.
original_zh_text: 你会放弃这个角色吗？你和大师有联系吗？如你所知，倾听很重要。&lt;page&gt;看看那些抵抗者的命运。虽然你老了。尤其是当你老了。&lt;page&gt;...他们受到压迫。我受够了我不希望其他人遭受同样的痛苦。

original_en_text: Ahh, is your needle too shy to show its edge? What a shame.
original_zh_text: 你羞于露面吗？不幸的是，他相信

original_en_text: Even my welcome has limits, needle bug.<page>I’ve become well accustomed to solitude, and it’s unnerving to play host to your strange strength overlong.
original_zh_text: 好客也有其局限性。&lt;page&gt;他已经习惯了孤独。很抱歉我接受了你奇怪的力量这么久。

original_en_text: Planning to hang about are you, needle bug?<page>Fancy a little training? Care to test the power of a Pinstress? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two?
original_zh_text: 玩针虫？&lt;page&gt;你想训练我吗？发现女巫的力量。也许你的老师会告诉你该怎么做。

original_en_text: Having second thoughts on our bout, needle bug? Good! I’ll not hold back my blade, and I’ll expect the same from you.
original_zh_text: 你更改过日期吗，虫子？好吧，好吧！好的！“我不想放弃我的剑，我希望你放弃。

original_en_text: ...Bug... Higher... It has come seeking... Zi is found... She is awoken.<hpage>Greetings, child of steel. I have known your type, in past. From your presence, it is clear this land too has caught the long gaze of your Masters.<page>Masters... Yes... For them, Zi observes... obedient... always...<page>And you... a creature in half... Pale It... Bug It... old... stubborn... alone... You too are observed.
original_zh_text: ...昆虫很高。我去找那个男孩。&lt;hpage&gt;显然，土地的存在也吸引了其所有者的长期利益。&lt;page&gt;老师、妈妈&lt;page&gt;你...半人半动物。它们是透明的。在经典中，我把一只非常顽强、顽强的昆虫放在一起。你也会观察到它。

original_en_text: ...Creature, higher... Its meeting, Zi’s awakening... It is not chance... It has been sent, by Masters served?... To retrieve her vassal lost?<page>But no... pale It cannot.. First, a chart is needed. Pale It must acquire one. Only then can Zi provide the marks... Their vassal’s location sensed strong.
original_zh_text: ...如果没有更高的存在形式，遭遇和觉醒都是偶然的。如何挽回失去的客户？&lt;page&gt;不，它太微妙了，难以理解。首先，你需要一张桌子。有一个蓝色的，它应该是。紫色是唯一的标志。你的生活会让你感到坚强。

original_en_text: <hpage>Zi, your vassal is gone, alive, fled beyond these lands.<hpage>I chose to allow their escape, even if your wish may not be granted.<page>The wish? No... pale It... Zi sensed clear your meeting... The rite... The vassal is tarnished. They have touched the dark. By the Masters, they will now be hunted... no matter the distance fled.<hpage>Perhaps, for your vassal, that is preferable? Waste here in servitude or flee free. They made their choice, and proclaimed it clear by their black action.<hpage>Their dark champion is slain, but luck or guile may yet see them survive.<page>Hope!.. Pale It... For a vassal who defies the Masters?... You give Zi a thought, complex...<page>The outcome is different... and Zi must now observe alone... but this may be the better way?<page>Zi shall accept the happening... shall pray the Masters still see her loyal... and Zi too will share the hope... that her vassal lives long unbound.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;“你的仆人活了下来。&lt;hpage&gt;即使他们的愿望没有实现，我也会选择离开。&lt;page&gt;你许什么愿？不，不，他脸色苍白。我感受到了他的遭遇。好人是肮脏的，她在黑暗中触摸我。&lt;hpage&gt;这对客户有利吗？他们做出了选择，并用黑人的行为证明了这一点。&lt;hpage&gt;他们的黑暗战士死了，但运气或诡计会拯救他们。&lt;page&gt;我希望是！很难想象一个人会反抗他的主人。&lt;page&gt;结果有所不同。紫罗兰应该单独考虑，但这是最好的方式吗？&lt;page&gt;儿子对此表示同意。祈祷的主总是看到他的信实。玫瑰有希望。他的人民没有停留太久。

original_en_text: For your talents, needle bug, in blade and strength... and restraint, take this emblem of my order.<page>Hadn’t ever thought another’d be joining our slim ranks, but you’re as deserving a member as’s ever come before.
original_zh_text: 你的才华在于剑和力量。&lt;page&gt;“没有人认为你是精英团队的一员，但你比以往任何时候都更值得成为这个团队的一员。" "

original_en_text: <hpage>I will not flee. I cannot abandon the kingdom to a collapse of my making.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我不想逃跑，我不想。“我不能为了我的生物放弃我的王国。

original_en_text: Creature, higher... return when a chart is acquired. A chart is needed, essential, to serve the Masters... to aid Zi.
original_zh_text: 高级生物学。请把这封信给我。为了服务大师，地图是不可或缺的。请帮助我。

original_en_text: Ahh... Shame. Surely battle’d be the better end, no?<page>If not by blade, we’ll just have to accept whatever conclusion this new quaking calamity flings upon our heads.
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。这场战斗会有一个更好的结局。&lt;page&gt;没有一片叶子，我们别无选择，只能接受这样的结论：这场令人震惊的新灾难已经降临到我们身上。

original_en_text: <hpage>Cease your summoning, fool bug!<hpage>Though you may yearn for freedom, that saviour you hope to call will bring only death.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;别再说我是傻瓜了。&lt;hpage&gt;但你所呼求的救主只会带来死亡。

original_en_text: It’s a right long time since I’ve felt so vigorous. All those dulled pilgrims are useless for testing my talents.<hpage>Your blade proved an impressive challenge, Pinstress. The strength and skills hidden about this kingdom continue to surprise me.<page>You bear your own strange strengths, needle bug. More I think than you’d be willing to reveal to me.<page>What, I wonder, are you planning to turn all that power towards?
original_zh_text: 我已经很久没有那么多精力了，所以不是所有无聊的朝圣者都能体验到我的才华。"&lt;hpage&gt;你的剑公主是一个巨大的挑战，你会继续惊讶于这个王国隐藏的力量和能力。&lt;page&gt;你有一种奇怪的力量，针虫。&lt;page&gt;我们将权力转移到哪里？

original_en_text: No. No. No... My champion slain!<page>Why do you do this, cruel slasher? Why must I stay, and serve, so long, long, long?<hpage>That void must not be called, bug. Not ever. None can control it, though many have tried. <hpage>Any strength you hoped it offered would fast be proven false.<hpage>Consider yourself fortunate I arrived in time. Your shell is saved, all by wish of your steel companion, and fear of her Masters’ punishment.
original_zh_text: 他们没有死，士兵们死了。&lt;page&gt;凶手，你为什么要这样做？为什么要花这么长时间？&lt;hpage&gt;请注意，此错误不能为空。很多人都尝试过，但没有人能够控制它。&lt;hpage&gt;你试图给予的力量很快就会出错。&lt;hpage&gt;我很高兴我们及时到达。他的尸体获救了。这是他铁伙伴的愿望，也是对上帝惩罚的恐惧。

original_en_text: <hpage>If I chose to head beyond, I would abandon Pharloom to a collapse of my making.<hpage>While I live, and still possess the strength to act, I will not allow that end to come to pass.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;如果我决定走得更远，我就会放弃法轮，我的事业就会崩溃。&lt;hpage&gt;只要我还活着，只要我还能打球，我就不会让这种事发生。"

original_en_text: Dunno if you’ve heard it, needle bug, but supposedly there’s a gleaming secret hidden at this mountain’s core.<page>Meant to be a marvel, or so my sisters past once told, a giant cavern all of crystal.<page>If you’re hanging around these heights, and time’s allowing, maybe you’ll get to seeking it?<page>Course you’d first have to find the entrance, but you’ve certainly shown the skills to wriggle up in there, provided you’re so inclined.
original_zh_text: 你可能听说过，但在这座山的中心，有一个明亮的秘密。&lt;page&gt;至少姐妹俩是这么说的。“这是一个奇迹，”他说，“一个充满水晶的巨大洞穴。&lt;page&gt;如果你去过这个高度，如果时间允许的话，你可以去寻找。&lt;page&gt;当然，首先你必须找到一条路径，但如果你必须这样做，你肯定会在那里测试你的跟踪技能。

original_en_text: <page>A small gift for you, pale It... for the thought, complex... rock of the home spear... and of Zi’s birth. May it aid your further action in this land.
original_zh_text: &lt;page&gt;一份小礼物会让你感觉更好。想想复杂性。兰斯·洛克和他儿子的出生将帮助我们在这个国家迈出新的一步。"

original_en_text: Off with you now, needle bug! A Pinstress of my substantial talent requires their deep meditation, especially after such a satisfying bout.<hpage>Goodbye, Pinstress. May your blade remain sharp.
original_zh_text: 像我这样有才华的歌手需要深思。尤其是在这样的开端之后。&lt;hpage&gt;早上好，公主。检查刀。

original_en_text: Ho, miss! How’s all this then? Lotta dials to be trackin’, but at least the controls seem in good order.<page>From here, I can guide your bell down, best as any bug.<page><hpage>Then you’ve no prior experience with this type of transport?<page>No one does, miss! Them’s who used to dive’re all long dead, or cursed ta half life. An’ there ain’t no bug left alive’s been brave or stupid enough to try... ‘til now, at least.<page>I’ll work it best’s I can. Can’t do much more, I’m afraid. At least the forgings of these docks were built to last. Now we’s only gotta pray they hold for you.<page>Here’s the key that’ll see you inside its metal belly. Pop in there once you’re feelin’ good and ready. In the meantime, I’ll get to seeing things set up here.
original_zh_text: 天哪！发生了什么？拉塔诺夫不断前进，但至少球队看起来不错。&lt;page&gt;从那里，我可以击败你的奴隶。&lt;page&gt;&lt;hpage&gt;“你用过这辆车吗？&lt;page&gt;“没有人会，女士。任何掉进水里的人都会受到诅咒，要么死。这条虫子不是活的，所以他大胆而愚蠢地挑战它。至少目前，&lt;page&gt;至少港口是可持续发展的，你只需要祈祷他们会支持你。&lt;page&gt;这是打破金属的关键。当你感觉好的时候试试。直到我看到里面的一切。

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, I have acquired a power that will enable me to end this black madness. Soon I will act to stop the quakes and save this land.<page>Excellent, pointy bug. Your drive, and your vigour, both have proven surprisingly large for one so small.<page>Know we have heard from Ballow, who told of his repair efforts upon the diving bell below. By now, that task is likely completed.<page>If you are hoping to put his work to the test, then we shall wish again on your survival. And if our own service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;多亏了我女儿的训练，我才有能力结束这场黑色的疯狂。我们将立即采取行动，防止地震，拯救地球。&lt;page&gt;对于这么小的一个人，我找到了他们的能量，而且能量是令人难以置信的巨大。&lt;page&gt;当他得知自己收到了巴罗的一封信时，他描述了自己在水下修复时钟的工作如下：“至此，工作已经完成。"&lt;page&gt;如果你想尝试你的工作，你必须再试一次。如果我们的专业服务能够满足您的基本需求，我们将继续提供。

original_en_text: Erm, you may notice your prize there is a little light, my lady...<page>Awful truth is, you’ve cleaned us out. We’ve not a single measly rosary left between us. Turns out we were just no match for you!<hpage>It was a game fairly played, sir, though I’ve no wish to see you destitute. Would you like to make another kind of wager, perhaps?
original_zh_text: 正如您可能注意到的那样，价格有点高。&lt;page&gt;可怕的事实是，你偷走了我们之间的空间。"&lt;hpage&gt;这是一场公平的比赛，但我不希望它破产。

original_en_text: Grfff... So it’s gotten that bad, aye? I guess... If that’s how it is, I’ll be your bug.<page>Meet me below, at the diving bell. We’ll see if I can get you ready for the drop.
original_zh_text: 然后情况变得更糟。实际上？我认为这是. ...如果是这样，那就是你的BAP。&lt;page&gt;请参阅下表。我会帮你准备飞机。

original_en_text: Holler when you’re ready, miss. The upgrades are done. That bell’s as ready as it’ll ever be.
original_zh_text: 当您准备好后，通话更新就完成了，声音也准备好了。

original_en_text: Ahhh... Can you feel it yet? All your troubles dripping away...
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。你听到了吗？你所有的担忧都会消失。

original_en_text: The deposits around here, those long-burning rocks. They’re useful to the Citadel, in whatever their shadowy business, but useless if you require tools of us!<page>We need finer material. Rare metal. Pharloom would provide a bounty to the able explorer. Find us some, and we’ll build your violent aids.
original_zh_text: 周围的沉积物都是很久以前烧毁的石头。即使在城堡里，您的秘密生意也很有用，但如果您不需要我们的工具！&lt;page&gt;轻金属灯塔奖励有能力的研究人员。为我们找到一些有助于暴力的东西。"

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Our lady has missed her mark, and so thusly ends our challenge!
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿。我们错过了进球，挑战结束了！
...国际空间站是.永远，永远，学习，成为一名公民。

original_en_text: My lady, I pray you reconsider! T’would be an honour to see those strong limbs of yours in action, truly!
original_zh_text: 请求您的评论！很高兴看到大量参与！

original_en_text: A respectable enough effort, truly. You didn’t earn enough rosaries to make a profit off us, but that should only spur you on to try again!
original_zh_text: “我们还没有赢得足够的袖子来占我们的便宜，但这将再次是一个挑战！

original_en_text: An old diving bell. Its door is shut tight by an ornate clamp.
original_zh_text: 一个漂亮的旧时钟门用一个漂亮的夹子关闭。

original_en_text: The diving bell’ll be ready again soon, miss. Once this new shield-shell is fitted, it’ll surely withstand the drop!.. Surely!
original_zh_text: 手表在短时间内就准备好了，并且有了新的保护器，它能够承受坠落。
...这条大街阿诺德，美联社。放手，奥利。来自国际空间站。

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!
original_zh_text: 嘿，该玩了！当你看到目标时，直接抓住钉子并击中它！

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I require a moment. Please unlock the bell for me.<page>Aye. Can do, miss. Hail me again when you’re ready to travel.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我需要时间敲钟。“&lt;page&gt;当您准备好旅行时，请保持快乐。

original_en_text: Here to sweat away your sorrows, miss? The steam does wonders for a mind set sullen, or a shell gone stiff.<hpage>I’ve found these lowlands hot enough already, and mine is a shell more resilient than most.<hpage>To challenge that further seems a unique sort of madness.<page>Aye, well, this is Pharloom, miss! Madness is catching. I’d say this here’s the smallest form of it.
original_zh_text: “你是来出汗的吗？蒸汽适合抑郁症患者和皮肤僵硬的人。&lt;hpage&gt;这些平原相当温暖，我的水槽比大多数地方更灵活。&lt;hpage&gt;更多的讨论将会疯狂。&lt;page&gt;疯狂的吸引力，这是最小的形式。

original_en_text: What an honour it was to play with you, my lady! I hope you’ll think of us whenever you feel those rosaries rattling around in your pockets.
original_zh_text: 我很高兴和你一起玩！每当你感到口袋里的念珠的痛苦时，请想想我们。

original_en_text: There is no choice! Not for us. We cannot leave, not ever. We are a Forge Daughter, fixed to this forge and its service. Ours is a duty lifetime bound.
original_zh_text: 我们别无选择。我们不值得这样做。我们将教育我们的女儿，并将她们奉献给这位领导人和他的服务。

original_en_text: If you’re planning passage below, Ballow’s the one to assist you. We must remain by the forge, always.
original_zh_text: 如果您在现场，巴洛洛可以帮助您。

original_en_text: Oh! Pointy bug, why do you bother us at our work? The world cracks and quakes to some grave new calamity, surely you should seek somewhere safer?<hpage>As far as I might flee, I suspect no such place exists, and in any case, I would not see this land’s bugs abandoned to their end.<hpage>What of you? Why do you choose to remain so diligent at your task, given the fell state of your lands?
original_zh_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！这是一个错误，不是吗？为什么要干涉我们的业务？世界正在崩溃，地震正在发生，新的灾难正在出现。&lt;hpage&gt;我怀疑在我能逃脱之前没有这样的地方，但即使如此，直到最后我也不会看到这片土地上的昆虫被遗弃。&lt;hpage&gt;我该怎么办？为什么国家衰落时工作这么难？

original_en_text: Oh! Small pointy bug, why do you bother us at our work?<hpage>The sound of your craft called me to investigate. What is your duty here? Are you a smith of some kind?
original_zh_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！小型急性昆虫：为什么它们会干扰我们的工作？&lt;hpage&gt;船的声音让我检查一下。你在这里的使命是什么？史密斯？

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!<page>If you can strike the target fifteen times, the prize is yours!
original_zh_text: 嘿，该玩了！当你看到目标时，直接抓住钉子并击中它！&lt;page&gt;当您实现目标15次时，奖品就是您的！

original_en_text: A smith? Hardly so crude! We are Forge Daughter! How can a pointy bug not tell?<page>Ours is the ancient line and honoured role. These docks and lands around are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you are as talented as you suggest, would you lend me your aid? I’ve lacked for my usual tools, and I suspect you could craft fine replacements.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then we’ll construct them. But! You’ll provide the materials, and compensation for our time.
original_zh_text: 史密斯怎么样？不太受欢迎。我们是创世之子。为什么我看不到昆虫？&lt;page&gt;我们的旅程是一次古老的旅程，是一份荣誉的文件。这个港口和周围的土地是我们的经验。&lt;hpage&gt;如果你有这个天赋，你能帮助我吗？由于缺乏通用工具，我们无法找到好的替代品。&lt;page&gt;拉脱维亚的陷阱你认识我男朋友吗？&lt;hpage&gt;这在我们国家很少见吗？其中一些人在这个过程中造成了严重的问题。&lt;page&gt;天哪！但我会的！他们用我们的设备和时间奖励我们。

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!<page>If you can strike the target twenty-five times, the prize is yours!
original_zh_text: 嘿，该玩了！当你看到目标时，直接抓住钉子并击中它！&lt;page&gt;如果您实现目标25次，奖品就是您的！

original_en_text: Well, perhaps that’s enough games for now, eh?<page>We’ll need to come up with a much trickier challenge to best you, my lady!
original_zh_text: 这个游戏已经够了吧？你在干什么？&lt;page&gt;你将不得不面对更困难的任务来击败自己。"

original_en_text: This world may not have long, but we shall face its end still delivering our duty.
original_zh_text: 和平可能不会持续太久，但我们会承担责任，承担责任。

original_en_text: To maintain one’s tools is a constant task. These shards should be kept close when you travel, that you can repair and replenish as the need arises.
original_zh_text: 由于设备的维护是一项持续的任务，因此必要时在维修和交付期间将其放在附近。

original_en_text: Pop inside the diving bell once you’re feelin’ good and ready. In the meantime, I’ll get to seeing things set up here.
original_zh_text: 当您感觉良好并准备好时，您可以跳上潜水钟。

original_en_text: A vicious stabbing trap? We can build it. Just know, it disturbs us, these devious implements you conceive to kill.
original_zh_text: 伤口不好？我知道你会用你想杀死的隐形工具激怒我们。

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Welcome, my lady, so glad you found us here! I can see you’re blessed with strong limbs and keen sight.<page>Fond of frolics are you? Keen to test your aim? We’d be right honoured to play a little game with you. A little test of skill we’ve set up.<hpage>I’ve no need to test my skills, sir, nor do I have time for frivolities.<page>Oh, but we’d make it worth your while! A prize awaits you, if you can meet our challenge!<hpage>If you offer a prize, that changes matters. I can meet any challenge if the reward is sufficient. What are the rules of your game?<page>Exceedingly simple, my lady! I’ll provide the pins for throwing, and my associate will provide a target. Hit the target fifteen times and you’ll earn yourself a worthy prize!
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿。欢迎，我很高兴你找到了我们！他有强壮的四肢和良好的视力。&lt;page&gt;你喜欢玩它吗？想看看你的目标吗？我很荣幸能和他一起打球。我们将进行能力测试。&lt;hpage&gt;你不需要测试你的技能，你没有时间学习你的智力。&lt;page&gt;但我们应得的。如果你接受挑战，你就会得到回报！&lt;hpage&gt;如果我赢了，一切都会改变。如果有奖励，挑战并不重要。你的游戏规则是什么？&lt;page&gt;很简单，女孩。我将提供发射器，我的合作伙伴将提供目标。击中目标15次，您将获得宝贵奖励！

original_en_text: A heavy door chained with a simple padlock.
original_zh_text: 沉重的门用一把简单的锁关上。

original_en_text: <hpage>This bell could carry me below, but it will first require a key, and an operator to aid its descent.<hpage>I cannot complete this task alone. Someone upon these docks will have to assist me.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;您可能会掉在这款手表上，但首先，钥匙和操作员会帮助您将它们取下。&lt;hpage&gt;你一个人做不到。“岛上的人民会帮助我们。

original_en_text: Oi! What’s with all these tremors? This smelt still need shovelling, and the shakes’re only making it harder.
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿。你为什么抖得这么厉害？“而且，南瓜需要铲子，所以混合南瓜会更难品尝。

original_en_text: <hpage>Though tied by charge, would you provide me your service, Forge Daughter? I have need of tools that your skills could likely provide.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then we’ll construct them. But! You’ll provide the materials, and compensation for our time.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;您会以有限的费用提供欺骗您女儿的服务吗？您需要工具来发展您的技能。&lt;page&gt;拉脱维亚的陷阱你认识我男朋友吗？&lt;hpage&gt;这在我们国家很少见吗？其中一些人在这个过程中造成了严重的问题。&lt;page&gt;天哪！但我会的！他们用我们的设备和时间奖励我们。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I need to return above. Please ready the bell for me.<page>Aye, miss. Sit on the bench, and let’s get you hauled up.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我得回去按门铃&lt;page&gt;她坐在长凳上帮助他们。

original_en_text: Quite a lot of targets struck, and quite a lot of rosaries earned! Our lady never fails to impress us!
original_zh_text: 他进了很多球，得到了很多玫瑰！女人总是有痛苦的感觉。

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Have to stop you there. That’s three times now you’ve missed your mark! I’m afraid that makes you the loser of our little game, with all due respect.<page>Fret not though, for we never tire of playing! Step over here, and we can start another game.
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿。你必须放弃，你输了三次！“抱歉，我们会输掉一场小比赛。&lt;page&gt;别担心，你永远不会感到无聊！到达后，您可以开始新游戏。

original_en_text: This trinket is our own invention. It wards against the deadly lava and heat around these docks. The workers used to request them of us. Now they’ve lost the mind to care.
original_zh_text: 装饰是一项发明。他们忍受着海岸附近致命的熔岩和高温。工作人员一遍又一遍地问我。我想他失去了兴趣。

original_en_text: Farewell, then. If you require our craft, this forge is always hot.
original_zh_text: 再见如果您需要我们的流程，这个炉子总是热的。

original_en_text: The new shell-shield’s all bolted on tight, miss. If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you where you’re goin’.
original_zh_text: 新的盒子和盾牌会被锁上，当你再次跌倒时，洗头发并大喊。

original_en_text: <hpage>The behaviour of your fellow workers, I’ve seen similar... agitation upon the roads. These docks are not alone in the strangeness of their occupants.<page>’Tis odd behaviour to be sure, but not for Ballow and us to know. Ours is busy work, and we keep to ourselves.<page>Whatever the goings on of the world outside, no bother to us, as long as our craft can continue.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我在他的同事中看到了类似的行为，并在街上感到震惊，因为港口并不是当地人唯一不知道的地方。&lt;page&gt;这是一种非常奇怪的行为，但巴罗和我都不知道。“我太忙了，没时间照顾你。"&lt;page&gt;无论发生什么，只要我们的船还在，我们就不会干涉它。

original_en_text: <hpage>How did you come to serve these docks, Forge Daughter?<page>Sent from our Forgehome we were, at request of those holy bugs above.<hpage>The Citadel dwellers? The veiled bugs? They ordered you here?<page>Yes! An age ago that. Such is duty! We Forge Daughters live to hone the craft, and aid the line.<page>By the Citadel’s patronage, and our long duty upon these docks, our Forgehome would swell in holy esteem.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;他是如何到达港口的？&lt;page&gt;应上述神圣昆虫的要求，我们被赶出了沃格尔的家。&lt;hpage&gt;谁是您所在城市的居民？隐藏的错误？你是奉命来的吗？&lt;page&gt;哦，是的！哦，是的！我们帮助女儿建设生活，提高技能，建造生产线。&lt;page&gt;多年来，在城堡的保护和这些港口的责任下，我们的船长受到了神圣的尊重。

original_en_text: <hpage>I’d expected this workshop too would contain only combative types, but you seem composed, Forge Daughter.<page>You’ve met the workers? They’re all wound up! They still work at their tasks, in a simple way, but they’re useless for conversation. It’s only ourselves and young Ballow with any sense left.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我以为这个研讨会是为好斗的人举办的，但它非常安静，帮助我抚养了我的女儿。&lt;page&gt;你看到工人了吗？大家都很紧张！在家做作业总是很容易，但无论出于何种原因，只有年轻的巴罗和我在谈话中没有提供帮助。

original_en_text: Miss! Errr... Ullo... I see you’ve survived... somehow... Thought that last plunge must’a been your end.<hpage>It was not. I survived the fall, and managed a treacherous return.<hpage>For the diving bell’s failure, the risks were clear to me. The fault lies not with you.<page>Aye! As you say! This bell’s old. And time has a way of breaking things even as fine forged as this.<page>And see below, for its failure I’ve been workin’ hard at improving the design! Your last journey ended up being a valuable test... ahem.<hpage>Good. That return path is long closed to me, and your bell is now needed again.<page>Again? We’ll if you’re game enough to try a second time... A shell-shield’s been fitted, and the bell’s like new. Better’n new!<page>If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you goin’.
original_zh_text: 是的，米西。是的，是的，是的……...他是如何活下来的？最后一跳是他的终点。&lt;hpage&gt;我从事故中幸存下来，继续我的冒险。&lt;hpage&gt;我能理解水表的故障。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的！哦，是的！正如你所说！“时间会找到一种方法来分解做得好的事情。"&lt;page&gt;请参阅下面的内容。当我们失败时，我们会尝试改进我们的设计！最后一次旅行是一次非常宝贵的经历。&lt;hpage&gt;好吧，好吧，我的路已经封闭很长时间了，所以我需要你的仆人。&lt;page&gt;又在这里？如果我再试一次，我会的。盖上盖子后，铃就是新的。最好的更新！&lt;page&gt;当你再次下来时，低下头尖叫。如果你这样做，我就带你上街。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I am ready. Please prepare the bell for departure.<page>S’time to take the plunge, aye, miss? Just sit on the bench, and I’ll see you strapped in tight.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我准备好了，我准备好了。&lt;page&gt;现在是冒险的时候了，不是吗？你在干什么？他坐在长凳上，看起来绑得很紧。

original_en_text: An old mechanism with a keyhole.

It’s done, miss! I’ve fitted the shell-shield. Bell’s like new. Better’n new even!<page>If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you goin’.<hpage>Your work is appreciated, sir. Know that, with luck, the threat from below might soon be quelled, and your lands shall rest calm.<page>Well... Good! I’m only really wishin’ to return to the forge, and my regular duties... A little purpose, routine...<page>Frankly, miss, all this action’s more’n a bit overwhelming for bugs like me. I’ll be glad when it’s all over... Providing we survive, of course.
original_zh_text: 结束了，女孩！我戴着盾牌，新的钟声又新又新，更好。&lt;page&gt;当你再次下来时，低下头尖叫。如果你这样做，我就把你从街上带走。&lt;hpage&gt;如果你幸运的话，潜在的威胁很快就会被消除，你的土地可能会变得和平。&lt;page&gt;好吧，回到大爆炸，我想做我的例行公事。小路，小路。&lt;page&gt;说实话，先生，对于像我这样的昆虫来说，这一切都有点遥远。生存是先决条件。

original_en_text: Miss! Errr... Ullo... I see you’ve survived... somehow... Thought that drop must’a been your end.<hpage>It was not. I survived the fall, and managed a treacherous return.<hpage>For the diving bell’s failure, the risks were clear to me. The fault lies not with you.<page>Aye! As you say! This bell’s old. And time has a way of breaking things even as fine forged as this.<page>And you can see here, for its failure I’d already been workin’ at improving the design! Ended up being a useful test... ahem.<hpage>Good. That return path is now closed to me, and your bell may still be needed if I choose to descend again.<page>Again? Well, if you’re game enough to try a second time...Once this new shield-shell is fitted, it’ll surely withstand the drop!.. Surely!
original_zh_text: 是的，米西。是的，是的。他们活了下来。“我想，一滴，无论如何，就结束了。&lt;hpage&gt;我从事故中幸存下来，继续我的冒险。&lt;hpage&gt;我能理解水表的故障。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的！哦，是的！正如你所说！“时间会找到一种方法来分解做得好的事情。"&lt;page&gt;如您所见，我们的项目失败了，所以我们正在努力改进！这是一个有用的测试。你咳嗽吗？&lt;hpage&gt;一切都好，一切都好，回归结束了。如果您决定再次下去，您可能仍然需要一个铃。&lt;page&gt;又在这里？如果您想再试一次，安装后，这个新的保护套永远不会脱落!是的，不!

original_en_text: A smith? Hardly so crude! We are Forge Daughter! How can a pointy bug not tell?<page>Ours is the ancient line and honoured role. These docks and lands around are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you are as talented as you suggest, would you lend me your aid? I’ve lacked for my usual tools, and I suspect you could craft fine replacements.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then soon, yes! I may accept. But not now! Now there is much work to be done, and we cannot afford to be bothered so.
original_zh_text: 史密斯怎么样？不太受欢迎。我们是创世之子。为什么我看不到昆虫？&lt;page&gt;我们的旅程是一次古老的旅程，是一份荣誉的文件。这个港口和周围的土地是我们的经验。&lt;hpage&gt;如果你有这个天赋，你能帮助我吗？由于缺乏通用工具，我们无法找到好的替代品。&lt;page&gt;拉脱维亚的陷阱你认识我男朋友吗？&lt;hpage&gt;这在我们国家很少见吗？其中一些人在这个过程中造成了严重的问题。&lt;page&gt;天哪!是的，现在!我被认出了，但不是现在。我们有很多工作要做，所以我们不必担心。

original_en_text: Oh! Small pointy bug, why do you bother this Forge Daughter at their work?<hpage>These black quakes that wrack your lands, I am seeking to see them quelled at their source, below the lakes of flame.<page>You would wish to descend so deep?... It is true these docks possess the means. Alas, we ourselves cannot help. Whether Pharoom’s health or fall, our charge ties us to this forge, always.<page>Ballow there’s the bug to ask, and if our fate is as dire as your action suggests, we are sure he is only needing of some quick convincing.
original_zh_text: 哦!哦!哦!哦!哦!哦!哦!哦! Bug，你为什么干预生意？&lt;hpage&gt;这些黑色地震摧毁了你的土地，你希望看到它们从火湖下的喷泉中消失。&lt;page&gt;为什么不跳得更深呢？这些港口有一个解决方案，但我们无法单独解决。无论我们是一家健康的公司还是一家死去的公司，我们的责任始终在于这种模式。&lt;page&gt;我认为巴罗怀疑，如果我们的命运很可怕，我们就必须立即决定它，正如他的行为所暗示的那样。

original_en_text: Return later, pointy bug! Now there is much work to be done, and we cannot afford to be bothered so.
original_zh_text: “我会回来的，亲爱的。我们有很多工作要做，所以我们不必担心。

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, I have acquired a power that will enable me to end this black madness. Soon I will act to stop the quakes and save this land.<page>Excellent, pointy bug. Your drive, and your vigour, both have proven surprisingly large for one so small.<page>We shall remain here, still. If our service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;多亏了我女儿的训练，我才有能力结束这场黑色的疯狂。我们将立即采取行动，防止地震，拯救地球。&lt;page&gt;对于这么小的一个人，我找到了他们的能量，而且能量是令人难以置信的巨大。&lt;page&gt;如果我们的服务可以帮助您完成重要工作，我们很乐意继续帮助您。

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay safe, Forge Daughter. If I require your aid, I shall return.<page>Our wishes go with you, pointy bug. Calm the raging of our world, that our task can continue.

original_en_text: <hpage>These controls are complex. If I’m to descend within the bell below, I will first require an operator.<hpage>Someone upon these docks will have to assist me.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;如果你想按门铃，你首先需要接线员。&lt;hpage&gt;港务局会帮助您。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I wish to depart. Please ready the bell for travel.<page>Sure thing, miss. Sit on the bench, and I’ll send you down.

original_en_text: Interested in our little game, my lady?<page>If you can hit the target fifteen times you’ll earn yourself a worthy prize!
original_zh_text: 您对我们的游戏感兴趣吗？&lt;page&gt;如果您达到目标15次，您将获奖！

original_en_text: Oh! Pointy bug, you return? Our world cracks and cries from some grave new calamity.<page>Nevertheless, we must remain, fixed to this forge and its service. Ours is a duty lifetime bound.
original_zh_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！史密斯：你回来了吗？我们的世界已经被摧毁，我们面临着另一场严重的灾难。&lt;page&gt;但我们必须继续支持这家工厂及其服务。

original_en_text: If you need something, talk to the boss. I’m busy.

original_en_text: A control panel with various levers and gauges.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have need to head below the lakes of flame.<hpage>There is a diving bell at the base of this structure that seemed fit for the task. I require it opened, and an operator to send it deep.<hpage>As one of few upon these docks with mind still sound, that role must fall to you.<page>Can’t you see I’m busy, miss? Ain’t got time for naught else while the shovelling needs doing.<hpage>Choose to aid me, or all your efforts will soon be wasted. This kingdom crumbles. Its collapse is inevitable. If you wish for your work, and your life to continue, you must help me, now.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have need to head below the lakes of flame. Can you aid me in this task?<hpage><page>Hmmm... Well if you head down below to the very base of the docks, there’s an old diving bell built for just what you’re askin’. <page>Thing is, you can ride it, but it takes an operator stood dockside to send it. I might be capable, but I ain’t got time for naught else while the shovelling still needs doing.<hpage>Choose to aid me, sir, or all your efforts will soon be wasted. This kingdom crumbles. If you wish for your work, and your life to continue, you must help me, now.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;“我想去火湖。你能帮助我吗？”"&lt;hpage&gt;&lt;page&gt;是的，是的，是的……...当您走到码头底部时，您会发现一块专门为您想要的任何东西制作的古老水下手表。&lt;page&gt;问题是它可以安装，但必须由码头上的操作员发送。我可以，但我没有时间做其他事情。&lt;hpage&gt;如果你想保住工作，我现在就必须帮助你。
你准备好迎接挑战了吗？

original_en_text: Oi! Who’sat? Whoever’s down there, if you’re feelin’ mad enough to try and travel, best meet me up at the controls, and we can chat.

original_en_text: Well. Well. Still alive! You have proved yourself made of the hardiest stuff, pointy bug.<page>Ballow did tell, shamefully, of complications with your diving bell, and of your absence upon its retrieval.<page>He had feared you lost to the flame, but we ourself had slight guessed otherwise.<hpage>To return from below proved as difficult a climb as ever I have faced, and yet, in time near, I will need to descend again.<page>Then twice mad you are, bug! Or brave beyond measure. We shall wish on your continued survival, even if you seem intent on ending it.
original_zh_text: 好吧，好吧，他还活着，他向你展示了你能做的最困难的事情。&lt;page&gt;巴洛为水下手表的复杂性和损失道歉。&lt;page&gt;他害怕被困在火里，但让我猜猜。&lt;hpage&gt;从底部回来是历史上最困难的攀登，但在不久的将来我们将不得不再次攀登。&lt;page&gt;“你疯了，鲍勃。她也很勇敢。虽然我希望这一切结束，但我希望它继续下去。

original_en_text: The frolics haven’t ended, my lady! If you’d like to really test yourself, we should play again!<page>Hit the target twenty-five times and you’ll earn yourself a beautiful necklace of rosaries! What say you?

original_en_text: <hpage>Keep well, Forge Daughter. I shall return if I require your aid.<page>Yes! Or no. Either is fine by us, as long as the craft continues.

original_en_text: Hesitate not, my lady! Take aim and throw true!
original_zh_text: 不要犹豫，设定目标并实现它。

original_en_text: Planning to lay a carpet of spikes? These would surely slow your prey. We’d never have considered using such common tools for combat.

original_en_text: Ola, ola! That’s it then. Our lady has struck the target fifteen times! A beautiful victory!<page>Hopefully you enjoyed yourself! A little levity is a balm in these troubled times, don’t you think?<hpage>I’d have thought such games best saved for times of peace, but perhaps there is truth in what you say.<hpage>And now that I have bested your challenge, you will produce the prize I have earned?<page>Oh... o-of course! I see you have a tool pouch of your own there. Full to bursting with baubles and trinkets, no doubt!<page>I’ll fit another pocket onto it, so you can carry even more tools and shards with you. original_en_text: Ola, ola! We’ve devised a final challenge for you, my lady, if you’re interested.<page>Hit the target as many times as you can without missing. The more targets you hit, the more rosaries you’ll win from us! Care to try?

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, within an old Weaver nest I discovered a weapon. Though much damaged by age, I believe your skills could see it restored.<page>Ho. An impressive tool that, and a fine challenge. We can reforge the weapon, if the price fits.

original_en_text: A fair exchange made, pointy bug. Now our work calls. Return again if you find need of our trade and talent.

original_en_text: We hope Ballow serves you well, pointy bug. In our long time serving these docks, he’s the finest assistant we’ve found.

original_en_text: Well. Well. Still about, pointy bug! You have proved yourself made of the hardiest stuff.<page>Ballow did tell, shamefully, of complications with your diving bell, and of your absence upon its first retrieval.<page>He had feared you lost to the flame, but we ourself had slight guessed otherwise.<hpage>To return from below proved as difficult a climb as ever I have faced, and yet I now need to descend again.<page>Then twice mad you are, bug! Or brave beyond measure.<page>Know we have heard from Ballow, who told of his repair efforts upon the diving bell below. original_en_text: And not a single target was struck... a right shame, that! We can’t reward you with any rosaries, my lady, but we’d love to see you test your aim once more!

original_en_text: A weapon from a long distant past. We can combine the Weaver components with our own mouldings to repair the tool.

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, these black quakes that now wrack your lands, I am seeking to see them quelled at their source, below the lakes of flame.<page>You wish to descend so deep, pointy bug?... original_en_text: Crafting by claw alone produces inferior results. With this kit, you can craft finer, sharper, and deadlier tools... if that is your wish.

original_en_text: My lady, you left our game in such a hurry! No doubt some task of great import pulled you away.<page>That’s an instant disqualification, of course. You understand. But we don’t hold it against you, not at all! Care to play again?

original_en_text: <hpage>I need a moment, sir. Please unlock the bell that I may exit.<page>Seein’ some sense? Can’t blame ya if you’re thinkin’ on backin’ out. It’s a mad hope that old bell’d even survive the trip.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, if you can hear me, there has been an accident during the descent.<hpage>In this broken state, the bell is unfit for travel. Retrieve it if you may, but I shall not return within.<page>...iss...istake...erwhelm...retrie...a...ssible...

original_en_text: Oh no... no, not at all. Wouldn’t do us any good, would it? original_en_text: Ola! That’s... that’s twenty-five times the target has been struck!<page>My lady... original_en_text: Urk! A prize, of course! My lady must have a prize!<page>Here then... a lovely necklace full with rosaries. I’d been hanging onto this for a while, but you’ve earned it fairly.<page>I just hope you think of me when you wear it, my lady!

original_en_text: Leave us! My great master needs time to reflect, and I must ponder on flavours anew!
original_zh_text: 离我们远点！业主需要时间反思，但他们也需要重新思考自己的品味。

original_en_text: Pilgrim who would hold our song within your shell, rise above.<page>Offer your most devout self unto our sacred heart.

original_en_text: ...ilgrim!... ast aside those many sinful hopes for rest ...d reward... remain pure... within our midst... sk for nothing! <page>See... Citadel’s simple stone, bare an... dorned. Left unpunish... thin our pure chorus... eir seductive sin... pread like flame...
original_zh_text: ...¡坏人！我放弃了休息的希望。1.奖我们之间别听我的！&lt;page&gt;请听我说。它看起来像一块石头。我们的衣服多么散落，我们的衣服多么散落，过度是一件悲伤的事情。&lt;page&gt;“是的，小心那些可怜的朝圣者。然后他有勇气再次这样做。基本设计。幸运的是，他逃脱了惩罚。他们有一个干净的合唱团;这是一种外部诱惑。它像火焰一样蔓延。

original_en_text: Accept, a t-t-token of the sentinel’s order.<page>As friends... let us p-part.

original_en_text: <hpage>I would view your collection, Vaultkeeper.<page>She may see it. A perfect set. This Vaultkeeper is rich with insights. Jealous its fellows would be... If still their minds remained.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;宝藏，检查一下你的收藏。&lt;page&gt;领导有远见，我羡慕我的同伴，但我的心还在。

original_en_text: Aaaahh. What’s this? The rasher of a courier, tied up tight! I can see its fat still dripping fresh!
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。你在干什么？邮局关门了。你可以看到一些新鲜的脂肪！

original_en_text: This stew, of Mossberries stirred thick. Good. Good! It shall form the base once set in mould.
original_zh_text: 准备鸽子，拌得很稠，好的！一旦你把它放在形状上，它就会成为基础。

original_en_text: Ahh... you have brought song again, though perhaps it is wasted on one as unworthy as I.<hpage>You needn’t satisfy my curiosity if it pains you, sir, but I must ask, for what crime or sin did the Citadel imprison you?<page>My sin? A grave transgression, the cause of much pain for many. But to speak of a sin... is to invite its return. I will say no more.
original_zh_text: 是的，正确的。对于像我这样的人来说，这首歌可能没有帮助，但它又回到了我身边。&lt;hpage&gt;如果你受苦，你不必满足我的好奇心，但我是一个虔诚的人。&lt;page&gt;你没有自己的吧？这是一种严重的违法行为，给许多人带来了巨大的痛苦。当我们说“不”时，记住它并且什么也别说。

original_en_text: By the purity of your will... the c-c-clarity of your intent... you are innocent of the silken curse.<page>Failed, has this sentinel. Your j-judgment, will it accept.<hpage>Is this truly failure, gilded one? You meant to test me and have done so. I would expect nothing less of a true guardian.<hpage>The matter is resolved. There is no need for death. Stand, and let us part as friends.
original_zh_text: 纯粹的意志。他的意图很明确。你是无辜的丝绸诅咒。&lt;page&gt;“你失败了，警卫。"&lt;hpage&gt;金牌失败了吗？我们对真正后卫的期望并没有降低。&lt;hpage&gt;问题解决了，你不必死。站起来，让我们成为朋友。

original_en_text: Seek out a Pickled Muckmaggot, the sacred treat revered and reviled for its intensity. It was a specialty of the chef Lugoli, long ago banished for culinary sacrilege.<page>Rumours sing that the great chef retreated to their home-caves in the dank midlands below...
original_zh_text: 找到Kimchlamet，上帝的欢乐，被崇拜和谴责的力量。这是一位因烹饪不善而入狱的厨师的作品。&lt;page&gt;据说这位伟大的厨师躲在家乡潮湿的中央洞穴里。

original_en_text: <hpage>With this I have fulfilled my promise, sir. The ingredients have all been delivered. The dish must be prepared perfectly, enough to rouse my master and see them sated. <page>Now! Permit me to work my skill, and you’ll stand to see a meal of scent and taste that would dazzle Pharloom in her prime!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我信守了我的承诺。所有的食物都到了。我真的会做饭。&lt;page&gt;“你会吃黄油的，我的孩子。“这道菜必须准备得足够好，才能叫醒我的客人，看到他们的胃已经饱了。"&lt;page&gt;快点，现在！亲自找出哪些食物吸引了法鲁姆！

original_en_text: Hrm? Oh, ‘tis merely the livid red bug. I was expecting some word from those above to explain the meaning of all this rumbling and shaking.<page>They fail in their holy duties! My master must be shielded from such inconveniences, else their digestion be disrupted.<hpage>There are worse fates than indigestion, sir. You are fortunate to be unharmed.<page>Fortune has nothing to do with it. I am simply of a hardier breed than the insipid young servants of these recent, wretched times!
original_zh_text: 这是什么？你在干什么？我希望上面的人能说些什么，解释一下这种咆哮和颤抖的含义。&lt;page&gt;我的老师应该尽量避免这种不便。"&lt;hpage&gt;我很高兴你没有受伤。这是因为消化不良更严重。&lt;page&gt;我是一个比悲惨过去的无聊年轻仆人更强大的种族！

original_en_text: Rkkt! I know she has it. Keeps it. Carried coveted in her cloth. This one searched for it. Give it! Give it to us!
original_zh_text: 他说他总是躲在衣服下面。我看到他了，你可以来了。

original_en_text: Divine music... The soul of Pharloom eternal laid bare... That our cursed age could still receive such blessing...<page>So, Weaver-spawn, our melody is yours now, held in mind to carry beyond our walls. Was the learning worth its thieving? <hpage>It was, Vaultkeeper. And know to me your service continues. Keep the cylinder safe, along with any others I may bring.
original_zh_text: 法老的灵魂已经显露出来，即使在这个被诅咒的时代，我们也能得到这样的祝福。&lt;page&gt;所以，韦伯的孩子们，我们的旋律就是你们的。别忘了把它从墙上取下来。&lt;hpage&gt;是的，财政部长。让我们知道我们的服务将继续下去。确保您的气瓶和其他气瓶安全。

original_en_text: ...Dear... grim... Dark it seems now... et these word... become your guide...<page>Hear our voice... Let it... your own! Give... of yourself... for great Pharloom, for... first-children who bequeath it to us... for our salva... sure to come!
original_zh_text: ...亲爱的...现在我们可以把它变暗，然后我们就有了一个指南。&lt;page&gt;拯救伟大法老萨尔巴的长子。“请过来。

original_en_text: For a sweet simmer, find me some Vintage Nectar. A rare brew, treasured by bugs with a keen scent for excellence.<page>There’s slim chance such an old yield might still exist. Alas! Its depth of flavour is a necessity for the holy dish!
original_zh_text: 如果您想要一杯甜龙舌兰酒，请寻找蜂蜜的背面，这是一种罕见的啤酒，因精致的昆虫和对完美的追求而受到推崇。&lt;page&gt;这种古老的回归仍然存在的可能性很小。哦！哦！它的浓郁风味是一道圣菜不可或缺的！

original_en_text: Hark! ...ilgrim! You... climb... our eternal embrace... who stand stru... the threshold... our stark Citadel of stone... kno... true service may now commence.<page>Forget... your weary shell. Forgo... urge to still... arloom commands... give... greatest gift! Join our chor... Raise... shell... voice... and sing!
original_zh_text: 听着，朋友！坏人！你是谁？站在永恒的怀里，谁能站起来？在石堡里，真正的服务开始了。&lt;page&gt;我忘记了他们。我们放弃了，势头仍在继续。阿罗姆的命令是. ...最美丽的礼物！加入合唱团。他的脖子有所改善。她的声音.贝维！

original_en_text: For the core of the meal, find that marvellous meat... The rasher of a courier, those spritely bugs who once arrived at the toll of every second bell.<page>I saw many a courier gorge upon this fatty snack. Where are they all? Have they abandoned their holy toil?
original_zh_text: 在食物的中心是活泼的昆虫，每次它们摇铃，它们寻找美味的肉和垃圾。&lt;page&gt;我见过很多邮递员吃油腻的零食。你放弃了神圣的努力吗？

original_en_text: The master has a mighty endurance, yet all of this rumbling and breaking makes me fearful for their safety.<page>Fear not. I will stay by their side until my old shell crumbles away.
original_zh_text: 业主非常坚固，但噪音和裂缝会让你担心安全。&lt;page&gt;“别担心，我会和他们在一起，直到我的旧壳被打破。"

original_en_text: Eggy, eggy, hee hee! I’ll eat a lot, grow big and fat. Then I’ll lay a lot of eggies!<page>They bring me plenty of food, so they must want plenty of eggies.<page>And plenty they shall have, if they’re nice to me! Hee hee!
original_zh_text: 鸡蛋大多数时候，我很胖，很胖。我试图放更多的鸡蛋。&lt;page&gt;鸡蛋为我们提供了很多食物，所以我们想要它。&lt;page&gt;如果每个人都好，人就会很多。

original_en_text: <hpage>I had thought I was answering your summons as a friend, or at least an ally, but now that we stand together in this place I can sense your intent.<hpage>You mean to raise your blades against me. Am I your enemy, then?<page>D-defence of the sacred Citadel, and the voices that fill it-t-t, is the eternal duty of the sentinels.<page>Termination, is the n-n-necessary fate of all those enthralled by the whispering Silk.<hpage>You believe me haunted, a slave to the pale threads? I think you are more perceptive than that. My Silk is my own, as is my will.<page>Unsure, is this sentinel. B-both haunted and innocent, you seem. With regret, this sentinel must t-t-test the strength of your will.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我以为我作为朋友，或者至少作为盟友，已经响应了他的号召，但现在我在这里，我能感受到他的意图。&lt;hpage&gt;他们会用剑攻击我。我是你的敌人吗？&lt;page&gt;守护者的永恒使命是保护城堡并满足那里的声音。&lt;page&gt;结局是所有被丝绸之语吸引的人不可避免的命运。&lt;hpage&gt;你以为我是鬼吗？白丝绸的奴隶？瑟纳克是我的，这是我的观点。&lt;page&gt;我不知道他是一名保镖。他看起来很无辜。不幸的是，保镖不得不考验他的意志。

original_en_text: An ornate lock mechanism with a keyhole at its centre.
original_zh_text: 一个美丽的封闭体，中心有一个封闭的洞。

original_en_text: The nectar! To think, such an aged extract still exists! What an exquisite tragedy that I cannot taste it myself. My master must have every drop!
original_zh_text: 曼娜！在哪里？玛娜！在哪里？在哪里？在哪里？让我们想象一下，有这样一件古老的东西存在，这是一场美丽的悲剧，而我却无法享受我的悲剧。

original_en_text: Yes! Yes! She gives... It is ours! <hpage>I have passed the relic, Vaultkeeper. Now uphold your promise and aid me with your insight.<page>Fool! Demanding of a Vaultkeeper. Hers is impudence enough to bring death... If she did not carry the scent of Weaver-spawn.<hpage>So you know something of my ancestry, learned bug. If it gains me favour here, then I’ll expect your service in full.<page>Bleg! Dead! Dead, your vicious kind are meant to be. Better methinks to stay as such... <page>Gkkkt. But this one was taught. It shall fold its claws. It shall pass its knowledge, as much as is gleaned.<page>Only to a first child must a Vaultkeeper defer.
original_zh_text: 哦，是的！哦，是的！哦，是的！哦，是的！“你把它给了我，它是我们的。"&lt;hpage&gt;现在，请信守诺言，帮助您实现您的愿景。&lt;page&gt;如果他的肿胀没有带来布蛋的味道，就足以杀死他。&lt;hpage&gt;我们承认我们祖先的错误，如果您能在这里找到我的偏好，我迫不及待地想要您的全面服务。&lt;page&gt;新鲜的！他的坏搭档死了，被判处死刑，但我想最好把他留在原处。&lt;page&gt;GKKT。这就是他们教我的。用你的指甲填满它。&lt;page&gt;宝藏只属于长子。

original_en_text: Oh drab and trembling squib, you who timidly step upon the Great Stage, fate has seen you chosen!<page>Cast away your fear and join me as my partner. Pharloom’s flame may flicker, but together we shall spark it ablaze!<page>Let us enliven this Citadel lost to silence! Let us rouse the soul of this once great land!
original_zh_text: 哦，单调而颤抖的裤子，大舞台上的懦夫，命运看到了选择！&lt;page&gt;放下你的恐惧，做我的朋友，一起骑行，火可能会燃烧！&lt;page&gt;重建宁静的城堡！让我们唤醒这个伟大国家的精神！

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I am seeking a melody held by your vaults, part of a set to open a path above. Tell me what you know of it.<page>The Weaver-thing would claim our sacred melody?! How grim the age we survive to see... Vile sacrilege for it to pass to an outsider...<page>Only our pontiff, lived long and low within our vault, they held the melody, jealously, covetously... A learning for the highest Vaultkeeper, and them alone.<page>A truth they were told to have found... There in the dark. Something within the melody, or the words. Something to set them silent... <hpage>I am not afraid of what I’ll hear, Vaultkeeper. If your pontiff and their melody wait below, I shall find them both.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;财政部，我正在寻找一首旋律下载到磁带上，作为上述开放路径的一部分。”&lt;page&gt;有什么事情会让你失去神圣的旋律吗？生活是多么艰难，将其传递给陌生人是多么蔑视！&lt;page&gt;只有这位在我们坟墓里度过了漫长而卑微的一生的父亲，才怀着邪恶和贪婪理解了这首旋律。&lt;page&gt;他们说他们找到了真相，因为旋律中的某些东西、黑暗中的文字可以帮助你平静下来。&lt;hpage&gt;“我不害怕听到它，亲爱的。如果爸爸和梅洛迪在等你，我会找到你。"

original_en_text: Yes! A fair gift, Weaver-spawn. This Vaultkeeper shall glean what knowledge a great mind can.
original_zh_text: 哦，是的！哦，是的！这是韦弗的礼物。我们收集知识，以便专业人士能够有伟大的想法。

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall guide.
original_zh_text: 当音乐结束时，音乐就继续。&lt;page&gt;因为我们驾驶的虚假永恒。

original_en_text: Grkkt. What has she brought it? More treasures waiting on a Keeper’s insight, yes? The sacred cylinders of our holy Citadel? Pass them. Give them. Now! She must!
original_zh_text: 问：你带来了什么？有许多宝藏等待着管家的直觉，圣城的宝藏。“应该是！"

original_en_text: Eternal, is the Citadel. Et-t-ternal, is the devotion of the sentinels.<page>While its shell is f-f-functional, this sentinel will hold true to its duty.
original_zh_text: 永恒的忠诚是守护者的忠诚。&lt;page&gt;尽管其功能齐全的船体，哨兵忠实地履行其使命。

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, you rare chosen who hath ascended to this final threshold, listen to our wish, deliver it, that you may rise above and see your pilgrimage end.
original_zh_text: 他不寻常的选择，永恒朝圣者的签名，使我们能够到达这个最后的入口，听到我们的誓言，履行它，并看到他朝圣之旅的结束。

original_en_text: Interloper! On you, our pontiff’s sacred melody! You have found it, hold it, and now you dally, lost like a mite in our shelves!<page>Return to the listening room below! The sacred cylinder can be played, and the melody of our vaults heard at last in this damned age stretched long.
original_zh_text: 你是我们父亲的神圣旋律！你找到了它，你已经拥有了它，但现在你徘徊在我们的同伴中。&lt;page&gt;回到下面的收听室。我们触摸到了圣柱，终于在这该死的时刻听到了我们的宝藏的旋律。

original_en_text: Taste, smell, texture... It is done! A meal to rival Pharloom’s finest.<page>Mighty master, how long you have waited to set your jaw upon so perfect a dish! Join us, and dine!
original_zh_text: 这种食物充满了味道，气味和一致性，可以媲美农场上最美味的食物。&lt;page&gt;师傅，你等了多久才吃到这么美味的食物？一起吃饭吧！

original_en_text: Yummy, yummy... oh! Are you here to serve me?<hpage>I am merely a visitor here, little one. Have you made this place your home, then?<page>My home? Oh yes! Lovely and warm. The big ones, they bring me food whenever I’m hungry. And I’m hungry now!
original_zh_text: 好的，哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！“你是来服侍我的吗？”&lt;hpage&gt;我只是一个访客，一个小人物，但你认为这是你的家吗？&lt;page&gt;我的家？哦，是的！他是如此的善良和温暖，当我饿了，他给我一些食物。

original_en_text: <hpage>I have more pressing tasks, sir. Perhaps your master should content themself with a humbler meal?<page>Blasphemy! My master shall have the holy indulgence they deserve, even if I must douse my shell in oil and climb onto a dish myself!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我们有一个直接的任务。你想让你的客人吃得好吗？"&lt;page&gt;我的主人值得上帝的宽恕，即使他不得不把我的壳浸在油里然后爬到盘子上。

original_en_text: To season a meal such as this... only a Crustnut will do. Once, scores of them could be gathered, high atop those coral crusted caves beyond the Grand Gate.<page>Surely some must still grow within that sand-ravaged land?
original_zh_text: 这个盘子的味道。坚果是由贝壳制成的。数十只鸟聚集在曾经被珊瑚覆盖的洞穴顶部。&lt;page&gt;它会在沙子里生长吗？

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall teach.
original_zh_text: 当音乐结束时，音乐就继续。&lt;page&gt;我教导你们成为永远的门徒。

original_en_text: We would hear the voice of the Keepers, within their grand vaults.<page>They who guard our history, our prayers and our secrets, across the ages.
original_zh_text: 你会在你美丽的胸膛里听到守护者的声音。&lt;page&gt;它包含我们的历史、我们的祈祷和永恒的秘密。

original_en_text: Pickled Muckmaggot! So that banished chef’s recipes outlived them after all!<hpage>Not so, sir. I claimed the maggot from the chef themself. Their brutish work continued, even with their shell claimed by cursed thread.<page>Incredible! A bug so devout, they could cook with mind expunged. This Citadel was far too hasty to expel such brilliance.
original_zh_text: Kimchomwe：为什么难民食谱持续时间更长&lt;hpage&gt;我不认为那是真的。昆虫被从水槽中移走。尽管水槽上覆盖着被诅咒的丝绸，但他们的残酷工作仍在继续。&lt;page&gt;这太不可思议了！有了这么忠诚的昆虫，你可能就不会想到做饭了。城堡渴望这样的声誉。

original_en_text: <hpage>I could track down any ingredient you desire, for a price. The oil you keep here may be of some use to me.<hpage>Promise it as reward, and your master shall have his meal.<page>Hrmph! Such a squalid bargain ill befits a holy servant... but so be it. Fetch me the ingredients and you shall have that pale condiment for yourself!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;根据价格，您可以找到您喜欢的材料。黄油可能会有所帮助。&lt;hpage&gt;作为奖励，业主会给业主奖励。&lt;page&gt;天哪！这个肮脏的外壳不适合武士，但你可以跳过食材，享受柔软的氛围！

original_en_text: What an awful clattering! Would you kindly conduct yourself a little more carefully?<page>And why are you adorned in such an awful, livid red? By my oath, those above must make a sport of sending me the most wretched servants they can find!<hpage>I am no servant, sir, rather a guest of sorts, invited by the Citadel. Tell me, is this vial of oil on display your own?<page>Nothing here is my own, you impertinent young mite! This sacred hall, and all the food contained within, belong to my most exalted master.<page>The Great Gourmand! The finest connoisseur who has ever lived, the one whose tastes transcend the ages!<page>None are left now who venerate them as they deserve, save for the loyal, lonely bug who stands before you.<page>That oil is merely a small savoury to whet their appetite for the grand meal to come. A spectacular, Pharloom spanning dish that I have been planning for an age.<page>But alas, those above seem to have forsaken my poor master! And I have grown so old. Now I can never hope to gather the necessary ingredients. Blast their indolence!
original_zh_text: 这是一首很棒的CM歌曲。你会小心吗？"&lt;page&gt;“你为什么穿得这么差？“人们发誓要给我他们能找到的最幸福的仆人。&lt;hpage&gt;“我不是统治者，我只是皇宫里的客人。展览中的瓶子是你的吗？&lt;page&gt;“不是我，小金刚。“这个神圣的房间和里面所有的食物都属于我的至尊主。&lt;page&gt;食物很棒。品味没有时间。&lt;page&gt;没有人得到应有的尊重，除了一个忠诚而孤独的昆虫在他们面前。&lt;page&gt;黄油有轻微的咸味，可以刺激下一餐的食欲。我长期以来一直在法罗群岛烹饪美味佳肴。&lt;page&gt;但是，哦，那里的每个人都有我可怜的老师。我知道我老了。我还没有收集必要的材料。妈的，种族。

original_en_text: Horrid she! What fool dares strike a holy Vaultkeeper! It has knowledge! Insight! As much as any could possibly retain in our fallen age.<page>Would she cast it all aside just to create more death? If so, she is Weaver to the core!
original_zh_text: 你太可怕了！“我知道，你是个傻瓜，攻击警卫。我们正在检查！在此期间尽可能节省。&lt;page&gt;他能放弃一切并造成更多死亡吗？如果是这样，这就是完美的平台！

original_en_text: So be it, impudent louse! Deny our kingdom’s agony. Refuse its touch upon your fickle shell!<page>Carve your hapless path. Stalk, and strike, and fight, but know your foe is fate herself, and she has risen raging!
original_zh_text: 别害羞。不要触摸我王国反复无常的外壳，也不要否认痛苦。&lt;page&gt;狩猎、战斗、战斗，你的敌人就是命运本身。然后，他就生气了！

original_en_text: Pain! Pain! Do you hear her cries, cursed spider-spawn!? Pharloom suffers for our pathetic, mortal ignorance! We fail it and it falls! <page>Knowledge is needed. More and more! It must be hoarded, sought! Strength to understand, to calm and quell.<hpage>It is action now that needs taking, Vaultkeeper, by myself and those left alive who would aid me.<hpage>Seek solutions in your texts and psalms as you may, but they alone will not be enough to heal a pain so great.
original_zh_text: 这会伤害你的！好痛！我听到你哭了，蜘蛛！帕劳是一个人，一个人。&lt;page&gt;我们需要越来越多的知识！救援和搜索！理解，冷静，冷静的力量。&lt;hpage&gt;守护者是现在必须采取的行动来帮助我和那些还活着的人。&lt;hpage&gt;尽可能在圣经和诗篇中找到答案。然而，仅靠这一点不足以治愈巨大的痛苦。

original_en_text: Yessss! See them all! Its collection gleams complete. Such sacred understanding, stored safe.<page>You have performed your part, Weaver-spawn... The agreement is concluded. Knowledge and rosaries, all were passed fair. No more between us.<page>Leave this Keeper to its treasures and their insights. It has given its service. Now this Keeper wants its time alone!
original_zh_text: 哦，是的！伙计们，看看他！这场表演太精彩了。上帝的知识仍然是真实的。&lt;page&gt;你们已经完成了你们的职责，或者你们这一代人的职责。我们达成了协议。知识和逻辑是很好的沟通。我们之间没有什么。&lt;page&gt;把这个保镖留给你的宝藏和直觉吧。他们已经提供服务了。现在，这个人想要他的时间！

original_en_text: <hpage>Show me your collection, Vaultkeeper.<page>Grkt, Weaver-spawn! She is a bother! Nuisance! Bring more gifts. The collection still has gaps!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;请给我看看你的收藏。&lt;page&gt;加油，海狸。我有麻烦了！这很酷！请再给我一份礼物。这个系列有一些缺点。

original_en_text: <hpage>Gilded one, what remained of the Citadel has been torn apart by the black threads. Still you keep to your duty?<page>While voices still fill the g-g-great chambers... the sacred task of the sentinels continues.<page>To defend... To p-p-protect.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;金色堡垒的残余部分冲破了黑线。&lt;page&gt;他的声音总是G先生，我不能。- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -&lt;page&gt;保护就是为了保护。

original_en_text: You dally, still? If you wish to earn your reward, you should be hunting down those ingredients! Or do you need directions from a serving-bug with some experience?
original_zh_text: 你在低声说话吗？如果您想购买该产品，请购买该产品！您需要专业建议来解决您的商业错误吗？

original_en_text: The Weaver-spawn, she has found it! Our pontiff’s sacred cylinder, stolen from the dark below...<page>Never! States our law. Never must our melody pass to a bug not Keeper! But you, fool Weaver, would shatter those tenants with reckless ease.<hpage>Your pontiff is gone, Vaultkeeper. Your fellows have fallen to husk or thread. What laws once bound these vaults died with them.<page>Ackk! Fine, cursed she. Claim the sacred song, and pain to you if we both are damned forever for it!
original_zh_text: 教皇的方舟在黑暗中被盗。&lt;page&gt;我们无能为力！法律解释说：我们的旋律不能碰昆虫和卫兵！但你愚蠢的阁楼很容易压垮租户。&lt;hpage&gt;你的伴侣陷入困境，管理这些资源的方法也就消失了。&lt;page&gt;我没事，我没事！唱这首赞美诗。如果你永远被诅咒，你就会受到惩罚。

original_en_text: <hpage>I return, bug, and ask to hear your melody again, that I may lock it clear in my mind.<page>Very well, good pilgrim. For one so fiercely devout as yourself, gladly will I give this gift.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我回来了，Bug，我想再次听我的音乐，这样我就可以把它清楚地留在脑海里。&lt;page&gt;像你这样美丽的朝圣者，我送给你这个礼物。".

original_en_text: <hpage>Your master seems satisfied, sir. It is time you gave what was promised.<page>Yes. Yes! It has been done! Made and served. A dish to match my master’s refined desires.<page>The pale trifle is yours. Take it and leave! My master needs time to reflect, and I must ponder on flavours anew!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;店主似乎对此很满意。现在是兑现承诺的时候了。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的！哦，是的！我们准备好了，饭菜是根据客人的需要准备的。&lt;page&gt;小白是你的。老师需要时间思考。您必须重新考虑您的偏好。

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I bring the psalm cylinder recovered from the dark chambers below here. I would learn its melody.<page>Kak! Then pass it, filthy Weaver-spawn! A cylinder so sacred should not remain a moment longer in your grubby claws!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我拿起在保险箱下面的暗室里找到的国琴，学习了旋律。&lt;page&gt;就是这里！如此神圣的圆柱体不再适合你肮脏的指甲了！

original_en_text: Hold them, will she? Covet them? Can she not part with such a small prize?<page>Remain blind fool she. This Keeper’s understanding stays with itself.
original_zh_text: 我可以带她一起吗？你想要这个吗？你不想要这个价格吗？&lt;page&gt;如果你继续盲目撒谎，你父母对你的看法不会改变。

original_en_text: Weaver-thing! Does she hope to spy upon our treasured records?<page>Within our vast store, always more there is to know, the old methods of prayer, to this land, to its rulers, and to the strength at its heart.
original_zh_text: 日内瓦想窃取一些珍贵文件？&lt;page&gt;在我们巨大的仓库和古老的祈祷形式中，总有一些关于地球、它的统治者和核心力量的东西需要了解。

original_en_text: She carries a precious cylinder! She must give it! Share it! Claw to claw!<page>Pass it! And this Vaultkeeper shall grant their wisdom. Just a small taste! A trickle! A glimmer! Of our Citadel’s sacred understandings.
original_zh_text: 我有一瓶值得拥有的好酒。让我们分享一下这个！帕达帕&lt;page&gt;经历这一切！财富给你智慧，蜂鸣器！一盏灯上帝对性的理解

original_en_text: Woken, is this sentinel. F-f-f-functional, is its shell.<page>Still devoted, is this s-s-sentinel, and awaiting your commandment.<hpage>You speak, gilded one? I’ve no command for you, but my curiosity is piqued.<hpage>You call yourself a sentinel. What is it you are charged with protecting?<page>Defence of the sacred C-c-citadel, and the voices that fill it-t-t, is our eternal duty.<hpage>I had assumed as much. Yet look around you, gilded one. During your slumber, the Citadel has fallen, and its voices lay silent. This place is dead, or very nearly.<hpage>Some would argue that standing guard over a kingdom’s corpse is a foolish task, empty of meaning. I wonder then, will you still hold true to your charge?
original_zh_text: 一名警卫醒了。f-f - f函数是一个shell。&lt;page&gt;卫兵们忠诚，等待您的命令。&lt;hpage&gt;你是说O？虽然没有收到订单，但我很感兴趣。&lt;hpage&gt;他们被称为守护者，他们保护什么？&lt;page&gt;维护C-C的神圣性及其声音是我们永恒的责任。&lt;hpage&gt;我就是这么想的，但看看周围。当你睡着的时候，城堡倒塌了，你什么也听不到。这个地方已经死了，或者几乎死了。&lt;hpage&gt;有些人认为保护王国的身体是无用的、无用的。

original_en_text: One must not wander idle between these sacred shelves! This is a holy place. Reverence! It is demanded.<page>If the fool she wishes to view this Keeper’s collection, head to the listening room below.
original_zh_text: 你不能在这些神圣的平台上行走，这些都是神圣的地方，请尊重我，这是必要的。&lt;page&gt;想要观看《卫报》系列的傻瓜可以前往下面的礼堂。

original_en_text: <hpage>My choice is made. I cannot leave. I must descend again, and see Pharloom freed.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我再也走不动了，我看到灯亮了，然后又摔倒了。

original_en_text: <hpage>The signs of battle here are clear, gilded one. Is it your charge then to hunt the haunted, even if they be of the Citadel’s ruling castes?<page>Defence of the sacred Cit-t-tadel, and the voices that fill it, is the eternal d-duty of the sentinels.<page>Termination, is the n-n-necessary fate of all those enthralled by the whispering Silk.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;战斗的痕迹清晰可见。即使你属于一个省份的统治阶级，你知道吗？正在寻找你的工作吗？&lt;page&gt;守护者的永恒使命是保护塔德尔圣城并迎接它的喧嚣。&lt;page&gt;结局是所有被丝绸之语吸引的人不可避免的命运。

original_en_text: <hpage>Out there lie the endless wastes... If I cross them now, Pharloom shall fall to a black fate of my making.<hpage>My choice is made. I will not abandon its bugs to that grim end. I must descend again, and cut them free.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;如果你现在经历这一切，法轮就会陷入我为你创造的黑暗命运。&lt;hpage&gt;我们不会屈服于导致这一艰难结局的错误。我们需要再次拯救他们。

original_en_text: <hpage>Keep safe, Vaultkeeper. I may expect your service in future, and I’d not have you pass before that task is complete.<page>Gyak... No fool this Keeper. It has lived long, watched its fellows wither, but it shall not die, not yet, not while knowledge needs be sought.<page>This pact is made, Weaver-spawn, insight for us, both she and it.<page>This holy Citadel, in glory and fall, there are holes in its history, even to a Keeper’s knowledge, even to the vaults.<page>Seek the cylinders, she must, those objects of intricate insight. Bring more for this Keeper and only this Keeper, for in this Citadel none are left possessed of such sound, sharp mind as it.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;您可以密切关注警卫并等待下一项任务，但在完成任务之前不要通过。&lt;page&gt;他活了很多年，看着同伴消失，但他并没有为寻找知识而死。&lt;page&gt;对于韦弗的后代来说，这是我们和她以及洞察之间的合同。&lt;page&gt;无论是辉煌还是衰落，这座神圣城堡的历史都存在漏洞，尽管它的守护者知道这一点，但它的时代也知道这一点。&lt;page&gt;加入多个守护者。这座城市没有人有如此强烈的声音和如此坚强的心。

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, regale us with our Threefold song, that you may rise above and worship before our kingdom’s divine heart.
original_zh_text: 天堂里永恒的朝圣者用我们的三首歌支持我们，在我们王国的核心之外尊敬我们。

original_en_text: Still you tarry here, bug who calls herself a guest? If your idle claws need work, put them to service for our exalted Great Gourmand!<page>I must remain by my master, so you will need to leave the Citadel and gather the ingredients for their meal in my stead!
original_zh_text: 你还在这里，自称昆虫客人吗？如果您的指甲需要工作，让它们为我们亲爱的朋友工作。&lt;page&gt;我必须和我的主人住在一起，你必须离开城堡为我收集材料。

original_en_text: A rusted statue of a pilgrim.

<hpage>To learn the melody upon this cylinder will require a working listening device. This one here has long ceased to function.<hpage>That last keeper still sane, in the vaults above... Their chambers hold just such a machine. I need only return.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;要理解本专栏中的旋律，您需要一款功能性助听器，该助听器将长期无法正常工作。&lt;hpage&gt;最后一名警卫总是很聪明，他的房间里有一辆这样的车。

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I recovered a psalm cylinder in the dark chambers below here. I believe it contains the melody unique to these vaults. I would have you play it for me now.<page>Kakrt! She has visited the pontiff’s depths and stolen the sacred song! Where is your respect, Weaver-spawn?! Our venerable dead deserve better than to have their chambers transgressed by your filthy foraging!<hpage>In this moment, Vaultkeeper, I’ve slim patience for your impudence. Either prepare the cylinder and stay silent, or ready yourself to learn regret.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我认为这些宝藏包括独特的旋律，你可以在盒子下的暗室中、在国歌的烟斗中看到。&lt;page&gt;卡莉！！他进入了教皇的心中，偷走了国家！Dusky，尊重在哪里？我们光荣的死亡应该比走廊里肮脏的食物更好！"&lt;hpage&gt;现在，财政部长，我对你的邪恶没有耐心。在准备好的汽油瓶里保持安静。

original_en_text: Eggy, eggy! I want to lay a lot of pretty eggies! So tell the big ones, bring me more food!
original_zh_text: 鸡蛋，鸡蛋，我想种更多的鸡蛋，我请求你给我带更多的食物。"

original_en_text: <hpage>Your chambers are surely grand, sir bug, but it is plain to see you are no sovereign here.<page>Is our state so bare, pilgrim?... “By the will of the Conductors,” we once boomed, and this Citadel shook at our decree.<page>But the words... How hollow they echoed. The mantle of rule, claimed greedily from Pharloom’s fading first children, those bitter Weavers... it was yoke, not crown.<page>Now, in our Citadel’s silence, we share their truth. Only one monarch’s claws ever clutched this kingdom, though we raised our voices to cry otherwise.<page>Would you see her, pilgrim? Up there at our Citadel’s crown? Reach those heights we’d hoped to hide and bow before this land’s true ruler.<hpage>In time near, sir bug, I shall indeed climb to meet your monarch...
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;伯杰先生，你的房间真的很漂亮，但你肯定不是这里的国王。&lt;page&gt;地球真的那么赤裸吗？“按照指挥官的命令，我们发动了一次进攻，按照我们的命令，城堡都在颤抖。"&lt;page&gt;法老的第一个堕落的儿子是一名手工摔跤手，由于贪婪而被剥夺了王国的外衣。这不是王冠，而是链条。&lt;page&gt;现在，在城堡的寂静中，我们分享了他的真相。尽管我们哭泣，但只有真正的格里芬才能征服王国。&lt;page&gt;“你想看吗，佩里？“我们已经到了想要躲藏并向这个国家真正的领导人鞠躬的地步。&lt;hpage&gt;“贝克先生，迟早我会见到你的主人。"

original_en_text: Cleansed, is this place. Eternal, is the d-d-duty of the sentinels.
original_zh_text: 清洁是一个地方，永恒是守护者的责任。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I bring ingredients for the dish.<page>At last! My master is withering away from hunger! Let us see what gifts you bring.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;我找到了这道菜的原料。&lt;page&gt;当然可以！你的主人饿了。

original_en_text: <hpage>Will you tell me of those who guard this structure? They are servants of the Citadel, are they not?<page>Servants...? They too are penitents. In a past age, that caste committed their own sacrilege against the Citadel.<page>A sin long forgotten, but so grave that their offspring and the offspring of their offspring carry the guilt with them still. To serve here is their only hope of absolution.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;谁来保护这座建筑？他们是城堡的仆人，不是吗？&lt;page&gt;“服务？".过去，城堡曾对城堡犯下暴行。&lt;page&gt;这是一种早已被遗忘的罪过，但严重到足以让子孙后代忍受。

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, regale us with our Threefold song, that you may rise above and worship before our kingdom’s divine heart.
original_zh_text: 天堂里永恒的朝圣者用我们的三首歌支持我们，在我们王国的核心之外尊敬我们。

original_en_text: <hpage>If this place was holy once, no evidence remains. Even as a prison, it has been neglected.<hpage>If you wish, I can free you. You can descend through the caverns below until you find a settlement.<page>You... are asking me to leave this place? Wh-what a strange, fearful thought! Such a sin would never... no.<page>By the grace of the Citadel, I am here as a penitent. Here, I can hide from the shame of my sins until they are withered away by time.<page>Leave this place...? Please! Strike me down dead before you speak such blasphemy again!
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;这是一个神圣的地方，但没有证据证明这一点。&lt;hpage&gt;如果你愿意，我可以开车送你。您可以穿过洞穴，直到找到定居点。&lt;page&gt;你是谁？“你想离开这个地方吗？“多么奇怪和可怕的想法啊！这样的犯罪从未发生过。&lt;page&gt;感谢上帝的恩典，我能够以忏悔者的身份来到这里，隐藏我罪恶的耻辱，直到时间耗尽。"&lt;page&gt;离开这个地方. ...“在你告诉我这个之前先杀了我。"

original_en_text: The mantle of conductor weighs heavy. Had I known the cost before its bearing, would I have accepted the duty?
original_zh_text: 司机的外套很重。如果你在事情发生之前就知道了，你会负责吗？

original_en_text: S... song, is it? You have brought song? You are of the Citadel, then? How... how many of you?<hpage>I am alone, sir. You needn’t fear, I am no servant of the Citadel. Are you a prisoner of theirs?<page>P... prisoner? I understand you not. There is no prison here.<page>This is a holy place of forgiveness. Please, speak with reverence.
original_zh_text: 这是什么？这是一首歌，对吧？实际上？你带了歌吗？你是城堡里的吗？这是...有多少？&lt;hpage&gt;我只是一个男人。”别担心，我不是囚犯。"&lt;page&gt;“我不知道，但他是个囚犯。“我不知道，没有监狱。&lt;page&gt;这是宽恕的圣所。请仔细说话。

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall build.
original_zh_text: 当音乐结束时，音乐就继续。&lt;page&gt;我们创造了永恒。

original_en_text: We would hear the song of the Architects, at the core of our Citadel.<page>They who sustain our realm, its walls, its floors and its voice, even as others fall silent.
original_zh_text: 在城堡的中心，可以听到建筑师的歌声。&lt;page&gt;他们将保卫我们的王国、它的墙壁、它的床和它的声音。

original_en_text: A Crustnut! Stale and dull, you’ll be thinking, yes? But ground to finest powder, that’s when its tart taste blooms!
original_zh_text: 本地！我认为它又旧又无聊，但如果你把它转移到最好的粉末上，它的味道就会绽放！

original_en_text: <hpage>If I’m to learn the melody upon this cylinder, I’ll first need to find a working device to play it. This one here has long ceased to function.<hpage>The vaults above would surely hold another such device. I must search thoroughly.
original_zh_text: &lt;hpage&gt;要理解这个圆柱体的旋律，你首先需要找到一种乐器来演奏它。&lt;hpage&gt;顶部的盒子应该有另一个设备。我们必须深入研究它。

original_en_text: You! Mite or mourner! Fell fated chosen left till last!<page>Relent! Submit! The fatal blow was struck. Fair Pharloom wails its end.<page>We woe befallen few remained, let us join here, at last, and show our fires fierce.<page>Together to share our kingdom’s pain, feel it scorch our shells, and know clear its suffering, its sorrow!
original_zh_text: 是你！昆虫是总是哭泣的人。命运选择了左翼，直到最后。&lt;page&gt;抱歉！大战：致命打击即将来临。Fair Farm最后一集&lt;page&gt;我们的不幸落在了剩下的东西身上，我们终于聚集在这里，展示我们火的力量。&lt;page&gt;我们分担王国的痛苦，感受我们燃烧的贝壳，我们理解你们的痛苦和磨难。

original_en_text: Our song upon a silken thread.... Such beautiful sound, so long absent from our halls.<page>Keep safe our melody, good pilgrim. You shall likely be the last to receive it.
original_zh_text: 这首歌是丝绸的。这个房间里没有什么好东西。&lt;page&gt;好朝圣者，你可能是最后一个这样做的人。

original_en_text: We would hear the melody of the Conductors, high in their gleaming towers.<page>They bearing the heaviest mantle, who would guide our land ever on to greatness.
original_zh_text: 从灯塔上，你可以听到大师的旋律。&lt;page&gt;他们将肩负起最重的武器，让我们的土地变得伟大。

original_en_text: A visitor? Now this is rare.<page>I must apologise for not rising to greet you. After an age spent sickly, I find myself unable to lift from this bedchamber.<page>I hope, good pilgrim, our Citadel has shown you the courtesy deserved of a bug devout.<hpage>I’ve borne its hospitality well enough, aged one...<page>Ahhh... My sympathies, pilgrim... We have fallen so far.
