And now, sadly, if you’ve come seeking aid or understanding, I fear I too shall disappoint. <page>Whatever you would ask, I have only my melody left to offer. It is a simple thing, the smallest of gifts, but perhaps more special now, for it has been rarely heard in these quietened times.
original_zh_text: 访客？今天不是这样的。&lt;page&gt;对不起，我无法站起来打招呼，我病得绝症，我不能离开这个房间。&lt;page&gt;亲爱的朝圣者，愿我们的城市表现出虔诚昆虫的礼貌。&lt;hpage&gt;一岁时，他对自己的热情好客感到非常满意。&lt;page&gt;是的，正确的。朝圣者，我已经走到了这一步，但不幸的是，即使你寻求帮助或理解，我也感到失望。&lt;page&gt;无论你想要什么，我只会给你我的歌。这样简单的礼物虽然小，但现在可能会变得更加特别。我在安静的时候从未听说过它。

original_en_text: If the weight of your sins bear down upon you, you may remain here with me in penitence, sister.
original_zh_text: 如果你的罪降临到你身上，请与我一起悔改！”

original_en_text: Ah.... your s-song. So long I’ve sat in silence. Tell me... are all songs played now as exquisite as this? Or has time made my hearing unrefined?<hpage>This art is new to me, and my skill is limited, but your appreciation is not unwelcome.<page>Ahh. The beauty of it. It is almost painful to my weary senses. Perhaps though, this pain is merely part of my penitence. <page>Play on, will you? I would join your tune. Just forgive me if my voice has become brutish.
original_zh_text: 这首歌让你沉默了很长时间。你能告诉我这首歌有多好听吗？&lt;hpage&gt;这门艺术对我来说是新的，我的能力有限，但我不欢迎你的评价。&lt;page&gt;哦，是的，对。这太酷了疲劳几乎伤害了我。这种痛苦可能是忏悔的一部分。&lt;page&gt;继续玩，好吗？你同意吗？添加您的歌曲。对不起，我的声音太粗鲁了。

original_en_text: You refuse to play our sacred melody! Why pause, Weaver-thing? Do you cower at the truths it may illuminate? Surely you are not the lesser sort that bows to fear?<hpage>When the moment calls, Vaultkeeper, I shall listen. For now, your task remains to keep the cylinder safe. And know, you shall answer to my blade if you fail.
original_zh_text: 我拒绝演奏神圣的旋律！“你为什么停下来，虫子？“你害怕会被揭露吗？“你不是一个害怕的孩子吗？”"&lt;hpage&gt;CSC，听着，你现在的工作是保护你的煤气瓶，如果你做不到，你将负责我的剑。
在这首诗里，有一种祝福。

original_en_text: For our base, we require the gelatinous Mossberry Stew. Its concoction is a druidic art, a jealously guarded secret of the moss-painted caverns deep below us.
original_zh_text: 在我们的基地，我们需要一根泡沫吸管来制作冰淇淋。他们的混合物就是德鲁兹艺术，隐藏在我们下面洞穴中的秘密。

original_en_text: Sweet fruit that grows in moist environments. Its seeds are toxic to most creatures.
original_zh_text: 它是一种生长在潮湿环境中的甜味水果。种子对大多数生物都有毒。

original_en_text: Report of the Memorium and its maintenance.<br><br>“Containment fails. Memory lost. Excise outer. Maintain inner.<br>Shellwood stasis sustained - Remember.<br>Marrowlands stasis critical - Remember.<br>Verdanian environment exceeded - Destined to forget.”
original_zh_text: 纪念品及其内容。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;停止失败。外部删除记忆丢失。呆在家里。"&lt;br&gt;树皮和树木的停滞仍在继续。&lt;br&gt;严重的骨髓骤停-记住。&lt;br&gt;除了令人印象深刻的氛围之外，注定会被遗忘。"
其中包括。{0}贝壳碎片（贝壳）

original_en_text: Nest fashioned from an old bell. Once set up, young Craws will occasionally roost within, filling the bell with shell shards and rosaries.<br><br>The Crawbell can be installed on the exterior of a home.
original_zh_text: 这块手表是用一块旧手表制成的。筑巢后，小螃蟹把罗杰的贝壳和碎片装满了时钟。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;三叶草可以安装在户外。
这张地图在这里。&amp;那个人说他是。

original_en_text: Gem-like organ taken from a Flintbeetle. Produces incendiary sparks when abraded, and may explode if cracked or dropped.
original_zh_text: 风琴是用黄金制成的，就像宝石一样。如果使用，可能会引起火灾，如果损坏或掉落，可能会爆炸。

original_en_text: Keepsake containing a precious memory. Can be used to expand a Crest.<br><br>Expand Crests in the Crest pane of the Menu.
original_zh_text: 这是一份珍贵的礼物，里面蕴藏着珍贵的回忆。您可以扩展您的头发。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;在“传输”菜单面板中，展开“传输”。" "

original_en_text: Defeat foes to add their records to the Journal.
original_zh_text: 击败敌人并将物品添加到您的日记中。

original_en_text: Review defeated foes in the Journal pane of the Menu.
original_zh_text: 被击败的敌人可以显示在日记菜单面板中。

original_en_text: Basic pouch designed for holding tools, traps and crafting materials.
original_zh_text: 基本包装旨在储存工具、陷阱和加工材料。

original_en_text: Gilded trophy awarded by Sprintmaster Swift to the fastest bug in Pharloom.
original_zh_text: Sprintmaster Swift授予Farroom最快昆虫金质奖章。

original_en_text: Reassembled cogwork heart, containing a fine array of wheels and regulators.
original_zh_text: 修复后的驾驶中心将包括复杂的车轮和控制装置。

original_en_text: Enlivened heart of Skarrsinger Karmelita. Its beat is steady and strong.
original_zh_text: 气候稳定而强劲，足以让斯卡林·卡梅莱塔的心保持活力。

original_en_text: Filthy rag, marked with the scrawl of an Underworker.<br><br>“So much suffering. Are we truly chosen, or have we sinned unknowing, and now are punished for it?”
original_zh_text: 工人签名就是工人签名。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;“疼吧？你真的被选中了吗？难道他们不知道自己有罪，注定会受到惩罚吗？"

original_en_text: Forgotten Weaver technique. Sew rending runes upon one’s enemies.
original_zh_text: 一种被遗忘的编织技术值得为敌人哭泣。
把它拿出来（把它拿出来）

original_en_text: An ancient mask carved from cold, pale ore. The mask protects the wearer, guarding their shell against damage.
original_zh_text: 古老的面具是用轻和冷的矿物雕刻而成的。口罩可以保护佩戴者，保护身体免受伤害。

original_en_text: Voices of the Choir, raised in sacred song.
original_zh_text: 唱诗班的歌声在全国各地回响。

original_en_text: Finely forged bell made from a gleaming metal.
original_zh_text: 这只表是由闪亮的金属制成的。

original_en_text: Garment gifted to pilgrims on admittance to the Citadel. Its thick weave offers additional protection against wind and cold.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者进入城堡时将收到的衣服。其厚实的面料进一步保护其免受风寒的侵害。

original_en_text: High quality nectar of a long-lived aphid, kept in storage over many lifetimes to allow a complex maturation.
original_zh_text: 优质持久的大马士革蜂蜜可以储存多年，实现复杂老化。

original_en_text: Grub that lives within and feeds upon Pharloom’s lingering Silk, born with the ability to sense Silk over great distances.
original_zh_text: 以漂浮的丝绸为食的爬行动物天生就能够从远处闻到丝绸的味道。

original_en_text: Chunk of dense coral-shell. Not fit for crafting tools, but claimed to have various medicinal properties if correctly prepared.
original_zh_text: 尽管又大又密的珊瑚壳不适合烹饪，但据说如果烹饪得当，它们具有药用价值。

original_en_text: Keys to the cells and passages of the Slab.
original_zh_text: 用于定位单元和频道的收件箱。

original_en_text: Beads carved from polished shell. The finer material reflects their increased value.
original_zh_text: 用于清洁贝壳的珍珠材料质量的提高反映了成本的增加。

original_en_text: Small worker’s key. Unlocks the door to the diving bell in Deep Docks.
Meat harvested from a defeated creature. It has been diced into fine chunks.
original_zh_text: 被征服生物的肉被切成小块。

original_en_text: Fresh innards of a Muckroach, tough and slimy with a rank odour. Unpalatable to most.
original_zh_text: 新鲜甲虫有一种坚硬、粘稠的气味，并有难闻的气味。对于大多数人来说，这很难接受。

original_en_text: Crumpled parchment containing the prayer of a Burning Bug.<br><br>“Hail to your heat! O glorious flame. You who builds and breaks us. Sear our shells. Char them black. That we may rise to join you, wreathed in bright and blazing joy.”
original_zh_text: 红色卷轴上写着为萤火虫祈祷。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;献给你的激情，荣耀的火焰。上帝创造了我们，摧毁了我们，并在我们的壳上留下了伤疤。"

original_en_text: Liquid lifeseed extracted from a ripe bud. Possesses regenerative qualities.
original_zh_text: 液体指甲是从成熟的树枝中提取的，这是一种繁殖品质。

original_en_text: Words of a Weaver from the nest beneath Bone Bottom.<br><br>“Hide her deep, the despised child, our shame shown in shell of iron. She is a wish cast vain, divinity mimicked in form too frail.”
original_zh_text: 人类的语言是用骨头巢编织而成的。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;“我们把它藏得很深。下雪的孩子我们的耻辱反映在我们的铁壳上。“对上帝的模仿非常脆弱。"

original_en_text: Aged medallion of the wanderer Seth. A gift given in respect of great skill.
String threaded with a mix of common and fine rosaries. Can be broken and the rosaries used to trade.
original_zh_text: 规则和精美念珠的结合。它破碎了，可以用于珍珠贸易。

original_en_text: Long sewing tool, uniquely balanced for combat. The blade is honed to a fine edge.
original_zh_text: 独特平衡的长缝合工具非常适合战斗行动。刀片经过抛光，边缘很薄。

original_en_text: Last edict of the Conductors.<br><br>“And lo, is eternity sustained. By Architect’s claw, we welcome that final form, of dial and rotor, and soul gladly given.<br><br>The perfect, unfaltering voice.”
original_zh_text: 最后的教学&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;“看，永恒是漫长的。“通过建筑师的手中，我们不仅得到了台面和旋转木马的最终形态，还得到了给我们带来幸福的灵魂。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;完美无限的声音！"
工具和套件。&lt;br&gt;&amp;生产工具包

original_en_text: Core of a flower formed around the body of a consumed Wood Wasp. Secretes a sticky sap that the wasps subsist on.
original_zh_text: 吞食大麻会在身体周围形成一个花芯，分泌植物生存所需的汁液浓度。

original_en_text: Bile gland of a rare sylphean slug. Talented pinmasters can use the glistening liquid within to improve a blade’s sharpness.
original_zh_text: 罕见的Yukanamex铁。一个好的针头制造商可以使用泡沫液体来抛光刀片。

original_en_text: Crude journal made of coarse fabric and bone, left by a fallen pilgrim.
original_zh_text: 倒下的朝圣者携带着由碎片和骨头制成的厚报纸。

original_en_text: Surgeon’s orders.<br><br>“Devout has succumbed during Silk suture. Refuses to revive. Sin committed. Permit no rites.<br><br>Husk marked for cremation. Retrieve dregs.”
original_zh_text: “外科医生的命令。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;但当它们缝在一起时，虔诚的人就会死。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;楼上有火葬迹象，请拆除螺丝。"

original_en_text: Gelatinous organ collected from the defeated Broodmother.
original_zh_text: 加利利的器官被他的养母切除，但没有成功。

original_en_text: Pulsating organ grown within the shell of Alchemist Zylotol. The gland replenishes over time, providing a near limitless source of Plasmium.<br><br>Crafting new Plasmium Phials no longer requires a reserve.
original_zh_text: 在津田炼金术士的外壳内，生长着一个脉动的器官，随着时间的推移，萨姆本人也在生长，提供了几乎无限的血浆。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;无需保护和创建新的Fial卡。

original_en_text: An artefact almost impossibly old, marked inside with many fine etchings. Most are indecipherable.<br><br> “...No will... No self... Shade...”
original_zh_text: 这是一件令人难以置信的古代文物，雕刻有许多复杂的部分。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;“...我没有自己的意志。没有我，两条腿上的影子

original_en_text: Worn ornament of the Nameless Town high above Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 一只不知名的鹦鹉装饰着这座城市

original_en_text: Versatile thread naturally produced within the shell. When enough Silk is stored, wounds can be healed and skills executed.<br><br>Attack enemies to replenish Silk.
original_zh_text: 多功能电缆会自然出现在外壳中。如果你储存足够的丝绸，伤口就会愈合并展示你的技能。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;他们攻击敌人以提供丝绸。

original_en_text: Artefact left behind by the Weavers, designed to collect and hold additional Silk.
original_zh_text: 工匠留下的艺术就是收集和收集更多的丝绸。

original_en_text: Hardened fragments of shell and bone, used in the crafting of tools and traps.
original_zh_text: 用于制造工具或陷阱的硬壳或骨头碎片。

original_en_text: Silk thread naturally produced within the shell. When enough Silk is stored, wounds can be healed and skills executed.<br><br>Silk Hearts will automatically regenerate some Silk.<br><br>Attack enemies to replenish Silk.
original_zh_text: 如果你储存足够的丝绸，伤口就会愈合，你的技能就会得到证明。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;丝绸的心脏会自动扩张。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;攻击敌人并提供丝绸。

original_en_text: Pristine cog from within the shell of an automaton. Despite long use, its metal has not dulled.
original_zh_text: 机器人盒子里的牙齿虽然使用了很长时间，但金属并不黑。

original_en_text: Intricate internal mechanism of a cogwork bug. Can be broken into individual shell shards for use in crafting.
original_zh_text: 复杂的内部传输故障机制。您可以将它们分成盒子。

original_en_text: Attune to the old memories of Pharloom.
Enlivened heart of Crust King Khann. It beats deep and slow.
original_zh_text: 谢谢你，国王。节奏低沉而缓慢。

original_en_text: Pungent delicacy preserved in roach brine. The most famous creation of the disgraced chef Lugoli.
original_zh_text: 用粉色、辛辣、美味的溶液腌制。卢戈利主厨最著名的作品

original_en_text: Remains of an ancient Weaver implement, broken and inoperable.<br><br>A craftsbug of high skill may be able to repair it.
original_zh_text: 这是一个旧的瓷砖废墟工具，损坏，不适合使用。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;蜘蛛专家可以解决这个问题。

original_en_text: Decree of the Citadel, dirty and worn.<br><br>“Full Chamber to the kingdom of the White Wyrm. Claim the Weaver, in half part. Last of their line. Sensed strong with Silk.<br><br>Resistance anticipated. Quell with rune cage.”
original_zh_text: 性规则古老而肮脏。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;整个红龙王国的大厅中。故事的一半已经到来。你团队的最后一部分。丝绸很坚固。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;“他被关在一个废弃的笼子里。

original_en_text: Writhing substance from the dark sea at the world’s base.
original_zh_text: 物质从黑暗的海洋上升到光明的底部。

original_en_text: Large spike of bone collected from a defeated Skull Tyrant.
original_zh_text: 钉子从失败的暴君那里获得了巨大的收获

original_en_text: Guide track for the Choir, with a theme of salvation.
Key with the mark of ‘Apostate’. Opens the way to certain cells and passages of the Slab.
original_zh_text: 带有“Back”符号的按钮-这将打开桌面上给定驱动器或通道的路径。

original_en_text: Tubes and receptacles built for the storing, recording and research of various materials.<br><br>The Materium can be assembled in a home.
original_zh_text: 管子或容器用于存储、记录或研究各种材料。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;这些材料可以在家收集。

original_en_text: Ethereal flower plucked from a deep and distant memory. Glows with soft, pale light that wards against the void.
original_zh_text: 从遥远的记忆中采集来的空灵花朵，以微弱而苍白的光芒照亮了天空。

original_en_text: Long sewing tool, uniquely balanced for combat. The blade gleams sharper than ever before.
original_zh_text: 长缝工具具有独特的平衡性，适合战斗。黑色比以往任何时候都明亮。

original_en_text: Long sewing tool, uniquely balanced for combat. The highly refined blade reveals its hivesteel banding.
original_zh_text: 长缝纫工具具有独特的平衡性，非常适合战斗行动。一个非常复杂的页面有一个模板的图像。

original_en_text: Writing implement for recording one’s travels. Can be used to update any acquired maps.
original_zh_text: 您可以使用它来更新您为笔记本电脑购买的旅行日志文件。

original_en_text: Technique taken from the primal source of Silk. Spin talons from thread that seek out enemies.
original_zh_text: 这项技术源于丝绸的起源。把你的指甲从线上拔下来，找到敌人。

original_en_text: Carving of Camora, Weaver of healing. A prayer is etched upon it.<br><br>“Weaver, heal my sons, their fearful hearts, their limbs that shake at the climb to come. We pray, gift but a glimmer of your strength, that when we stand before your divinity, you see bugs shed free of fear.”
original_zh_text: 卡莫拉的雕塑治愈了织物，并将其写入祈祷文。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;我的孩子们，Chukatskia，在即将到来的扬升中，请治愈他们恐惧的心，他们颤抖的手和脚。当我们在你的上帝面前见面时，你会发现我像一只绝望的昆虫。"

original_en_text: Ancient Weaver technique. Cling to sheer surfaces and leap off to rapidly scale heights.
original_zh_text: 纺织技术。他接近一个陡峭的表面并迅速跳了起来。

original_en_text: Cold, steely stone with remarkable regrowth capacity.<br><br>If shattered into shell shards, it will reform over time.
original_zh_text: 冷铸铁具有很强的再生能力。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;即使外壳破裂，随着时间的推移也会修复。

original_en_text: Rusted key of common design. Can be used to open a range of simple locks.<br><br>Degraded by time, it will break after a single use.
original_zh_text: 整体设计的关键是抗皱能力。许多简单的锁都可以打开。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;随着时间的推移，使用后就会分解和分解。

original_en_text: Rare element found naturally within the rock and bone of Pharloom.<br><br>Used by skilled craftsbugs in the construction of tools and trinkets.
original_zh_text: 它是一种在自然界中发现的稀有元素，存在于石头和农场骨头中。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;宇航员用它来制造仪器和配件。

original_en_text: Two parts of a cogwork heart, containing an intricate array of wheels and regulators.
original_zh_text: 核心的两个部分包含一个复杂的轮子和一个调节器。

original_en_text: The heart can be displayed in a home.
original_zh_text: 你的心可以在家里展示。
把它拿出来（把它拿出来）{0}?

original_en_text: Rare symbolic medallion, given only to a true friend of fleas.
original_zh_text: 一枚罕见的象征性奖牌，只颁发给奇普真正的朋友。

original_en_text: Summon the Beastlings and return together to their mother.
original_zh_text: 我们打电话给动物，回到母亲身边。

original_en_text: A pouch for holding traps and tools, and fine crafting implements to increase their lethality.
original_zh_text: 一个袋子里装满了陷阱、复杂的设备和工具，增加了杀伤力。

original_en_text: Hard, charged stone that can catch, store and discharge electricity.
original_zh_text: 固体岩石和炸药被捕获、保存和释放。

original_en_text: Carved bone idol of an ancient Weaver. A prayer is etched upon its body.
original_zh_text: 古代工匠的骨头。你的祈祷写在你的身体里。

original_en_text: Cracked shell containing soul drawn from a long deceased bug.
original_zh_text: 破碎的壳里有从一只死去已久的昆虫中提取的灵魂。

original_en_text: Thick, syrupy soup of Mossberries and druidic herbs. Sweet and aromatic, but poisonous to most creatures.
original_zh_text: 糖酱富含香草和姜泡沫。尽管它又甜又香，但对大多数生物都有毒。

original_en_text: Deflective technique of a creature spun from thread. Bind Silk around the needle to deflect enemy attacks and instantly strike back.
original_zh_text: 如果你把丝绸绑在针上，敌人就会立即依附起来进行反击。

original_en_text: Gleaming pearl carved over with intricate markings. The rarest and most highly valued rosaries in all of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 闪亮的珍珠具有复杂的特征。您可以在法纳姆的每个地区找到最稀有、最珍贵的念珠。

original_en_text: One half of an artefact left behind by the Weavers, designed to collect and hold Silk.<br><br>A completed spool will allow one to hold more Silk within their shell.
original_zh_text: 其余一半的布料用于收集和保存丝绸。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;整卷可用于生产大量丝绸，其外壳可容纳更多丝绸。

original_en_text: Deadly Weaver technique. Throw the needle forward with force amplified by coiled Silk.
original_zh_text: 他将致命的框针扔到面前，并用织布增强力量。

original_en_text: Tattered decree of the Citadel.<br><br>“Bug of voice grown hoarse or shell fallen frail, you have been selected for duty most sacred.<br><br>Become our light, our guide in darkness, that others worthy may climb to join the holy song.”
original_zh_text: 城堡被毁了。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;你的声音消失了，你的外壳破裂了，你被选中履行你最神圣的职责。"&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;在黑暗中，做我们的光，做我们的向导，给其他人站起来加入我们歌唱的机会。"

original_en_text: Meat harvested from a defeated creature. It has been cleanly speared through, but is otherwise intact.
original_zh_text: 他被殴打了，但他是无辜的。

original_en_text: Heirloom of a village lost to Pharloom’s Haunting.
original_zh_text: 法鲁起义期间，这座城市的所有宝藏都丢失了。

original_en_text: Shard of an ancient mask worn to protect oneself from harm.<br><br>Complete a mask to strengthen the shell and protect against damage.
original_zh_text: 这是他用来保护自己的面具。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;填充的面罩可以增强外壳并保护其免受损坏。

original_en_text: Metallic cylinder of Citadel make, etched with a recording of sound.<br><br>The cylinder can be played in a gramophone.
original_zh_text: 城堡里建造的金属柱子上刻有铭文。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;该圆柱体可以使用声谱再现。

original_en_text: Faded parchment containing the last words of a lost pilgrim.<br><br>“-ter I die here in the damp dark than join those poor sods, trapped to stumble, aimless and empty, until their limbs fall to dust.”
original_zh_text: 一幅褪色的卷轴，描绘了一位迷失的朝圣者的遗言&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;除非你死在潮湿的黑暗中，否则你不能和那些疯狂的混蛋站在街上，直到你的脚变成灰尘。"

original_en_text: Map of Pharloom and a quill for recording one’s travels. When resting at a bench or elsewhere, the map will be updated with newly discovered areas.
original_zh_text: 当您在其中一个海岸停留时，地图将更新为新的开放区域。

original_en_text: Deadly Weaver technique. Cast the needle in a whirl of Silk around oneself, lashing foes.
original_zh_text: 一种致命的组织技术，将针插入体内攻击敌人。

original_en_text: Holy Weaver talent. Play ancient melodies by stringing Silk along the needle.
original_zh_text: 上帝有能力在古代演奏古老的歌曲。

original_en_text: Essence of a being merged within. Silk will be restored when resting at a bench.
original_zh_text: 存在的本质消失了，海滩上发现了丝绸。

original_en_text: Metallic cylinder of Citadel make, etched with the melody of the Vaultkeepers.<br><br>The cylinder can be played in a gramophone.
original_zh_text: 城堡上建造的金属柱子保持着警卫的基调。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;该圆柱体可以使用声谱再现。

original_en_text: Long burning rock from the base of Pharloom. Mined and used by the Citadel in its forgings.
original_zh_text: 农场的地板上有一块在城堡中挖掘出来的燃烧的石头，用于伪造。

original_en_text: One part of a cogwork heart, containing an intricate mechanism of wheels and regulators.
original_zh_text: 它是变速箱核心的一部分，具有由轮子和控制器组成的复杂机构。

original_en_text: Simple protective garb, sewn through with flexible spines.
original_zh_text: 简单的防护服，松紧钉缝，

original_en_text: Seal symbol given in recognition of a true Hunter, stamped in sticky goo.
original_zh_text: 印章上的标志是为了纪念真正的猎人，用胶水印刷而成。

original_en_text: Tough, furred seed from the centre of a corpora cluster. Stale to taste, but strong once ground as seasoning.
original_zh_text: 一颗强大而邪恶的种子来自Deka集团的核心。虽然味道很差，但浸泡在原料中会很浓烈。

original_en_text: Guide track for the Choir, with a theme of ascendence.
Old Weaver recording instrument, strung with Silk runes. The faded runes hold a Weaver’s words from ages gone.
original_zh_text: 古代的编纂者记录了用丝绸符号装订的工具。

original_en_text: Key with the mark of ‘Indolent’. Opens the way to certain cells and passages of the Slab.
original_zh_text: 关键是冷漠，这为斑块内的特定细胞和通道开辟了道路。

original_en_text: Tattered pelt taken from the body of a Crawbug. Fragile and drab, it is considered to have few practical uses.
original_zh_text: 螃蟹的厚壳被认为脆弱、单调，几乎没有实际用途。

original_en_text: Deadly Weaver technique. Pierce through enemies in a blur of blade and Silk.
original_zh_text: 使用致命的织物和丝绸遮蔽技术攻击您的敌人。

original_en_text: Hard horn piece, broken from the tip of a Conchfly’s shell.
original_zh_text: 固体碎片从外壳边缘掉落。

original_en_text: Small bundle of shell shards tied together with string. Can be broken to use the shards for crafting.
original_zh_text: 一个小贝壳用绳子绑在一起。你可以使用这个工作。

original_en_text: Heavy bell filled with the shimmering soul of the Bell Hermit.
original_zh_text: 沉重的仆人身上充满了贝尔隐藏的光芒。
显示库存中完成的百分比。

original_en_text: Singed parchment containing a pilgrim’s scrawl.<br><br>“My dear companions, all are gone now, devoured, scorched, fallen to exhaustion, or worse, seduced by the Haunting.”
original_zh_text: 烧毁的卷轴上有祈祷涂鸦。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;“亲爱的同志们，在折磨我的诱惑下，一切都消失了，吞噬了我，烧伤了我，疲惫不堪，变得更糟。"

original_en_text: Meat harvested from a defeated creature. It has been seared in a way that noticeably affects the flavour.
original_zh_text: 它是被征服生物的肉，烹饪方式会影响味道。

original_en_text: Liquid lifeseed, possessed of remarkable regenerative qualities. A substance foreign to Pharloom, introduced by the Alchemist Zylotol.
original_zh_text: 液体的生命周期具有再生能力，这是炼金术士吉洛托提出的，是来自法罗姆的外星物体。

original_en_text: Protective garb lined with the soft down of a Fayforn and sewn through with flexible spines.
original_zh_text: 防护服上覆盖着柔软的火角羽毛，并用柔性缝纫线缝制。

original_en_text: Hardened chunk of horned shell collected from a defeated Savage Beastfly.
original_zh_text: 硬角壳是从屠宰的动物中获得的。

original_en_text: Ancient Weaver talent. Throw the needle upward and launch to tremendous heights.
original_zh_text: 古代工匠的才华。放下指针，从高空发射。

original_en_text: Advanced Weaver talent. Throw the Silk-strung needle like a harpoon and charge towards it.
original_zh_text: 他们像长矛一样扔线，跑到他们前面。

original_en_text: Sentence issued by the Citadel Ministers.<br><br>“Chosen of the Choir, by grace of our magnanimous Conductors you are granted mercy. When you exit that cage, an elder bug of sins absolved, you may rejoin our flock and feel our light, and never again shall your voice fall silent.”
original_zh_text: 雅各布总统的决定。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;当他们从这个笼子里出来，旧的罪被赦免时，他们将加入我们的羊群，感受到我们的光，他们的声音将不再沉默。"

original_en_text: Heavy necklace laden with pearl rosaries. Can be broken and the rosaries used to trade.
original_zh_text: 珍珠项链可以被折断，然后换成珍珠。

original_en_text: Carving of Keelal, Weaver of the path. A prayer is etched upon it.<br><br>“Blessed Weaver, lady of grace, you who see our sin, our frail shells, our voices weak, and still offer your protection. How great your mind to care so much for ones so lowly.”
original_zh_text: 雕塑，街道上编织雕塑。我有一本祈祷书。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;“韦弗夫人，你是祝福的，因为你看到了我们的罪恶、我们脆弱的外壳、我们微弱的声音。"

original_en_text: Consume the Silkeater to retrieve a cocoon after falling in battle.
original_zh_text: 在战斗中倒下后，鲸鱼让他回来了。

original_en_text: A relic of Pharloom’s past, interesting to collectors of historical items.
original_zh_text: 对于历史文物收藏家来说，过去古遗址可能会很有趣。

original_en_text: Worn string holding a meagre amount of rosaries. Can be broken and the loose rosaries used to trade.
original_zh_text: 您使用的绳子里有一些珍珠。玉戒坏了，你可以换一下。

original_en_text: Short string of rosaries. Can be broken and the rosaries used to trade.
original_zh_text: 这是一个小戒指。它破碎了，可以用于珍珠贸易。

original_en_text: Order issued by the Citadel. The once gleaming seal has worn with time.
original_zh_text: 曾经闪闪发光的封印随着时间的推移消失了。

original_en_text: Iron emblem of the Court of Craws, absolving the bearer of all crimes past and future.
original_zh_text: 科巴法院宣告过去和未来的所有罪行无罪。

original_en_text: Engraved cruststone, worn by sand and blanched by time.<br><br>...Watch...Remember...Till time... Life anew...
original_zh_text: 切割后的贝壳会被沙子磨损，并随着时间的推移变成白色。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;...工资就摆在桌面上，现在我还记得，这是我的新生活。

original_en_text: Small worker’s key. Unlocks the gate in the middle of Deep Docks.
original_zh_text: 打开Deep Dock服务器密钥的中央端口。

original_en_text: Fabled Weaver talent. Dash forward and sprint with unnatural speed, as though gliding upon Silk.
original_zh_text: 根据传说，韦弗是如此有才华，他吸引了他在一个不自然的速度，就像他滑倒在丝绸上。
图片来源：Axe de la Silk

original_en_text: The memento can be displayed in a home.
original_zh_text: 您可以在家重温您的回忆。

original_en_text: Plea of a Weaver from the furthest edge of Pharloom.<br><br>“Flee, sisters. Flee until your strength exhausts, so far you may escape at last her silken sight.<br><br>To start anew, to sustain, free of web and service eternal.”
original_zh_text: 他在灯塔尽头祈祷。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;“来吧，我的妹妹，你可以一直跑到用尽所有的力量，最终你就会摆脱光滑的视线。"&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;重新启动、维护和删除持久网络和服务。"

original_en_text: Simple garment worn by several pilgrims over the ages. Torn, tattered and repaired many times over.
original_zh_text: 多年来，朝圣者一直穿平底鞋。泪水、泪水和赔偿。

original_en_text: Small sculpture, inexpertly but painstakingly crafted as a symbol of enduring friendship.
original_zh_text: 这些小雕塑经过精心设计，象征着永恒的友谊。

original_en_text: Long sewing tool, uniquely balanced for combat. The Hivesteel blade has been sharpened to its ultimate form.
original_zh_text: 长缝纫工具具有独特的平衡性，非常适合战斗。将带有蜂窝刀片的钢刀片抛光至最终形状。

original_en_text: Blood of a creature merged full with liquid lifeseed. Possesses powerful regenerative qualities.
original_zh_text: 血液和液体的重要活动- 1。高质量的分娩。

original_en_text: A machine with a symbol of Silk.
Discarded key of the Whiteward.<br>Opens the sluice beneath the operating theatre.
original_zh_text: 他触摸了白钥匙。&lt;br&gt;他打开手术室的门。

original_en_text: Last words of the Weavers.<br><br>“Sisters, spiders, the burden is passed. These simple bugs shall bear it full. Never to cease. Never to silence.<br><br>We shall die, and wait, and pray, that one may come of silken strength enough to weave us free.”
original_zh_text: 数据的最后一句话&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;姐妹们、蜘蛛和吉姆结束了。错误可以接受。他们从不停止。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;我们死了，我们等待并祈祷。也许有人会拥有丝绸的力量来编织我们的自由。"

original_en_text: Chunk of hardened material found in the shells of great beasts. Can be broken into individual shell shards for use in crafting.
original_zh_text: 巨型动物壳中的固体物质。您可以将它们分成单独的壳。

original_en_text: Shards of an ancient mask worn to protect oneself from harm.<br><br>Complete a mask to strengthen the shell and protect against damage.
original_zh_text: 这是他用来保护自己的面具。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;填充的面罩可以增强外壳并保护其免受损坏。

original_en_text: Flexible fibre from within a Hoker’s spine. Can be woven into garments and accessories by a skilled seamstress.
original_zh_text: 妓女脊柱中的柔性纤维。衣服和配饰可以由熟练的编织者编织。

original_en_text: Rotary key of the Architects. Opens their Chapel in the Underworks.
original_zh_text: 带有建筑钥匙的教堂将被改造成开放式地下室。

original_en_text: Simple protective garb, expertly woven but showing signs of age.
original_zh_text: 简单的防护服，针织精良，但有老化迹象。

original_en_text: Retracted Weaver surveillance instrument. Once assembled, the device will allow observation over vast distances.  <br><br>The Farsight can be assembled in a home.
original_zh_text: 手表组装并销售后，可以进行远程监控。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;您可以在家安装Farsight。

original_en_text: Scrawled missive on tattered black rag.<br><br>“Defiler... Dark... Attend... Home... Wheel...”
original_zh_text: 这封信写在一块黑布上。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;“我们摧毁他们。请在黑暗中加入这个论坛。两脚架（两脚架）

original_en_text: Beads carved from various materials, used as a measure of faith and traded as currency. Each is etched with a fine patterned design.
original_zh_text: 珍珠由各种材料雕刻而成，被用作信仰的衡量标准，可以换取金钱。

original_en_text: Enlivened heart of the Green Prince. Its beat is sharp and clear.
original_zh_text: 绿王子的内心充满了活力，他的笑话清晰易懂。

original_en_text: Vial gifted by the Chapel Maid, filled full with swirling soul.
original_zh_text: 教堂秘书给了他一壶旋转的灵魂。

original_en_text: Brittle levitating rock, found throughout the fringes of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 驾驶室末端有一个薄弱的活塞。

original_en_text: Black stone egg formed before the birth of Pharloom.<br><br>A relic from the ancient past. Highly prized by collectors of historical items.
original_zh_text: 黑色石头形成于法老出生之前。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;古代文物受到文化收藏家的高度重视。

original_en_text: Enlivened heart of Nyleth. It beats faint and fast.
original_zh_text: 这激活了尼尔斯的心脏，使他的脉搏微弱而急促。

original_en_text: Key to a restored bell above Bellhart.

original_zh_text: The Kitchen in Moss附近酒店

original_en_text: Finely crafted metal key, shaped to resemble a surgical implement.<br><br>Grants access to the Citadel’s Whiteward.
original_zh_text: 专门为手术目的设计的金属扳手。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;怀特伍德被允许进入城堡。

original_en_text: Contorted mass of ashen vine. Cries out incessantly.
original_zh_text: 灰葡萄弯曲了，他继续哭泣。

original_en_text: Carving of Atla, Weaver of time. A prayer is etched upon it.<br><br>“By grace of your example, and our history held full in mind, our song is yours, as your name is sacred. Weaver Atla, may you be praised eternal.”
original_zh_text: 亚特兰蒂斯的碎片，时间的结构这些话是写在祈祷中的。&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;我们的历史活在我们心中，他的名字是神圣的。看阿特拉，永远的赞美。"

original_en_text: Sermon of service, delivered by an ordained Vaultkeeper to acolytes in training.
original_zh_text: 向指定的残疾人培训员提供咨询意见

original_en_text: Long sewing tool, uniquely balanced for combat. The blade is marked by time and use.
original_zh_text: 长缝工具具有独特的平衡性，适合战斗。时间和目标刻在你的指甲上。

original_en_text: Sacred melody of the Vaultkeepers, coveted and claimed by the pontiff below the Whispering Vaults.
original_zh_text: 守护者的神圣旋律被召唤，教皇低声宣布。

original_en_text: Adornment strung with a large quantity of rosaries. Can be broken and the rosaries used to trade.
original_zh_text: 它是镶有许多珍珠的珍珠，可以破碎用于珍珠贸易。

original_en_text: Liquid lifeseed extracted from a ripe bud. Possesses regenerative qualities.
original_zh_text: 液体指甲是从成熟的树枝中提取的，这是一种繁殖品质。

original_en_text: Carved child’s toy of a bug clad in leaves.
original_zh_text: 孩子们切割玩具，蠕虫只会安装在叶子上。

original_en_text: Common weapon of Pharloom, still in good condition despite long use. An expertly crafted metal rod with a sharpened tip.
original_zh_text: 型号中的普通手枪虽然使用了很长时间，但状况良好。这根棍子由金属制成，末端锋利。

original_en_text: Last surgery of Conductor Mizello, performed in Whiteward’s operating theatre.
original_zh_text: Mi Zero做的最后一件事就是去惠特利的房间。

original_en_text: Fine thread spun from the soul of its creator. Highly coveted for its remarkable strength and mystical properties. Used to heal wounds, extend life and weave powerful runes.
original_zh_text: 物质是造物主灵魂的结构，因其非凡的力量和神秘的本质而受到高度赞扬。它用于治愈伤口、延长生命和编织强大的符文。

original_en_text: Map of Pharloom, partially filled out. Without a quill it cannot be updated.
original_zh_text: 弗拉门戈，部分填满。除非您有笔，否则您无法更新它。

original_en_text: A frustrating fiend. They flee beneath the bone whenever I try to strike them down.
original_zh_text: 每当我试图杀死它们时，它们就会躲在我的骨头下面。

original_en_text: Is this abundance a sign of purity or greed? The way faith is measured in this land is curious indeed.
original_zh_text: 这种财富只不过是纯洁或贪婪的象征。

original_en_text: Once they summoned song from their subjects. Now they rise only to command an end to those unstrung.
original_zh_text: 有一首歌是关于这个的。现在，他们正在为那些尚未完成的人服务。

original_en_text: Automatons of impeccable construction, welcoming entrants to their chamber with a display of deadly dance.
original_zh_text: 机器人的结构完美，你会被死亡之舞欢迎进入房间。

original_en_text: Mad matriarch of the Slab rarely seen outside her warren. From her all jailers are born and bred.
original_zh_text: 斯兰兹的疯狂女王在她的领地之外几乎看不见。所有囚犯都是土生土长的。

original_en_text: Flight it possesses, but only just. It may lift from the stone, but those sad wings would never carry it far.
original_zh_text: 他有飞行能力，但没有其他能力。它可以带着石头飞翔，但它悲伤的翅膀永远飞不远。

original_en_text: Mindless infant larva, coated in thick slime.
original_zh_text: 没有大脑的幼虫的身体通常覆盖着粘液。

original_en_text: Chief and chaplain of the Stilkin, forever raging against the Citadel that chokes their caves and sees them suffer.
original_zh_text: 斯特尔金的酋长和牧师对城堡感到愤怒，城堡仍然关闭洞穴并看着他们受苦。

original_en_text: An essential bug if one ever hoped to navigate that dark maze of stacks and scrolls.
original_zh_text: 如果你想在书和卷轴的黑暗迷宫中导航，这是一个不可避免的错误。

original_en_text: Child of Verdania, fully capable to fight despite its young age.
original_zh_text: 虽然Birdanha的孩子很小，但他们可以战斗。

original_en_text: Their thick shroud leaves them sightless, yet it seems to matter little. They have no care for their own safety, wishing only to charge at those they sense as sinful.
original_zh_text: 他们不担心自己的安全，他们只想责怪那些感到内疚的人。

original_en_text: Large, gelatinous drifter. Chases away threats by hurling its bulk around.
original_zh_text: 这是一种类似凝胶的漂移，会增加威胁的规模，从而减少威胁。

original_en_text: Aggressive fly of Pharloom’s lowlands. Rams prey with its hardbone mask.
original_zh_text: 帕拉姆平原的莫哈。他们戴着面具去打猎。

original_en_text: Blade maiden of a once renown warrior sect, survived long beyond the rest of her order.
original_zh_text: 臭名昭著的武士刀锋夫人的寿命比任何其他邪教都长。

original_en_text: Blindingly fast, winged warrior able to launch pointed pinions from its forelimbs.
original_zh_text: 锋利的羽毛从翅膀的前臂突出，使它们能够以令人难以置信的速度射击。

original_en_text: Leaping hunter of a bygone age. The swiftest of their sect, deftly skilled with spinning foreblades.
original_zh_text: 您营地中最有经验的士兵熟练地将剑向前转动。

original_en_text: They seek to slay their only chance at survival. Alas, any words would fall useless. I have only my blade to offer response.
original_zh_text: 他们寻求唯一的生存机会。天哪，什么都不会出错。

original_en_text: They call out to warn their fellows at the smallest sense of threat. A successful hunt here means staying silent and hidden right up until the decisive strike.
original_zh_text: 当您感到轻微威胁时，请通知您的伴侣。在这里，成功的狩猎意味着保持沉默，直到决定性的打击到来。

original_en_text: Though the Weavers have long passed from Pharloom, this servant still performs its function.
original_zh_text: 法老失去了衣服，但他的仆人履行了职责。

original_en_text: Hard-shelled bug with a climber’s pin. Their pin, once aid, has become a weapon, though the bug is unrefined in its use.
original_zh_text: 长着锋利针头的蜥蜴曾经是一种帮助，现在它们是一种武器，但虐待并不完美。

original_en_text: Huge ant hunter tasked to protect the stores and passages of its tribe.
original_zh_text: 巨型蚂蚁猎人的任务是保卫部落的商店和走廊。

original_en_text: Staunch and skilled bladebug of a once flourishing land lost to time.
original_zh_text: 在这个曾经繁荣的国家，随着时间的推移，有权势、经验丰富的妓女已经消失。

original_en_text: Aged pilgrim, overgrown with lichen and moss.
original_zh_text: 古代的朝圣者身上长满了苔藓和苔藓。

original_en_text: There is no finesse in its use of Silk. It consumes its slim supply only to amplify its force.
original_zh_text: 我们不使用丝绸技术！吃少量食物来增强体力。

original_en_text: Steel horned floater, able to defend itself and its companions.
original_zh_text: 钢制胶囊保护您和您的卫星。

original_en_text: Tormented will of countless husks made manifest in a pit of Silk dregs.
original_zh_text: 废墟中出现了许多不稳定的炮弹。

original_en_text: That they ever hoped to keep their domain clean... What futility.
original_zh_text: 保持这个地方干净是浪费时间。

original_en_text: I would very much like to feel their soft fur, if only they weren’t so hostile.
original_zh_text: 如果你没有敌意，你真的想感觉柔软。

original_en_text: This kingdom appears more advanced in metalwork than my own ever was, in great part due to the natural heat source at its base. Working in such an environment is an impressive feat.
original_zh_text: 这个自然区域似乎更像冶金而不是采矿，但这主要是由于底部的热源。

original_en_text: Aerial worker lost to Pharloom’s Haunting. Bears a pouch full with flintstone which they will fling at intruders.
original_zh_text: 这名乘客因佩林的痛苦而死亡。熊捡起一个装满石头的袋子，扔给袭击者。

original_en_text: Haughty thespian convinced that only dazzling performance can raise Pharloom from the throes of death.
original_zh_text: 这位伟大的演员相信，只有戏剧喜剧才能将法罗从死亡的痛苦中拯救出来。

original_en_text: Hard-shelled insect common upon the surface of Shellwood Pond. Once a staple food for passing pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 一种常见的硬壳昆虫，栖息在贝壳状池塘的表面，是朝圣者的主食。

original_en_text: Old knight consumed by black thread.
original_zh_text: 男人被一条黑线吸引住了。

original_en_text: I would not have guessed so large and marvelous a flea existed. I am pleased it saw sense before I had to strike a killing blow.
original_zh_text: 没有跳蚤大到足以让你高兴地看到真相。

original_en_text: A terrifying achievement of Pharloom, to build a construct so large and yet so nimble.
original_zh_text: 对于法罗来说，建造如此大且灵活的建筑是一项伟大的成就。

original_en_text: Their rough, ridged shell grips tight to any surface. Even walls and roofs become pathways for these nimble bugs.
original_zh_text: 始终牢固地粘附在带有扩张外壳的任何表面上。墙壁和天花板也可以作为这些狡猾昆虫的跳板。

original_en_text: Nature distorted... This bug was born tiny and mild. The Citadel deformed it in futile hope it may sustain.
original_zh_text: 细菌非常小，自然是友好的。城堡扭曲了他，希望他继续。

original_en_text: They would make effective hunting companions, though even without the Haunting I suspect their loyalty would always remain to their clan.
original_zh_text: 他们是高效的猎人，但即使没有鬼魂，他们对部落的忠诚也不会永远持续下去。

original_en_text: Shell plated worm that lives beneath pools of shifting sand.
original_zh_text: 昆虫生活在柔软的沙湖中。

original_en_text: Large male Driznit, ferocious and territorial. Fires its heavy coral mask at intruders.
original_zh_text: Deznit大型雌性拥有强壮而尖锐的轮廓。戴着沉重的珊瑚面具射杀入侵者。

original_en_text: With its wranglers long dead, the Moorwing stalked the towers of Greymoor, feasting on passing pilgrims and tenders alike.
original_zh_text: 当警卫死后，沼泽的翅膀飞到格雷莫尔塔的顶部，为路过的朝圣者和骑士提供食物。

original_en_text: Hiding its tongue amongst fronds so similar... There is impressive style to this one’s trickery.
original_zh_text: 用这张床单遮住你的舌头。这个男人的风格非常令人印象深刻。

original_en_text: Scissor-wielding bug charged to cut and spool fallen dregs of Silk for return to the Citadel above.
original_zh_text: 昆虫摇动织物，切下掉落的丝绸部分，将其取出，然后将其放回锁顶部。

original_en_text: What seems at first a purely defensive mechanism may also be necessary to rid this creature of excess heat.
original_zh_text: 还需要一个干净的外部保护机制来消除这种过度的生物恐怖主义。

original_en_text: For his stern stewardship his legions seemed utterly loyal. For less combative bugs his would have been a hard rule.
original_zh_text: 由于他的严格控制，他的军队似乎完全忠诚，而且他们的规则对最具攻击性的细菌也很严格。

original_en_text: Remains of a Citadel bug possessed by Silk dregs. The husk will lash out wildly with the many sharp pins caught inside its thread.
original_zh_text: 甲虫的残骸和子弹的丝线残骸会猛烈燃烧，许多锋利的针会穿过丝线。

original_en_text: Altered servant of the Citadel’s Whiteward, responsible for the cremation of husks and the recycling of Silk from their shells.
original_zh_text: 怀特伍德城堡的仆人焚烧贝壳并回收丝绸。

original_en_text: Short elder crawbug eagerly serving in their court.
original_zh_text: 老螃蟹在法庭上努力工作。

original_en_text: Theirs is the perfect shell for their duty, a wall of a warrior and an adept fighter. If I hope to claim their treasures, I must bring my best.
original_zh_text: 他们的盾牌是完成任务的完美外壳，也是熟练士兵和士兵的高墙。如果你想拥有你的财富，你必须尽力而为。" "

original_en_text: Their bells would once have rung with hope and mirth, lifting the spirits of any climbing companions. Sadly, those instruments have turned purely to combative use.
original_zh_text: 仆人们已经充满了希望和喜悦，这增强了登山者的精神。不幸的是，这个工具仅用于战斗。

original_en_text: The way they skate along the water’s surface is so elegant. Surely it is a skill that can be learned? When time permits, I should attempt the task.
original_zh_text: 水上滑冰很有趣，这是一项需要学习的技能，不是吗？实际上？如果我有时间，我会这样做。

original_en_text: A creature long familiar to me. I suspect that no matter how far I travel, if I descend deep enough they will always be there.
original_zh_text: 无论你走多远，它都会永远存在。

original_en_text: When defeated, it splits into many smaller forms. Yet another remarkable creature of this land before the monarch.
original_zh_text: 当它被击败时，它会分解成许多更小的形式。在君主之前，这片土地是另一种不同寻常的生物。

original_en_text: Winged insect with a flaky shell that perfectly mimics its environment.
original_zh_text: 这些昆虫的外壳完全模仿环境。

original_en_text: Unnaturally overgrown Mossgrub, bred within the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 城堡的纪念碑上覆盖着不自然的泡沫。

original_en_text: While these bothersome bugs are left free to forage, no loose rosary or trinket is safe.
original_zh_text: 这些讨厌的昆虫可以自由吃食物，但没有玫瑰和免费装饰品也是安全的。

original_en_text: Younger form of a Muckroach. Attacks prey by leaping from the water and snapping with its flexible jaws.
original_zh_text: 它们跳出水面，攻击猎物，将下巴弯曲成柔软的下巴。

original_en_text: Elite former hunter acting as the final line of defence before their mother.
original_zh_text: 这位前猎人是抵御母亲的最后一道防线

original_en_text: All are haunted here, the jailers and the jailed. Do they realise they will never leave this place? Or how long they have stayed already?
original_zh_text: 你知道所有囚犯和看守都不会离开这个地狱吗？你来这里多久了？

original_en_text: Such feeble creatures could only survive thanks to the rarity of predators in these super-heated caverns.
original_zh_text: 这种脆弱的生物可以在非常高的温度下生存，因为这些洞穴中几乎没有捕食者。

original_en_text: Fully grown mollusc able to unleash a gushing torrent of burning fluid from its back.
original_zh_text: 成熟的海鸥从背上吐出热液体。

original_en_text: By this swooping menace, a simple bug could be easily overcome. More dangerous still, they rarely attack alone.
original_zh_text: 有了这种身临其境的威胁，简单的错误就可以轻松克服。更危险的是，它们几乎不发动攻击。

original_en_text: A common enough bug, though not to be underestimated. The acuteness of their other senses more than makes up for their lack of vision.
original_zh_text: 虽然这是一个非常常见的错误，但也不应低估。其他感官的敏锐足以弥补视力的不足。

original_en_text: Darting predator that clings fast to roofs and outcrops, often summoned to aid its larger companions.
original_zh_text: 快速的掠食者紧贴屋顶和突出物，经常向体型较大的同伴寻求帮助。

original_en_text: Is it the Haunting that drove them to cackling madness, or was their unending toil the cause even before that?
original_zh_text: 鬼魂会让他们发疯吗？还是这就是他们无休止地工作的原因？

original_en_text: Short, nimble bug who uses barbed bolas to keep beasts corralled and caged.
original_zh_text: 一种狡猾的小昆虫，可以用短嘴将野生动物关在笼子里

original_en_text: Despite their youth, they are impressive opponents. It seems likely their tribe were trained for combat from birth.
original_zh_text: 尽管他很年轻，但他是一个非常强大的敌人，显然他的部落从他出生的那一刻起就接受了战斗训练。

original_en_text: Disciple of the Whispering Vaults, tasked to navigate its dim recesses to retrieve old scrolls.
original_zh_text: 男爵低声对财务主管说，他的任务是在黑暗深处找到古老的轮子。

original_en_text: This one’s strength was much enhanced by stolen soul. They are not the first who tried to hoard it, or to mould it towards such violent ends.
original_zh_text: 被窃取的灵魂大大增强了这个人的力量。他们并不是第一个积累它们或试图将它们推向如此暴力目标的人。

original_en_text: With all the refuse collapsing throughout their domain, the worker’s stiff shell would be essential if they held any hope to survive.
original_zh_text: 由于该地区所有垃圾都在倒塌，工人的水槽对他们的生存至关重要。

original_en_text: Civilisation encroaches from this kingdom’s crown, but the lowlands are still ruled by great beasts. Its roar stirs something deep within me, some primal instinct.
original_zh_text: 文明已经入侵了王国的王冠，但动物仍然占主导地位，这杯朗姆酒唤起了我的一些原始本能。

original_en_text: The poor creature has lived a life too calm and coddled. It would not fare well in the world beyond its walls.
original_zh_text: 这个小动物过着安静舒适的生活。

original_en_text: Lithe, winged scouts frequently paired with their heavier brethren.
original_zh_text: 轻型侦察机通常与全副武装的侦察机配合使用。

original_en_text: Their throwing weapon is well-suited to the wide caverns they inhabit. These sly little bugs must have a keen claw for crafting.
original_zh_text: 他们的武器非常适合他们居住的巨大洞穴。这种狡猾的小昆虫需要锋利的爪子。

original_en_text: Toughened Kai capable of extending sharp spikes from within its shellsack.
original_zh_text: K. K.斯特朗可以从口袋里塞进头盔里。

original_en_text: An impressive act of mimicry. To match so closely with its land, their clover caves must have sustained through generations uncounted.
original_zh_text: 为了适应地球，他们的三叶洞穴已经存在了几代。

original_en_text: This bug is soft and clumsy, but to its fortune its home caves seem relatively free of effective predators. I wonder why that is.
original_zh_text: 这些昆虫又甜又傻，但幸运的是洞穴里没有有效的捕食者。

original_en_text: Towering iron automaton, driven by rotor and cog.
original_zh_text: 由车轮和旋转齿轮驱动的高速自动铁路车辆。

original_en_text: Small bug that crafts a shell of sharpened coral. Spins its shell at rapid speed to cut through crust and bone.
original_zh_text: 小昆虫可以由锋利的珊瑚壳制成。旋转外壳以分离外壳和骨头。

original_en_text: Plump, plentiful drifter of a coral past.
original_zh_text: 这里曾经有一个巨大的珊瑚礁和很多漂流。

original_en_text: Far tougher for being matched inside their encrusted domain. They must have lived their whole lives within their tower, to command it so.
Tall bug charged to pile Silk dregs in preparation for respooling. Their sharp rake now doubles equally well as a stabbing weapon.
original_zh_text: 大型昆虫积累丝绸废料，准备处理。锋利的手可以用作刀。
被特罗维尔折磨的人们

original_en_text: Few creatures of that Silk stricken place would find nourishment enough to grow so large.
original_zh_text: 在丝绸泛滥的地区，很少有生物能够找到足够的营养来生长到如此大小。

original_en_text: Anguished spectre of lingering thread. Despite its ephemeral nature, strong strikes can dispel the Wraith for a time.
original_zh_text: 鬼魂的生命虽然天生短暂，但一击就可以暂时驱除。

original_en_text: A tragic fate for a once honourable bug. Those void soaked threads... Their physical might is nothing compared to the corruption they wreak upon a soul.
original_zh_text: 与埋在真空中的电线的灵魂侵蚀相比，他们的体力根本算不上什么。

original_en_text: The coldshard, even when destroyed it remembers its former shape. A remarkable material, and perhaps even more astonishing there seems life contained within it.
original_zh_text: 当冰破裂时，它仍然记得它原来的形状。这是一种罕见的物质，也许更令人惊讶的是，它似乎含有生命。

original_en_text: The talent and intelligence of this construct goes far beyond others I have witnessed. They seem less built as a tool to serve than an attempt at life itself.
original_zh_text: 这种结构的天赋和智慧远远超出了我见过的任何其他结构，而且它似乎更受生活的诱惑，而不是服务工具的诱惑。

original_en_text: In entering their domain, I freed these bugs to infest the greater vaults. They are a nuisance, and I have only myself to blame.
original_zh_text: 入侵他们的领土后，我用这种昆虫感染了我的大乳房。

original_en_text: Winged mite-beast, bred large to catch workers who once tried to flee their tasks.
original_zh_text: 许多动物被饲养是为了捕捉逃离工作的工人。

original_en_text: The way it darts in and out of the ground has an almost playful quality to it. An amusing and effective way to ambush prey.
original_zh_text: 进入和离开地下室是一种有趣的感觉，是一种有趣且有效的观察矿井的方式。

original_en_text: Floral foe with a core shaped to mimic a mask. The core can be thrust forth to bludgeon unwary bugs.
original_zh_text: 模仿面具的形状。你的思想可能会将一个鲁莽的错误强加给你。

original_en_text: The servitor has been heavily damaged by time and the elements. Its actions have grown erratic. It seems no longer able to discern friend from foe.
original_zh_text: 他们的行动变得不稳定，敌人和盟友之间不再有区别。

original_en_text: A unique mask and impressive form. Now just another near forgotten specimen of this land before the monarch.
original_zh_text: 他是这个国家被遗忘的冠军。

original_en_text: These bugs work mainly as finders and foragers for the warriors of their tribe. Combat has not long been their nature.
original_zh_text: 这些昆虫主要被部落士兵用作猎人和掠食者。

original_en_text: Pharloom shall quickly learn the curse of this substance. What benefits it provides can be swiftly outweighed.
original_zh_text: 最终，凶手意识到了这种物质的诅咒。他们提供的好处很快就会得到回报。

original_en_text: Puppet servant of the Citadel, suspended on strings of Silk. An early form of automaton, requiring extensive Silk to maintain its service.
original_zh_text: 这个人的娃娃挂在丝绸上。第一台机器需要大量的丝绸来维护。

original_en_text: Eternal defender of Shellwood Shrine. His pin and cymbal show many marks of their use.
original_zh_text: 松树和松树是谢泼德先生永恒的守护者，有多种用途。

original_en_text: It is no wonder these constructs were cast. No mortal bug would last long inside that scorching place. Even my shell struggles to withstand its heat.
original_zh_text: 毫不奇怪，宫殿仍在建设中。昆虫在如此炎热的气候下无法生存很长时间。皮肤无法忍受高温。

original_en_text: Fabled first Cloverstag of Verdania’s wilds. Commands the grass and leaves to aid its attack.
original_zh_text: 第一个传奇与耀眼的三叶草沙漠有关。我祈祷草和树叶帮助我进攻。

original_en_text: Disciple of the Choir, charged to maintain its perfect order, by sharp pin if necessary.
original_zh_text: 喇叭按钮负责维持完美的秩序，如果需要，可以使用锋利的剃须刀。

original_en_text: When they do not hinder my path, I find their simple motion rather pleasant.
original_zh_text: 散步时享受简单的锻炼。

original_en_text: Holds an extensive supply of searing acid in a layered sack within its shell. The acid rains from its mouth upon any creature it sees as food.
original_zh_text: 贝壳的涂层含有大量的皮肤酸。从你嘴里喷出的酸雨落在所有你认为是食物的生物身上。

original_en_text: Heavy, hard-shelled worker, forever repairing the Citadel’s crumbling Underworks.
original_zh_text: 重工业工人正在修复永久摧毁城堡的地下工程。

original_en_text: It has no means to defend itself. Its only hope for survival is to be mistaken for a plant.
original_zh_text: 他无法保护自己，唯一的生存希望就是用植物取代他。

original_en_text: This one has allied themself with me, either as thanks for their saving or respect for one judged as equal. Whichever the reason, their fellowship is welcome.
original_zh_text: 这个人和我在一起感谢他的救赎，或者尊重那些被认为平等的人。

original_en_text: Bugs like these crossed the caves to bring me to Pharloom. I cut down many before my capture. Then I had thought them minded and cunning. Now I can see the singular will that haunts them all.
original_zh_text: 蠕虫在雨中穿过洞穴，直到我被抓住。他们认为自己又快又聪明。现在我看到了一个让他们惊讶的愿望。

original_en_text: Its sticky spit would no doubt make a useful crafting material if moulded fresh. Unfortunately, I cannot stop to experiment.
original_zh_text: 如果是最近形成的，那么浓稠的唾液无疑是该过程中有用的材料。不幸的是，我们无法阻止这种经历。

original_en_text: The smell from these jailers overwhelms my senses. I strongly doubt they have ever thought to bathe.
original_zh_text: 警卫的气味让我失去了知觉，不想游泳。

original_en_text: A creature at its most basic. This one is no threat to me, or any other.
original_zh_text: 这是最基本的制度之一，不会对我或其他任何人构成威胁。

original_en_text: Aged former pilgrim. Uses their wings to position above threats and crush them under their large shell.
original_zh_text: 用你的翅膀将它们置于威胁之下，然后将它们压在大壳下。

original_en_text: A bug once frail, pushed by twisted thread beyond its mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 在扭曲线的帮助下，脆弱的昆虫将它们推向了极限。

original_en_text: The threat of its exploding rear is an effective deterrent to predators, but the slightest jolt or fall can cause its premature end.
original_zh_text: 尾部爆炸的威胁可以有效地阻止掠食者，但即使是小碰撞或坠落也可能很快结束。

original_en_text: To live only a single, bright moment... What would one feel? Is it glorious, or only despair? Or could it be both, mixed equal?
original_zh_text: 生活在最光明的时刻是荣耀还是绝望？你能将两者结合起来吗？

original_en_text: Though their mind is largely lost their skill with a chain has not been forgotten. Does the Haunting eternally bind a bug to the task it had in life?
original_zh_text: 虽然他们的灵魂几乎消失了，但他们使用锁链的能力并没有被遗忘。你能把这个错误变成一生的工作吗？

original_en_text: Angered, adult Beastfly with a weighty body and a thickened hardshell mask.
original_zh_text: 一个邪恶的成年人戴着一个巨大的厚厚的面具爬上了天空。

original_en_text: Young, bony bug that can curl its body to form a ball.
original_zh_text: 年轻的骨甲虫可以将身体圆成球体。

original_en_text: So close to a perfect furred form... If only they’d been able to breed out the spines.
original_zh_text: 接近完美的皮肤形状。如果荆棘可以生长，

original_en_text: Bulky worm of the deepest depths. Lives in tight crevices and uses its weighty body to batter.
original_zh_text: 最大的就是生活在狭窄的空间里，面对沉重的身体。

original_en_text: Crazed fanatic able to guide Pharloom’s haunted Silk by music played upon it.
original_zh_text: 粉丝们可以通过播放音乐来控制老鹰的丝绸幽灵。

original_en_text: There is old anguish bound upon these threads, the result of countless cruel procedures.
original_zh_text: 这些线索与古代的苦难有关，是无数残酷程序的结果。

original_en_text: Rare, enormous Skull Scuttler. The Marrow’s largest predator, and the most feared for its ferocious temperament.
original_zh_text: 骨髓中最大的掠食者也是最危险的，因为其本性凶猛。

original_en_text: Full-grown former pilgrim serving the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 一个在城堡里长大的男人。

original_en_text: Lord and justice of Pharloom’s craws. Delivers death to condemned bugs with his steel-plated beak.
original_zh_text: 贪婪正义之王法老借助铁口杀死了邪恶的昆虫。

original_en_text: Rarely seen beetle that spends most of its life nestled deep in bone and rock. The Flintgems on its shell excrete an explosive powder.
original_zh_text: 这种不寻常的甲虫大部分时间都在骨头和石头深处度过，而克里姆林宫外壳中的宝石则释放出爆炸性尘埃。

original_en_text: Disgusting both in manner and stench. I feel no remorse to see them felled.
original_zh_text: 我不喜欢它的味道和形状，也不后悔失去它。

original_en_text: Pharloom proves often the effectiveness of bells as weapons. Never before had I considered them as such.
original_zh_text: 法罗一再证明物种作为武器的有效性，但他从未想过这一点。

original_en_text: Enormous tubular beast uniquely suited to living close to the void below.
original_zh_text: 这种巨大的管状野兽非常适合生活在下面的洞穴附近。

original_en_text: Old pilgrim carrying a heavy iron bell staff.
original_zh_text: 老朝圣者手里拿着一根沉重的铁棍。

original_en_text: If left to grow, these young bugs will fight for dominance until only one remains.
original_zh_text: 当年幼的昆虫被迫生长时，它们会争夺优势，直到只剩下一个。

original_en_text: Living Silk commanding a dead shell... An affront to nature, and one all too common across Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 用活绳订购死贝壳是对自然的侮辱，这种情况在法雷姆地区也很常见。

original_en_text: Coiled nest of charged worms. Assaults intruders with bolts of crackling electricity.
original_zh_text: 携带行李的蛇形昆虫巢穴。他们使用爆炸性闪电攻击。

original_en_text: High caste bug, responsible for delivering sermons and leading prayer for those beyond the walls of the Whispering Vaults.
original_zh_text: 上流社会的蠕虫负责说教和引导那些在低语之墙之外的人的祈祷。

original_en_text: Did he recognise my part played in this land’s void-strung state? If so, perhaps his judgment was not unfair. To these bugs I have brought much destruction.
original_zh_text: 你知道我在这个领域扮演什么角色吗？如果是这样，那么你的判断就错误了。

original_en_text: That incendiary material they carry is a natural wonder, with many potential applications. What a waste to carelessly throw it at me whenever I pass by.
original_zh_text: 温暖的材料是一种自然奇观，有多种可能性。每次发生这样的事情，你不小心把我扔进去是没有意义的。

original_en_text: Not a frontline force, but in my assault upon their tower all emerge to see me stilled.
original_zh_text: 这不是一支前线军队，但当我攻击他们的塔楼时，每个人都出现了，看到我冷静下来。

original_en_text: A cowardly sort. They will try to remain at range to throw their sharp weapons. Best to rush them down and cut quick.
original_zh_text: 这是一种懦弱。他们试图在十字路口停下来并投掷锋利的武器。最好立即切断它。

original_en_text: Wide-masked aerial attacker trained to act as support for its grounded companions while remaining at range.
original_zh_text: 戴口罩的飞行员接受了通过帮助地面同事来保持自主性的培训。

original_en_text: Most likely this one’s true charge was to root out and condemn those not seen as sufficiently fervent.
original_zh_text: 也许这个人的真正责任是根除和谴责那些看似不活跃的人。

original_en_text: Old catcher over Shellwood Pond, bearing a longpin and stricken by the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 老接球手在舍伍德的池塘里遭到鬼魂的袭击，鬼魂手里拿着一根长针。

original_en_text: Grizzled older roach tender weighted with a lasso of heavy chain.
original_zh_text: 毛茸茸的蟑螂被绑在一根沉重的链子上。

original_en_text: These ones somehow learnt to call and guide the scorching Wisps that share their thicket. Whether through dominance or reverence is unclear.
original_zh_text: 这些生物学会了召唤和引导生活在丛林中的精灵。

original_en_text: He carelessly seeded these caves with that cursed substance... His final fate seems fair reward for those efforts, yet I feel some sympathy. It is an alluring power.
original_zh_text: 他的最终命运似乎是对这些努力的公正回报，但我仍然同情他。
剧透是一个软壳，由Coral签名。

original_en_text: To pair with another is a base instinct, and one that brings some bugs great joy. I once sought similar union, but of my own mates none could match my lifespan.
original_zh_text: 与他人交配是一种基本本能，也能给昆虫带来巨大的乐趣。我以前也寻求过这样的联盟，但我没有一个能与我的生活相匹配的伴侣。

original_en_text: Song queen of the Skarr and their most talented warrior.
original_zh_text: 歌手Skelin和他最有才华的拳击手。

original_en_text: For one to love another so similar to themselves, is that selfless or vain?
original_zh_text: 爱像你这样的人是自私还是虚荣？

original_en_text: A crude construct of my father’s fallen domain. Only a fool believes that void can be fashioned to do their bidding.
original_zh_text: 只有傻瓜才能在自己的指挥下制造真空。

original_en_text: Short-horned bug born with underdeveloped wings.
original_zh_text: 短角昆虫基本上有不完整的翅膀。

original_en_text: Common bug wielding a set of old bells. The bug will fling the bells at anyone it deems still free.
original_zh_text: 一只普通的昆虫会敲响古老的钟声。这个错误是对那些仍然相信自己自由的人的警告。

original_en_text: Born with many tools I would once have desired for myself. Fortunately, I have trained hard around those limits.
original_zh_text: 我生来就拥有必要的工具，幸运的是我在这些限制内工作。

original_en_text: More bother than the bug themself are the countless traps they have already laid throughout their caves.
original_zh_text: 比昆虫本身更令人困惑的是洞穴中的许多陷阱。

original_en_text: The lethality of these bugs is unexpected. Their bodies were never built for combat. The Haunting has altered their nature dramatically.
original_zh_text: 细菌的死亡率是出乎意料的，而且它们的身体并不是为了战斗而设计的。

original_en_text: Docile bug whose wings mimic the grasses of the Far Fields. A common snack for larger predators.
original_zh_text: 柔软的昆虫和翅膀模仿田野里的草。它们以大型食肉动物为食

original_en_text: Exhausted bug, grown sickly from the smog of the Underworks. The worker’s twistpins, once tools of repair, now serve as spun projectiles.
original_zh_text: 地下烟雾侵扰着无助的昆虫。工人的扭转销曾经被用作维修工具，现在被用作旋转球。

original_en_text: Humbled prisoner serving their sentence for sin committed within the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 这位卑微的囚犯因所犯下的罪行在他的城市失踪。

original_en_text: Ancient heart of Shellwood, connected to all its living things.
original_zh_text: 影木的灵魂与万物相连。

original_en_text: Guide and ofttimes leader within the Citadel’s Choir.
original_zh_text: 他是城堡合唱团的总经理和总经理。

original_en_text: Poor of sight but possessing a keen sense of smell, it uses its bulk to charge at foreign scents. Remaining fierce so far into old age is an admirable trait.
original_zh_text: 它们的视力很差，但对气味非常敏感，并利用它们的体积来吸收奇怪的气味。

original_en_text: Crawling insect with a sizzling bile sack in its abdomen.
original_zh_text: 烧伤、西斯塔菲拉、胃部喉咙窒息

original_en_text: If given a chance, this one will steal Silk from any significant source, including my own shell.
original_zh_text: 如果幸运的话，这个人会从重要来源偷丝绸，包括我的贝壳。

original_en_text: Mindless sack filled with Plasmium. When broken the Plasmium can be consumed for its temporary benefits to health.
original_zh_text: 没有大脑的人充满了血。一旦血浆分解，您就可以食用它，因为它对健康有暂时的好处。

original_en_text: More effective an opponent than would be guessed. The precarity of its winding domain can make even its simple assault a challenge.
original_zh_text: 敌人比你想象的更有效率。伤口磁场的不稳定性使得简单的攻击变得困难。

original_en_text: Elder Conchfly crowned with a huge coral horn. Once partnered with a mate, they will rarely be seen alone.
original_zh_text: 一个古老的贝壳的头部有一个巨大的珊瑚角。当我和我的伴侣一起工作时，我并不感到孤独。

original_en_text: Drained yet dedicated labourer, wielding a coarse steel brush.
original_zh_text: 他是一位勤奋的工人，手里拿着一支沉重的笔。

original_en_text: Fierce, strong and disciplined... yet these qualities do not protect them from the Haunting. Is such a fate inevitable in these lands?
original_zh_text: 他们坚强、坚强、有纪律，但这些品质并不能保护他们免受问题的影响。

original_en_text: A form well suited for combat, lithe and fast. No surprise it seems to rank so high amongst its cult.
original_zh_text: 最适合战斗，轻，快速的形式。毫不奇怪，他们在邪教中占据着很高的地位。

original_en_text: Winged ant hunter that strikes from the air with its bone lance.
original_zh_text: 战斗机用空中加农炮攻击蚂蚁。

original_en_text: In my home caves, when once this substance was allowed to flourish, I saw similar aberrations. This is wonder tainted strong with revulsion.
original_zh_text: 在我的洞穴里，当物质繁荣时，我们观察到类似的扭曲。

original_en_text: Furred bug beneath a heavy bell. It has grown too large to burrow, but in maturing has developed small wings.
original_zh_text: 它们太大了，无法进入洞穴，但当它们成熟时，它们会长出小翅膀。

original_en_text: Aerial bug of the Citadel, unarmed but for its short horn.
Adult Mossmir with a fully developed stinger and hardened hide.
Motherhood is an instinct that can push creatures beyond what seems their natural limits. It turns even weaker beasts like these into formidable foes.
original_zh_text: 母性是一种本能，它将身体推向看似自然的极限，将软弱的动物变成强大的敌人。

original_en_text: The remains of an aged bug were housed at the pyre’s heart. The structure suggested they wished for immolation. If so, I have seen their wish granted.
original_zh_text: 在一堆树中间，有一具古老昆虫的尸体。他想烧死她，如果是这样，你会发现你的愿望已经实现了。

original_en_text: Skilled ant hunter bearing blade and armour fashioned from bone.
original_zh_text: 熟练的蚂蚁猎人使用刀和骨甲。

original_en_text: To survive while storing so much searing fluid within... Before I would have believed it impossible, but Pharloom is home to many marvels.
original_zh_text: 它们在体内积聚大量的热液体以生存。殖民时期的房屋曾经被认为是不可能的，但现在却是许多奇迹的诞生地。

original_en_text: Choir commander of the High Halls, able to summon and command cogflies at a flick of their baton.
original_zh_text: 在上层大厅，合唱团队长可以举起一个光球并指挥它。

original_en_text: Masked coral drifter, grown larger than its more numerous companions.
original_zh_text: 珊瑚的面具比它的许多卫星都高。

original_en_text: Many-legged insect fanatically obsessed with flame.
Curiosity saw me answer their summons, but I shall not allow them to stall me long. I must work fast to fix my grand mistake.
original_zh_text: 有趣的是，我接到了电话，但我不能让你等太久。我必须尽快纠正我所犯的错误。

original_en_text: A revolting creature. My shell itches at their presence. In the pens where their numbers grow vast, I am forever on edge.
original_zh_text: 他是一个邪恶的生物，在不断增长的围栏里总是紧张不安。

original_en_text: Dancing around this simple creature as it charges back and forth is the sort of game I delighted in as a child. Alas, I now have more pressing matters to attend to.
original_zh_text: 当这个简单的生物奔跑时，跳舞是我小时候最喜欢的游戏。"

original_en_text: Theirs seems a sad, grueling task, serving their lifetime for a Citadel unseen.
original_zh_text: 他们似乎是一个悲伤而复杂的职业，曾经是一座无形的城堡。

original_en_text: Airborne relative of the grounded Skull Scuttler, found only in the Marrow’s deepest, hottest caves.
original_zh_text: 它是密闭石棉的近亲，只能在骨髓中最深、最热的洞穴中找到。

original_en_text: Theirs would be a high risk life, followed by a short, searing end.
original_zh_text: 他们的生命处于危险之中，他们将有一个短暂的燃烧结局。

original_en_text: Placid native of Verdania. Its hide closely mimics the flora of its territory.
original_zh_text: 普拉西德出生于维达尼亚。模仿当地植物的外皮。

original_en_text: They remorselessly eliminate any pilgrim or passerby deemed impure to their sight. The countless husks, strewn on paths beside them, tell of their conclusive decisions.
original_zh_text: 他们会毫不犹豫地排除不干净的朝圣者和行人。附近街道上散落的许多子弹让他知道了自己的决定。

original_en_text: Weak, afraid, and aware of the imminent end. I understand their desperation, but my death will not prevent the coming fall.
original_zh_text: 我理解他们的绝望，但我的死亡不会在明年秋天停止。

original_en_text: An inspired use of steam. I must remember its construction when designing future tools.
original_zh_text: 我们鼓励双胞胎。当我们设计未来的工具时，我们必须考虑它们的结构。

original_en_text: They know well their domain, lurking in wait in its byways and bogs, always ready to pounce.
original_zh_text: 他们非常了解自己的领土，并守卫街道和沼泽，为袭击做好准备。

original_en_text: Husk of an alchemist’s assistant granted false life by Plasmium.
original_zh_text: 在炼金术士助手的壳内，他从等离子体中获得了虚假的生命。

original_en_text: The false mask alone is frightening enough to scare away smaller pests.
original_zh_text: 口罩本身可以防止小寄生虫的感染。

original_en_text: In its natural state it would avoid potential predators, but Pharloom’s Haunting now compels it to aggression. Fortunately, its jaws are ill-suited for combat.
original_zh_text: 在自然界中，它们会避开潜在的捕食者，但当涉及到捕食者时，它们会变得更具攻击性。

original_en_text: Returned to their home caves, this chef continued to devise delicacies too repulsive for any bug still sane.
original_zh_text: 回到原来的洞穴，面包师继续烹饪美味的菜肴，以至于昆虫总是注意到它。

original_en_text: Hardened warrior lord of a bygone age, able to command the coral crust to his bidding.
original_zh_text: 曾几何时，一位强大的军事指挥官可以执行命令并指挥珊瑚礁。

original_en_text: There seem no ranks in their domain, yet this one has risen above the rest. A station likely gained through intimidation and thuggery.
original_zh_text: 虽然他们在自己的领域似乎没有什么名气，但他们的名气比别人好。

original_en_text: Manic fencer who delights in battle.
original_zh_text: 他是一个喜欢战斗的人。

original_en_text: Sightless burrower that reacts violently to the slightest sound.
original_zh_text: 盲人洞穴人对小噪音反应强烈。

original_en_text: Monarch of Pharloom, and the primal source of Silk.
These bugs have been driven out of their vault’s recesses by Pharloom’s black collapse. They are a nuisance, and I have only myself to blame.
original_zh_text: 农场的黑色碎片将昆虫从胸部后部赶走。这就是问题所在，我为此责怪自己。

original_en_text: Flying bone mite that lives near magma. Roasts its prey by spitting scorching tar.
original_zh_text: 骨螨虫生活在岩浆附近。吐出热树脂并烧焦食物。

original_en_text: Plentiful pest with a sharp proboscis and a belly full of bile.
original_zh_text: 寄生虫很多，鼻子尖，胃里充满了胆汁。

original_en_text: Small arachnid found in many crevices and caves throughout Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 在法鲁山谷和许多洞穴中都发现了小蜘蛛。

original_en_text: Large worm mutated heavily by Plasmium. The creature has become fused to the roof of its cave, no longer able to move freely.
original_zh_text: 寄生虫的类型因寄生虫而异。生物体在洞穴顶部融化，不再能够自由移动。

original_en_text: Its training resembles my own, favouring fast strikes and rapid movement. Once a hunter, perhaps?
original_zh_text: 就像我的训练一样。我喜欢射击快，动作快。

original_en_text: What exceptional senses it possesses. It detects me with ease, even when not a single sound is made.
original_zh_text: 多么美妙的感觉啊。您可以很容易地找到它，没有噪音。

original_en_text: Young masked worm that delights in ambushing intruders within its tunnels.
original_zh_text: 年轻的蒙面昆虫喜欢在隧道里培育坏人。

original_en_text: Small automaton built to work, without complaint, in the scorching heat of the Underworks’ Cauldron.
original_zh_text: 小型自动驾驶机器的设计即使在冰箱的高温下也可以毫无抱怨地运行。

original_en_text: Elder overseers of the Deep Docks, responsible for the oversight and punishment of lesser workers.
original_zh_text: 深圳中心航站楼的高级管理人员将对下级工人进行监督和处罚。

original_en_text: Drifting creature with a wide coral mask and hard proboscis to stab its prey.
original_zh_text: 浮游生物使用巨大的珊瑚面具和又长又硬的鼻子来咀嚼食物。

original_en_text: The feeder’s curled pin looks designed to keep ravenous roaches at bay, and the tender from turning into the meal.
original_zh_text: 被甲虫覆盖的针叶似乎可以防止贪婪的甲虫成为猎物。

original_en_text: A creature born of a bug’s desperate hope for strength. Few possess the skill to call the void, and of those that can, none possess the means to tame it.
original_zh_text: 很少有人有能力创造真空，而有权力的人也没有能力驯服真空。

original_en_text: Dark-furred bug protecting itself with a spiked coral nut.
original_zh_text: 黑发昆虫用短珊瑚果实保护自己。

original_en_text: Thick-plated scuttler that prefers high places.
Drained worker on the verge of collapse. Consumed by the Haunting, they continue to work far beyond their mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 无助的工人正处于崩溃边缘。他们对混乱感到愤怒，并继续挑战自己的极限。

original_en_text: Cunning bug that hunts with darts fashioned from stake and bile.
original_zh_text: 他们使用指甲和胆汁制成的箭来捕猎隐藏的昆虫。

original_en_text: The void that will claim all things... In the barbed forms it chooses its nature can be seen clear.
original_zh_text: 它们的性质反映在它们选择的脊柱形状上。

original_en_text: Cogwork construct forged primarily for the Core’s protection. Bears a shield and poke-pin, and possesses a lethal understanding of their use.
original_zh_text: 该装置的结构主要用于保护核心。他拿起盾牌和针头，明白了自己的致命目的。

original_en_text: Small bony bug that favours dark tunnels. Can expand its spiked carapace to ward against attacking predators.
original_zh_text: 喜欢隧道的小虫子。它锋利的外壳可以膨胀以躲避捕食者。

original_en_text: Their sharp cleaning implement is as filthy as the rest of the place. They only layer grime on grime.
original_zh_text: 他们锋利的清洁工具和其他地方一样脏。他们只是在土壤表面铺上土壤。

original_en_text: High standing insect of the Choir, bearing a bow. This elite Reed has been trained and fed beyond its smaller fellows.
original_zh_text: 昆虫站在一把弓上，手里拿着弓。除了他们的小朋友之外，这个精英团队还培训和教育他们。

original_en_text: It lies low to the ground, perhaps out of reverence for its task, but can spring up suddenly to attack. Its shear makes for a deadly weapon with surprising reach.
original_zh_text: 你可能躺在地板上，完成你的使命，但突然他们攻击你。他的组织是一个惊人的致命武器。

original_en_text: Small automaton with a shielded shell, intended to carry loads of dangerous flintflame.
original_zh_text: 带有危险火焰运输保护壳的小型自动装置

original_en_text: They too seek the spectre at the Haunting’s heart, though I fear that foe would pose a challenge beyond their mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 他们仍在寻找心中的鬼魂，但他们担心这些敌人可能会带来超越国界的挑战。

original_en_text: Defeat {0} more to complete the hunter’s notes.
original_zh_text: 他输了。{0}按照猎人的注释添加内容。

original_en_text: Nesting creature that fuses its face with sharpened coral.
original_zh_text: 巢穴中的生物将它们的脸与锋利的珊瑚混在一起。

original_en_text: The moss looks to grow even inside their stomach, which the pilgrim spits at foes in compressed gobs. A foul form of offence.
original_zh_text: 苔藓似乎生长在山顶，朝圣者向敌人吐口水，形成压缩粘液。

original_en_text: Rare automaton intended to perform the ringing of bells and cymbals in the depths of the Core.
original_zh_text: 这是一款罕见的可以敲钟和敲钟的机器。

original_en_text: Disciple of the Choir, elevated above other pilgrims, and forced to cowl their face forever more.
original_zh_text: 角小丑总是比其他朝圣者更谦虚。

original_en_text: Pharloom’s structures seem almost built for them. The endless corners and cracks, so perfect for mites to burrow and nest.
original_zh_text: 法老的建筑主要是为他们建造的。无尽的角落和裂缝是理想的螨巢。

original_en_text: Flighted creature formed from coldshard. If shattered it will quickly reform.
original_zh_text: 飞行生物是由冰冷的垃圾制成的，一旦被摧毁就可以重建。

original_en_text: In every land, creatures find new and surprising ways to disguise themselves. One must be wary always.
original_zh_text: 在每一个国家，生物都找到了新的和令人惊讶的方式来伪装自己。我们应该时刻保持警惕。

original_en_text: Aggressive winged bug of the lowlands. When angered, it rapidly whips its bladed tail as a weapon.
original_zh_text: 当它们在低地引起昆虫袭击时，它们会立即使用刀片和尾巴作为武器。

original_en_text: Young ant hunter wielding sickles carved from teeth. Will often call for aid if danger comes close.
original_zh_text: 年轻的蚂蚁猎人被欺骗了。当危险来临时，他们经常寻求帮助。

original_en_text: Overgrown elder, able to spawn burning bubbles from within its coral-cased shell.
original_zh_text: 一旦被感染，黑莓手机的珊瑚壳就会产生燃烧的气泡。

original_en_text: Imposing old insect nesting in the heights of Shellwood. Her command of twig and branch ensured no pilgrim ever survived within her territory.
original_zh_text: 他对军队的控制确保了他的领土上没有朝圣者。

original_en_text: This bug’s fusion with the crust-growth... It seems intentional, though I imagine the union is far from comfortable.
original_zh_text: 蠕虫的融合和贝壳的生长。这似乎是故意的，但我认为工会对此并不满意。

original_en_text: Born and built only to work until time stiffens its limbs. Perhaps it is mercy this construct knows nothing of the freedom it lacks.
original_zh_text: 他们出生并被迫工作，直到时间硬化了他们的手脚，也许结构并不知道他们所没有的自由是仁慈的。

original_en_text: Warrior cartographer of a tribe from Pharloom’s edge. Her skills in battle could challenge the kingdom’s best.
original_zh_text: 他是边境农场部落的地图战士，拥有足够的战斗能力，可以挑战王国的巅峰。

original_en_text: Once one of Pharloom’s favoured bugs, and yet their domain and their shells would have been the first to fall to the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 亲爱的昆虫，它的田地和树皮，再次第一次落入鬼魂手中。

original_en_text: Hidden amongst their tower’s matching crust, these smaller bugs would have survived and thrived.
original_zh_text: 这些小昆虫隐藏在塔的壳中，可以生存和繁殖。

original_en_text: This one lived long and fed much. The wood will be much safer for their slaying.
original_zh_text: 最好在森林里杀死它们。

original_en_text: They once teemed around their tower, in numbers immense. It is a rare chance to witness such a bountiful display of life.
original_zh_text: 他们聚集在塔楼周围，这是逃离奢华生活的宝贵机会。

original_en_text: Burrower that nests in the Bellvein and seeks out hard bells to protects its soft body.
original_zh_text: 尼安德特人发现了坚硬的山峰，并在海豚身上筑巢来保护它们柔软的身体。

original_en_text: It is easy to be caught off-guard by the ricocheting trajectory of its flung mask, especially in tight corners.
original_zh_text: 尤其是在近距离拍摄时，很容易失去他画的面具的痕迹。

original_en_text: Time allowed their shell to grow thick, all the better for battering their targets.
original_zh_text: 时间会刺穿他们的外壳，并将自己附着在更高的目标上。

original_en_text: Arachnid that nestles within dark holes in cavern roofs. Pounces on prey from far above.
original_zh_text: 蜘蛛生活在洞穴顶部的黑洞中，向远处的猎物飞去。

original_en_text: A monster in the classic form of tales from youth. Its slaying was done as much by my fierce travelling companion as by myself.
original_zh_text: 一个典型的年轻怪物，被我和我可怕的同伴杀死了。"

original_en_text: Passively waits for prey to blunder into its path. A technique that should not necessarily be derided. Whatever is effective is best.
original_zh_text: 当当地的雷声突然袭击他的道路时，他被动地等待着。技术不应该被削减。最有效率的人是最好的。

original_en_text: My unique shell can resist the darker deformations of this substance, but even I have limits...
original_zh_text: 我独特的外层抵抗这种材料的黑暗变形，但它也有局限性。

original_en_text: Screeching scavenger dyed black in mourning at their land’s collapse.
original_zh_text: 当地板掉下来的时候，尖叫的送葬者被涂成了黑色。

original_en_text: Amazingly, the creature carries the void’s black liquid in its stomach, violently spraying it forth if threatened.
original_zh_text: 令人惊讶的是，这种生物的腹部充满了黑色液体，当受到威胁时，它会猛烈呕吐。

original_en_text: A critical member of the larger flock. Without them present the Kai would be fast driven to extinction by larger predators.
original_zh_text: 如果没有它们，它们很快就会被大型掠食者灭绝。

original_en_text: Strong bug replete with rosaries. If angered they will whip their strings in a ceaseless onslaught.
original_zh_text: 强大的昆虫充满了玫瑰。如果我生气了，我就会继续工作。

original_en_text: To subsist on the sickly water in this fetid environment it spits out the most toxic elements. Over generations, this former survival technique has turned into an effective hunting tool.
original_zh_text: 去除最有毒的元素才能在如此困难的环境中生存。经过几代人的努力，这项生存技术已成为有效的狩猎工具。

original_en_text: Far more hostile than their younger companions but seemingly less likely to roam far from their nest.
original_zh_text: 它们比年轻的同伴更具敌意，但很少离开巢穴。

original_en_text: Depressed thespian, consumed by the melancholy of a collapsing world.
original_zh_text: 这位抑郁的演员被世界崩溃的黑暗所笼罩。

original_en_text: Once exulted chef, exiled from the Citadel for repeated culinary crimes.
original_zh_text: 一名同性恋厨师因一系列烹饪违规行为而被赶出城堡。

original_en_text: Feeble servant of the Underworks with a long twistpin and hard shell.
original_zh_text: 虚弱的仆人披着披肩和硬毯子。

original_en_text: Starved servant of the Slab, bearing a hooked longpin.
original_zh_text: 饥饿的石奴手里拿着一根长针。

original_en_text: Spherical, winged automaton housing many sharp spikes.
original_zh_text: 机关枪，有球形翅膀，里面有许多锋利的尖刺。

original_en_text: Their plump, round shape makes them well-suited for target practice. Difficult to resist testing my aim on them...
original_zh_text: 它又厚又圆，是射击练习的完美选择。“很难抗拒我目标的考验。"

original_en_text: Elder Drapefly grown big from age and consumption. Its heavy body allows it to hit much harder than its younger companions.
original_zh_text: 旧船随着年龄和努力而成长，沉重的船体可能比年轻的朋友更难对抗。

original_en_text: Final arbiter of the Blasted Steps, tasked to ensure only the sinless ever step beyond the Grand Gate.
original_zh_text: 爆炸阶段最终调解人的任务是确保只有无辜者才能通过大门。

original_en_text: This one chose to embrace the doom to come. I shall not share such easy surrender.
original_zh_text: 他决心接受自己的命运，而我却轻易放弃了。

original_en_text: Gentle glider of Mount Fay. Its downy wings and cowl allow it to resist even the most cutting cold.
original_zh_text: 柔软的山地植物，有柔软的翅膀和带子，可以抵御最寒冷的寒冷。

original_en_text: Heavy, hard-shelled charger relying on weight and strength.
original_zh_text: 重型刚性装载机取决于重量和强度。

original_en_text: This one’s husk held a masterful talent, to weave Silk into blazing runes. Throughout my life, I have seen runes woven for many tasks. Was she the first to hone such skills?
original_zh_text: 人类有编织火链的天赋。我一生中见过很多龙。这是您第一次学习这项技术吗？

original_en_text: This one disturbs me... There is something in its simplicity. Do I almost feel fear?
original_zh_text: 她很担心他们。你害怕这种简单吗？

original_en_text: Myth made real in memory. The creature seemed completely at one with the flora around it. Did it ever truly exist as I have seen it?
original_zh_text: 神话就是记忆中的真理。这种生物似乎与周围的植物完全融为一体。正如你所看到的，它存在。

original_en_text: Simple. Graceful. Another fine bug lost forever from these lands.
original_zh_text: 另一种奇怪的昆虫从地球上永远消失了。

original_en_text: His desire to see Pharloom saved may have been well intentioned, but he seemed quite happy for others to die upon the stage in pursuit of his goal.
original_zh_text: 他可能想拯救他的农场，但他很高兴其他人为了推进他的职业生涯而立即死去。

original_en_text: Brave worker carrying unstable flintflame and wearing a heavy bell to protect against potential ignition.
original_zh_text: 勇敢的工人携带不稳定的易燃物质，并佩戴沉重的铃以防止烧伤。

original_en_text: Its bright gems could be used to make beautiful, but short-lived jewellery. An amusing idea for a gift... or a trap.
original_zh_text: 闪亮的珠宝可以用来制作美丽但持久的珠宝。

original_en_text: Small burrowing ant, servant to the larger Skarr.
original_zh_text: 大骷髅的蚂蚁和仆人在一个小洞穴里。

original_en_text: Heavy, hairy jailer responsible for capturing sinners and punishing prisoners.
original_zh_text: 他们是一支沉重而软弱的警卫，抓捕罪犯并惩罚囚犯。

original_en_text: Small fluttering creature capable of defending itself with its small stinger.
original_zh_text: 这种小飞行生物可以用一根小针保护自己。

original_en_text: Agile bug of Pharloom, its higher functions have been lost to the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 前灯缺乏灵活性导致混乱和高级功能丧失。

original_en_text: Old warrior guarding the border of their domain, stiffened by time and awoken by song.
original_zh_text: 边境巡逻队退伍军人在温和的天气里唱歌醒来。

original_en_text: More dangerous in the moment of its explosive and corrosive death than it ever was in life.
original_zh_text: 爆炸性和腐蚀性的死亡时刻比生命中的任何其他时刻都更危险。

original_en_text: The core member of a powerful order, trained fearless and faithful. Theirs was a kingdom of warriors, one built upon their blades.
original_zh_text: 强大邪教的主要成员训练有素、勇敢、忠诚。他们的王国是一个战士的王国，建立在他们的骨头上，他们是最强大的。

original_en_text: If the woody hide is shattered, the bug will still bravely, foolishly try to attack.
original_zh_text: 即使牛撕裂了一棵树，昆虫也会大胆而愚蠢地攻击它。

original_en_text: Young acolyte raised in the darkest vaults, destined to ascend to the rank of Scrollreader.
original_zh_text: 年轻的弟子在最黑暗的宝藏中长大，注定会在羊皮纸读者中得到晋升。

original_en_text: Learned disciple of the Choir charged to maintain the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 一位才华横溢的合唱团学生负责保护城堡的纪念碑。

original_en_text: Heart of the Haunting, long lulled to slumber and desperate to wake. The higher being’s threads stretched throughout Pharloom, snaring its bugs and driving them to madness and discord.
original_zh_text: 心灵是鬼魂，沉睡，渴望醒来。生活先进的孩子们在雨中行走，驱除昆虫，带领他们与疯狂作斗争。

original_en_text: Vigorous old knight and their noble companion, working together to see their lands cut free from haunted madness.
original_zh_text: 一位古老的精神骑士和一位高贵的同伴共同努力，将地球从鬼魂的疯狂中解放出来。

original_en_text: Winged insect that feeds upon moss and lichen in the caves above Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 一种有翼的昆虫，以苔藓为食，咬骨头下的真空
兄弟信号&amp;格伦的重要性

original_en_text: Mournful creature tasked alone to expel the Citadel’s choking refuse. Their talent with a longpin is unmatched.
original_zh_text: 勇敢的生物的任务就是独自清理城堡中令人印象深刻的垃圾。他作为远程士兵的天赋是无与伦比的。

original_en_text: They ceaselessly churn through rock and bone without ever seeming to rest. Do they have a destination? Or are they compelled to dig forever deeper?
original_zh_text: 他们不断地在石头和骨头之间移动，似乎从未休息过。

original_en_text: Obese offshoot of Muckroaches, born of the Citadel’s exhaust smog. The winged roach’s sagging stomach is filled with sizzling bile.
original_zh_text: 一只甲虫，一根大树枝，从城堡的排水沟里飞出来，他虚弱的胃里充满了嘶嘶声和胆汁。

original_en_text: Ancient Weaver condemned for a transgression lost to time.
original_zh_text: 一位古代工匠被指控犯下迷失时间罪。

original_en_text: A fine shot with its sharp mask. Its aggression has no ill effect on its aim.
original_zh_text: 美丽的照片，美丽的面具，攻击性不会影响目标

original_en_text: Seeming soft, but hiding a sharp surprise. Any larger predator attempting a bite would learn a pointed and painful lesson.
original_zh_text: 这种咀嚼可能看起来很舒服，但它隐藏着一种尖锐的惊喜。试图询问的大掠食者得到了艰难而痛苦的教训。

original_en_text: Not a bug but a projection of another’s will cast in smog and Silk.
original_zh_text: 不是昆虫，而是其他昆虫被扔进烟雾和丝绸中。

original_en_text: Broken construct built by Weavers past, able to fire a focused beam of silklight to carve halls and chambers through ice and bone.
original_zh_text: 一旦被毁，韦弗的建筑就能够通过冰、骨雕盐和房间辐射来自马赛的浓缩空气。

original_en_text: Short-lived sprite born of flickering flame.
original_zh_text: 一个转瞬即逝的灵魂在明亮的火焰中诞生。

original_en_text: Slow drifting bug with a heavy top shell. The bug reacts little to threats, even those that could claim its life.
original_zh_text: 昆虫的皮肤很厚。即使对生命构成威胁，这个漏洞也几乎没有得到回应。

original_en_text: Bell-clad bug responsible for mining the deeper, treacherous depths below their docks.
original_zh_text: 守护者负责在码头下挖掘更深、更危险的深处。

original_en_text: Toothy growth that lives on cave roofs. Wraps wayward bugs with its long tongue and drags them up to be consumed.
original_zh_text: 洞穴的屋顶上躺着一种有齿的植物，长长的舌头上包裹着邪恶的昆虫。

original_en_text: Fine winged flyer that survives in flocks.
